story:
"If you’ve got a great pair of earbuds that just aren’t the right fit for your daily workout, this is the solution you’ve been looking for."

 

"The earhoox stayed in place and I did not even feel them in my ears. Amazing and ingenious design if you ask me!"

 

Absolut(ly) Fit - www.50by25.com

"I never wear them [Apple earbuds] because they're not comfortable, don't fit my ear, always fall out,...But adding the soft, flexible rubber of earhoox helps you to get a great fit, and makes them so comfortable that you almost forget you have them in."

 

"earhoox has created a solution for runners, cyclists, and athletes from all sports to secure their earbuds, making them more comfortable, and less apparent during intense exercise."

 

earhoox™ - Sky Blue 

 

Clara puts earhoox to the test


 
 
 
 
 


 

earhoox™ for EarPods (Coming Soon!)

earhoox™ Signature T-Shirt 
 
earhoox™ Performance Dry Fit Shirt 
 
Men's Performance Pullover

Women's Performance Pullover with Thumbholes

 

 

  • Provide honest & constructive feedback on our product
  • Test earhoox™ as hard as you can, and send us the proof!
  • Like & Follow us on Facebook & Twitter and check out the earhoox™ Instagram 
  • Spread the word and help us reach our fundraising goal so that we can deliver the earbud cure to the world

Who are earhoox™ designed for?

earhoox™ are designed for everyone, with athletes in mind. The team took to the drawing board to solve a common problem, and focused on how individuals move with their music and their earbuds. We found that running, and intense exercise are a great reason pop in a pair of earhoox™, but that life is a great reason to keep them in. Whether wearing them for comfort, security, or style, earhoox™ will be there for you.

Where do I specify the color I want?

Please leave a comment with your color choice. 

Where do I specify the clothing size I want?

Please leave a comment with your size choice. 

What am I supporting?

The earhoox™ team has two goals for this project to fund. First, we plan to fund the production molds required to produce thousands of earhoox™ for the earhoox™ fan base! Secondly, we plan to fund the design and production of retail packaging that suits our brand, and that we would be proud to display on shelves in stores around the world.

How do earhoox™ work?

earhoox™ have two main features: the tire and the shark fin tip. Made of durable silicone, the tire stretches around any circular earbud to create a snug fit that keeps earhoox™ in place at all times. The shark fin tip comes in two sizes, Large & Small, which provides a flexible shape to apply outward pressure and traction to key points of the ear. Together, the tire and shark fin tip transform your ordinary earbuds and elevate your listening experience.

How do I know which size I am?

Every set of earhoox™ comes with a pair in both sizes: Large and Small. We haven't found an ear that doesn't fit one of these sizes! So when you receive your set, try on both, pick a preference and then share the other pair with a different sized friend!

"I love it, so what now?"

Jump over to the perks section on the right hand side. We have created a bunch of options for you, and we hope you find one that suits you as well as earhoox™ themselves will. If you don't, and you have an idea or a request, just shoot us an email at answers@earhoox.com!

 

Anthony's custom color, Fierce Red.
 

We want our supporters to love earhoox™ forever…so we made sure to mitigate as many risks as possible leading up to our launch:

• earhoox™ have already been fully designed, prototyped and tested! We’ve seen how our ‘testers’ love them and we know you will too! 

• Some of our testers have been consistently wearing their earhoox™ for the past 6 months with no signs of wear, so we know they can withstand a beating! 

• We’ve developed a great relationship with our manufacturer during our exhaustive prototyping phase. They are ready to ship as soon as we hit our funding goal! 

• Our manufacturer is prepared to fulfill our expected goal – but they are also prepared to fulfill a much larger order (while maintaining quality) if earhoox™ are a wild success!
 
• If any setbacks were to occur during the fulfillment process, we would keep our supporters very informed via personal messages and our social networks (Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram)

With that said, we do believe our final challenge to overcome is getting the word out. earhoox™ needs to reach a lot of people to be successful. We’ve asked all our friends and family to spread the word, but that’s not enough. With so many great projects out there, we’re asking everyone to please share earhoox™ with your friends!

Photo Credits: Somar Productions and Promotions

Video Credits: Gravity Sleeps

story:
With the rise of the Wi-Fi network and everything today going mobile, the traditional printer can't fully meet your printing demands when you are suddenly struggling to find a place to print and want to print on various surfaces although it has powerful printing capacity. There's a mobile printer Selpic P1 that will fit your needs and make printing truly mobile.

Selpic P1 is a well-rounded portable printer for handling all your printing needs at home, in the office, or on the go. Selpic P1 uses inkjet technology but operates like a pen, allowing you to print photos, barcodes, QR codes, or just plain text on almost any porous surface, not limited to just paper. And it does all this right from the palm of your hand.

 



 


New inkjet printing systems such as this one are extremely impressive in their versatility. Selpic P1 supports printing at any angle, including horizontal and vertical orientation, and can switch printing direction from left to right or right to left.


With a built-in line break function, Selpic P1 has the ability to print either a single-line or across multiple lines. The number of printable lines is almost limitless.

Also, with the print ruler, you can better find the starting point and set up the printing position much more accurately and quickly.


Using the built-in microphone in your smartphone, the Selpic P1 app is able to turn your spoken words into text. The speech recognition is extremely high-quality and you can print the results at the touch of a button. This can be really handy when your hands are full or when you are speaking to a group, for example in education or business.

 



With the intuitive and user-friendly interface, you can customize any design on the dedicated app to create unique prints. You don't need to learn any fancy software or have any particular design skills.

Simply connect to a wireless network, add your custom design, and slide the printer onto any surface. Your creative work will be printing in just 3 steps.

 



The remarkable Selpic P1 can print almost anything, including text, logos, memes, QR codes, barcodes, and more, on any porous surface. It works perfectly on textiles, leather, wood, metal, plastic, paper, and even on curved or uneven surfaces. It does all this in high-quality, and allows you to save paper and make use of creative materials.

 



There are 8 cartridge colors available, which could meet all personalized printing demands. You can get the amazing color and print effects whether on dark or light surfaces. Just experience outstanding and vivid print quality using Selpic cartridge.


 



Selpic P1 has built-in 600 x 600 DPI, and is equipped with 300 nozzles and has nozzle spacing of just 0.002 inches. Each nozzle can eject 18 million drops per second, producing incredible quality and detail without missing a beat and with zero banding issues. There's no need to worry about misprints or fuzzy detail.

 

Weighing just 92g (0.21Ibs) and featuring an ergonomic pen-like shape, Selpic P1 is the smallest and lightest inkjet printer ever. The extremely compact design allows it to fit in a pocket, backpack, or any small workspace, allowing for easy transportation and saving space.

 

With a single cartridge, Selpic P1 is capable of printing over 90 pages of A4 papers. And installing replacement cartridges can be done in seconds. Simply press the lock button, pull out the old cartridge, and insert the new one. That's all there is to it!

 

Following minimalist design principles but retaining sophistication, this mobile printer is designed in a pen shape and is able to fit into the palm of your hand. Selpic P1 uses solid matte black and pearl white, and the refractive matte finish accentuates an ethereal sense of depth that reveals elegance and inner peace in every shade. Enjoy fast, effortless printing wherever you go.

 

Provided a collection of software development tools, Selpic P1 makes it easy to add additional features and custom mobile app development needs. Just build your mobile application and extend more printing possibilities.

 

 



 

We are striving to build a world-class printing brand with the purpose of delivering high-quality products and excellent customer service. Selpic P1 is not our first product, and we have already gained lots of loyal customers and a strong reputation from our earlier products.

 



 



 



Founded in 2016, Selpic Inc. is a California-based company in USA focusing on digital printing solutions. Selpic aims to change the way people experience printing by providing leading products to simplify your daily life. We leverage technology with creative designs and hardware innovation for the benefit of our users.

The Selpic crew is a team of tech lovers with a passion for technology and innovation. Our team is comprised of bright minds with rich experience in tech research, industrial design, product development, and manufacturing.

 





Note: The above specifications may change according to the progress.

 





Add-On Perk: You can also add extra cartridges on Selpic P1's Checkout page.

 



 



 

With 5 subsidiaries and nearly 600 employees worldwide, Selpic has achieved notable success based on good financial support and a strong supply chain team. It’s important to note that we have already finalized a successful round of trial production. The hardware is already fully verified in production and the app runs steadily and smoothly after three releases.

With the help of our strong supply chain, we believe we can minimize almost all the potential risks of this journey. However, just like any other smart hardware product, unexpected delays related to production and logistics may occur as we have to cooperate with various suppliers, purchase a large number of components, and complete production through complicated procedures. However, we promise we will work closely with the factory to ensure production runs smoothly from beginning to end. Should any lapses occur, we will keep you informed of the latest updates.

story:
My name is Scott Herman and I'm 30 years old. I have been growing my beard for a little over eight months now and it's coming to the point that I am willing to shave it off despite how much self fulfillment I've had from growing such a nice majestic beard. So I came up with a wonderful plan which is to shave my beard off if my goal is raised ($5000) by 12/20/2012. I will then shave my beard off and present the money I raised to Toys For Tots. It's a means for me to give a little something to those who are less fortunate this Christmas Holiday.

If I don't reach the $5000 goal, I will still give what funds I was able to raise to The Toys For Tots Foundation.

If you are unable to donate at this time, please help me spread the word and share this with your friends on all your social networks!

story:
The beginning

Newspapers reported the growth of animals kidnapping, an event of international scale but a crime very poorly studied, with no precise references and with understimated effects.

Often people who are victims of this vile and disgusting crime feels abandoned, with any kind of support from institutions and pinning their hopes in isolated actions, like to post a Facebook message or put a print on a streetlight.

No one knows what happen to the people that suffer this separations, often alone person that dump all their solitude in the only thing that they have, their "best friend". Not least all the children that cannot understand "why" someone could be pluck out their play-friend.

We want help all this people.

Leonardo is a 36 with a fourteen years experience in professional system-administrator, studying law and working actually in a Security Company and Private Investigations.
Stefano is 34 programmer, with senior experience abroad and passion for criminology.
Each in love for animals.

We want to create a national centralized database, where everyone is involved in this crime can share a lot of informations: missing report, animal details, date and time, location, microchip information, pictures, and any other info ( like a suspects seen around the location the days before etc.) that can help to create an information network to link other cases with the hope to catch the person responsible of the crime and work as a deterrent for future actions.

Project include geo-localization of crimes ( a crime map).

We want create a separate access for law enforcement and all the animal rights organizations that want to cooperate with the project.

We started! But we need your help!

What We Need & What You Get

What we already did?

  • Founded a noprofit  Cultural Association.
  • Designed a database schema and planned all that we needs to build up the system ( hardware needed, software implementation and scalabilty etc.)

We'll deploy all our skills. and our free time.

What we need to do:

  • Create a website of Association
  • Buy all the hardware technology to create a strong structure, load balanced with no downtime for maximum reliability.
  • Create a strong structure to host any sensible data.
  • Create all the software application, graphics and all other we need to do something light and easy-use.
  • Install all services we need ( mail servers, web servers etc.)
  • Buy some hardware in use for who'll manage and maintain the website, answer to the requests etc.
  • Create Android Application for smartphone use.
  • Create a small office with all needs
  • Create all graphics materials
  • Ask for legal advice
  • Ask for a english translation of the site
Our goal is to be online in 2015.
Every step of the project will be shown on the website of association. Every donors will be informed about the developement of the project and we think to create a section in website to thanks everyone that helped us!

Other Ways You Can Help

Donate and share this to help us!

story:
PARADIGM (N.) A model or pattern. A theory or a group of ideas about how something should be done, made or thought about.  

The best is yet to come!

Imagine when your favorite Moleskine and Leuchtturm1917 notebooks are combined.

You will get a hybrid of sophisticated high-quality product that is The Paradigm Journal.

A simple and minimalistic tool that gives you maximum results. Paired with the right tool, this journal becomes the perfect place to brainstorm new ideas, capture moments of inspiration or gather your thoughts. Every great idea deserves the space to develop it.

Our goal is to be a part of your new adventure. A commitment to start doing and to do more.

THE PARADIGM JOURNAL

IS NOW AVAILABLE ON OUR WEBSITE

 

GET YOUR COPY HERE!

 

Our mission is to have more and more people use The Paradigm Journal.

An opportunity for you to do something not only for yourself but for others. YES, do a thing or two for a person. The first step to doing more.

SHARE THIS PROJECT

This journal is your companion to accomplishing more.

- A true definition of a journal

F E A T U R E S

I N  A  G L A N C E

DETAILS

D A I L Y  P A G E S

W E E K L Y  L A Y O U T

Other cool features

In a world that is being advanced with digital space we aim to restore and curate the most basic yet essential tools in our lives.

We are ready to ship your journals as soon as the campaign ends.

A VERY EXCLUSIVE REWARD SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR THIS CAMPAIGN ONLY.

A TIMELESS PIECE.

We bring you The Quintessentiale Watch. 

This is your first look to our other project. All the way from city of love, France.

T H A N K  Y O U

This is a whole new journey for us and a very special one. We are glad to share this project to all of you and that you maybe able to accomplish you goals in life. Thank you so much for your support.

R I S K S  A N D  C H A L L E N G E S

We have partnered with some of the best manufacturers to create world class products. When we created this journal we thought that we wanted to make it different from all other journals in the market. We have gone through a lot of changes and updates from the design to the final layout. We wanted to make it simple and easy to use but at the same time be able to attain to its promise and hopefully make a difference.

We wanted to reach as many people as possible around the world so we decided to make this project available to all. Although we are aware of the challenges that might come in terms of International Shipping we want to ensure all of our backers and supporters that we will make it happen. At the end of the day we will make sure that you will have The Paradigm Journal in your hand. We will start on the information survey right away as soon as the campaign ends.

As this is an ongoing project we are hoping for your support and we truly appreciate it. We also welcome your ideas or for any questions give us a shout out at ask@quintessentiale.com. Again THANK YOU so much.

We bring you The Quintessentiale Watch. 
This is your first look to our other project. All the way from city of love, France.

T H A N K  Y O U
This is a whole new journey for us and a very special one. We are glad to share this project to all of you and that you maybe able to accomplish you goals in life. Thank you so much for your support.
R I S K S  A N D  C H A L L E N G E S
We have partnered with some of the best manufacturers to create world class products. When we created this journal we thought that we wanted to make it different from all other journals in the market. We have gone through a lot of changes and updates from the design to the final layout. We wanted to make it simple and easy to use but at the same time be able to attain to its promise and hopefully make a difference.
We wanted to reach as many people as possible around the world so we decided to make this project available to all. Although we are aware of the challenges that might come in terms of International Shipping we want to ensure all of our backers and supporters that we will make it happen. At the end of the day we will make sure that you will have The Paradigm Journal in your hand. We will start on the information survey right away as soon as the campaign ends.
As this is an ongoing project we are hoping for your support and we truly appreciate it. We also welcome your ideas or for any questions give us a shout out at ask@quintessentiale.com. Again THANK YOU so much.

story:
Welcome to

"The Next Generation of Social Media Catalog Shopping!"

Use our Browser based Solution

On ALL Your Favorite Devices: iPad, Android Tablets, Surface, Kindles, iPhone, Smartphones - - and, of course, Your Mac or PC.

ABSOLUTELY, NO Readers, Downloads or APP’s are Required for ANY Device


It’s Revolutionary!


Catalog Gallery features a wide variety of many different types of Digital Catalogs from Major USA & Canadian "BRAND" Name companies. Shop, Browse & Share these Catalogs - - ALL from our “ONE–STOP SHOP”, Right in Facebook. 

NOW, “Without leaving Facebook”, you can “Shop” your favorite Catalogs & “Share” with your friends what you are thinking of buying - - get their opinions (Will this color look good on me? - - Is this watch too expensive? - - Is there a better deal somewhere else?)

It’s just like having all your friends in the store with you!

Also, you can see what your friends are shopping for in your "Facebook Newsfeed" and share your views and opinions with them.

CATALOG Gallery is the ONLY Social Catalog Shopping System fully integrated into Facebook & connected to all your favourite Social Media Sites.

It’s Revolutionary!

We hope you will join us to make “CATALOG Gallery” a tremendous, Worldwide success!



OUR EXPERIENCE

Our Team has extensive experience in the Digital Media industry. Currently, we supply “Customized” Digital Catalogs to many Major USA & Canadian "BRAND" Name Retail & Catalog companies.


Ron - President (Visionary)

Dan - VP Sales & Marketing (Let's people know)

Cam - VP Operations (Guides the Team)

Jeff - Graphic Designer (Makes it look good)

Jeff - Web Software Engineer (Get's it done)

Dennis - Programming Engineer (Makes it work)


We are really excited to bring you CATALOG Gallery. We have just about finished the final design and main implementation, but we need

YOUR SUPPORT

to complete the final integration of our proven software into the Facebook platform - - So, you too, can enjoy the Fun & Excitement of CATALOG Gallery, Right in Facebook.



Thanks for considering CATALOG Gallery, we hope you'll Join Us!!

story:
This campaign is for marketing my Website & Shipping Mobile App.. (Nationwide) U.S and Canada

Your contribution will help me achieve this.

The website allows its members to arrange their vehicle transportation, auto shipping made simple with out any Broker fees. Broker are middle man which normally charge a big fee. We only charge a montly membership fee.

Marketing Funds Needed

Where the funds will go

  • Marketing
  • Hiring 2 data entry clerk.
  • Telmarketing/Phone Sales
  • I-Phone App
  • Direct Mail

Our Products

  • Patent pending mobile app
  • Web Site
  • Trade Marks
  • Copyrights

Our Impact

  • This project is valuable to the contributor and also to shipper.
  • Shippers have Direct contact to Car Carrier. (No middle man)
  • Will be able to put people to work. Hire dispatchers. (Nationwide)

Our Mission

Our mission is to offer nationally competitive pricing and to simplfy the way dealers and carriers interact, for one low price ship all you want. It is as simple as scanning vin number with your smartphone

  • Other Ways You Can Help
  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember to share Us
  • Facebook US
  • Tweet US
  • Linkin US
  • Google US

story:
What Can Roofus Do?

The Roofus combines the functionality of a combination square, bevel, protractor, digital level and speed square, plus many very useful exclusive features into one compact easy to use tool. 

Mark accurate plumb cuts, birds mouth depth marks and seat cuts, without adjusting the tool or changing the tool's configuration.

Hip and Valley rafter cuts made fast by just flipping the tool over and using the reverse side scales.

       Mark angled checkouts in any Roofus configuration without adjustment to the tool. 


Pro models - Machined from solid aluminium with an anodized protective finish, laser etched artwork, engraved angle scales for high accuracy and high quality stainless steel and brass hardware.

Standard models - Made of high quality metal replacement composite resin with high quality stainless steel and brass hardware. 

Metric and Imperial variants in both standard and pro are available for to order.  Please note that your country may charge local taxes and import duties in addition to your order cost that may need to be paid when collecting your parcel.

You may need to hold your iPhone or smart phone landscape to see the images below with correct proportion.

Metric Roofus 'Pro' 

  • Degree Scale

  • Rise & Run Scale

  • Hip-Valley scales for each of the front scales on the tools' reverse side 

  • 350mm Metric blade

  • CNC Machined from solid Aluminium 

  • Protective Anodized finish 

US/Imperial Roofus 'Pro'

  • Degree Scale

  • Rise & Run Scale

  • Hip-Valley scales for each of the front scales on the tools' reverse side 

  • 14'' Imperial blade in sixteenths.

  • CNC Machined from solid Aluminium 

  • Protective Anodized finish 

 

 

About Roofus

I'm Sean Pepper a carpenter from Western Australia. As an apprentice roof carpenter, I noticed a problem with the layout process of building material, most importantly rafters. There were too many tools required to complete such a simple task, I wanted one layout tool that could do it all, but it didn't exist.  So I invented one. It began with many drawings and sketches as an apprentice and developed into a series of prototypes. Most of them once lived in my tool belt and were used on site until the next prototype took its place.  It took 7 years, 25+ working prototypes, and a lot of really hard work to reach the final production design you are buying/using today.

Other Ways You Can Help

A donation of even the smallest amount can go a very long way as it may not just be you that's donating. Any small donation would be hugely appreciated as every bit counts and will help get my invention on shelves all around the globe. If you just can't contribute right now, or you have but want to help out more, please share our campaign using the social media share buttons, and best of all, help out by 'liking' us on Facebook and tagging all your friends that might be interested in the Roofus.

story:
Modifi3D PRO is an evolution of the 3D print tool. It is now tougher and has more power. We have added adjustable temperature control with an LCD display. Temperature can now be set up to 450ºC to allow for future potential of new tips and attachments.

The PRO is designed to replace much of the sanding, scraping and snapping to finish off your 3D prints, and comes with 10 interchangeable tips. The new improved tips are stronger than before and provide more functions including the ability to produce countersinks and setting threaded inserts. See the tip section further down this page for the full range.

Modifi3D PRO has retained a light and compact form similar to the original tool. This lightweight form makes it easy to control and very comfortable to use. Below is a list of some Modifi3D PRO features.

Adjustable temperature gives precise control for different tasks and materials.

  • 10 interchangeable tips (full details below).
  • Simple and easy to use.
  • Lightweight and compact.
  • Rapid heat up to 200ºC in less than 25 seconds. (450ºC max)
  • LCD Display
  • Adjustable temperature control
  • More power (30W)
  • Adjustable Standby and Sleep modes
  • Basic stand included + downloadable 3D file to print your own stand/tool holder.
  • The ideal companion for your 3D printer.

Kit includes Modifi3D PRO, 10 x interchangeable tips, stand and DC power supply.

Modifi3D PRO is easy to use and takes away the frustration of finishing 3D prints. Simply plug in and it can be ready to use in 20-25 seconds.

The PRO also has options for standby and sleep modes if not being used (a basic stand is included but we will provide a downloadable 3D file so you can print your own stand/tool holder).

Below are basic instructions (note that these are subject to change in the final version of the product). Full detailed instructions will be provided with your reward.

  • Select a tip and thread into the heater cover tube. Leave the heater cover tube and locking nut in place (this is only for rotational adjustment if required).
  • Place Modifi3D PRO on the included stand and plug in.
  • When connected to power, it will start heating to the last selected temperature. The actual temperature will be shown on the LCD screen.

  • To set the temperature press the + / - buttons until the desired temperature is selected.
  • After a few seconds the temperature will start to change and the actual temperature will be shown on the LCD display.
  • Temperature is adjusted in 1°C increments. To adjust in 10°C increments click the + or - a few times and then hold down.

  • If Modifi3D PRO is still for the selected standby time, it will go into standby mode and the temperature will decline to the selected standby temperature. During standby mode, it will go into sleep mode after the selected time.
  • When Modifi3D PRO is moved, it will wake and go into working mode automatically and the temperature will rise to the last selected temperature.
  • Modifi3D PRO comes with a settings mode that can be used to adjust default standby and sleep times and temperatures.
  • Instructions for the settings mode will be provided with your reward along with the full detailed instructions.

  • To change tips unplug the DC power and allow the tips to fully cool.
  • Unscrew the existing tip from the end of the heater cover tube (leave the heater cover tube and locking nut in place)
  • Replace with your selected tip.
  • If you wish to rotate the tip, slightly loosen the locking nut and rotate the heater cover tube. Once at the correct angle simply tighten the locking nut.
  • Plug in the power supply.

Modifi3D PRO Heating Time.

All Modifi3D PRO tips include our special coating to prevent sticking and feature improved strength due to the new constuction.

The kit comes complete with 10 interchangeable tips making it easy to choose the right tool for the job.

Tip construction gives potential for new tips, adaptors and attachments to allow additional functions in the future.

  • Power: 30W
  • Input: 24V DC
  • LCD Display (Adjustable Temperature Control)
  • Temperature Range: 150-450ºC (302-842ºF)
  • Handle Size: 29mm x 17mm x 100mm (1.1" x 0.6" x 3.9") excluding tips
  • Handle Weight: 30g (1oz) approx.
  • DC Power Supply (US, EU, UK, AU)
  • Cable: 1.5m (59") long to 3.5 x 1.35mm DC plug

After receiving a lot of feedback from the original Modifi3D and getting a vast number of requests for a more powerful, temperature controlled version we started the process of building a Modifi3D PRO towards the end of 2017.

Much of 2018 was spent testing and developing various iterations of design. We have built numerous prototypes in various formats before settling on its final form and function.

We devoted a lot of time to producing high quality tips giving a good selection of functions. These have been treated with our improved coating and have been trialed with numerous print materials. 

If you know someone who owns a 3D printer please share our campaign by clicking on the share buttons at the top of this page.

story:
Business has only two functions, marketing, and innovation. You either learn how to master these two, or you will soon see that without it, your business will fail. Marketing is essential to businesses, but it needs to be implemented in the right way. Don't get left behind! Become a MARKETING EXPERT on your own time with the world’s best online marketing education platform, and take advantage of the unique IndieGoGo introductory price!

With the Digital Marketing Strategist 2.0 system, you will MASTER ABILITIES like copywriting, email marketing, search engine optimization, analytics, social media marketing, and advertising for the web. Even if you're not super tech savvy, you will not only come out knowing how to market your product or other's products, but you will also be able to identify new marketing trends and profit from it.

You’ve probably heard the statistics: Americans owe over $1.45 trillion in student loan debt, spread out among about 44 million borrowers. That’s about $620 billion more than the total U.S. credit card debt. In fact, the average Class of 2016 graduate has $37,172 in student loan debt, up six percent from last year. It keeps growing. But you don't have to be one of them. Our limited rewards offered below will allow you to acquire a better marketing strategy without breaking the bank!

For as little as $60 you can kickstart your way to SUCCESS! If you're serious about growing your business and getting ahead of your competition, choose the reward that will bring you a lifetime of knowledge and experience!

Every business and entrepreneur must possess the ever-changing strategic skills in marketing to stay in business. We want you to excel in this essential and HIGH DEMAND skill. With our vast knowledge and expertise, you will gain the current skills you need to succeed while being able to spot new and upcoming marketing trends instantly and use them to your ADVANTAGE.

We live in a fast-paced world. Our many responsibilities pull us in all directions. This is why we have made it easy for you to use our videos, quizzes, case studies, practical exercises online, and more on your Mac or PC, tablet, and mobile devices anywhere, anytime! Your time is precious; the Digital Marketing Strategist 2.0 system will work around your schedule.

Imagine what could happen to your business, or to your job if you do not become a strategic digital marketer? Your business will fail, or you will be replaced... maybe by an algorithm. Don't get left behind!

Stop wasting your hard earned money and start the path to becoming your own marketing superstar with the Digital Marketing Strategist 2.0. Support us today!

Risks and challenges

After the funding is complete, we run the challenge of developing the video courses. As in typical video development, we could run into delays or other problems. Another issue is making sure we allocate the proper funds to pay the expert speakers while still delivering on time. The good news is our team has eight years experience in course video development with more than 200 hours of filmed courses for our company and on behalf of colleges and businesses, for external and internal training purposes. We are confident things will run as planned, but if there are any hiccups, we will keep our backers posted every step of the way!

story:
Imagine what it would feel like to leap out of bed every day knowing exactly what you needed to do. Then getting to the end of the week with a feeling of happiness and satisfaction because you had achieved everything you had set out to. Imagine waving goodbye to overwhelm, lack of focus, confusion, procrastination.


 

Visualize being guided along every day on your road to success by a simple and proven goal setting system that allows you to stay completely focused on what really matters. 

MY PA helps you break down your long-term mission into bite-size daily goals and tasks so everything is more manageable. There's a gratitude journal, weekly review and idea and inspiration vault for mind-mapping and doodling plus you have a daily health and fitness tracker.

People who set three goals every day are more likely to achieve them.

This is why at the beginning of each day there is a space to write your three most important goals for the day.

My PA is a stylish planner and goal setting system, designed to make you feel like you have your very own personal assistant.

My PA is more than just a planner, it's a road map for your success with everything you need to turn your vision into a reality. It's designed for creatives, freelancer & entrepreneurs who really want to make the most of their gifts and lives.

Think of it as having your very own 24/7 personal assistant helping you to stay on top of your game, stop you from feeling overwhelmed and help you make every single day count. There is a place for every goal, project, idea, thought or intention. 

 

A chic & stylish planner which you'll want to keep with you all the time

 

My PA guides you step by step from creating your vision to planning everything you need to do to achieve your goals and dreams.

 

 

 

 When your tasks are scheduled in pieces, you'll reach your bigger goals with ease instead of trying to do everything in one day (and reaching burnout). 

MY PA guides you step by step through creating your big goals and then listing the projects you need to do to achieve those goals. It then helps you to break these big goals up into smaller monthly, weekly and daily goals as you go along.  It makes everything more simple and straightforward and takes away all those feelings of being overwhelmed.

 When you make space for your ideas, you create a mindset that allows you to feel even more inspired creative.

A gratitude journal helps you notice the beauty and the good thing that already surround you and helps train your mindset to find more things to be thankful for.

"I practice being grateful "Oprah Winfrey said. And a lot of people say 'Oh Oprah that's easy for you, cause you got everything"

"On the contrary" Oprah argued "I've got everything because I practice being grateful"

You'll be sure to be more productive with the daily health and wellness tracker where you can record your exercise, mediation, and water intake daily. 
 

Have you ever written on paper and noticed your pen gliding across the page beautifully? We specifically designed MY PA  to give you that feel, upgrading the paper from other planners we saw on the market to create something you LOVE using. The lay flat section sewn binding is designed so even when you open your planner in the middle it will still lie completely flat. 

At 10 X 7 inches or 240 X 140 mm, the size is perfect and is between A4 and A5. Can be easily carried in a handbag or briefcase. The pages are section-sewn which makes it possible for the book to lie flat even when opened in the middle.

The matt laminate cover is easy to keep clean and flexi-bound, purposefully chosen to give a workable and friendly feel. The thicker elastic is designed to hold the notebook shut and can be used as a bookmark so that you can easily turn to the right page every time you open the notebook. There are two ribbon markers as well to help you keep other sections to hand.

FLEXI- BOUNDSECTION SEWN (lay flat binding)
115 GSM PAPERELASTIC TO KEEP IT ALL TOGETHER
2 X RIBBON MARKERS

 

The Members Club is an exclusive online Facebook Group where members connect and network with other like-minded entrepreneurs so they can continue to feel empowered, inspired, and motivated. The group will provide a place to sound ideas, find and give support and find accountability partners as well. 
 

We also realize that life is not just about work – it’s about balance. My PA provides support for health and fitness goals with a daily exercise, health and wellness tracker. 

 

.

 

Thank you so much for checking out our project.

We invite you to support us in our journey so we can help and support as many people as possible in their journey to success. All you need to do is back our project! ツ

 

Make 2019 your most connected, organized, productive and fun year yet! 

Risks and challenges

The biggest challenge facing most crowdfunding campaigns is shipping and getting the product to you, the customer, in time. We have this solved, and will be using a reputable fulfilment service.

We will do everything in our power for you to receive My PA on time and in top notch condition so you can start achieving your goals as soon as possible.

We would absolutely love it if you could share our campaign and help us get the word out about MY PA. Simply share our campaign, take a screenshot and send to mypaplanner@gmail.com & we'll send you the full PDF Version at the end of the campaign.
story_txt:
Imagine what it would feel like to leap out of bed every day knowing exactly what you needed to do. Then getting to the end of the week with a feeling of happiness and satisfaction because you had achieved everything you had set out to. Imagine waving goodbye to overwhelm, lack of focus, confusion, procrastination. 

Visualize being guided along every day on your road to success by a simple and proven goal setting system that allows you to stay completely focused on what really matters. MY PA helps you break down your long-term mission into bite-size daily goals and tasks so everything is more manageable. There's a gratitude journal, weekly review and idea and inspiration vault for mind-mapping and doodling plus you have a daily health and fitness tracker.

People who set three goals every day are more likely to achieve them.
This is why at the beginning of each day there is a space to write your three most important goals for the day.

My PA is a stylish planner and goal setting system, designed to make you feel like you have your very own personal assistant.
My PA is more than just a planner, it's a road map for your success with everything you need to turn your vision into a reality. It's designed for creatives, freelancer & entrepreneurs who really want to make the most of their gifts and lives.
Think of it as having your very own 24/7 personal assistant helping you to stay on top of your game, stop you from feeling overwhelmed and help you make every single day count. There is a place for every goal, project, idea, thought or intention. 

 
A chic & stylish planner which you'll want to keep with you all the time
 

My PA guides you step by step from creating your vision to planning everything you need to do to achieve your goals and dreams.



 


 


 

 When your tasks are scheduled in pieces, you'll reach your bigger goals with ease instead of trying to do everything in one day (and reaching burnout). 
MY PA guides you step by step through creating your big goals and then listing the projects you need to do to achieve those goals. It then helps you to break these big goals up into smaller monthly, weekly and daily goals as you go along.  It makes everything more simple and straightforward and takes away all those feelings of being overwhelmed.


 When you make space for your ideas, you create a mindset that allows you to feel even more inspired creative.


A gratitude journal helps you notice the beauty and the good thing that already surround you and helps train your mindset to find more things to be thankful for.

"I practice being grateful "Oprah Winfrey said. And a lot of people say 'Oh Oprah that's easy for you, cause you got everything"
"On the contrary" Oprah argued "I've got everything because I practice being grateful"

story:
ClayXYZ is the most user-friendly desktop clay 3D printer ever. Just load the clay, download the model and click start to enjoy it, the process of creation. It allows you to print your special cup, vase and bowl, in addition to artworks like mask, sculpture and building model. 

The print material, clay, makes it different from the traditional 3D printer. Clay can be reused, very environment-friendly. Besides, the standardized process of loading clay is as simple as changing a battery.

“Allowing you to create anything from intricate vases and bowls to masks and models, it’s a great idea — and something any self-respecting maker is going to want to add to their home studio.” -Digital Trends

“ClayXYZ promises to be a revolutionary tool for individual ceramicists and sculptures ”- Designboom

“ Printing in clay is getting more popular, where items could make fantastic gifts, mugs, light shades and models. It’s certainly a niche of 3D printing that’s worth exploring further.”-All3DP

                      We love to bring our incredibly magical design to life.

                                 Design Ceramic Musical Instrument

                                                                        See detail

                                     Intricately textured ceramic artwork

Turn your idea into reality. Design your personalized vase, bowl and lampshade. Everyone can be an artist, freely create your sculpture, mask and architecture. Decorate your life with artworks you printed, endowing you with a meaningful lifestyle. Also, you can send your artwork as a surprise gift to someone special. 

Making a ceramic Lamp at home is no longer impossible.

                                       Intricately textured ceramic artwork

                                             Drink Water with Your Printed Cup

Most of the previous 3D printers print out ABS or PLA plastic models, just product prototypes or models for display. Now you can use ClayXYZ to print out a unique cup, fire it in kiln. After that, the cup can be directly used to drink water. You can also 3D print your own lampshade and bowl, design your own warm home.

Three Steps to Start  

  • Load the clay: Load clay into the tube, then connect the tube with extrusion device. 
  • Download the model: start slicing software, download the model you want to print, then set such parameters as thickness and fill ratio. 
  •  Hit print: click start to send print order to the 3D printer. 

                                                   Three Steps to Enjoy

Don't worry about limited 3D design experience 

We share Library of Models. We are continuously developing and adding new models on our Website or Thingiverse. So far, we have successfully printed many models, like cups, kettles, bookends, mask and Great Wall. All those models have been tested, which can be perfectly realized by ClayXYZ.

                                     You can download models from clayxyz.com

 Also, users can upload awesome models to our website, share them with others. 

You can repair the printed artwork

You are able to choose different clays to deliver different styles. Also, you can glaze the artwork if you want it more fascinating. Glaze it with different colors, then fire it via kiln. 

                                   You can repair the clay-printed artwork.

Extremely stunning! Besides, you can repair the clay-printed artwork. Don’t worry about making it worse. Melt it in the water and reuse the material. Pretty environment-friendly!

ClayXYZ helps you starting from 1 to ∞

With ClayXYZ, you will be free from spending much time on the same things. As an architect or sculptor, you can let ClayXYZ help you to print a lot of rough models, and then you can adjust and even recreate artworks on the basis of that. This is very time-saving! Just focus on making your most desirable design.

                                                    For Artists and Designers

The traditional 3D printer uses ABS plastic material which can not be reused. ClayXYZ uses the ordinary clay. You can dissolve it in water and reuse the material. Pretty environment-friendly.

                                                     Extremely fun

Easy to Get the Print Materials

You can buy it anywhere you can. Amazon Link

The clay is affordable for everyone.

Reusable Natural Material

Melt it in the water and reuse the material. Pretty environment-friendly!

                                                        Reusable Natural Material 

Try the Air Hardening Modelling Clay

                                                    Many different brands

  • Great for both classroom and studio use 
  • Doesn't require oven baking - air dries in 24 hours 
  • Super pliability helps build hand strength and fine motor skills 
  • Perfect for all ages

You do not need to worry about firing problems because of this kind of clay exists. It is easy to buy (Amazon Link), and the price is very affordable.

Fire the Model

Decorating it Before Firing  

You can add some decorating components when it is half-dry.

How to do it

  • Use a moist sponge to softly smear the surface of the dry model, until it is moist; 
  • Smear the glaze on the surface of the model, until the model is covered with 4 to 5 layers of glaze. Then air-dry the model. 
  • Add beautiful patterns on the surface by using other glazes if you like it. 
  • Put it into a kiln to fire it. 20 hours later, done!

If you just want to verify your design, then you do not need firing. If you want to make porcelain, you can choose to fire it. It is easy to buy (Amazon Link), and the price is very affordable.

                               ClayXYZ Extrusion Device for Clay

It can be compatible with many existing FDM 3D printers. The extrusion device employs special air compressor, perfectly remove bubbles out clay. In this way, improve the accuracy of printing, meet the needs of daily creation.

                                                          Tube and Compressor

If you already have an FDM 3D printer, you just need to buy the extrusion device to enjoy the fun of creating artworks from clay.

                                                                    Comparison

Hardware

  • Printer firmware: Arduino Mega2560 as master control, compatible with Reprap Marlin firmware. 
  • Extruder: high-precision stepper motor-driven spiral extrusion structure. 
  • Overall structure: aluminum XYZ three-axis high-precision stepper motor control structure, the accuracy of 15 microns.

Software

 

  • Supports Windows, Mac, or Linux 
  • Connected to PC via USB 
  • Supports model formats: STL, OBJ, STP, IGS 
  • Print control software: Repetier Host 
  • Compatible Slice Software: Slic3r or Cura

Print Materials

Support ordinary clay material. Improve clay performance by adding additives like gypsum powder.

How do We Control Accuracy?  

The overall mechanical frame is made of 2020 aluminum, employs screw drive linear guide structure. With Arduino Mega2560 as the master, the use of A4988 drive module to drive high-precision stepper motor, in addition to Marlin firmware compatible with Reprap printer, ClayXYZ’s mechanical precision reaches 15 microns.

More complete and unedited printing videos can be seen on our YouTube channel HERE. 

x100 Speed Up     

How do We Control Print Quality?  

The use of high-precision stepper motor drive extrusion device, along with the pressure valve and solenoid valve, achieves the control of clay pressure and switch. Ultimately, print precision comes to 0.2mm.  

How We Made It So Affordable?

Open source Arduino Mega2560 and Marlin firmware compatible Reprap are used to control XYZ triaxial motion of the printer, greatly reducing the cost on the premise of ensuring printer accuracy and quality. The use of recyclable ordinary clay as a raw material greatly reduces the cost of materials.  

High-Precision Extruder

                    The nozzle of Extruder has different diameters, variety.

                                                 Sydney Opera House model

                                                                            Clay Tube

A Ceramic Baby gift package includes 5 small vases and a real wood box. You can put a flower, a leaf to decorate your life. You can enjoy the beauty of ceramic with Ceramic Baby.

                                         Ceramic Baby Gift Package

○ Idea bursts& market research - October, 2015 

○ Prototype - May 2016  

○ Software Design - July 2016 

○ Industrial Design - November 2016 

○ The 1st-generation product - November 2016

○ The 2nd-generation product - January 2017 

○ Preparation for IndieGoGo - May 2017 

○ Launching on IndieGoGo - July 2017 

○ Collection of backer information - Augest 2017 

○ Production - December 2017 

○ Delivery - March 2018

  • Founder and CEO - John Fray,  a ceramic artist, having studying ceramics for 5 years. Love to extend ceramics to more people.
  •  Mechanical Engineer – Jesse Robichaux, a master of Mechanical Engineering, with 5-year work experience in mechanical design. Have a passion for robotics.
  • Electronic Engineer -Edwin Lozada, a master of electronics Engineering, works in the field of Electronics Design for 3 years. Expert in 3D printer.
  • Software Engineer - Joseph Shelton, a master of Software Engineering, 5 years in software design, loves ceramics.
  • Industrial designers - Anthony McNichols, 4 years in industrial design, once won IF Award
  • Product Manager - Christopher Juarez, responsible for interactive design and project management
  • Marketing - Violet R. Coleman, an expert in products development and marketing.
  • Supply chain management - Tommy Cheek, has rich experience of supply chain management, responsible for many large projects.

 My name is John, a ceramics enthusiast. I have a ceramics studio, spending over ten hours a day studying ceramics. Meanwhile, I would like to extend ceramics to the public, so I always open the studio to interested people to experience ceramic art. During that process, I found that many people wanted to realize their thoughts about design. Why don’t help them to realize that! So, the idea of designing a magical tool came to me. When I first started researching, the technology of 3D printing ceramics was an exciting and interesting one. But, the desktop 3D printers on offer were unable to live up expectations. Industrial 3D printers could make that but these would be too costly to produce. So I decided to work with the professional team, spent more than one year designing ClayXYZ, the best desktop clay 3D printer. 

Our goal of designing ClayXYZ is to want more people to experience the fun of DIY, let more people achieve their own ideas. When using ClayXYZ, no more worry about the harm of the print material, the clay is totally healthy. Besides, we even can glaze the clay model, fire it via kiln. You can directly use your DIY cups, bowls and lampshades, and decorate your home with those famous buildings and statues. A very interesting experience is that you are able to make a special gift for your friends via ClayXYZ.

 Click and Download Media Kit

Risks and challenges

Just like any other project, we face challenges when it comes to engineering, manufacturing and shipping. But what we have is not only a passion, an idea, a design, we also have the work experience and professional knowledge in the field of 3D printer, marketing and manufacturing. Our team members are based in CA, US and Dongguan, China to make sure that we are close to the factories. Our mechanical engineers, electronic engineers and software engineers have spent over one years designing, testing and upgrading ClayXYZ, finding solutions to make it fast and accurate to ensure its high quality.

As for the manufacturing and shipping, we have carried on the prototype trial production. Our team are very experienced in the relevant areas. CEO has studied pottery for 4 years. The mechanical engineers, electronic engineers, software engineers and supply chains have more than 5 years of experience in related areas. We are confident that we will complete the mass production and deliver ClayXYZ on time. We will update the production and delivery information, keep informing you with the latest progress of the project.

You can directly use your DIY cups, bowls and lampshades, and decorate your home with those famous buildings and statues. A very interesting experience is that you are able to make a special gift for your friends via ClayXYZ. Click and Download Media KitRisks and challengesJust like any other project, we face challenges when it comes to engineering, manufacturing and shipping. But what we have is not only a passion, an idea, a design, we also have the work experience and professional knowledge in the field of 3D printer, marketing and manufacturing. Our team members are based in CA, US and Dongguan, China to make sure that we are close to the factories. Our mechanical engineers, electronic engineers and software engineers have spent over one years designing, testing and upgrading ClayXYZ, finding solutions to make it fast and accurate to ensure its high quality.As for the manufacturing and shipping, we have carried on the prototype trial production. Our team are very experienced in the relevant areas. CEO has studied pottery for 4 years. The mechanical engineers, electronic engineers, software engineers and supply chains have more than 5 years of experience in related areas. We are confident that we will complete the mass production and deliver ClayXYZ on time. We will update the production and delivery information, keep informing you with the latest progress of the project.

story:
About "Cool Jerk Soda Fountain" and Logan Day

Remember back in the 40's and 50's when having a "good time" with friends had a much more innocent meaning? Or maybe you aren't old enough to remember that, but you know that college students these days aren't so innocent...?

  • My name is Logan Day and I am a Sigma Chi fraternity member studying Entrepreneurship at Ball State University. Ever since I was a young kid, I've always felt like I was born in the wrong era and belonged back in the 40's where the music was brassy, the people were classy, and there were plenty of good times to be had.

  • This summer, I established and operated a mobile ice cream stand themed in the 40's & 50's called, Cool Jerk Ice Cream; and I am having a blast with it! The customers inspired me to expand on the idea by opening an old timey soda fountain in Ball State's student village.

    Everything from the phosphate beverages on the menu to the bow-tie around the soda jerks' neck will be an accurate snapshot of history from the iconic small-town drug store...

  • But I need your help raising the money to open this shop!

What do you think ... are you willing to help make this dream a reality?

What We Need & What You Get

    We Need Money For Things Like...

  • Rent, insurance, employees, renovation, vintage equipment, and other costs associated with start-up.


          If We...                                           We will...
               Reach Our $70,000 Goal:             open the soda fountain this Fall.

               Exceed $100,000:                    explore opening additional locations

           Don't Reach $70,000 Goal:        save money and launch another
                                                      campaign at a later date

    By Donating Money You Get...

  • Free stuff, customer rewards, recognition on our wall of top contributors, or even part ownership in the company!

Check out our "Perks" below for more information!

The Impact

Imagine...
A place where students can go to have some pure, unadulterated fun with friends. But I don't want to stop there...my ultimate dream is to franchise this and take it to other campuses so that students everywhere have the option of clean, healthy fun with their friends.

Your support will help create those good times and give students an alcohol-free alternative to the bars.

As a personal and professional commitment to my community, I will endeavour to uphold a reputation of outstanding philanthropic and volunteer-based service by establishing a company culture that encourages such involvement with the community.

     Non-Profits to Benefit:
          - Sigma Chi Foundation
          - Second Harvest Foodbank
          - Cardinal WINGS (Ball State Student Organization)
          - Many more...

Other Ways You Can Help

Just don't have the money to donate...?

You can still help us by spreading the word about this campaign. Share it with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media outlets.

Thanks for your help!

-Logan Day

P.S. Feel free to message me at www.facebook.com/cooljerkicecream or call me at (765) 405-0763 if you'd like to hear more about the project!

**Perks are only valid if campaign reaches or exceeds its goal. Alternative perks will be given if goal is not reached.

story:
The most featured notebook ever

In today’s world wherein technology & modernization are replacing every aspect of our life; one thing which remains mostly untouched is our notebooks. If you do a quick analysis on the history of notebooks & journals nothing much has changed as most of the features remain same.

We at MintMug thought this situation needs a check and initiated the process of developing the most beneficial and most featured notebook ever. After a yearlong period of research & development, numerous opinion surveys and countless prototypes we came up with “The Mont Notebook”.

 

 

With 30 plus prominent features such as ultra-slim solar calculator, ultra-slim USB drive, 2-in-1 pen, goal tree, multi-color cover (17 options), Mont page marker, gold foiling & so on; Mont notebooks are perfect amalgamation between traditional and modern aspects and are miles ahead of its predecessors.

We believe in the thought of “Continuous Learning” and invite you all to share your opinions, suggestions, feedback & selfies too :-) with us to make the Mont Notebook further refined.

Kindly, follow us on our social media channels or mail us for latest updates on Mont Notebooks.

Let your first step towards success start with the Mont Notebook.

We know that you, our backers make or break the projects. Hence, we require your support to spread the word to as many people you can.

For this we have designed 2 types of referral program wherein you can earn loads of rewards for your support.

Backers Champ

Ask your friends or family to back our project and for each referral purchase you will earn something additional.

 

Just mail

Snippet from Indiegogo

For a backer to count as a referrer, you must promote this campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account. This is important because otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to any resulting contributions or visits.

Example:

When Funder A is logged into their account and uses Indiegogo’s share tools to send a tweet, for example, the link in the tweet includes Funder A’s unique ID. Then, when Funder B reads the tweet and clicks through the link to contribute, Funder A is recognized as helping bring in the amount contributed by Funder B.

For more information, please mail us at info@mintmug.com

Social Champ

We have worked very hard to bring the Mont notebook to life and now we require you to support us in spreading the word.

 

1. Share: Share our Kickstarter project on any social media platform.

2. Mention: Mention the #themontnotebook and #mintmug  in your social media posts for easier tracking.

3. Send Us: Send the link or screenshot of the share to info@mintmug.com for our verification.

4. Receive: We will email your PDF or Flipbook version within 3 weeks of our campaign end date and your 2-in-1 pen will be sent as per the timeline.

Please refer to the FAQ section to know about terms & conditions.

Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Pinterest | Tumblr | Google+ | Others

 

Check out the layouts of various pages of the Mont notebook here!

Goal Tree

We all begin a new year with some prominent goals in mind. The Mont goal tree is a pictorial representation of growth and strong foundation to achieve those goals. It comes with 12 segments representing 12 months of a year. However, it's not bound to any time frame and you can use it as per your wish.

25 Years Calendar

One of the distinctive feature which keeps The Mont notebook  a class apart from other notebooks is the calendar for 25 years. Now enjoy searching the day of your silver jubilee in 2025 or the day of your birthday in 2035.

Monthly Layout

 

Find the blue squared numbers for the corresponding sections in monthly layout and read the pertinent description of the layout sections below.

1) Objectives: Jot down 4 prominent goals that you would like to achieve on this month (ex: revenue, sales, training, etc.) and in turn which may help you to achieve the year's goals.

2) Daily Tasks: Write out 4 things you want to do on a day to day basis and mark the box each day when you do that activity (ex: daily meet, mailers, workouts, etc.). Regular analysis of daily tasks ensures you reach towards the month’s goal.

3) Month's Priorities: We all know every month has its own set of priorities (ex: birthdays, celebrations, meetings, etc.); now never miss any important dates which require extra attention.

4) Month's Focus: List out the activities which you either want to fulfill or emphasize on this month (ex: gardening, jogging, planning, etc.). Focus activities may or may not aid towards realizing month’s objectives.

5) Monthly Calendar: Mont notebook comes with an open calendar wherein you are not bound to any dates or expiration issues. Now use the calendar whenever you want with utmost flexibility. Moreover, we are not providing you a calendar for 1 or 2 years, but for 25 years; isn’t it too good!

6) Notes: We always require spaces to write down our bits; we are providing you with 2 notes segments so that you never run out of spaces.

Weekly Layout

Find the blue squared numbers for the corresponding sections in weekly layout and read the pertinent description of the layout sections below.

1) Objectives: Jot down 4 prominent goals that you would like to achieve on this week (ex: Lab Projects, Team Lunch, Cardio, etc.)

2) Activity: Performing new activities leads to a positive personality (ex: learning a new language, visiting an new place, doing charity, etc.). Hence, make sure to write down at least one activity of your choice for the week in this section. We are not in favor of mentioning a predetermined activity for you as each individual and their sets of choices, activities, opinions are different.

3) Week's Priorities: Just like months, every week has its own set of priorities (ex: birthdays, School visit, outings, etc.); now never miss any important dates which require extra attention.

4) Week's Focus: List out the activities which you want to complete this week (ex: shopping, blog, classifieds, etc.). Focus activities may or may not aid towards realizing the week's objectives.

5) Weekly Calendar: Yes, you are right! The Mont weekly calendar starts on Monday, so that you can keep your weekends together. Additionally, it does not mention any hours of the day as we know everyone’s day doesn’t begin or end on same hours. Just like monthly planner, Weekly planner also comes with an open calendar wherein you are not bound to any dates or expiration issues. Now use the calendar whenever you want with utmost flexibility. Moreover, we are not providing you a calendar for 1 or 2 years, but for 25 years; isn’t it too good!

6) Daily Priorities: Never miss your day's to-do list (ex: picking kids from school,corporate presentation, rehearsal, etc. ) with daily priorities section.

7) Notes: We always require spaces to write down our bits; we are providing you with 2 notes segments so that you never run out of spaces.

 

 

 

 

Mintmug is a small team of highly qualified and experienced members who have carried out extensive market research and acquired comprehensive knowledge about the need of ingenuity. The team’s business dictum is meeting consumer requirements with the best and most innovative products.

We are extremely grateful to Google and Kicktraq team for their round the clock analytic support towards our campaign. Their dedicated units made sure that we never run out of vital data whenever required.

 

Thanks for making it to the end of the campaign page.

Here's your bonus, answer the famous personalities in the image below and mail us at info@mintmug.com. All the backers (pledge level 4 & above) with 100% correct answers will get a surprise gift along with their shipment.

You can also mention that you have cracked the puzzle in the comment section after mailing us for a quick response from our side and please don't mention the answers there; Lets not make it easy for others.

Cheers!

story:
Get the stands at our official website www.creatiodesign.net

 

Ridge Stand now is called Rmour® Stand from 2020.

 

------------------------------------

People, get away from neck and back pain from now on with Ridge Stand 2.0 

 

 

Why Ridge Stand 2.0

 

Tired of pains in your neck and back from prolonged laptop use? Do you feel your laptop overheating? Looking for easy-to-use and portable laptop stand that can be packed on the go?

Ridge Stand 2.0 is our solution. We designed our stand to fit the exact angle of your MacBook or iPad - with comfort. With an eye-level viewing experience your posture improves. When your neck and back feel relaxed, you can fully enjoy any task, safely use your device, and improve device usage time. 

In summer, how to cool the laptop is always a big problem for most of us.  Ridge Stand elevates your laptop computer off your desk, providing an optimal viewing and user-friendly experience, and helps keep your portable PC nice and chilled.

Add-On Cooling Fan Kit - Ridge Stand Ventilation Solution

Add-On Extensional Clamp is compatible with various kinds of QI and USB hub.

 

Introducing Ridge Stand 2.0 Products

 

Ergonomic. Sleek. Lightweight. Portable. Adjustable. – Ridge Stand Family

 

Ridge Stand Pro

Ridge Stand Pro is designed especially for the MacBook. The new Pro stand is wider and thicker than the previous version as well as more sturdy and able to withstand the greater weight of a laptop. The design of Ridge Stand Pro encourages a healthier posture for your neck and back as you work, play, and interact with the world.

 

Ridge Stand 

Ridge Stand is just the right solution for the iPad and e-reader. It can sustain a max weight of 4kg (9lbs) device by using it as position 1 like MacBook Air 11 inch. (Position 1: 4kg; Position 2: 1.3kg.) It is perfect for playing games and watching videos as well as working on your iPad.

 

Ridge Stand Mini 

Ridge Stand Mini is a smaller stand designed for mobile phones. The Mini is ideal for securing phones at the optimal angle to allow to comfortably watch videos, browse the news, chat with friends, and take selfies anywhere - even in the car. *Every package includes a car mount and a sticky pad to secure your phone.

 

Watch Stand

Magnetic charging cab​le not included.

Ridge Stand for the Apple Watch is the newest stand to join our family. Just snap your magnetic charger in place and let your watch charges automatically. Continuing in our Ridge Stand series, this watch stand also has a sleek design and is highly durable. It is simply a must have for any Apple Watch owner.

 

Features

 

PORTABILITY: Whatever the work place or the work time, one thing is certain, the ability to move your workplace gives you greater control to choose when and where you work - giving you the freedom to do your best work.

Light to carry and simple to set up, using Ridge Laptop Stand is a breeze to use.

A Ridge Stand Carrying Case is including with every Ridge Stand Pro and Ridge Stand order. 

Photo by user Daniel Putzer

 

Pack it up. 

 

ADJUSTABILITY: Our stands can be adjusted and readjusted to fit any angle thanks to its strong hinge units – you can setup the stand to your eye level, and to relax your neck and back.

 

CLEAN WORKSPACE: Ridge Stand was designed to help cut clutter from the workday and open spaces that promote productive thought. We believe that people can get more done when they have a clean, organized workplace. Less clutter means less distraction, which equates to greater focus and productivity.

Ridge Stand helps productivity soar.

 

BUILD-IN CABLE ORGANIZER: Ridge Stand not only prevents stress on your neck and back, it removes the distracting jumble of wires with a built-in cable organizer. Regardless of the viewing angle, the charging cables can be organized and hidden from view.

 

KEEPING THINGS COOL: Ridge Stand reduces heat associated with laptops, tablets, and phones by elevating the units and providing better ventilation. Now we offer a new choice for a better ventilation solution - the cooling fan kit. Better air flow to reduce device heating whether you are playing computer games, watching videos, coding, or photo/video editing. 

Ridge Stand Fan Kit - Clever Laptop Cooling Solution

Ridge Stand cooling fan kit has two different specs. Each of them is adapted to the corresponding Ridge Stand or Ridge Stand Pro. You can easily attach the fan in just a few seconds.

 

EXTENSIONAL USB HUB/ QI WIRELESS CHARGING: With Ridge Stand extensional clamp, you can add the USB hub, QI wireless charger. It’s compatible with different sized 3rd party products from 7 – 15 cm thickness. Just adjust the screws manually to fit different 3rd party product. No worries when you want to charge your phone while using your laptop, or not having enough USB ports.

 

More details

 

SILICONE BUMPER: Forget annoying obstacles on the edge of your screen - we have thickened the rubber bumper. Our groove design can hold your device securely. With the new silicon buffer, you can play with your bezel less phone and tablet without any blocks from the stand.

 

NON-SLIP DESIGN: An extra silicone mat protects your device. Regardless if you use the stand in position A or position B, the new Ridge 2.0 design allows you to keep your cables organized and provides non-slip protection for your device.

 

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY 

  • Ridge Stand Pro: Laptops like MBP 13”, MBP 15”, MBA11”, etc.…
  • Ridge Stand: Lightweight laptops like MBA 11”; Tablets like iPad Pro, iPad mini, Kindle, etc.…
  • Ridge Stand Mini: Phones like iPhone, etc.…
  • Ridge Stand Watch: Apple Watch

 

PREMIUM AEROSPACE GRADE ALUMINUM ALLOY: There are two colors available for Ridge Stand 2.0: Silver, Dark Grey. 

Compared to Ridge Stand I and Ridge Stand Plus, Ridge Stand 2.0 is more durable and stable as a result of slight design modifications. Due to the release of Ridge Stand 2.0, we will no longer be producing the old versions of our products anymore.

 

Spec

 

Placement Instruction 

 

----- Ridge Stand 2.0 -----

 

----- Ridge Stand 2.0 Pro -----

 

Shipping Notice:
1. Most packages go through customs without any duty, but some are selected by chance and you may be charged for a duty fee. 
2. We can’t mark any package as a 'gift', we may claim every item a lower value at 30%off.
3. If you receive a tracking number when we ship, do track your package every two days to make sure it doesn’t get hung up in the system and returned to us. 
4. In case of return, we would not be responsible for the processing fee charged by express company, and postage for re-sending the product. 
* U.S. packages
We will MAIL most of your packages by postal service. 
Due to shopping festival in December and January, packages will be in logistics storage warehouses and will not be delivered on time. Please wait patiently and check with your local post office.
* Outside the U.S.
We will send out most of your packages by EXPRESS SHIPPING. Please do not provide P.O. box address.
If you live in a place that is known for customs issues, we can't guarantee every possibility an extra charge. Please assist with customs clearance if needed and feel free to contact us at creatiodesigninc@gmail.com
