It is simply a must have for any Apple Watch owner. Features PORTABILITY: Whatever the work place or the work time, one thing is certain, the ability to move your workplace gives you greater control to choose when and where you work - giving you the freedom to do your best work.Light to carry and simple to set up, using Ridge Laptop Stand is a breeze to use.A Ridge Stand Carrying Case is including with every Ridge Stand Pro and Ridge Stand order. Photo by user Daniel Putzer Pack it up.  ADJUSTABILITY: Our stands can be adjusted and readjusted to fit any angle thanks to its strong hinge units – you can setup the stand to your eye level, and to relax your neck and back. CLEAN WORKSPACE: Ridge Stand was designed to help cut clutter from the workday and open spaces that promote productive thought. We believe that people can get more done when they have a clean, organized workplace. Less clutter means less distraction, which equates to greater focus and productivity.Ridge Stand helps productivity soar. BUILD-IN CABLE ORGANIZER: Ridge Stand not only prevents stress on your neck and back, it removes the distracting jumble of wires with a built-in cable organizer. Regardless of the viewing angle, the charging cables can be organized and hidden from view. KEEPING THINGS COOL: Ridge Stand reduces heat associated with laptops, tablets, and phones by elevating the units and providing better ventilation. Now we offer a new choice for a better ventilation solution - the cooling fan kit. Better air flow to reduce device heating whether you are playing computer games, watching videos, coding, or photo/video editing. Ridge Stand Fan Kit - Clever Laptop Cooling SolutionRidge Stand cooling fan kit has two different specs. Each of them is adapted to the corresponding Ridge Stand or Ridge Stand Pro. You can easily attach the fan in just a few seconds. EXTENSIONAL USB HUB/ QI WIRELESS CHARGING: With Ridge Stand extensional clamp, you can add the USB hub, QI wireless charger. It’s compatible with different sized 3rd party products from 7 – 15 cm thickness. Just adjust the screws manually to fit different 3rd party product. No worries when you want to charge your phone while using your laptop, or not having enough USB ports. More details SILICONE BUMPER: Forget annoying obstacles on the edge of your screen - we have thickened the rubber bumper. Our groove design can hold your device securely. With the new silicon buffer, you can play with your bezel less phone and tablet without any blocks from the stand. NON-SLIP DESIGN: An extra silicone mat protects your device. Regardless if you use the stand in position A or position B, the new Ridge 2.0 design allows you to keep your cables organized and provides non-slip protection for your device. UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY 
Ridge Stand Pro: Laptops like MBP 13”, MBP 15”, MBA11”, etc.…
Ridge Stand: Lightweight laptops like MBA 11”; Tablets like iPad Pro, iPad mini, Kindle, etc.…
Ridge Stand Mini: Phones like iPhone, etc.…
Ridge Stand Watch: Apple Watch
 PREMIUM AEROSPACE GRADE ALUMINUM ALLOY: There are two colors available for Ridge Stand 2.0: Silver, Dark Grey. Compared to Ridge Stand I and Ridge Stand Plus, Ridge Stand 2.0 is more durable and stable as a result of slight design modifications. Due to the release of Ridge Stand 2.0, we will no longer be producing the old versions of our products anymore. Spec Placement Instruction  ----- Ridge Stand 2.0 ----- ----- Ridge Stand 2.0 Pro ----- Shipping Notice:1. Most packages go through customs without any duty, but some are selected by chance and you may be charged for a duty fee. 2. We can’t mark any package as a 'gift', we may claim every item a lower value at 30%off.3. If you receive a tracking number when we ship, do track your package every two days to make sure it doesn’t get hung up in the system and returned to us. 4. In case of return, we would not be responsible for the processing fee charged by express company, and postage for re-sending the product. * U.S. packagesWe will MAIL most of your packages by postal service. Due to shopping festival in December and January, packages will be in logistics storage warehouses and will not be delivered on time. Please wait patiently and check with your local post office.* Outside the U.S.We will send out most of your packages by EXPRESS SHIPPING. Please do not provide P.O. box address.If you live in a place that is known for customs issues, we can't guarantee every possibility an extra charge. Please assist with customs clearance if needed and feel free to contact us at creatiodesigninc@gmail.com

story:
What is the point?

We at Vibrant Advertising have come to a decision. We want to help make marketing easier. Today that means digital marketing, because the days of paper ads are long gone. If you are a small retailer, that might mean finding a way to target your customers with ads that apply to them and will encourage them to visit your store. For others, it might mean placing an emphasis on a certain product you need to sell more of. For yet others, it could mean targeting a nationwide or global market, without a multi-million dollar budget. We think that should be not only possible, but easy. 

Now is the time to make it happen

Mobile advertising – put your ads in EVERYONE'S POCKET. 

Digital signage – Malls. Fast food. Hotels. Airports. Even sell advertising space on your sign, anywhere you want.

Web ads – UMM, HOW DID YOU FIND THIS?

Any and every platform that you decide is best. We will be there, watching and helping you succeed. We are developing a solution that can help do all of these things, and more. Much more.

Vibrant Advertising has an incredible concept

Design your own advertising. We will help you design it, target it, and if you want, publish it and manage it. But it’s yours. You decide where it should go and to whom. If you want a video wall that is 20 feet wide in your casino, we can help you make that happen, and you won’t have to spend another dollar on another software product. If you want to get ads to cell phones of people in your town that want to buy glow in the dark fish, we can help you make that happen too. The point is, it’s YOURS. Own it. If you believe in it, it will work. That’s our philosophy with our products, and we live by it. This is the Designer in it's current state.

Who we are

We've built a solid team with years of development, sales, and digital marketing experience, all pointing to this project being a success. Meet our team.

Russ Thiel Senior Developer and Project Lead

Tom Boyle Senior Sales Manager

John Halsted Web Design and Internet Marketing Manager

And our partners.

  • Kay Jacobs Graphics Design and Art Work

  •     NTS Search Marketing Internet and Mobile Advertising Experts

This is what we do

We are building the best software possible, and it will make it easy to design and deploy your advertising. We have the best marketing and design staff available if you need them, and they can make your advertising return great results. Is there more work for you to do? Probably. There’re a lot of questions that have to be answered. But we will help you answer them. What do you want to do? Are you a single outlet retailer selling souvenirs out of a 200sf store? Will having walk-by traffic stop and look through your windows help sales? Are you looking to get people to sign up for your fantasy hockey league? Are you a cruise ship owner that has to target ads on dozens of huge HD screens on your ship? Do you own 9 casinos and have a new act performing? That’s cool. No matter who you are, how large or small your target audience may be, we can make your life easier and your advertising budget drop.

Don’t buy the hype

There are a lot of companies that can claim a million impressions of your ad every day on the web. The catch? They may be in Yugoslavia at 3 a.m., and you still get billed. You know what marketing works best? The marketing that finds people that might be interested in what you’re selling and tells them why to buy from you instead of someone else. It’s that simple. If you need local, walk by exposure, think about digital signage. If you need internet attention, we are partnered with an exceptional team of internet search specialists, NTS Search Marketing. They can help you target markets, manage results, and much more. What about mobile ads? How many have you seen on your phone, in Facebook™, or Angry Birds™ or any other app? Yours could be there too, reaching millions of consumers every day. Use your imagination!

Our answer

A solution that does it all. Yeah, we know, it sounds too good to be true… and we all know what comes of that. The truth is, it is possible to solve this dilemma with one product (and some elbow grease). Our AdEx Suite will help you do everything we’ve claimed. You can design 1 ad that looks great on a 60 inch TV in your store, and export that to a mobile ad that looks just as good and can be sent straight to Google’s™ AdWords - and hit every mobile phone you want. Yes, you still have to pay for the ads in the apps or on their sites. Nothing good is free. But if you want us to manage that, no problem. If you want to handle it yourself, that’s cool too.

The Designer under development right now.

Designer in Action.


Playlist Manager.

Managing Animations is a Piece of Cake.

The (not so) small print

We talk a lot about digital signage. We’re big believers, and it works in a LOT of places. But here’s the real deal. In order to show stuff (ads, shows, commercials) on a TV or monitor, it takes a box plugged into that TV or monitor. For us that means a small computer attached to the TV or monitor. Same applies to any digital signage solution. (Does your TV work without any input? Exactly.) We have 2 solutions, and which one you might want depends on what you want to accomplish. We have a low cost, Android™ based solution that is solid and will do the basics. It can play your movies, ads, static pictures, and can support one HD monitor or TV. Perfect for a single storefront, for example. 

The other solution is based on Windows™ and costs a bit more, but it can handle advanced graphics, data access, and multiple monitors. The other reality, if you want to handle a video wall (more than 2 monitors) is you’d better call us and get the specs. It takes a serious computer to handle that much video, although our AdEx Player software can handle it no problem. We want to make sure you know the reality of what you’re getting.

The rest of the real deal

Any and ALL rewards that do not include a player device WILL require one to utilize the digital signage player features. You will NOT need anything additional to use our software for it's great advertising export features.

Other stuff

Yes, we call this a digital advertising tool. But think about that for a second. Does advertising mean you have to be selling something? Or just telling people something? Because we do a bit more than the name might suggest. How about the flight status monitors you’ll find in any airport? Or the menu at a fast food restaurant? Those are perfect for us too. If you’re interested in data access and display, please check out the technical specs, and do so believing we have you covered.

The AdEx Suite

AdEx is the brainchild of Russ Thiel, a gifted software developer hailing from Denver, Colorado. On one of his many projects, he found himself searching for a reliable, easy-to-use Digital Signage package, and pretty much came up empty. He located a couple that were very outdated and very, very overpriced, and a couple more that will host and display pictures and videos from the web but not much else. Neither extreme fit the bill.

Enter the AdEx Suite. Supporting all 3 major platforms – Windows, Android, and iOS – all in one Designer. Just imagine, creating a single project and targeting any of the 3 platforms with 1 click! We will initially have limited functionality on Android and iOS, and full functionality on Windows. But the upside to that is we are building in an export tool (think MOBILE ADVERTISING), so you can create static or animated content, and save it as images or movies, targeted to each mobile platform. Exactly like the big marketing firms do! We expect that the Digital Content firms are going to be really upset, because we’ve pretty much made them obsolete. Maybe we should give them a discount or something.

But back to the project. There are 3 basic software components; the Designer, which is where all the cool, artsy stuff happens. It Supports animations(which vary depending on platform), all kinds of data - and we mean all kinds (Windows Players only!) - Sql Server, Oracle, Excel, MySql, and anything else that has an ODBC driver. Not sure what ODBC is? That’s cool, there is a wizard to walk you through getting any of your data to the Designer in a few simple steps. Of course we included the ‘standard’ transitions you see everywhere, like pixilate, blinds, fade and wipe; but we also added things like animating transparency, location, colors, and rotation! We know that’s a lot to take in, although it’s a tiny fraction of what the AdEx Suite can do. So please watch the video to see some examples of what we mean.

The second component is not quite as sexy, but every bit as important. Called the AdEx Server, it gives you the tools to schedule, rotate, and manage playing your content on your digital signs. You can control everything from your web browser using our secure server.

Picture sitting on a beach, sipping a Mai Tai, and changing all the ads in your bank or hotels on the fly to drum up some business, and you’ll have a great idea of what we’re thinking.


The third component only applies to Digital Signs, and not at all to mobile marketing. We call it the AdEx Player, and just like you’d think, it handles playing your project content for you on your tvs or monitors, in your lobby, airline check-in queue, storefront, or maybe your casino. The workhorse of the Suite, It stays out of sight and out of mind; it just does it’s job, although you’ll never even see it.

That’s a brief, low key overview of a project that has a decent chance to revolutionize digital marketing. We would love to thank you for taking the time to read this and watch the video above, and if you still have questions, please reach out to us at marketing@vibrantadvertising.com and we will do our meager best to answer you!

Where are we now?

We are about 60% through our way to a beta-testable product, and the same amount through the company website. One of what we consider the high points of this project is you, the backer, can use the latest revision published to our site - anytime. This project will run on a Windows PC, and so when you get update emails from us, you will also get a link so you can test what we just did!

This is a link to our current project status... it is a long, fairly technical list. Sorry about that...  but it is software, after all!  :)  (We did it this way because we just couldn't format the list the way we wanted directly through indiegogo). Here it is.

Be aware that any reward that does not include an AdEx Player device will require you to purchase one if you want to use the great digital signage features of the software! Of course, no hardware is needed for mobile content, except the PC you install the Creator on!

Also, just to acknowledge all the fine companies whose products we have mentioned above or in our video, their copyrights and trademarks are their sole property.

story:
The Concept

SeatSync is a mobile ticket marketplace providing fans a convenient and low-cost alternative to the existing ticket resale options. Existing services levy hidden fees and "delivery" charges to send you an email with your tickets; online classifieds are hopelessly inefficient. SeatSync is the answer.

 

Our Idea

As with any innovative idea, SeatSync comes from the belief in a better way to do things. We are die-hard sports and music fans, and we know how challenging it can be to buy or sell tickets to an event. Exorbitant fees, inconvenient transactions, and poor customer service are the status quo for the industry. In addition, trying to buy or sell tickets at the last minute usually ends in disappointment or, even if you are lucky, the hassle of coordinating a complicated transaction.

We are creating SeatSync to unite buyers and sellers in a transparent, convenient, and low-cost secondary marketplace. We are committed to creating the experience our users deserve.

This means:

  • No huge fees. Our competitors charge up to a 25% commission on every transaction. We think that is unfair. SeatSync charges a flat usage fee of $2 per transaction to anyone who sells tickets to an event. Buyers pay no fees.

  • A safe ticket transaction that values your privacy first, while ensuring accountability by using a well-established peer-to-peer marketplace strategies.

  • A seamless, mobile marketplace using location-based technology, centered around buying or selling your tickets as efficiently as possible.

With SeatSync, listing your tickets is fast, easy, convenient and FREE. Then, when you sell your tickets, sellers pay only $2 per transaction. Buyers pay no fees, so the full ticket price is received by the ticket seller. Plus, no fee for buyers makes them more likely to buy your tickets. 

 
How does SeatSync work?

SeatSync is a simple, easy to use native application for your mobile phone. The process couldn't be simpler.

  1. Ticket sellers list their tickets on SeatSync for upcoming events, and the place(s) and time(s) when a transaction works best.
  2. Ticket buyers search the SeatSync listings based on each event, price, and seat location, and select tickets for purchase.
  3. SeatSync facilitates the transaction, enabling the buyer and seller to meet at an agreed upon time and place, usually based on the seller’s ticket listing.
  4. SeatSync then follows up with both parties to ensure that the transaction went well, the tickets were as expected, and that everyone is happy.


The Impact

SeatSync is currently slated for launch in the early summer months of 2012. We are looking to raise $7,500 to help fund application development and ensure that our initial launch this summer is a success.

Aside from donating to help us meet our goals... help us get the word out! Take a moment to follow our progress (links below), and sign up for details on our upcoming launch at SeatSync.com.

 

Thank you for your support!

Michael Wilson, John Haugen and Graham Thornton

SeatSync Co-Founders

story:
Go to Our Official Store to Buy X35G

 

 

Minisforum X35G start shipping

Introducing The MINISFORUM 

In our eight years of Mini PC design, we listened to every user's constructive opinions, and on this basis, we carried out a lot of innovation, injected new design concepts, selected better materials, carefully produced, pursued excellent quality, repeatedly optimized integration, to achieve the best performance.

Features

1.10th 10nm Gen Intel® Core™ i3 

2.Intel® UHD Graphics

3. DDR4-3200MHz 16GB （ Dual channel Onboard）

4.NVME SSD (pcie3.0 4X)

5.Intel® Optane™ Memory supported

6.Intel® WIFI6 AX200，BT 5.1 pre-install

7.Thunderbolt 3    5K / 60Hz

8.RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet×2

 

MINISFORUM Media Report

Why Choose MINISFORUM？

 

1.Stronger core & memory

Intel 10nm Core Processors Turbo Frequency 3.4GHz

DDR4-3200MHz 16GB （Dual channel pre-install）

X35G uses Intel's CPU，compared with the 8th generation Intel Core i3-8130U and i3-8145U, the 10th Gen Intel® Core™ i3 has some significant improvements. It can achieve faster operation and reduce power consumption.

Provides support for faster system memory (RAM) and higher frequency speed. And we are the first mini pc built-in Optane memory. which can help mini pc to increase the speed of boot, software loading, file loading. Even can speed up your game, boost your work efficiency.

2. Faster network experience

X35G built-Intel Wi-Fi6，With the latest Wi-Fi 6 technology, you can surf the web at the speeds of 300MB/s, 2.77 times faster than 5G Wi-Fi speed. BlueTooth 5.1 pre-install, RJ45 Gigabit Ethernet×2, this makes this MiniPC a perfect soft routing machine.

3. More storage arrangements

1×2.5 inch SATA3.0 HDD or SSD Supported

1×M.2 2280 SATA SSD Supported

M.2 2280 NVME SSD (pcie3.0 4X) Supported

Intel Optane Memory Supported

Flexible storage, easy to expand, 2.5-inch HDDS large capacity with low cost, support NVMe SSD fast read.

4. Stronger output method

Thunderbolt 3 (UBS-C) : 5K@60Hz

HDMI 2.0: 4K@60Hz

Display Port: 5K@60Hz

The MINISFORUM X35G has multiple input/output ports, providing multiple ports for different types of peripherals.

Thunderbolt™ 3 brings lightning speed and performance to USB-C, creating one thin, reversible compact port that delivers the fastest2, most versatile connection to any dock, display, or data device.


5. RJ45 Support more application functions

【Dual RJ45 LAN Ports】X35G comes with two Gigabytes LAN ports which provide you much more network usage, such as software router(OpenWRT/DD-WRT/Tomato, etc.), firewall, NAT and network isolation, etc.

6. Multiple interfaces meet your needs

Multiple types of interface allow you to have fun with multi-screens, high-definition playbacks, and other functions.

7. Superb cooling systems, completely Silent

This mini PC effectively dissipates heat out of the casing. It is designed to be ready to handle 25W TDP CPU (Two heat pipes of pure copper). There is a Heat sink with a Centrifugal(Blower) Fan.

The motherboard has another additional intelligent temperature control system to guarantee heat dissipation execution under ordinary working conditions and it's maximum quietness. At the point when the CPU load increments to 100%, it will naturally speed up to rapidly release the heat. This will also give improved product execution and soundness.

8. Boost your work efficiency

X35G represents a new attempt and match. The addition of Optane not only heighten hard drive

performance, but it also has both speed and capacity. It can increase the speed of your softwar

e loading and document reading faster. Greatly improve work efficiency and comfort, also get ri

d of unpleasant work experience caused by stalls and crashes.

9.Stunning View in 5K

Our PC comes with Thunderbolt 3 and supports 5K video output. HDMI 2.0,  supports 4K at 50FPS and 60FPS frame rates,，and expands the bandwidth to 18Gbps.The transmission speed of Thunderbolt 3 is 40GB/S, not only can output 5k video.

10. The Ability to Blend into Home or Office (VESA-mountable behind compatible display）

The VESA mount is all set for easy installation on the back of televisions or monitors compatible with VESA. This will allow this mini PC to turn into a home or office-friendly device. 

Product Comparison

USER CASES

Test Reports

1. CPU Performance Test

2.TDP Power test

3. SSD  test

11. Guaranteed ex-factory quality

Since Minisforum is an organization with 8 years of involvement with PC production, our assembling and quality control are severe. 

Numerous crowdfunding projects owner's don't have their supply chain, which makes it impossible for them to the quality of creation even they have brilliant thoughts and ideas. We have our factories and supply chain, which permits us to control the production of items.

 All items need to pass a strict assessment before they go out. Our engineers will play a series of thorough tests on our PCs before we leave the factory, including vibration test, drop test, interface test, temperature, and moistness test, etc., to guarantee our benefactors can get good items.

What's in the box

Timeline

Risk and challenge

It is the second time our company conducted crowdfunding. Experienced in the last campaign, 

we have mastered the whole process. We own our factory and have a complete supply chain. No

w our sample machine has been assembled from our own factory about this activity. We will min

imize your risks but continuously optimize meanwhile. The reason that we crowdfunding here is 

to build our brand awareness and accept different voice to try more innovation. We need your su

pport and advice. Join us we will return satisfy to you.

story:
ACADEMIC SUCCESS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

ComWriter helps you write smarter. It can save you 100 hours a year on your academic writing, collaborating and publishing. It helps you write the most professional papers, with everything you need all in one place. Focus on content, not formatting!

As an Indiegogo funder, you get an early-bird subscription to ComWriter (savings worth over $500), so you can transform your academic writing straight away.

Plus, you’ll be a part of a groundbreaking shift in academia, truly modernizing academic writing. 

 

What we need

ComWriter 1.0 has been a game-changer for the academic world and is already used by more than  10,000 students, researchers, and professors in 110 countries. We’ve since made even more improvements, based on feedback from librarians and users, and are ready to launch CW 2.0, but we need funding to make it a reality.

ComWriter 2.0 will enable collaboration and WYSIWYG editing with print preview, which is a huge advantage over other software on the market. We're ready to launch V2.0, but we need funding to make it a reality.

 

WHAT YOU GET

As an Indiegogo funder, you'll get an exclusive early bird discount. Once this campaign ends, these prices will no longer be available - get your early bird discount now!

More information on the Student Plan and Researcher Plan can be found here. All courses include a certificate of completion. Click here to find out more about our online, interactive, self-paced courses.

 

The smarter way to write and cite

Meet Evie and Emma, they’re both writing their final Masters assignment which involves group work.

Evie is writing in Microsoft Word and uploading to Google Drive for collaboration. When a group member makes changes, she downloads the new version, edits, and uploads; and so do the others. There’s a lot of emails checking on where everyone’s at. Others in the group prefer DropBox to collect research. All group members have used different kinds of formatting and referencing, and it’s taken her hours to reformat to the right style. They’ve spent more time on managing each other and formatting than they have on writing.

Emma has ComWriter. She and her group members all access the same document and can see each others’ changes in real time. She uses the task management tool to keep everyone on track with deadlines. Because they're all on the same page, literally, they’re all using the same University style guide and formatting the references was instant. The team has also invited their supervisor to check the draft online.

 

ACADEMIC SUCCESS STARTS HERE

Imagine being able to do all of this:

  • Collaborate and make changes in real time; you can see others writing as they write on your screen, just like Google Docs (but with all the academic tools you need). Say goodbye to messy file sharing or file syncing forever.

  • Format everything correctly in just one click; automatic formatting and reformatting using built-in style guides and templates; for references AND text.
  • Use it anywhere, and collaborate with anyone; it’s cloud-based so there’s no need to install software. Plus, it backs everything up for you so you never lose your work.
  • Access more than 30,000 journal and university style guides for all disciplines; apply a pre-defined style guide or customize your own to make all your text AND references perfect for your personal writing, your assignment, your thesis, conference paper or journal article.

  • Store all your research material (including your bibliography, images, tables and Url links) to reuse instantly in other projects.

​​

  • Write anything: blogs, preprints, conference papers, teaching material, assignments, or essays, for ANY subject or discipline.

  • Manage what needs to get done by adding comments, todos, and notes. Assign tasks to colleagues and set due dates for tasks. Chat with colleagues online.

  • Track milestones or monitor the progress of sections (e.g., chapters). Assign sections to collaborators, set wordcount and reference targets, or add due dates. 

 

COMPARISON REPORT

Writing academically requires a number of features just not available in other products

 

ComWriter is the only bibliographic tool to have 120 different reference types, with all sorts of smarts to interpret your data:  more templates, more data, more accuracy.

 

TIMELINE

TEAM

 

Dr Linda Glassop, CEO & Founder, is the academic brains trust behind ComWriter with more than 20 years experience in Higher Education and the IT sector. Linda is an accomplished author and continues to supervise postgraduate students. Linda has a range of academically qualified people helping her with developing content and advising on design. 

Aamir Qutub, CTO, recently came on board to head up our technical team and is charging ahead with ComWriter Version 2.0. Aamir's team brings youthful enthusiasm and technical innovation to the difficult task of making academic writing easy! 

 

FAQs

What will the funds be used for?

The funds will be dedicated to the completing the development of V2.0 features, primarily: WYWSIG preview editing (mapping the style guide and enabling quick updating), sharing (controlling the roles and the features for each role), and adding sections (the need to continue numbering across sections for headings, footnotes, and captions).

When will ComWriter Version 2 be available?

Version 2.0 beta is scheduled to be launched in mid-January, 2018. You are welcome to start using Version 1.0; however, Version 2.0 is delivering a brand new writing editor to enable WYSIWYG editing (preview editing) and collaboration. The official version 2.0 will launch in February, 2018. 

What can ComWriter do that other software can’t?

  • Only ComWriter feels like Microsoft Word, but with the added ease of styled formats, combined with slick online sharing.
  • Only ComWriter allows real-time collaboration and project management
  • Only ComWriter has pre-defined styles for text AND references.
  • Only ComWriter lets you use – and customize – pre-defined styles.
  • Only ComWriter has image captions AND cross-references.
  • Only ComWriter has unnumbered headings, numbered headings and appendix headings already defined.
  • Only ComWriter has custom reference types making citations and references more accurate.
  • Only ComWriter supports comments, as well as in-line to-dos and notes.
  • Only ComWriter lets you share your research material.
  • Only ComWriter supports report writing (with correct page numbering) and long documents such as books and theses.

Does my University support ComWriter?

Every University requires students to format references according to their discipline style guide. Every University supports the use of automated bibliographic tools.

Will my Professor allow it?

Students are allowed to use whatever tool they deem to be useful to their academic productivity.

Which journal styles do you cover?

Currently, we take requests for any Journal style guide. Version 2 will also launch 30,000 different style guides. All the common style guides are currently available, For example, APA, Harvard, MLA, MHRA, Chicago, Turabian, Vancouver, IEEE, and more. Contact the Support Desk if you need something specific. 

How much storage can I have?

Storage of references, images, and Url links is unlimited.

What if I already have a subscription?

When Version 2 is ready to launch we will automatically update your subscription plan to the Perk you have selected. You will be refunded for anything pre-paid on your current plan. 

What if I have a team that is larger than 5?

The 'Meeting of Minds' perk can be amended to be: 5 for 24 months, 10 for 12 months or 20 for 6 months. Other configurations are negotiable. This perk is ideal for a business, university or institution wanting to evaluate CW 2.0 across the organization (either local or international).

story:
With the Optimus we have put the three top tools requested by makers (3D printer, Laser cutter and CNC mill) into one machine and made it affordable enough for individuals. All without compromising the performance or quality of any of the tools.

Press Reviews​

The idea

We wanted to make a machine that could help you make your own products, going from an idea, to a prototype and to a final product. We wanted the machine to be capable of modifying your personal items, like engraving your own name on a bag. But most of all we wanted a machine that could build things you can not find in stores, like this inductive chess game, which are fully made with the Optimus.

In this chess game the pieces has been 3D printed, the black squares laser engraved and the tracks separating them, has been cut with the CNC. Even the PCB board powering the induction coils under it, has been made with the CNC.

The Optimus is born

The solution we came up with was a modular machine that can quickly be transformed by the user into the tool that you need, illustrated in this stop-motion video.

The Optimus has two different configurations, a vertical delta formation and a horizontal Cartesian configuration. Each form is optimized for for a certain tool. The delta for 3D printing and the Cartesian for laser cutting and CNC.

By making it easy to rebuild into two different configurations we could fit a 3D printer, laser cutter and CNC mill into the same machine. The transformation can be done in less than 10 min.

To make sure that this absolutely works we have:

  •  Made it so that after transforming the machine it can calibrate itself so you do not have to spend time and effort every time tuning it in. No need for manual calibration.​
  • We tested three Optimus machines, assembling/disassembling each of them more than 500 times and it had no effect on the performance. If you transform once a week, 500 times means 10 years! Because of the metal body, transforming it a large number of times will not affect its accuracy.  But it is important to fasten the screws tight each time!
  • Made it extra strong and rigid for the CNC  with a unique mechanical design as shown below.

​​

To give you an idea how strong and reliable the Optimus is, Simon did some crazy tests on it.  
 

The slider is the fundamental part of the machine. It is the movable part used in both configurations.

Because of its simple design it is easy to manufacture and transport, bringing down the costs.

Perks

The Optimus a very affordable and capable desktop fabrication machine that gives you a lot of bang for the buck. Here is a comparison table of tools on the market with similar performance.

We have built and carefully tested 20 machines and we have already started production of 50 units that will be ready to ship to the first backers in March, after the campaign is over. Below you can see some pictures and a video from the production.

 

Premium delta 3D Printer

We choose to design the 3D printer of the Optimus as a delta model. The reason for this is that the delta design has a few advantages over Cartesian printers. The most important one is that the moving parts are lightweight, making it print faster and with higher precision. Another important advantage is that the overall design is less complicated and uses less parts, which in turn makes the machine cheaper to produce and easier to maintain. The downside is that the printer, because of how the arms move, must be much taller than the actual print volume used, but for the Optimus though, we have turn this downside into a strength since the extra length is then available to you when you turn it into the Cartesian configuration, working with the laser or CNC.

With the 50cm long sliders the printing volume is 24cm in diameter and 30cm in height. Large enough to satisfy most of your 3D printing needs.

Assembly

The assembly of the delta is simple and contains just a few easy steps and can be put together in less than 10 min. Below Simon does a live demonstration of this process.

 

Nozzle

For the Optimus we have made sure you will not have problems with a blocked hotend. We have installed a CNC machined aluminum heat sink in combination with cooling fans to effectively transport heat away from places we do not want it. Inside the heat sink is also a titanium isolator which conducts half as much heat as steel, and five times less than brass. This keeps the heat concentrated around the nozzle where we want it and greatly reduces blocks.

In case you would like to print with different nozzle sizes we made it very easy to swap. You simply remove one screw on the side of the hotend and pull it out. Nozzel sizes ranges from 0.2mm, 0.4mm, 0.6mm to 0.8mm.​

 

The Control box

The control box is the brain of the Optimus and contains two powerful 32-bit processor boards, one for machine control and the other for the touch screen. On the back we put easy to use, plug and play connectors, connecting the control box to the different parts of the machine in a easy way. You can control the printer with the touch screen in similar ways to how you use your smartphone. You can transfer gcodes either by USB or SD. With our phone app (more info further down) you can connect over WIFI to e.g operate the machine, send gcodes or set it up for laser cutting and CNC milling.

Automatic bed leveling

To make sure the machine prints with reliable quality every time you use it, we installed an automatic bed leveling system to make sure the bed is always leveled. The delta arm will probe the bed and figure out the perfect plane matching the bed. This makes sure that the first layer will be printed perfectly with optimal adhesion.

All metal body

The majority of the parts on the Optimus is made out of metal. We put thick 12mm steel rods and 10mm timing belts as the main structural component which makes the machine very strong, minimizes vibrations and optimizes print quality. This also makes it very quiet and smooth when printing. 

 

Optional heated bed

The Optimus can also be upgraded with a heated bed covered with a PEI sheet on top, which makes prints stick to the bed without using glue, hairspray or other tricks.

Extendable

It is easy to extend the height of the Optimus if you would like to have a larger print volume. Just replace the sliders with longer ones.

Technical details

  • Print volume - Ø240mm x 300mm
  • Print speed - 18 mm³/s (0.4mm nozzel)
  • Print head travel speed - 20 to 360 mm/s
  • Layer resolution - 50 microns - 300 microns (0.4mm nozzel)
  • Filament size - 1.75mm
  • Nozzle temperature - up to 295 ˚C
  • Build bed (Optional) - 20 ˚C to 100 ˚C heated bed with PEI cover
  • Printable materials - Without heated bed, PLA. With heated bed, ABS, PET, HIPS and more.
  • Operating sound - 40 dBA
  • OS - Windows, MAC, Linux
  • File format - gcode
  • Connectivity - USB, SD, WIFI, Touch screen
  • Voltage -  110v or 220v
  • Weight - 16kg

Print quality

The print quality of the Optimus is excellent and if you go down to the minimum print resolution it is very hard to see layers anymore.

Laser engraver & cutter

By transforming the Optimus you can use it as a laser cutter or CNC mill. In the Cartesian configuration the Optimus gets a much wider working volume, better suited for these tools. It opens up a lot more possibilities for making.

For the laser you will have a working area of 50cm x 50cm. With this big size it is much more interesting to do laser projects.

Transformation

The assembly of the bed takes a little longer then the other assemblies, but you only need to do it once. Transforming the Optimus from delta to Cartesian is very easy and can be done in less than 10 min as shown in real time by Simon in the video below.

What materials can you work with?

There are a few options for the strength of the laser and depending on which you choose you will be able to work with different materials and with different cutting speeds. With the least powerful laser at 500mW you can engrave on most materials, but is really only possible to cut thin and very soft materials like 2mm foam board.

We will offer laser powers from 500mW, 2W, 5W and 10W. With a more powerful laser, cutting speeds increases and with the 10W laser you can even start to engrave on more exotic materials such as anodized aluminum.

If you have trouble deciding which laser power to select you can use this simple guide below.

What can you do?

 

CNC

With the CNC mill you can start working with wood and other materials to carve them into the shape you want. You can even use it to engrave different patterns onto a surface and make beautiful signs. A really useful tool for making products is to be able to make your own PCB boards to integrate some kind of functionality into your products. With the Optimus CNC option this becomes possible and gives you whole new dimensions to making.

The standard option comes with a Z axis, a spindle and a few standard flat and ball drills in a few different sizes.

Technical details 

Spindle Power - 450W - DC

Spindle speed - 12000 rpm 

What materials can I use?

With the Optimus CNC you can mill in woods, acrylic, ABS, machinable wax, brass, aluminum and more.

What can you do?

Software

Phone app (Only for Android right now)

With the app you can completely control the Optimus from your smart phone over WIFI. Every control feature that is available on the touch screen is also available to you in the control app. In fact you have even more control options from your phone.

If you like to draw, you can use the app to take a picture of your drawing and the app will transform your drawing into gcode for laser engraving or for printing a extruded print.​

 
 

The app also makes it easy to work with the CNC as it takes you through a wizard to calibrate the machine and makes sure it is set up properly before you start to mill.

You can also easily pause the machine and change filament in the middle of the print. In this way you can make your 3D printed objects even more beautiful with multiple colors.

 

Desktop software

To generate gcode for 3D printing you can use many different software. We will provide an modified version of Cura that is Optimized for the Optimus.

If you want to generate gcode for the laser cutter the simplest way is to install the free sotware Inkscape and the two plugins 305 engineering and J tech photonic.

For generating toolpaths and gcodes for CNC the simplest way is to use Autodesk Fusion 360 which can be downloaded and used for free by enthusiasts and small startups.

Open source

At febtop we believe in active communities. Our vision is to bring personal manufacturing to as many people as possible. We want to create intuitive and creative tools and bring them into the hands of people and see them create amazing things. We want to give people tools that are easy to jump into, are efficient, affordable, fun and with great potential to create. We love and believe in open source hardware and software and we like to build strong communities around our products so we can make them better together. We think that the best way to do this is to invite the users and community members of our products to join in and contribute to the development. Together we can make our products better, come up with new functions for them and even design completely new ones.

Timeline

VAT for European Customers 

Please know that if you pledge for any of the perks and live in a country that is a part of European union  then you have to pay extra 25% of VAT on those perks.
story_txt:
With the Optimus we have put the three top tools requested by makers (3D printer, Laser cutter and CNC mill) into one machine and made it affordable enough for individuals. All without compromising the performance or quality of any of the tools.Press Reviews​The ideaWe wanted to make a machine that could help you make your own products, going from an idea, to a prototype and to a final product. We wanted the machine to be capable of modifying your personal items, like engraving your own name on a bag. But most of all we wanted a machine that could build things you can not find in stores, like this inductive chess game, which are fully made with the Optimus.In this chess game the pieces has been 3D printed, the black squares laser engraved and the tracks separating them, has been cut with the CNC. Even the PCB board powering the induction coils under it, has been made with the CNC.The Optimus is bornThe solution we came up with was a modular machine that can quickly be transformed by the user into the tool that you need, illustrated in this stop-motion video.The Optimus has two different configurations, a vertical delta formation and a horizontal Cartesian configuration. Each form is optimized for for a certain tool. The delta for 3D printing and the Cartesian for laser cutting and CNC.By making it easy to rebuild into two different configurations we could fit a 3D printer, laser cutter and CNC mill into the same machine. The transformation can be done in less than 10 min.To make sure that this absolutely works we have:

 Made it so that after transforming the machine it can calibrate itself so you do not have to spend time and effort every time tuning it in. No need for manual calibration.​

We tested three Optimus machines, assembling/disassembling each of them more than 500 times and it had no effect on the performance. If you transform once a week, 500 times means 10 years! Because of the metal body, transforming it a large number of times will not affect its accuracy.  But it is important to fasten the screws tight each time!
Made it extra strong and rigid for the CNC  with a unique mechanical design as shown below.
​​To give you an idea how strong and reliable the Optimus is, Simon did some crazy tests on it.  

 
The slider is the fundamental part of the machine. It is the movable part used in both configurations.Because of its simple design it is easy to manufacture and transport, bringing down the costs.PerksThe Optimus a very affordable and capable desktop fabrication machine that gives you a lot of bang for the buck. Here is a comparison table of tools on the market with similar performance.We have built and carefully tested 20 machines and we have already started production of 50 units that will be ready to ship to the first backers in March, after the campaign is over. Below you can see some pictures and a video from the production.
 

Premium delta 3D PrinterWe choose to design the 3D printer of the Optimus as a delta model. The reason for this is that the delta design has a few advantages over Cartesian printers. The most important one is that the moving parts are lightweight, making it print faster and with higher precision. Another important advantage is that the overall design is less complicated and uses less parts, which in turn makes the machine cheaper to produce and easier to maintain. The downside is that the printer, because of how the arms move, must be much taller than the actual print volume used, but for the Optimus though, we have turn this downside into a strength since the extra length is then available to you when you turn it into the Cartesian configuration, working with the laser or CNC.With the 50cm long sliders the printing volume is 24cm in diameter and 30cm in height. Large enough to satisfy most of your 3D printing needs.AssemblyThe assembly of the delta is simple and contains just a few easy steps and can be put together in less than 10 min. Below Simon does a live demonstration of this process. NozzleFor the Optimus we have made sure you will not have problems with a blocked hotend. We have installed a CNC machined aluminum heat sink in combination with cooling fans to effectively transport heat away from places we do not want it. Inside the heat sink is also a titanium isolator which conducts half as much heat as steel, and five times less than brass. This keeps the heat concentrated around the nozzle where we want it and greatly reduces blocks.In case you would like to print with different nozzle sizes we made it very easy to swap. You simply remove one screw on the side of the hotend and pull it out. Nozzel sizes ranges from 0.2mm, 0.4mm, 0.6mm to 0.8mm.​
 

The Control box

The control box is the brain of the Optimus and contains two powerful 32-bit processor boards, one for machine control and the other for the touch screen. On the back we put easy to use, plug and play connectors, connecting the control box to the different parts of the machine in a easy way. You can control the printer with the touch screen in similar ways to how you use your smartphone. You can transfer gcodes either by USB or SD. With our phone app (more info further down) you can connect over WIFI to e.g operate the machine, send gcodes or set it up for laser cutting and CNC milling.
Automatic bed leveling
To make sure the machine prints with reliable quality every time you use it, we installed an automatic bed leveling system to make sure the bed is always leveled. The delta arm will probe the bed and figure out the perfect plane matching the bed. This makes sure that the first layer will be printed perfectly with optimal adhesion.

All metal bodyThe majority of the parts on the Optimus is made out of metal. We put thick 12mm steel rods and 10mm timing belts as the main structural component which makes the machine very strong, minimizes vibrations and optimizes print quality. This also makes it very quiet and smooth when printing.  Optional heated bedThe Optimus can also be upgraded with a heated bed covered with a PEI sheet on top, which makes prints stick to the bed without using glue, hairspray or other tricks.ExtendableIt is easy to extend the height of the Optimus if you would like to have a larger print volume. Just replace the sliders with longer ones.Technical details

Print volume - Ø240mm x 300mm

Print speed - 18 mm³/s (0.4mm nozzel)

Print head travel speed - 20 to 360 mm/s

Layer resolution - 50 microns - 300 microns (0.4mm nozzel)

Filament size - 1.75mm

Nozzle temperature - up to 295 ˚C

Build bed (Optional) - 20 ˚C to 100 ˚C heated bed with PEI cover

Printable materials - Without heated bed, PLA. With heated bed, ABS, PET, HIPS and more.

Operating sound - 40 dBA

OS - Windows, MAC, Linux

File format - gcode

Connectivity - USB, SD, WIFI, Touch screen

Voltage -  110v or 220v

Weight - 16kg

story:
Our Story:

We are a Nomadic Society and keeping track of assets and accounts is hard.  We are the Baby Boomer generation, we are Entrepreneurs, we are Parents,  We have a lot of things to keep track of these days.  Most of us also have aging parents that are a little bit disorganized.  Almost all of us use the internet in some way, shape or form.  Find It Later was born out of sheer necessity to keep it straight.  There is almost no one on the planet that would not benefit from our services.

How it works:

So how about this?  We created password-protected CheckItNow Lists that you download and fill out on your desktop.  Only YOU and your key-keeper (the lucky person in your life who gets your password) can even open these lists.  We can’t even access your lists – we only store the password.

Then, you create the trail.  And the trail is this….go thru our extensive CheckItNow lists. For example, write down WHERE the account is located (Bank of America), what it is (Individual Savings), and the last four digits (2222).  Then move on thru the Lists.  You will be also adding your User Names for Social Media accounts and where you have those accounts.  Do you really want someone to endorse you for sales when you are no longer with us?  That’s kinda creepy.

Why we are on IndieGoGo:

We can run this company without the 25K but we want to make it better for you.  Right now, you download the CheckItNow Lists, fill them in, share your password with that lucky Key-Keeper we mentioned above. With our fundraising goal of 25K, we can offer you a lot more and also advertise in targeted areas to spread the word.

Here we go.  You will have your password-protected list on your desktop.  But what if your Key-Keeper lives in Texas and you live in California?  What if you are in the military and stationed overseas?  The point is, your CheckitNow Lists would be in the cloud in safe, secure storage.  No, this is NOT hackable information because no full account numbers and passwords for those accounts are stored.  You are storing the TRAIL. So now, if you pass on, your Key-Keeper enters the password on the link provided from anywhere in the world and they can begin to the process.

If you say to us – but my parents, myself, my husband – already wrote a will so do I really need this?  Yes, because a will doesn’t tell you WHERE things are, it just tells you what you get.  A will also doesn’t list money that is hidden under the bed or your Social Media accounts.  And just because THEY wrote a will for the both of you, each and every person has their own stuff.  ESPECIALLY these days.  And if you own your business?  That’s a whole bunch more.  You need the trail, for you, Your aging parents?  You may have to buy them one and fill it out for them – that’s what I did – but they still need it.

And here are the facts to back this up:

Across the United States, there is more than $58 BILLION in unclaimed money.  In New York and Florida ALONE there are more than 36 MILLION UNCLAIMED insurance and bank accounts.  Where does it go?  To the state. Then you say, that won’t happen to me.  I have all of it written down already.  Really?  Because I said the same thing and found $27K in an IRA that I forgot about.  I found it creating this business!

We did our homework.  Check out our website:  www.FindItLater.com, our Facebook page, www.Facebook.com/finditlater and our Twitter account, www.Twitter.com/kd_find

Thank you so much for the support.  You will thank me later when everything is all easy-breezy.  And when you FIND something you didn’t know you had, share it with us!  We will add it to our arsenal of testimonials. 

Keverne, Founder & CEO, San Francisco

story:
Début Juillet 2018 : Cette campagne est maintenant terminée et nous livrons nos contributeurs de la première heure. Vous pouvez toujours acquérir le Meeting Spicer, dans ses versions Anglaise et Française, sur la page IndieGogo en anglais.

Vous pouvez également nous contacter directement sur MeetingSpicer.com.

 

Qui sommes-nous ?

Nous sommes 2 coachs Agile travaillant depuis des années au sein de différents types d’organisations à travers le monde (Europe de l’Ouest, Europe Centrale, Asie ou Etats-Unis).

Dov :    RegisBob :  

Notre travail est d’aider les personnes que nous accompagnons à perfectionner leur façon de réaliser leurs tâches mais aussi à améliorer leur environnement.
Et quelque que ce soit l’entreprise avec laquelle nous coopérons, petite start-up ou grande banque internationale, nous rencontrons un problème récurrent : ces multiples réunions non-efficaces.


D’où vient le Meeting-Spicer ?

L’outil a été conçu à l'origine par Dov pour répondre à ce soucis auprès d’un de ses clients, l’année dernière.

Depuis, nous avons développé plusieurs prototypes. Après avoir reçu des feedbacks enthousiastes lors de plusieurs conférences ou meetups, après l’avoir vu fonctionner au sein de plusieurs équipes, nous sommes finalement prêts pour le partager largement !


Comment fonctionne-t-il ?

Le Meeting-Spicer est un jeu de cartes. Chacune propose une activité en relation avec la facilitation de réunion qui ne prend pas plus de 30 secondes à réaliser.

  • Une activité en début de réunion (carte Verte) : conçue pour aider votre équipe à s’énergiser et se concentrer sur l’efficacité de la réunion
  • Une activité en fin de réunion (carte Rouge) : aider votre équipe à apprendre ce qui s'est bien passé et ce concentrer sur les étapes à venir.

Voici quelques exemples :
 


Vous disposez de cartes complémentaires que les participants peuvent jouer pendant la réunion :

  • Activités Surprise (cartes Jaunes) ! Ces activités aident les participants à prendre pleine conscience de ce qu’il se passe durant la réunion, en comprendre la dynamique, sans pour autant la perturber
  • Cartes Temps et Humeur : Elles permettent aux participants de communiquer silencieusement sur le timing et leurs propres ressentis et offrir des feedbacks instantanés.
  • Cartes Rôles : Elles permettent d'indiquer et comprendre les rôles délégués

Voici quelques exemples :

 

Grâce au Meeting-Spicer, les participants de la réunion partagent une compréhension commune sur ce petit truc qui va apporter une étincelle à la réunion (ou ce qui la bloque).


Quels principes font que l’activité fonctionne ?

La magie de l’outil repose sur le micro-apprentissage. Les activités occupent uniquement 2 fois 30 secondes par réunion, pas plus. Meeting-Spicer ne se substitue au contenu de la réunion.

Il est important de ne piocher qu’une seule carte verte, qu’une seule carte rouge par réunion pour se donner le temps de la compréhension des activités. Elles sont bien plus profondes qu’il n’y parait.
Nous générons de la frustration à dessein !

La simplicité des activités et leur axe éditorial mènent les participants à l’introspection. Meeting-Spicer ne propose en soit aucune solution mais suggère des pistes de réflexion qui mèneront les participants à trouver leurs propres actions.

Chaque participant devient acteur de la réussite des réunions, du meilleur emploi de son propre temps !

Ce que nous espérions, et ce que nous avons constaté sur l’année passée, est que cette intégration au sein d’une équipe du micro-apprentissage et de l’introspection mène à la prise d’actions, à l’appropriation et à la dissémination des pratiques. Les personnes prennent en charge leur temps ainsi que celui de leurs collègues.

 

A qui est destiné cet outil ?

  • Vous participez régulièrement à des réunions mais vous êtes accablé par la réunionnite aiguë ?
  • Vos réunions sont généralement efficaces et vous désirez assurer dans le temps ?
  • Vous animez régulièrement des réunions mais vous vous sentez démuni ?
  • Vous concevez un kit de facilitation ?
  • Vous aimez simplement aider vos collègues à passer un temps agréable ensemble ?

Le Meeting-Spicer est fait pour vous !


Comment organiser l’implémentation ?

A la première utilisation, l’outil doit être présenté à l’équipe. 5 minutes peuvent suffire : il s’agit de présenter les principes de fonctionnement et d’instaurer la confiance pour que les participants jouent le jeu et laissent la magie opérer.

Il est important aussi de rappeler les principes, en particulier 1 seule carte verte et 1 seule carte rouge par réunion.

Pour certaines équipes, il peut ensuite être nécessaire d’attiser la curiosité après la réunion. Ce peut être par exemple en provoquant les réflexions et les échanges au sein de l’équipe sur les activités qui ont été proposées dernièrement.

Ensuite, on constate une appropriation par les équipes assez rapide.
On laisse alors un jeu dans la salle de réunion. Les différents occupants pourront l’utiliser à leur guise.


Que recevrez-vous ?

Une fois le projet totalement financé, vous recevrez une belle boîte complète comportant

  • plus de 70 activités pour animer les premiers et derniers instants de vos réunions
  • plus de 30 activités pour épicer les réunions
  • autour de 20 cartes complémentaires
  • un booklet de 20 pages de présentation du jeu et de quelques pratiques de facilitation

L'ensemble est produit en Belgique, dans de beaux matériaux, pour une qualité identiques à vos meilleurs jeux de cartes habituels.

Vous recevrez également un fichier PDF pour imprimer un poster à afficher dans vos salles de réunion ainsi que des modèles de cartes vierges pour compléter le jeu de vos propres activités.

 

Par dessus tout, vous recevrez toute notre gratitude ainsi que
la satisfaction de contribuer à soigner les équipes de la réunionnite aigüe.
Participez avec nous à répandre la culture des réunions efficaces.

 

What about other languages?

No worry, an english version is already available, here:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-effectiv...

For the moment, we focus ourselves on the French and English versions.
Other translations are on the work, though we prefer, for the short term, deal with the communities we are able to meet and animate the most. Feel free to contact us if you think you can help.


Qu’attendons-nous de cette campagne ?

Tout d’abord, nous croyons en cet outil. Nous voulons le partager à tout le monde. Nous avons déjà rencontré pas mal de monde avec nos prototypes, vous aussi vous pouvez l’introduire dans vos organisations !

Le but est de produire le jeu dans un format encore plus abouti, en un support analogue aux jeux de cartes auxquels nous avons tous l’habitude de jouer. L’aspect encore plus professionnel aidera son adoption.

Nous croyons vraiment que le Meeting-Spicer vous aidera et qu’il saura retenir tout votre intérêt. Et nous pensons déjà aux prochaines étapes !

Après le succès des campagnes IndieGoGo, voici ce que nous prévoyons :

  • Traduire de nouvelles versions.
  • Introduire les versions dédiées à des réunions plus spécifiques : réunions à distance, rituels de projets en méthodologies Agile, etc.
  • Développer des app iOS et Android dont nous avons des prototypes.
  • Etendre les possibilités pour que vous puissiez contribuer aussi au contenu du Meeting-Spicer.


Comment limitons-nous les risques de cette campagne ?

Cette fois-ci, nous ne proposons au financement que le jeu de cartes. Nous mettons de côté le développement des applications mobiles et autres extensions. Nous voulons produire le Meeting-Spicer aussi rapidement que possible.

Nous nous concentrons donc sur son impression en haute-qualité. Nous envoyons vos jeux de cartes durant le mois de juillet 2018.


Comment soutenir la campagne ?

  • Aidez son financement !
  • Ajoutez à votre contribution des jeux à offrir aux personnes qui dirigent vos réunions, à votre directeur, à votre patron ou à toute personne qui pourrait en avoir besoin !
  • Proposez à tous vos amis d’obtenir leur propre jeu : ne prêtez pas le votre à qui que ce soit, nous savons bien que les gens ne rendent jamais les choses, n’est-ce-pas ?
  • Partagez ! Partagez ce projet autour de vous !
  • Suivez-nous sur Facebook (fb.com/MeetingSpicer) et Twitter (#MeetingSpicer) .
  • Envoyez-nous un message, nous adorons recevoir vos feedbacks.
story_txt:
Début Juillet 2018 : Cette campagne est maintenant terminée et nous livrons nos contributeurs de la première heure. Vous pouvez toujours acquérir le Meeting Spicer, dans ses versions Anglaise et Française, sur la page IndieGogo en anglais.Vous pouvez également nous contacter directement sur MeetingSpicer.com.
 Qui sommes-nous ?Nous sommes 2 coachs Agile travaillant depuis des années au sein de différents types d’organisations à travers le monde (Europe de l’Ouest, Europe Centrale, Asie ou Etats-Unis).Dov :    RegisBob :  Notre travail est d’aider les personnes que nous accompagnons à perfectionner leur façon de réaliser leurs tâches mais aussi à améliorer leur environnement.Et quelque que ce soit l’entreprise avec laquelle nous coopérons, petite start-up ou grande banque internationale, nous rencontrons un problème récurrent : ces multiples réunions non-efficaces.
D’où vient le Meeting-Spicer ?L’outil a été conçu à l'origine par Dov pour répondre à ce soucis auprès d’un de ses clients, l’année dernière.Depuis, nous avons développé plusieurs prototypes. Après avoir reçu des feedbacks enthousiastes lors de plusieurs conférences ou meetups, après l’avoir vu fonctionner au sein de plusieurs équipes, nous sommes finalement prêts pour le partager largement !
Comment fonctionne-t-il ?Le Meeting-Spicer est un jeu de cartes. Chacune propose une activité en relation avec la facilitation de réunion qui ne prend pas plus de 30 secondes à réaliser.
Une activité en début de réunion (carte Verte) : conçue pour aider votre équipe à s’énergiser et se concentrer sur l’efficacité de la réunion
Une activité en fin de réunion (carte Rouge) : aider votre équipe à apprendre ce qui s'est bien passé et ce concentrer sur les étapes à venir.
Voici quelques exemples : Vous disposez de cartes complémentaires que les participants peuvent jouer pendant la réunion :
Activités Surprise (cartes Jaunes) ! Ces activités aident les participants à prendre pleine conscience de ce qu’il se passe durant la réunion, en comprendre la dynamique, sans pour autant la perturber
Cartes Temps et Humeur : Elles permettent aux participants de communiquer silencieusement sur le timing et leurs propres ressentis et offrir des feedbacks instantanés.
Cartes Rôles : Elles permettent d'indiquer et comprendre les rôles délégués
Voici quelques exemples : Grâce au Meeting-Spicer, les participants de la réunion partagent une compréhension commune sur ce petit truc qui va apporter une étincelle à la réunion (ou ce qui la bloque).
Quels principes font que l’activité fonctionne ?La magie de l’outil repose sur le micro-apprentissage. Les activités occupent uniquement 2 fois 30 secondes par réunion, pas plus. Meeting-Spicer ne se substitue au contenu de la réunion.Il est important de ne piocher qu’une seule carte verte, qu’une seule carte rouge par réunion pour se donner le temps de la compréhension des activités. Elles sont bien plus profondes qu’il n’y parait.Nous générons de la frustration à dessein !La simplicité des activités et leur axe éditorial mènent les participants à l’introspection. Meeting-Spicer ne propose en soit aucune solution mais suggère des pistes de réflexion qui mèneront les participants à trouver leurs propres actions.Chaque participant devient acteur de la réussite des réunions, du meilleur emploi de son propre temps !Ce que nous espérions, et ce que nous avons constaté sur l’année passée, est que cette intégration au sein d’une équipe du micro-apprentissage et de l’introspection mène à la prise d’actions, à l’appropriation et à la dissémination des pratiques. Les personnes prennent en charge leur temps ainsi que celui de leurs collègues. A qui est destiné cet outil ?
Vous participez régulièrement à des réunions mais vous êtes accablé par la réunionnite aiguë ?
Vos réunions sont généralement efficaces et vous désirez assurer dans le temps ?
Vous animez régulièrement des réunions mais vous vous sentez démuni ?
Vous concevez un kit de facilitation ?
Vous aimez simplement aider vos collègues à passer un temps agréable ensemble ?
Le Meeting-Spicer est fait pour vous !
Comment organiser l’implémentation ?A la première utilisation, l’outil doit être présenté à l’équipe. 5 minutes peuvent suffire : il s’agit de présenter les principes de fonctionnement et d’instaurer la confiance pour que les participants jouent le jeu et laissent la magie opérer.Il est important aussi de rappeler les principes, en particulier 1 seule carte verte et 1 seule carte rouge par réunion.Pour certaines équipes, il peut ensuite être nécessaire d’attiser la curiosité après la réunion. Ce peut être par exemple en provoquant les réflexions et les échanges au sein de l’équipe sur les activités qui ont été proposées dernièrement.Ensuite, on constate une appropriation par les équipes assez rapide.On laisse alors un jeu dans la salle de réunion. Les différents occupants pourront l’utiliser à leur guise.
Que recevrez-vous ?Une fois le projet totalement financé, vous recevrez une belle boîte complète comportant
plus de 70 activités pour animer les premiers et derniers instants de vos réunions
plus de 30 activités pour épicer les réunions
autour de 20 cartes complémentaires
un booklet de 20 pages de présentation du jeu et de quelques pratiques de facilitation
L'ensemble est produit en Belgique, dans de beaux matériaux, pour une qualité identiques à vos meilleurs jeux de cartes habituels.Vous recevrez également un fichier PDF pour imprimer un poster à afficher dans vos salles de réunion ainsi que des modèles de cartes vierges pour compléter le jeu de vos propres activités. Par dessus tout, vous recevrez toute notre gratitude ainsi quela satisfaction de contribuer à soigner les équipes de la réunionnite aigüe.Participez avec nous à répandre la culture des réunions efficaces. What about other languages?No worry, an english version is already available, here:https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-effectiv...For the moment, we focus ourselves on the French and English versions.Other translations are on the work, though we prefer, for the short term, deal with the communities we are able to meet and animate the most. Feel free to contact us if you think you can help.
Qu’attendons-nous de cette campagne ?Tout d’abord, nous croyons en cet outil. Nous voulons le partager à tout le monde. Nous avons déjà rencontré pas mal de monde avec nos prototypes, vous aussi vous pouvez l’introduire dans vos organisations !Le but est de produire le jeu dans un format encore plus abouti, en un support analogue aux jeux de cartes auxquels nous avons tous l’habitude de jouer. L’aspect encore plus professionnel aidera son adoption.Nous croyons vraiment que le Meeting-Spicer vous aidera et qu’il saura retenir tout votre intérêt. Et nous pensons déjà aux prochaines étapes !Après le succès des campagnes IndieGoGo, voici ce que nous prévoyons :

Traduire de nouvelles versions.

Introduire les versions dédiées à des réunions plus spécifiques : réunions à distance, rituels de projets en méthodologies Agile, etc.

Développer des app iOS et Android dont nous avons des prototypes.

Etendre les possibilités pour que vous puissiez contribuer aussi au contenu du Meeting-Spicer.

Comment limitons-nous les risques de cette campagne ?Cette fois-ci, nous ne proposons au financement que le jeu de cartes. Nous mettons de côté le développement des applications mobiles et autres extensions. Nous voulons produire le Meeting-Spicer aussi rapidement que possible.Nous nous concentrons donc sur son impression en haute-qualité. Nous envoyons vos jeux de cartes durant le mois de juillet 2018.
Comment soutenir la campagne ?
Aidez son financement !
Ajoutez à votre contribution des jeux à offrir aux personnes qui dirigent vos réunions, à votre directeur, à votre patron ou à toute personne qui pourrait en avoir besoin !
Proposez à tous vos amis d’obtenir leur propre jeu : ne prêtez pas le votre à qui que ce soit, nous savons bien que les gens ne rendent jamais les choses, n’est-ce-pas ?
Partagez ! Partagez ce projet autour de vous !

story:
Short Summary

Street Shield was founded on the concept that we’re all human, and that as humans, we are subject to error. Something as simple as a one-time mistake in our entire busy, overloaded lives shouldn’t cost $75 or more; adding that parking rules are often confusing and poorly laid out – well, we’ve had enough. We at Street Shield recognize that parking tickets are a big drain on funds and energy, and that there needs to be a better way of following the rules. You’re a lawful citizen – why should you have to contribute to the annual pot of $17 billion dollars collected from parking tickets? We hear you – Street Shield is the solution.

What We Need & What You Get

Your money will go towards the development of a technology that will alert you when you are in danger of being fined. Street sweepers? No problem. Through your phone, Street Shield will tell you when and where they are. Contributors will be given a slot in our beta program, making you a first Street Shield user.

The Impact

The average person receives anywhere from 1-3 parking tickets a year – if the city is being lenient, that’s anywhere from $75-$225! Pooling all of our parking tickets together leaves a total of $17 billion dollars collected annually going into what – more ways to give parking tickets. Street Shield thinks we can all agree that we’re collectively done paying for that, can’t we?

Risks & Challenges

There isn’t much standing in our way. All we need is your help to finish priming technology that essentially already exists. The last obstacle standing is the government officiates, and with your help in cutting their funds by following the law, it won’t take much more to cut that barrier down. After all, who could argue with a product that helps a country’s citizens uphold the rules of the road.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    So don’t just sit there – help us so we can help you. If you can’t donate today, that’s okay! There’s always tomorrow. And even if not then, just spreading the word helps. Tell your family. Tell your friends. The reign of street sweepers is over – Street Shield is here to stay.

    If you can't donate money you can:

    Fill out this survey,

    http://bit.ly/1dYZe0p

story:
We are building the most comprehensive exchange between the writing community and the publishing community to facilitate publishing opportunities.

Publisheeze.com is the platform for novelists, non-fiction writers, poets, screenwriters, freelancers, academics and more to secure an agent, publisher or self-publisher. 

PublisheezePro.com helps agents, traditional publishers, self-publishing companies, motion picture studios and production companies find talent.

Together these two platforms match each other to the best publishing opportunity better than Match.com finds your next date.

  • Easy to use templates
  • Powerful profiles representing one's whole body of work
  • Intelligent matching to only the right opportunities
  • Unlimited projects and submissions
  • Real time alerts on four digital platforms to keep you in the know
  • Thousands of agents and publishers looking for their next author
  • Self-publishing solutions saving time and money
  • Tons more...

We give writers who want to self-publish more tools and control than ever before. No more visiting 10 websites to find the best deal.

  • Writers set the terms of service
  • Writers set the budget
  • Writers view multiple options on one platform
  • Publisheeze educates those unfamiliar with self-publishing 
  • We deliver more writers to our self-publishing partners

Publisheeze does not guarantee one gets published, but we do create opportunities writers never had before.

  • Expanded representation of one's work
  • Attached media, accomplishments, qualifications, sample documents for download, publisher-tracking and more.
  • Our focus is on the mid-tier publisher (over 11,000 of these) who are hungrier than the top publishing houses (whom we also serve).
  • Predicted to be the number one tool for literary and entertainment agents to find and manage new talent.
  • We will get you read. Your talent will get you published.

Contribute what you can. For those of you who can’t contribute, you can spread the word to the many people you know who write and desire to get published.

  • Tell your writer friends about Publisheeze
  • Sign up to be notified of launch date.
  • Have you school, writers group or social media friends alerted to our platform.
  • Plan this to be the best gift you can give your writing friend or family member this Christmas.
  • Keep writing!

story:
We launched a successful campaign a year ago and FLEKS3D is now with over 500 users in all 50 states and 37 countries. We are now back to offer additional sizes, plates for the DELTA 3D printers FLASHFORGE (and similar sized 3D printers) and the FLEKS3D "Simple". Plus we are offering our most popular sizes again for 3D Printers like MAKERBOT, ULTIMAKER and COBBLEBOT.

FLEKS3D is an ADD-ON compatible with ANY desktop 3D printer (FFM). FLEKS3D makes 3D printing EASIER, with a HIGHER SUCCESS RATE and provides a SMOOTHER WORKFLOW.

EASIER by releasing the print with a single "FLEKS" of the plate. The part simply pops off. No more damaged prints, no more scraping and no more cut fingers.


HIGHER SUCCESS RATE with a proprietary texture that grabs the first layer and keeps it in place. No more blue tape, No more hairspray.


SMOOTHER WORKFLOW with interchangeable print plates. Once the print is done, just switch the plate to a new one.

FLEKS3D on ULTIMAKER 1.0

FLEKS3D on MAKERBOT

Below is one of our backers demonstrating ease of use.




FLEKS3D™ "system" on MakerBot Rep 2 (original)

http://techcrunch.com/2015/11/11/fleks3d-lets-you-pull-your-3d-prints-out-of-your-printer-with-a-quickness/

http://www.core77.com/projects/42579/FLEKS3D-BUILD-PLATE

http://www.fabbaloo.com/blog/2015/11/8/fleks3ds-back-with-more-print-plate-options

https://www.3printr.com/easily-remove-your-3d-prints-using-the-fleks3d-build-plate-1232035/

http://3druck.com/drucker-und-produkte/fleks3d-flexible-3d-drucker-plattform-4822489/

http://www.3ders.org/articles/20151110-fleks3d-kickstarter-build-plates-to-make-removing-3d-prints-easier.html

http://www.notcot.org #fleks3d

http://3dprintingindustry.com/2015/11/18/fleks3d-is-back-on-kickstarter-with-more-3d-print-removal-options/





8x8 FLEKS3D on an Ultimaker 1 using ABS


FLEKS3D on FlashForge

FLEKS3D "SIMPLE" is the most attainable of our products. This is a great entry level model to try us out. It simply attaches to the print-bed with clips. These are offered as a single plate starting from $15. An added bonus is that the SIMPLE offers more printable area since there is no frame, great options for those edge-to-edge prints.

FLEKS3D "SIMPLE" on FlashForge

Yes, yes, yes and yes. With over 500 users worldwide FLEKS3D has been tested with a wide range of filaments. Our community has tested FLEKS3D to the max. FLEKS3D just works.








FLEKS3D works with heated plates up to 100°F (40°C). However, we have found that it works great without a heated plate and we recommend trying without it first. When using a heated plate FLEKS3D might bend a little. If so hold it down with clips and you are good to go. We provide a "self-leveling puck" for the users that have that feature. In the end of the campaign we will reach out to everyone to see who needs one.

Our first prototypes still work 18 months later. So we can’t say how long the lifespan is, just that it is longer than 18 months.

FLEKS3D build plate is now in all 50 of the United States and in over 37 countries. Over 500 people around the globe have tested our product and it passed with flying colors.
see community images on instagram




Thank you for visiting our campaign. We would like to thank our past supporters for giving us so much feedback on our product. We also would like to thank future supporters for believing in FLEK3D and continuing in making 3D printing better.
