story:
The Gyrokinetic Engine by RGEnergy

As we head into the last week of our funding drive,

I would like to thank those who contributed to our project for no other reason than to better our crippled earth.  It certainly shows the stuff you are made of.  Please know that I will do my best to see that your rewards  go well beyond what can  be offered at this time. .

 I would also thank these talented individuals for their assistance: : Ken LeBrun from http://revolution-green.com/ ;   Ruby Carot from http://coldfusionnow.org/ ;  Sterling Allen from http://www.pureenergyblog.com/ ;  Gary Hendershot from http://www.youtube.com/user/SmartScarecrow ; Shane Liddell from http://www.crowdfunders.us/ ; and Jeannine "jp" Parker from  http://www.savorthesuccess.com/member/jp-jeannine-parker .

The question was asked if the research would stop.  Of Course Not!!  The funds were to speed-up not to maintain the research. Thanks to you all once again. . Stay with us on our website and feel free to comment:  http://www.rgenergy.com/

Why So Busy!!

  One of our company members has committed to present at the Tesla Tech http://teslatech.info/ttevents/2013conf/program.htmTeslaTec this July.  

We intend for him to display a rotary prototype at the show as part of his physics discussion.  This work must be completed in June.  As we wind up this final week, I would welcome you to view the  update page on this site as I will post pictures and videos of what was and is completed and needed  in this regards

 

Our  Motivation

Hello, I am Bob Rohner, a retired engineer. As I grow older, my chief concerns have turned to the future being left for my six grandkids. I worry if they will have the clean air and cheap energy I had as I was growing up. I worry that their quality of life will deteriorate into some futuristic sci-fi horror movie instead of the brighter future we have all envisioned for these new arrivals. I worry about the climate changes, super-storms, blizzards, and droughts that are becoming prevalent.

Many of you out there feel the same way, of that I am sure. The need for a viable clean alternative method of power generation has become overwhelmingly apparent. I believe we may sitting on just the needed solution. I hope you will take part in supporting this attempt to free the world of the debilitating polluting chemicals being forced into our bodies and our environment.

 

The Engine

An amazing engine was invented over 30 years ago by a man named Joseph Papp. The engine had no cooling system, no intake, and no exhaust. It was fueled by an inexpensive mixture of inert gasses sealed into its cylinders. The engine was elegantly simple in construction and adaptable to mass production. It can be readily sized for individual home generation use in the Kilowatts up to village use in the megawatts. Its high torque power output was certified as correct to the USPTO. Unfortunately the eccentric and controversial inventor died taking the secrets to the fuel with him.

 The Company

The overwhelming needs to complete the development of such a clean and safe device lead to the creation of our company RGEnergy (Rohner Group LLC). My brother Tom and I, both engineers, who worked together to design and build the original gyrokinetic engines, would function as the principle investigators, joined by respected scientist, engineers and consultants. We lost Tom to pancreatic cancer two years ago and have been struggling to find a perfect replacement since.

 

The Progress

Our efforts to restore this technology to operational status have taken giant steps forward. We have demonstrated conclusively that large bursts of energy can be induced in inert gases, and this energy is controllable and convertible. Recently published works by the Universities of Wisconsin and Missouri are presenting associated verifications of these findings. The results of our work to date is far more than can be viewed and discussed in this short paragraph and we ask you to view our www.RGEnergy.com, and YouTube channels to learn more.

 


Our Goals (with your help)

As quoted from our good friend and advisor Dr. Michael McKubre:

“This is a power source that mankind needs to have. We need to make a push and get this energy out in the hands of the people.

 

First, completion of the crossover circuitry. To run at maximum efficiency, the gyrokinetic engine needs to take advantage of the large electrical plasma discharge in one cylinder to trigger the opposing cylinder. Involved will be the analysis and construction of the circuitry as well as the completion of a full cycle twin cylinder testing apparatus. This test apparatus which is marginally operational now will permit the tweaking of the crossover pre-excitement voltages and plasma discharges to obtain the maximum power output.

 


Second, the construction of the Papp fuel mixer per our understanding of Papp’s patent discussions and personal papers. The original mixer built by Papp was destroyed in transit. Originally this inert gas mixer was considered unnecessary. However, new information discovered in his papers as well as the finding regarding the crippling effects that even the smallest of mixture changes and contamination can have on the plasma performance of the gas mix has compelled us to rethink this.
The funding will include providing full material assistance and direction to a volunteer team of engineers.

 


Finally, we will either restore the original Rohner designed Papp engine or build a new one from scratch. The original engine is sufficiently robust to present the entire power output as a serial (final functional) engine. The retrofit would involve the remanufacture of the stainless carrier sleeves, heads, and electronics. This fully functional and reliable (but not, by any mean field ready) engine then becomes the tool for attracting the engine manufactures. Associated with this step will be the filing of full patent applications.

 


The Funding

With good budgeting it appears that approximately $264,000 will be needed to get past the first and perhaps second stage. We will at that time determine if the energy output is sufficient to continue to the third stage of engine building directly or detour through an alternative path. In either event a second crowd fund may become necessary. Complete funding for the projects are estimated at $480,000, however as with all research this could be twice or half the eventual need. We anticipate completion of stage 1 and 2 by the end of the year, but as with financing this could be twice or half the remaining time.


Enviromental Notes

The environmental benefits of having no emissions what-so-ever should be quite obvious to all. What makes this new plasma energy source even more valuable is its ability to produce its power output on demand whether mechanically or electrically. No massive and expensive energy storage systems or exotic chemically hazardous batteries are needed to match the fluctuating demands of the consumer.


Company Goals

RGEnergy is driven only to take the engines to this final prototype stage before turning them over to the engine manufacturers with their vastly superior technology skills, and manufacturing abilities. We are in no way interested in reinventing the wheel. It is our belief that a superior product will be created by the existing manufacturers as they jump-in and retool voluntarily once the availability and standardized fuels cells is complete.

Initially, we believe that these engines will likely be relegated to functions such as regional power generation and pumping, until the development and reliability reaches a sufficient level to allow wider applications. Here we are getting ahead of ourselves and only speculating. But with each engine replaced the world will get healthier.

 

Thank You

The support , the technical details, and the history is a far richer story than can be presented here. Please be sure to visit our website at www.rgenergy.com to learn more.


Your contribution could be the final piece of the puzzle. If you can’t contribute I would appreciate it if you would spread the word to others who can.

Together, let’s give old mother Earth a clean bill of health.


Sincerely
Bob Rohner

story:
"This is something I've been waiting for" - Kim Cascone, composer.
"I am sure it will lead to very many interesting kinds of new instruments, songs, performances and possibly even genres of art!" - Noah Vawter, diydsp.com
"Axoloti is f***ing awesome and so superior to every other embedded computing option for music/audio that's currently out there." - SeanQuixote De'la Manton, music-hacking hobbyist and multiple time Music Tech Fest Hack Camp award winner

A new solution to create your own digital synthesizer, effects unit, groovebox or stomp-box, quick and easy.

With the Axoloti Patcher on your computer you can program your sound, composition, and interaction by selecting objects like oscillators, filters, envelopes from the object library:

and drawing connections on your computer:

With the Axoloti Core hardware connected to your computer, you can tweak parameters in real time. Or map parameters to MIDI controllers and tweak without computer.

After uploading your patch, the hardware runs independent from a computer. Turn it on and play. 

Axoloti enables "classical" virtual analog synthesis but also allows effects processing, step-sequencing, sample playback, or granular processing. The modular and open source approach breaks with the restrictions set by closed source manufacturers.

Setup examples

You can connect virtually everything with Axoloti - the real killer application is anything you can come up with yourself. Here are some examples to get you started:

For keyboard players and controllerists

Connect a MIDI keyboard or controller to Axoloti Core, and turn it into a synthesizer specialized for your signature sound. In addition you can add your own dials and faders to escape from the 128-step MIDI nature, by soldering them to the general purpose inputs and outputs on the rear side.

For instruments with an audio output like an electric guitar

Connect the Axoloti Core in between your guitar and your guitar amp, and create your signature guitar sound.

To control Axoloti with footswitches, you can add an off-the-shelf MIDI foot controller. Or solder one or multiple footswitch and expression pedal jack inputs on the general purpose input/output.

Or make your own stomp-box, mounting Axoloti Core and your selection of switches, LED's and potentiometers.

Or create your own amplifier. I made a prototype out of laser-cut plywood and plexi, a car booster-type amplifier, a power supply, and two speakers.


Or create your own audio-processing or audio-generating control surface

Mount up to 15 potentiometers, faders, switches, LED's in a box, and connect them to the general purpose in- and outputs. Or maybe add some sensors too?

More examples can be found on http://axoloti.be/examples/

The Impact

Open source hardware synthesizers have been designed before. But almost all of them have a fixed synthesis architecture. While anyone could tweak the firmware code, few did because of the steep learning curve. Enabling users to compose their own algorithms visually easily brings it to a new level. Axoloti aims to establish a lively user community sharing patches, tutorials, new objects and applications. 

Compared to Arduino, Teensy, or Raspberry Pi, you do not need to deal with coding or a command line prompt. With Axoloti you can focus directly on what really matters.

Many projects use Arduino together with Pure Data to interface with other electronics. That works, but you have three things to worry about: the electronics, the program on the Arduino, and Pure Data patch. Axoloti simplifies such setups dramatically.

Tech specs

The Axoloti Core hardware is Open Source and has

  • Stereo audio input and output with 24bit sampling
  • DIN MIDI input and output
  • Micro-sdcard slot for storing patches and samples
  • Micro-USB device port to connect to your computer
  • a 180Mhz ARM Cortex M4 microcontroller with 256kB of SRAM, and 1MB of Flash (STM32F427)
  • USB host plug (in development) to connect USB-MIDI controllers directly (requires USB MIDI class compliance)
All connectors are conveniently laid out on one edge. On the other edge there are general purpose in- and outputs available for connecting potentiometers, faders, LED's, sensors, or other devices via UART, SPI or I2C.

The Open Source Axoloti Core software runs on OSX, Windows and Ubuntu Linux.

More details about the Axoloti Patcher software and Axoloti Core board can be found on the website http://www.axoloti.be.

Project Status

I have been developing Axoloti since early 2013. Since summer 2013 I've had a working graphical patcher, and started deploying to test users, using Axoloti in a wide variety of projects. It went through three generations of hardware prototypes. I have mentored workshops with users from different backgrounds, and traveled to events across Europe, like MusicHackDay in Paris and Amsterdam and MusicTechFest in London, Berlin and Paris to gather community feedback.

What We Need & What You Get

A lot of development and testing has been done already. Tens of prototypes are already in the field. Lots of patches have been made to demonstrate the capabilities. Users with different backgrounds have used Axoloti for a wide variety of applications.
It's time now to start series production, and support a growing community of users. You can become one of them!

Risks & Challenges

Some features are still in development, the most important one is USB host to support connecting a USB-MIDI controller (MIDI class compliant) or a USB device like keyboard, mouse or joystick (HID-class). The Axoloti Core board design still needs to go through a revision, adding USB host circuitry, going through DFM (Design-For-Manufacturing), and regulatory compliance testing. Production can also take longer than estimated due to component shortage.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think Axoloti is cool, but don't want to fund this project, please spread the word to your friends, your social media, or your blog!

story:
Thanks for the support of the crowdfunding users.!

MicroPC's RAM will be changed to 8GB, no longer need to make up the difference, all users who participate in crowdfunding will receive 8GB LPDDR4 MicroPC!

 

Microsoft Surface Go is so small, lightweight, and affordable that it has been dubbed as the iPad 6 killer. However, 6" MicroPC is not only smaller than Surface Go but also has more interfaces. The palm-sized MicroPC is only 15mm in the thinnest part, weighs 440g and consumes only 10W for the thermal design, but its performance is as good as Microsoft Surface Go at a lower price. MicroPC is a mobile productivity tool suitable for each and every industry!

Features of GPD MicroPC:

  • Compatible for IT fields and more with its rugged exterior: Network communication, electric power, exploration, mining, archaeology, education training, manufacturing, service chain, call center, business services, public institution, government military and many more;
  • Strong Performance with Ultra Low Power Consumption: Intel N4100 processor, four cores, four threads, and thermal design of 10W;
  • 128GB super capacity M.2 SSD for fast read and write speed (read:576MB/s, write: 465MB/s), replaceable, and infinite capacity expansion;
  • RJ45 interface for wired network access, and wireless Wi-Fi 2.4G/5G dual bands and Bluetooth 4.2 for dual-channel max. transfer rate of 433Mbps;
  • Built-in one RS-232 serial interface, widely used in industrial control and automation;
  • Three USB 3.0 interfaces to maximize extended USB devices;
  • One full-featured Type C charging interface for audio, video and data transmission;
  • One microSDXC slot for manual backup or migration of data in a network-free environment;
  • Touchpad with left and right buttons, as well as all the left, middle and right buttons on the left-side mouse, a familiar operation allowing users to get started immediately;
  • QWERTY keyboard with a backlit design to meet the emergency needs at night, or in no light or dim light;
  • Active cooling design and PC-level cooling solution;
  • Two copper nuts embedded on the back for fixation in various complex environments;
  • Power indicator, dormancy indicator and RJ45 indicator to keep abreast of the machine at any time;
  • User-friendly lanyard hole, gifted with a lanyard that can carry 4kg;
  • It is much better than Microsoft Surface Go (8GB/128GB) in terms of overall performance, but it is smaller and more lightweight. It weighs only 440g and can be controlled by one hand.

 

  GPD MicroPC Microsoft Surface Go (8GB/128GB)
OS Windows 10 Pro, Ubuntu MATE 18.10 Windows 10 Home Basic 64bit
Product Positioning Household intelligent device Household intelligent device
Screen size 6 inches 10 inches
Screen technology Gorilla® Glass 4, Sharp full-fit dazzling screen Gorilla® Glass 3, PixelSense™ display
Pointing device Touchpad Touchscreen
Resolution 1280×720 1800×1200
Aspect ratio 16:9 3:2
PPI 245ppi 217ppi
View 178° 178°
CPU Intel® Celeron® N4100 Intel® Pentium® Processor 4415Y
Core / thread 4/4 2/4
GPU Intel® UHD Graphics 600 Intel® HD Graphics 615
RAM LPDDR4 8GB LPDDR3 8GB
ROM 128GB M.2 SSD, infinite capacity expansion 128GB M.2 SSD, infinite capacity expansion
WI-FI 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac compatible 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac compatible
Wired LAN 10/100/1000Mbps Ethernet card None
Bluetooth 4.2 4.1
RJ45 1 None
HDMI 1 None
USB A 3 None
USB C 1 1
RS-232 1 None
Card reader Micro SDXC slot×1 Micro SDXC slot×1
Dimension 153×113×23.5mm 245×175×8.3mm
Weight 440g 522g (without keyboard cover)
Heat dissipation Active Passive
Lanyard hole Yes None
Price Crowdfunding price: $314, official price: $414 Official price: $499

 

Media report

"It’s a little clamshell computer with HDMI, USB, and Ethernet ports… and a Serial port and a rugged design. The idea is that it’s a computer that could be used by network engineers, sys admins, and other folks who need those features. But with an expected price tag of $299, I suspect it might also appeal to other mobile PC enthusiasts when it goes up for order in a few months." more >>

 

The anti-shock aviation-level ABS synthetic resin LG-DOW 121H is imported from South Korea, with a thick thickness of 1mm, which is flame retardant, high-heat resistant, and V-0 fireproof, with a Rockwell hardness up to 109 R, and bending strength up to 26000kg/cm2. Its integrity rate reaches 97.63% under the 1.5m drop test.

Its streamlined appearance is matt UV-sprayed, with rounded corners for great affinity and comfortable feel.

The area of the strip-shaped hollow air inlet on the back is up to 28%, and the 3mm-high feet makes the bottom air inlet design sleeker.

On the back, the 45°-inclined air outlet protects the external interfaces from dust accumulation and dissipates heat more smoothly.

The non-slip twill groove gives a strong grip.

Its 6” high definition (HD) wide color gamut (WCG) screen, with Corning® Gorilla® Glass 4 has a vividly colorful, natural, smooth and visible effect.

With the 178° view, users can obtain an excellent visual experience at any angle.

With 1280×720 resolution and 3000: 1 static contrast, it displays dedicate and bright colors.

The rotatable axis supports stepless adjustment for the maximum stretch of 150°.

A qwerty keyboard, touchpad, and 3D mouse are integrated into the C face, which is only 15×9cm in size. The metallic film button is wedge-shaped designed, which is more ergonomic and provides an excellent experience for finger pressing.

 

The qwerty keyboard is backlit to meet the emergency needs at night, or in no light or dim light.

The keyboard layout is more reasonable. You may complete all operations with your left thumb in case of only number inputs.

MicroPC has a built-in touchpad with a larger operable area, while also supporting the left and right buttons of the touchpad. In this way, the cursor is slide more accurately through right thumb.

The upper left corner of the C face is the left, middle, and right mouse buttons, with an appropriate width to assure an unfettered operation.

The power key is recessed to avoid accidental touch. It is extremely convenient to turn on or off the machine by holding it in the left hand.

The fan switch is centered, and the Off and On states are clearly identifiable.

Two copper nuts (suitable for 2.5mm-diameter screws) are embedded on the back for fixing the machine in various complex environments. You can attach it to any rotatable hanger, stand, lift, tray, bracket, etc.

MicroPC is provided with a user-friendly front lanyard hole, fit for any badge or mobile lanyard.

The RS-232 serial port is widely used in industrial instrumentation, mouse, keyboard, printer, etc. Or go to RS-485 from RS-232 to achieve the data communication at 1200m and 100Kbps.

 

MicroPC has built-in Gigabit NIC, and it supports wired network access through RJ45 interface for the maximum download speed of 125MB/s.

 

MicroPC supports wireless 2.4G/5G dual bands, with the dual-channel max. transfer rate of 433Mbps.

Similarly, in response to Internet of things applications, MicroPC also has a built-in Bluetooth 4.2 module that supports IPv6 connectivity options to make data transfer faster.

The microSDXC slot carries the microSDXC card that is UHS-I bus, Class 10 standard, U2 grade and A1 specification, supporting the minimum random read and write I/O performance up to 1500 IOPS / 500 IOPS, the maximum data transfer at 104MB/s, and the expandable storage space up to 2TB.

GPD MicroPC use Intel 8th Gemini Laks N4100 Embedded processer, reduced package size.
TDP of CPU raise to 10W,  compare with 4415y(Microsoft Surface Go), a few advantage in single-core test but a number of advantage in multi core test.

Compared to the 4415Y in the seventh-generation Kaby Lake architecture, N4100 in the eighth-generation Goldmont+ architecture boosts the CPU cache to 4MB, while 4415Y is only 2MB, which means the data execution time of N4100 is much lower than 4415Y.

Description:

CPU Mark Rating: As of 18th of December 2018 - Higher results represent better performance.

CPU Single Thread Rating: As of 18th of December 2018 - Higher results represent better performance.

CPU Value (CPU Mark / $Price): As of 18th of December 2018 - Higher results represent better value.

The N4100 processor has a reference frequency of 1.10 GHz and a pulse frequency of 2.4 GHz, while 4415Y only supports a reference frequency of 1.6 GHz and no turbo frequency acceleration. In terms of overall performance, N4100 is better than 4415Y.

MicroPC uses 9.5-generation Intel® UHD Graphics 600, supports operating frequency up to 700MHz, and increases the bandwidth by 33% over the previous generation. It supports 10-bit 4K VP9 film decoding, while the thermally-designed power consumption is only 10W, which can be called as a low-power decoder, and ideal for home theater personal computer (HTPC) and game console. The output of 4K×2K/60p HD video is available via HDMI 2.0 interface.

 

Compared to Microsoft Surface Go's built-in LPDDR3, MicroPC is paired with high-frequency LPDDR4. Although it is a single-channel design, the indicators of read, write, and copy are not weak.

MicroPC's built-in M.2 interface, together with the standard 128GB SSD for M.2 2242 interface, can expand the large-capacity SSD infinitely. The hard disk is tested with CrystalDiskMark for continuous reading and writing, and the result shows 576MB/s read rate and 465MB/s written rate. Its write rate is obviously higher than the Microsoft Surface Go 64GB and 128GB versions. Additionally, the read / write speed of MicroPC is more balanced while the write speed of Microsoft Surface Go is evidently lower.

It applies the PC-level cooling solution with the active cooling design and high-power turbofan. MicroPC demonstrates better overall performance than the passively cooled Microsoft Surface Go.

Three USB 3.0 interfaces and one Micro SD slot support up to 4 external storage devices and infinite storage. It is possible to extend more peripherals through the Hub.

MicroPC supports PD 2.0-based fast charging, which can fill half the battery in 30 minutes. It also supports all 5V/3A-based mobile phone chargers and portable power source. Therefore, a charger can be shared between the MicroPC and the mobile phone. You can easily find the charging source at the airport or coffee shop (5V/3A charging output standard is available in most places).

The much-maligned Windows 10 Home is abandoned, and instead, MicroPC will have Windows 10 Pro to give users a new experience!

Furthermore, under the strategic cooperation with Ubuntu MATE, MicroPC will support Ubuntu MATE 18.10.

At that time, you may download the Ubuntu MATE 18.10 firmware on the GPD official website and crowdfunding update area. The shipped machine defaults to Windows 10 Pro.

1. Does the crowdfunding price include tariff’s that may be incurred in the destination country?

The raised funds include international express freight and remote area surcharges, but do not include the tariffs incurred when entering the destination country which need to be paid by you. Tariffs vary by country: To an EU country, the tariff rate is 21%, to Japan the tariff rate is 10%; to USA goods priced over $800 will also incur a tariff.

2. What post-sale service can the participants in the GPD MicroPC crowdfunding obtain?

Users that participate in this crowdfunding can obtain the same warranty as those that buy the product after it launches. If users are dissatisfied with the product, they can return the product within one week after receiving it for a refund. Initial product freight costs to the user will be deducted from the refund.

Please note that postage and packing costs incurred for returns will be borne by you. When mailing back units, the local postal courier should be used. Other international logistic services tend to incur tariffs on entry into China, ranging from 20% to 30% of the value of the goods. GPD will not bear this part of the cost.

3. What will happen if the crowdfunding fails to reach the target amount?

If the crowdfunding fails to reach the target amount, the users will also get reward. At the same time, we will seek other financing channels to ensure development and mass production. We also hope that users is fond of this product can continue to follow the project.

4. What can I do if I don’t receive a reply to my question in the crowdfunding comments?

For questions regarding: product technicals during the crowdfunding, product shipment after the crowdfunding, product problems or returns, please send your question to the following email: kendyz@gpd.hk using the email you used in your crowdfunding order. Replies will be sent to you soon.

For distributor or agent inquiries. Please send an email to: sales03@gpd.hk.

Indiegogo supporters will receive the reward as a priority.
Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is made as best as possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page.

CE-RoHS, FCC, CCC, JATE, MIC and other international certificates will be provided.

We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues.
story_txt:
Thanks for the support of the crowdfunding users.!MicroPC's RAM will be changed to 8GB, no longer need to make up the difference, all users who participate in crowdfunding will receive 8GB LPDDR4 MicroPC! Microsoft Surface Go is so small, lightweight, and affordable that it has been dubbed as the iPad 6 killer. However, 6" MicroPC is not only smaller than Surface Go but also has more interfaces. The palm-sized MicroPC is only 15mm in the thinnest part, weighs 440g and consumes only 10W for the thermal design, but its performance is as good as Microsoft Surface Go at a lower price. MicroPC is a mobile productivity tool suitable for each and every industry!Features of GPD MicroPC:

Compatible for IT fields and more with its rugged exterior: Network communication, electric power, exploration, mining, archaeology, education training, manufacturing, service chain, call center, business services, public institution, government military and many more;

Strong Performance with Ultra Low Power Consumption: Intel N4100 processor, four cores, four threads, and thermal design of 10W;

128GB super capacity M.2 SSD for fast read and write speed (read:576MB/s, write: 465MB/s), replaceable, and infinite capacity expansion;

RJ45 interface for wired network access, and wireless Wi-Fi 2.4G/5G dual bands and Bluetooth 4.2 for dual-channel max. transfer rate of 433Mbps;
Built-in one RS-232 serial interface, widely used in industrial control and automation;

Three USB 3.0 interfaces to maximize extended USB devices;
One full-featured Type C charging interface for audio, video and data transmission;
One microSDXC slot for manual backup or migration of data in a network-free environment;

Touchpad with left and right buttons, as well as all the left, middle and right buttons on the left-side mouse, a familiar operation allowing users to get started immediately;

QWERTY keyboard with a backlit design to meet the emergency needs at night, or in no light or dim light;

Active cooling design and PC-level cooling solution;

Two copper nuts embedded on the back for fixation in various complex environments;

Power indicator, dormancy indicator and RJ45 indicator to keep abreast of the machine at any time;
User-friendly lanyard hole, gifted with a lanyard that can carry 4kg;
It is much better than Microsoft Surface Go (8GB/128GB) in terms of overall performance, but it is smaller and more lightweight. It weighs only 440g and can be controlled by one hand.

 Media report"It’s a little clamshell computer with HDMI, USB, and Ethernet ports… and a Serial port and a rugged design. The idea is that it’s a computer that could be used by network engineers, sys admins, and other folks who need those features. But with an expected price tag of $299, I suspect it might also appeal to other mobile PC enthusiasts when it goes up for order in a few months." more >> The anti-shock aviation-level ABS synthetic resin LG-DOW 121H is imported from South Korea, with a thick thickness of 1mm, which is flame retardant, high-heat resistant, and V-0 fireproof, with a Rockwell hardness up to 109 R, and bending strength up to 26000kg/cm2. Its integrity rate reaches 97.63% under the 1.5m drop test.Its streamlined appearance is matt UV-sprayed, with rounded corners for great affinity and comfortable feel.The area of the strip-shaped hollow air inlet on the back is up to 28%, and the 3mm-high feet makes the bottom air inlet design sleeker.On the back, the 45°-inclined air outlet protects the external interfaces from dust accumulation and dissipates heat more smoothly.The non-slip twill groove gives a strong grip.Its 6” high definition (HD) wide color gamut (WCG) screen, with Corning® Gorilla® Glass 4 has a vividly colorful, natural, smooth and visible effect.With the 178° view, users can obtain an excellent visual experience at any angle.With 1280×720 resolution and 3000: 1 static contrast, it displays dedicate and bright colors.The rotatable axis supports stepless adjustment for the maximum stretch of 150°.A qwerty keyboard, touchpad, and 3D mouse are integrated into the C face, which is only 15×9cm in size. The metallic film button is wedge-shaped designed, which is more ergonomic and provides an excellent experience for finger pressing. The qwerty keyboard is backlit to meet the emergency needs at night, or in no light or dim light.The keyboard layout is more reasonable. You may complete all operations with your left thumb in case of only number inputs.MicroPC has a built-in touchpad with a larger operable area, while also supporting the left and right buttons of the touchpad. In this way, the cursor is slide more accurately through right thumb.The upper left corner of the C face is the left, middle, and right mouse buttons, with an appropriate width to assure an unfettered operation.The power key is recessed to avoid accidental touch. story:
We’ve all heard about the Cloud. This brand technology allowing companies to put their data somewhere else to reduce their expenses. The fact is that current offers do not really cover what the Cloud is capable of.

Plus, all current offers aren’t privileging what really company needs: something easy to use, something trust worthy, and something which really make the Cloud beneficial.

The Cloud is a remarkable tool, thou not yet used to it's full potential. Vistory was founded to bring it to the next level.

So, we created VESS, the Virtualized Emulated and Secured Solution, the first Meta Cloud Management Platform, the only global Cloud Computing solution.



The Cloud allows users to easily share, acces, monitor a software, information or data through a network.

VESS is just the kind of example illustrating this definition. But, contrary to existing offers, VESS proposes more:


The advantage?

If indeed our solution offers Intel systems host as the market is today, we added what the market isn’t offering: the hosting of Legacy systems such as Sparc, AS400, MVS…

We know that today companies are investing a lot of ressources (money, staff, time) just to keep those machines running. The investment can represent thousands even millions.

VESS helps those companies to reduce their budget, saving 30% to 70% on their IT budget.


Keep it secured

We created VESS since the first day by optimizing it for all security matters.

  • Regarding the user access: Role-based user access (RBAC), secured authentication
  • Network connection: Customer ring-fenced data, firewalls, secured VPN network
  • Hybrid cloud solution : Because the companies may have different needs in terms of confidentiality and security, VESS can be deployed both in a Public Cloud (infrastructures are shared) or in Private Cloud (infrastructures are dedicated), or a mix of the two models


A dedicated app

Because efficiency and speed are as important as cost is, Vistory developed VESS to assist customer needs whenever and wherever they are.

We now live in a PC+ era. We need to access data everywhere, which is more important in a company who needs flexibility.

And because those profiles can be varied, VESS is now available on iOS and Android, and will be soon released on Windows phones.


Cloud 2.0

As explained, VESS is allowing companies to not only transfer their data for Intel machines, but it is also for older machines. This kind of offer does not exist today on the market.

More, today companies have to deal with 3 or 4 different majors to access their data, or to simply virtualize their servers. Coming soon, VESS will not only assure virtualization, but also allow companies to access their data hosted by those 3 or 4 majors through only one interface: VESS itself.

No more dealing with 4 invoices; 4 contracts; 4 suppliers. VESS is the only 1.

As Sauron would say: ‘1 solution to rule them all’ (lol)



  • Virtualized all machines with no exception
  • Administrate your users: create your account, setup your own environments, manage your systems over VESS
  • Hosting location transparency: choose your datacenter location in APAC, EMEA or USA. 
  • Pay-per-use: Only pay for what you use
  • Hybrid Solution: public and private Cloud available
  • Scalable solution: whatever you are a small or a major company, VESS adapts itself to your needs
  • Accessible through all type of devices: PC, tablets, smartphones
  • On time invoicing: no surprises, you know in real time what costs to expect



Coming from various horizons, various experiences with several majors like Microsoft, Total or FedEx, Vistory is firstly about dedicated people sharing the same business vision. And as friends, we wanted to create something together.

Within our jobs, we have met engineers, sales and even final customers, and, thanks to their feedbacks, we thought our solution for each of them.

So, we know the market is always right. If this is true today, what would it be in the next 3 or 5 years? Will all current applications be on the Cloud?

We strongly believe it will be the case. And we don’t want to let the old Legacy servers remain a blocker to the Cloud adoption for all customers. We used our experience to answer to one simple question: what is the market is waiting for today?

And VESS was born.




We already have invested 20k on our own, and we’re expecting to raise 75k with this crowdfunding campaign. Thanks to you donations, you will allow Vistory to extend its offering and provide VESS with more:


Functionalities

Donation will allow us to extend VESS to more machines not yet handled by the market. Those are for the most legacy devices (old used servers, still running but not supported anymore). VESS is now proposing Sparc, but we still need money to improve our R&D to add more old machines.


Design

After an intense research, companies are expecting VESS. But beyond functionalities, we need to develop our own graphic identity, to propose something modern, sexy, and simple for the final user.


Go to market

A marketing campaign will be launched on 2015 to stimulate our international growth & commercial offer. Your donations will be used to expand our product visibility on the market.


Current Roadmap



Well, if you’re interested in participating to our growth, you may donate:



Here at Vistory, we are aware of risks and challenge for a start up to present a new product on any market, especially when you try to bring something new. Working for some of us as IT project managers, we have solved many commercial/engineering/production issues.

Plus, with our experience at Majors as Microsoft and others, we perfectly handle all processes from the plan paper to the final customer.

We’ve launched this solution because we know that many companies are handling old servers, called Legacy systems. Those are generally maintained for business constraints:

•  30 % of an ITD budget is dedicated to the preservation of these servers

•  Most of them are 10 years old, thus at the end of editor / manufacturer support lifecycle

•  They involve security and maintainability risks

And as explained on the video, the primary need is coming from the market itself, not from us. We just seized this amazing opportunity.



Thank you for having taken time to read our offering and product. I am completely aware that it is essential for you that your money is used of the best possible way. Because we committed ourselves in the transparency of VESS, be sure we committed also in the use of this fund raising.

Indiegogo is a wonderful platform, allowing startups and small companies to exist, to market products, to create jobs. And hopefully, thanks to you, Vistory will be one of those.

But none of this can be possible without your donations. You are in the middle of the real economy, the foundation of the future, Vistory’s future.

Make it possible! Make it real! We count on you!

Alexandre Pédemonte, CEO



More info:

Visit our website: www.vistory.fr

Write us: contact@vistory.fr
story_txt:
We’ve all heard about the Cloud. This brand technology allowing companies to put their data somewhere
else to reduce their expenses. The fact is that current offers do not really
cover what the Cloud is capable of.
Plus, all current
offers aren’t privileging what really company needs: something easy to use, something trust worthy,
and something which really make the Cloud beneficial.
The Cloud is a remarkable tool, thou not yet used to it's full potential. Vistory was founded to bring it to the next level.
So, we created VESS, the
Virtualized Emulated and Secured Solution, the first Meta Cloud Management Platform, the only global
Cloud Computing solution.



The Cloud allows users to easily share, acces, monitor a software, information or data through a network.


VESS is just the kind
of example illustrating this definition. But, contrary to existing offers, VESS
proposes more:
The advantage?
If indeed our solution
offers Intel systems host as the market is today, we added what the market isn’t offering: the hosting of Legacy systems such as Sparc,
AS400, MVS…
We know that today
companies are investing a lot of ressources (money, staff, time) just to keep those machines running. The
investment can represent thousands even millions.
VESS helps those companies
to reduce their budget, saving
30% to 70% on their IT budget.
Keep it secured
We
created VESS since the first day by optimizing it for all security matters.



Regarding the user access: Role-based user
access (RBAC), secured authentication


Network connection: Customer ring-fenced data,
firewalls, secured VPN network

Hybrid cloud solution : Because the companies
may have different needs in terms of confidentiality and security, VESS can be
deployed both in a Public Cloud (infrastructures are shared) or in Private
Cloud (infrastructures are dedicated), or a mix of the two models

A dedicated app
Because efficiency and
speed are as important as cost is, Vistory developed VESS to assist customer needs whenever and
wherever they are.
We now live in a PC+
era. We need to access data everywhere, which is more important in a company
who needs flexibility. 
And because those
profiles can be varied, VESS is now available on iOS and Android, and will be
soon released on Windows phones.
Cloud 2.0
As explained, VESS is
allowing companies to not only transfer their data for Intel machines, but it
is also for older machines. This kind of offer does not exist today on the market. 
More, today companies
have to deal with 3 or 4 different majors to access their data, or to simply
virtualize their servers. Coming soon, VESS will not only assure
virtualization, but also allow companies to access their data hosted by those 3
or 4 majors through only
one interface: VESS itself.
No more dealing with 4
invoices; 4 contracts; 4 suppliers. VESS is the only 1.
As Sauron would say:
‘1 solution to rule them all’ (lol)







Virtualized all machines with no exception


Administrate your users: create your account,
setup your own environments, manage your systems over VESS


Hosting location transparency: choose your
datacenter location in APAC, EMEA or USA. 


Pay-per-use: Only pay for what you use


Hybrid Solution: public and private Cloud
available


Scalable solution: whatever you are a small or
a major company, VESS adapts itself to your needs


Accessible through all type of devices: PC,
tablets, smartphones


On time invoicing: no surprises, you know in
real time what costs to expect







Coming from various
horizons, various experiences with several majors like Microsoft, Total or
FedEx, Vistory is firstly about dedicated people sharing the same business vision. And
as friends, we wanted to create something together.
Within our jobs, we
have met engineers, sales and even final customers, and, thanks to their
feedbacks, we thought our solution for each of them.
So, we know the market
is always right. If this is true today, what would it be in the next 3 or 5
years? Will all current applications be on the Cloud? 
We strongly believe it
will be the case. And we don’t want to let the old Legacy servers remain a
blocker to the Cloud adoption for all customers. We used our experience to
answer to one simple question: what is the market is waiting for today?
And VESS was born.



We already have invested
20k on our own, and we’re expecting to raise 75k with this crowdfunding
campaign. Thanks to you donations, you will allow Vistory to extend its offering and provide VESS with
more:
Functionalities
Donation will allow us
to extend VESS to more machines not yet handled by the market. Those are for
the most legacy devices (old used servers, still running but not supported
anymore). VESS is now proposing Sparc, but we still need money to improve our
R&D to add more old machines.
Design
After an intense research, companies are expecting VESS. But beyond functionalities, we need to
develop our own graphic identity, to propose something modern, sexy, and simple
for the final user.


Go
to market
A marketing campaign will be launched on 2015 to stimulate our international growth & commercial offer. Your donations will be used to expand our product visibility on the market.
Current
Roadmap







 
Well, if you’re
interested in participating to our growth, you may donate:







Here at Vistory, we
are aware of risks and challenge for a start up to present a new product on any
market, especially when you try to bring something new. Working for some of us
as IT project managers, we have solved many commercial/engineering/production
issues. 
Plus, with our
experience at Majors as Microsoft and others, we perfectly handle all processes
from the plan paper to the final customer. 
We’ve launched this
solution because we know that many companies are handling old servers, called
Legacy systems. Those are generally maintained for business constraints:
• 
30 % of an
ITD budget is dedicated to the preservation of these servers
• 
Most of
them are 10 years old, thus at the end of editor / manufacturer support
lifecycle
• 
They
involve security and maintainability risks

And as explained on
the video, the primary need is coming from the market itself, not from us. We
just seized this amazing opportunity.





Thank you
for having taken time to read our offering and product. I am completely aware
that it is essential for you that your money is used of the best possible way.
Because we committed ourselves in the transparency of VESS, be sure we
committed also in the use of this fund raising.
Indiegogo is a wonderful platform, allowing startups and small companies to exist, to
market products, to create jobs. And hopefully, thanks to you, Vistory will be
one of those.
But none of
this can be possible without your donations. You are in the middle of the real
economy, the foundation of the future, Vistory’s future.
Make it
possible! Make it real! We count on you!
Alexandre Pédemonte, CEO


More info:
Visit our website: www.vistory.fr
Write us: contact@vistory.fr

story:
The newly released “iPad OS” operating system unlocks countless functionalities for iPad Pro that makes it virtually identical to a Macbook Pro user experience. It also allows new connectivity with USB C. The ability to connect to external drives, cameras and monitors opens up a whole new world for users, but presents a new problem…being forced to use the single available port on the iPad Pro.

 

That is why we created doqo, the ultimate iPad Pro Keyboard and productivity booster. Under the slim and sleek aluminum housing, you will find everything you need to get more done…

  •  Full-size backlit keyboard with scissor-switch keys delivers laptop quality typing experience
  •  Ingenious 8-in-1 hub for ultimate connectivity of external accessories using USB, HDMI & more
  •  MacBook-size trackpad unlocks new multitasking features such as gesture control & multi-touch

With doqo Keyboard, you can get more power, incredible connectivity, and the best user experience out of the awesome iPad Pro.

 

 

 Reviews Of The Keyboard

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 *All the doqo Keyboard will have the below options to choose from.* 

  • Keyboard layout in different languages
  • Two colors: Iron Gray and Silver
  • The doqo Keyboard is upgraded with Apple Pencil Slot & Headphone Jack
  • Four different choices available: 11" iPad Pro (2018), 12.9" iPad Pro(2018), 11" iPad Pro (2020) and 12.9" iPad Pro(2020).

*Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. We are here to help:following our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/trydoqo/.We'd love to have you in our doqo group!*



 
 

doqo’s exclusive all-in-one hub design puts plenty of ports where you need them. You can connect your iPad Pro to an external monitor, TV, mouse, smartphone, hard drive, flash drive, camera, and more like never before.

 
  •  Dual Monitors to Boost Productivity
     

doqo supports HDMI connection from its 7-in1 hub allowing you to easily connect to a second monitor or external hard drive. Enjoy 4K 30Hz video output for using larger screens and large scale applications to maximize your productivity, do more, and see more from your trusty iPad Pro.

 

  •   More Storage for Content Creators
     

Be ready wherever creativity strikes you and safeguard your artistic endeavors and important work. doqo supports USB-C, SD/TF card, and USB 3.0 data transfer at the same time. Connect your camera and backup drive to doqo, to save your essential files for creative work, business, or family memories.

 

  • Fast Charging Through Type-C Ports

​

No need to take your iPad Pro out of the keyboard. You can just charge your iPad Pro through the USB-C port, compatible with QC 3.0 standard, charging speed up to 18W.

 

 

MacBook size multi-touch trackpad with fully functional gesture controls allows doqo to deliver the best hybrid laptop experience. Perfectly tweaked to work seamlessly with your iPadOS and take advantage of its latest features and multitasking functions.

 

  • Enjoyable Typing Experiences

 

Enjoy a laptop-like typing experience with a full-size, responsive scissor-switch tactile keyboard with comfortable key travel, large keycaps and great feedback to make typing more efficient, faster, and more enjoyable.

 

  • Dedicated Function Keys

​

Personalize your iPad configuration with dedicated function keys for special commands and to make adjusting the iPad Pro's volume, brightness, and other settings as easy a quick tap.

 

 
  • See Perfectly During the Night

​

Adjustable laser engraved backlit keys allow you to see perfectly during the night without disturbing screen vision.

 

 
  •  Plug and Play
     

doqo keyboard is simply a plug and plays solution for both works and leisure. The quick-release mechanism makes install or remove your iPad Pro without efforts!

 

  •  Stable Connection

​

A single Type-c connection ensuring fast charging, data transfer for your iPad Pro, as well as providing a more stable connection with your iPad than normal Bluetooth keyboard.

 

 

  • Ultra-Portable, Just Pack and Go
     

doqo eliminates the need to carry bulky accessories and extra devices. The doqo keyboard + iPad Pro gives you the power of a laptop with the portability and flexibility of an iPad. It is your ultimate business companion & travel solution.

 

  •  More Protection for Your iPad Pro
     

doqo is designed durable, yet it is compact and elegant. It can be carried as easily as your iPad and goes with you anywhere. It’s perfect for students, travelers, and business people. The all-around-edges clamshell case design is made of durable aircraft quality aluminum and adds style and protection to your valuable iPad Pro. Enjoy protection, productivity and peace of mind with doqo.

 

 
 


 
 

doqo is a professional team with years of design and manufacturing experience on Apple accessories. Since the incredible iPad Pro launched back in 2018, we have dedicated our efforts and experience to empower the already incredible iPad Pro with a multi-functional keyboard for added productivity. One year in the making, doqo Keyboard is here today, on a mission to deliver you the most enjoyable and intuitive iPad Pro user experience possible! Thank you for supporting us!

story:
What is The Antzy Top?

The Antzy Top is the smoothest, highest quality, and most durable fidget gadget on the market. It is specifically designed for anyone who fidgets on a daily basis. It helps to reduce stress and anxiety while keeping you focused on the task at hand. Made from stainless steel, this gadget is built to last!

 

What is so different about this particular fidget gadget?

  • The highest quality fidget toy on the market. It won't break on you like those other cheap fidget gadgets
  • The design and quality allows it to spin over 5 minutes!
  • Completely silent so you don't disturb those around you. Other fidget gadgets make way too much noise. 
  • Built from stainless steel, this is the highest quality and most durable fidget gadget on the market
  • BONUS: Built in LED feature for night time fidgeting. Take fidgeting to the next level with this crazy feature!

Built using stainless steel for lifetime durability

Records breaking spins!

 

BONUS: LED Night Time Feature

Unboxing and Set Up

Antzy Top Specifications:

Body Material: High quality and long lasting stainless steel body with a smooth surface finish.

Bearing Material: Top of the line Steel R188 bearings designed for a smooth and extra long spin. 

LED light Battery Type: lithium cell CR927 3v: Completely replaceable and can be purchased almost anywhere. 

Battery Duration: 4-5 weeks of continuous and heavy use

Test Customer Reviews:

"It is the smoothest thing I've ever felt! So satisfying!! I'm getting one for each of my family members."

"Wow, how can this little gadget be so addicting? I use it at my desk every chance I get."

"I'm always fidgeting and moving around so this is absolutely perfect for me. Absolutely amazing!"

"Thanks a lot guys, now I have to take this thing everywhere I go..."

How do I use it?

There is no correct way to use this amazing gadget. Spin the gadget in any way to replace your old fidgeting habits. The smoothness of it feels like butter between your fingertips.

Completely Silent

This fidget gadget is completely silent and will not disturb anyone around you. Whether you're in class or at work, you can fidget in complete silence and tranquility.

Why Fidget?

Fidgeting is a way that we relieve our stress and anxiety. When we fidget, we have excess energy that we need to release. So why not fidget in a way that can relieve this stress and anxiety, while keeping you focused on your important tasks?

Where can I use the Antzy Top?

The question is, where do you fidget the most? This gadget is great for your commutes, road trips, classroom, work, or when you're just hanging out. The fidgeting possibilities are endless with the Antzy Top! We're actually using this fidget gadget right now as we create this kickstarter campaign!

I'm not a fidgeter. Would I still enjoy the Antzy Top?

Of course! This gadget is fun and useful for absolutely everyone. Just be careful, it's very addicting!

Rewards:

 

Stretch Goals:

Where are we in the process?

After thorough tests and countless prototypes, the design you see is the most optimal design for this type of gadget. Not only is the material durable and high quality, the gadget itself can spin for over 5 minutes. We are absolutely ready to take this amazing gadget to the market!

Delivery Timeline.

As soon as the project is over, we will start the fulfillment process. We expect to have every gadget delivered by the end of August!

Our Final Statement.

Although we believe that the Most Satisfying gadget has many benefits, we aren't claiming to cure any illness or condition. Fidgeting with this gadget is a fun a creative way to help you take on your daily routines. We have personally experienced enhanced focus and astounding stress release during our more mentally strenuous tasks.

Risks and challenges

I've done many product launches and I've learned from each and every single one of them. Everything is set in place for the production of  this product as well as the fulfillment. There's always a small chance for a slight delay, but I promise to communicate timely and honestly about the status of the project.

story:
In a Nutshell

Why? 

Sending an email is like sending a postcard. Anybody can read it. At Whiteout Networks we believe that everybody should be able to encrypt their sensitive information everywhere. And we mean everybody. If you want to protect your privacy, you need end-to-end-encryption.

How?

We have developed Whiteout Mail - the first fully integrated Email/PGP-client, that runs on all devices. Our Solution is easy to use, beautiful to look at, and runs on your desktop, tablet, smartphone... simply any device.

What? 

As a supporter, you will benefit from immediate access to our service. We will enable you to send and receive encrypted mails and you will have the ability to reserve your preferred email address, before somebody else does. It only takes 2 Minutes to get your account up and running.

Why Is This Important?

At Whiteout Networks we believe that everybody should be able to encrypt their sensitive information everywhere. And we mean everybody. Our job is to make that happen. So that encryption for email will soon be as common as for example airbags in cars.

So we are building an encrypted email service that is easy to use, beautiful to look at, and that runs everywhere, on your desktop, tablet, smartphone.

Whiteout Mailbox. Encrypt Everything.

The Whiteout solution makes email encryption incredibly easy to use. Because everything is integrated, users can get up and running in a matter of minutes. 


The Whiteout solution consists of Whiteout Mail, a PGP-enabled email client, and Whiteout Mailbox, a secure and encrypted email service. 

Whiteout Mail: An open-source client based on PGP. Installable as packaged app on desktop (Chrome or Firefox) and mobile (Android, iOS). Or running directly in your browser.The first email client that offers end-to-end encryption and is available everywhere. Think of Thunderbird + Enigmail + GPG all integrated and running on all your devices. It is available today as a Chrome packaged app here or as a webmail that runs in your browser here. It is also available for Android here and for iOS here.



Whiteout Mailbox. 

Whiteout Mailbox is a new privacy-by-design email service where everything that you store in the cloud is encrypted. Safe from hackers, criminals, spies, and even safe from us.  Messages that you send to Whiteout users and other PGP clients are encrypted end-to-end with your private key on your client. Messages that you send and receive in clear text are encrypted on the server with your public key so only you can read them. 

Take a look at our website for more details on our technology stack.

Our solution will come in different editions:

  • The free client can be used with an existing email address. 
  • The Pro edition has 20GB of storage space and the ability to connect your own domain.

  • The Personal edition has everything you need for your personal usage and 2GB of storage space for your mailbox.

Whiteout in the Press

Why You Should Support Us

The good news is that email encryption is well understood. The PGP standard for email encryption has been around for more than 20 years. Even the NSA acknowledges that they cannot break it. But: It can be really hard to use PGP and you cannot get it to work on all your devices. It’s time to bring that technology into the 21st century.

We’ve worked really hard over the last year to build PGP encryption that is easy to use and works everywhere. 

Our next step is to finish the development of Whiteout Mailbox, your new email address that encrypts everything you store in the cloud.

Support us to so we can make this available as soon as possible. And use this opportunity to reserve your favorite email address before somebody else does, and to be part of the very first group of Whiteout Mailbox users. 

What Will the Funds Be Used For

Your funds will be used to extend and accelerate our development and delivery efforts, specifically:

  • Development for the client application on all mobile platforms, including Android, iOS, Firefox OS, Windows Phone.
  • Engaging top UI/UX experts to improve the ease of use of application and service even more.
  • Working with the open source community on developing an industry standard for synchronizing private and public keys between devices.
  • Scaling the backend server infrastructure for running Whiteout Mailbox.
Who We Are

Whiteout Networks was founded in 2013 in Munich. Our mission is to provide secure email that is easy to use and runs everywhere. Our products are based on open standards. We believe in contributing to existing open source projects that we build upon in our software. All our source code is published (here). Because you can only trust what you (or your trusted third parties) can inspect. As part of our work on Whiteout Mail we also work on email.js (here),  which is an open source toolbox for writing email applications in JavaScript.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your friends and help us build a community of users. Encrypted email works best if everybody has access to it!

FAQ

My friends already use PGP. Can I email with them?  Yes you can. Our automatic key lookup will find their key if it is available from a number of well-known key servers. Otherwise you can import their keys yourself.

I need more technical detail on the Whiteout solution.  Please check out our website for more information.

My friends do not have PGP and do not have Whiteout Mailbox. Do they need to get Whiteout Mailbox as well?  They can choose to get Whiteout Mailbox as well for a fully protected mailbox or they can PGP-enable their existing Mailbox by using the free Whiteout client.

What if I don't want a T-shirt?  Let us know and we'll donate the cost of the shirt to one of the well-known PGP non-profits.
story_txt:
In a Nutshell



Why? 
Sending an email is like sending a postcard. Anybody can read it. At Whiteout Networks we believe that everybody should be able to encrypt their sensitive information everywhere. And we mean everybody. If you want to protect your privacy, you need end-to-end-encryption.
How?
We have developed Whiteout Mail - the first fully integrated Email/PGP-client, that runs on all devices. Our Solution is easy to use, beautiful to look at, and runs on your desktop, tablet, smartphone... simply any device.
What? 
As a supporter, you will benefit from immediate access to our service. We will enable you to send and receive encrypted mails and you will have the ability to reserve your preferred email address, before somebody else does. It only takes 2 Minutes to get your account up and running.
Why Is This Important?


At Whiteout Networks we believe that everybody should be able to encrypt their sensitive information everywhere. And we mean everybody. Our job is to make that happen. So that encryption for email will soon be as common as for example airbags in cars. So we are building an encrypted email service that is easy to use, beautiful to look at, and that runs everywhere, on your desktop, tablet, smartphone.
Whiteout Mailbox. Encrypt Everything.

The Whiteout solution makes email encryption incredibly easy to use. Because everything is integrated, users can get up and running in a matter of minutes. 





The Whiteout solution consists of Whiteout Mail, a PGP-enabled email client, and Whiteout Mailbox, a secure and encrypted email service. 
Whiteout Mail: An open-source client based on PGP. Installable as packaged app on desktop (Chrome or Firefox) and mobile (Android, iOS). Or running directly in your browser.The first email client that offers end-to-end encryption and is available everywhere. Think of Thunderbird + Enigmail + GPG all integrated and running on all your devices. It is available today as a Chrome packaged app here or as a webmail that runs in your browser here. It is also available for Android here and for iOS here.




Whiteout Mailbox. 

Whiteout Mailbox is a new privacy-by-design email service where everything that you store in the cloud is encrypted. Safe from hackers, criminals, spies, and even safe from us.  Messages that you send to Whiteout users and other PGP clients are encrypted end-to-end with your private key on your client. Messages that you send and receive in clear text are encrypted on the server with your public key so only you can read them. 

Take a look at our website for more details on our technology stack.
Our solution will come in different editions:



The free client can be used with an existing email address. 


The Pro edition has 20GB of storage space and the ability to connect your own domain.

The Personal edition has everything you need for your personal usage and 2GB of storage space for your mailbox.





Whiteout in the Press





Why You Should Support Us

The good news is that email encryption is well understood. The PGP standard for email encryption has been around for more than 20 years. Even the NSA acknowledges that they cannot break it. But: It can be really hard to use PGP and you cannot get it to work on all your devices. It’s time to bring that technology into the 21st century.
We’ve worked really hard over the last year to build PGP encryption that is easy to use and works everywhere. 
Our next step is to finish the development of Whiteout Mailbox, your new email address that encrypts everything you store in the cloud.
Support us to so we can make this available as soon as possible. And use this opportunity to reserve your favorite email address before somebody else does, and to be part of the very first group of Whiteout Mailbox users. 


What Will the Funds Be Used For


Your funds will be used to extend and accelerate our development and delivery efforts, specifically:


Development for the client application on all mobile platforms, including Android, iOS, Firefox OS, Windows Phone.
Engaging top UI/UX experts to improve the ease of use of application and service even more.
Working with the open source community on developing an industry standard for synchronizing private and public keys between devices.
Scaling the backend server infrastructure for running Whiteout Mailbox.

Who We Are


Whiteout Networks was founded in 2013 in Munich. Our mission is to provide secure email that is easy to use and runs everywhere. Our products are based on open standards. We believe in contributing to existing open source projects that we build upon in our software. All our source code is published (here). Because you can only trust what you (or your trusted third parties) can inspect. As part of our work on Whiteout Mail we also work on email.js (here),  which is an open source toolbox for writing email applications in JavaScript.





Other Ways You Can Help
 Please share this campaign with your friends and help us build a community of users. Encrypted email works best if everybody has access to it!
FAQ

My friends already use PGP. Can I email with them?  Yes you can. Our automatic key lookup will find their key if it is available from a number of well-known key servers. Otherwise you can import their keys yourself.


I need more technical detail on the Whiteout solution.  Please check out our website for more information.


My friends do not have PGP and do not have Whiteout Mailbox. Do they need to get Whiteout Mailbox as well?  They can choose to get Whiteout Mailbox as well for a fully protected mailbox or they can PGP-enable their existing Mailbox by using the free Whiteout client.


What if I don't want a T-shirt?  Let us know and we'll donate the cost of the shirt to one of the well-known PGP non-profits.

story:
Having a Hectic Life? 

Having Difficulties to Recall Key Appointments, Birthday Parties or Special Events? 

Need Help in Organizing & Planning Your Week / Month?

In today’s fast-paced world, planning is everything. That’s why we created Plannerly 2.0; the last and only calendar you’ll ever need.

Plannerly 2.0 makes sure you will NEVER forget a thing again!

But...there are plenty of calendars out there, from electronic to paper and more.

Right?

 

 

COMPLETE KIT

The complete Plannerly 2.0 kit features a Monthly and Weekly Dual planner (double sided & magnetic), Grocery Shopping List (magnetic), To Do List (magnetic), 3 Magnetic Markers, Magnetic eraser.

Everything is here to get organised today.

 

UNIQUELY DOUBLE-SIDED!

Both a Monthly & a Weekly Planner 2 For the Price of 1.

Need to plan ahead for a month? Use our monthly planner. Intense week? Switch to weekly.

 

ULTIMATE STAIN RESISTANT TECHNOLOGY

No more wasted money. Watch as every cent makes sense with our ultimate stain- resistant technology.

Plannerly 2.0 is a pleasure to write on and wipe off with over 150,000 Writing and erasing cycles.

Even after 30 days, there will be no marks or residue behind, no stains or ghosting. Start with a clean planner every time - guaranteed.

 

PERFECT DIMENSIONS

The Plannerly 2.0 premium dual planner features the perfect dimensions. At 17 by 13 inches, Plannerly 2.0 can be used on ALL magnetic surfaces.

   It FITS on any refrigerator – from smallest to biggest.


MAXIMUM WRITING SPACE

Plannerly 2.0 offers optimal writing space; with bigger, bolder blocks. so there is ample room to write what you need in the spaces.

 

 

SUPERIOR QUALITY

Plannerly 2.0 Is Made to Last a Lifetime Using High Quality Flex Magnet & Smudge Proof Laminate.

Will Not Crease or Curl!

 

Strong Magnet makes the dry erase calendar adhere to the refrigerator with ease, no slipping or sliding when writing on.

 

Dry Erase Markers

Our Premium Magnetic Dry Erase Markers Has Fine felt tip with premium ink providing comfort, Eye Catching colors and smooth writing, and boasting handy built-in erasers on the cap for erasing precision.

 

Our markers stick to ALL magnetic surfaces.

 

Magnetic Dry Erase Erasers

Our Magnetic Dry Erase Erasers are made with high quality EVA and proprietary felt material. These are perfect for erasing large spaces.

 

 

You can place the magnetic planner low enough on the refrigerator so that kids can know their schedule instantly

Plannerly 2.0 is an ideal tool, as it helps you keep track your family on track by organising the activities of the whole family

Water Proof, Moisture - Proof And Durable

 

 

 

                              

From the smallest of appointments to the most stressful of due dates...when you plan, you plan to succeed.

Planning is the key to progress, faster decision-making, flexibility, and control.

What’s more, dry erasing helps save the planet...one paperless day at a time.

" Buy one, we will plant one, Tree Planting is one of the simplest & most effective ways of tackling climate change. That's why we will plant a tree for every product we sell with the help of a non - profit One Tree Planted organisation. "

                        

 

 

 

The good news is that we’re officially ready to launch Plannerly 2.0. However, without your support, we can’t bring this game- changing innovation to life. Back our campaign now and share it with your friends and family.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

 

What I get when I pre-order plannerly 2.0 Complete kit?

1Pack plannerly 2.0 Includes Monthly and weekly Dual planner (double sided & magnetic), 1 Grocery Shopping List (magnetic), 1 To Do List (magnetic), 3 Magnetic Markers, 1 Magnetic eraser.

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we have partnered with major courier companies & hence we are able to ship to all the countries worldwide.

When will I receive my plannerly 2.0?

As soon as the funding goal is reached ($5000 USD), we will ask our manufacturer to start the production. ( Manufacturing Unit can produce 2000 units a Day )
We can guarantee that all the products will be shipped before Christmas to all our backers.

What are the shipping costs?

Shipping costs change depending on the location & on the chosen perk.
For multi packs (2 pack, 3 pack & more) shipping cost decreases. 
Select your country in the checkout & the shipping costs will be calculated instantly.

How do I upgrade my perk to better one?

If you would like to upgrade your perk to a higher priced perk

Follow the below steps :-

Step 1:- Click on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile.

Step 2:- Click "upgrade to higher priced perk" next to your orginal perk.

Step 3:- Select the new higher priced perk you would like to claim

When you complete the transaction, your original Contribution will be automatically refunded.

Can I choose more than one perk?

As per Indiegogo rules, you will not be allowed to choose multiple perks in a single transaction.
However you can claim multiple perks by initiating a new contribution for each perk.

There was an error with my contribution?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors & steps to resolve :
Common Contribution Errors

I would like to change my shipping address, what should i do?

Please refer to this article on how to update your shipping address

Common Contribution Errors

What is the best way to clean the planner?

You can use our premium Eraser (or the built-in eraser on the markers cap). The erasers are durable, long lasting & easy to clean

Alternatively you can also use paper towels, wipe or sponge

Can I use the planner on a desk?

Yes of course you use the planner anywhere you are comfortable with.

How big are the squares in the monthly planner? Can I put magnetic pins on this?

It’s 2.4” x 2.4” a square you have ample room to write what you need 

And of course you can place the magnetic pins as well

What are the dimensions?

Monthly Planner – 17 x 13 inches

Grocery Shopping – 13 x 17 inches

To – Do List – 9 x 11 inches

Can I use it on the wall? I’d like to get one for my office?

Although our planner is designed to be magnetic, You can stick the planner to a metal frame (picture frame) without glass if you want to hang on the wall

Alternatively you can also use 3M command strips 

Does it work on stainless steel fridges?

Mist magnet-friendly appliances have a thin sheet of stainless steel as a decorative face over a metal core that's more ferromagnetic — meaning our planner stick’s to most stainless fridges.

Are the pens magnetic?

Yes the pens are magnetic.

Will any dry erase markers work on it?

Yes all dry erase markers works on our planner.

story:
How does it feel that on ANY GIVEN DAY, you can decide to totally change the direction of your life? 

All it takes is a few perspective shifts and the proper guidance to unleash the greatness in you. The quickest way to see MASSIVE improvement in your life is to question every next decision. Is this choice benefiting me or slowing me down? From bad habits to the words you use, and most importantly how you view yourself. Ask yourself, what do I need to do to have the life I want?  

All of us have an instinct for success, but many people live their whole lives not utilizing this instinct. Most people go through life just wishing something great or exciting will happen but are left disappointed and frustrated because they're still stuck in a job they don't like and are still struggling in life. The only way to change the circumstances in your life is to change the way you THINK and the way you live. 

You deserve more than you tell yourself you do. You deserve to be HAPPY and FREE to pursue your dreams and your life's purpose. You deserve to live a life on your own terms, one that is designed by YOU and you alone. You deserve to succeed and become the best person you can be!  

This is why we created this planner. Our MISSION is to help you navigate your days as efficiently as possible and maximize productivity in a fun, interactive way. We designed it as a game, so you can always challenge yourself to follow through your goals.

Get into the habit of writing down your dreams and goals and review them frequently and revise them when necessary.

Once you've steered your life to the direction you need to go and have developed yourself in the process, then we are successful in our mission. 

Don't ever let anyone tell you that you can't do something. Don't let anyone dictate how your life should be lived. You are the Master of your fate and the owner of your mind and soul. 

 

 

 

 

Productivity Game designed to challenge you in a fun way and lets you set rewards for a job well done.

 

Add a burst of color to your daily page. Create a priming ritual to bring life and energy to your day.

 

Goal setting pages allow you to set your short term and long term goals and break it down into actionable steps.

 

   Keep track of your positive and negative habits every month.

 

A gratitude section to write down your most memorable moments and list down people you would like to thank.

 

A convenient deadline tracker to view all your deadlines on one page.

 

A space to jot down ideas.

 

A handy contact list to store your important contacts.

 

Bucket List + Book List = Create your top 30 bucket list and write the top 30 book titles you want to read.

    

Finance Tracker: Income Tracker, Bill Tracker, Budget Setting, Debt Tracker all rolled into one!

 

 

We are two people who have a passion for self-development, growth and improvement in every aspect of life. We want to inspire others to be accurate thinkers, rise up to the challenges, reach their full potential, realize their dreams, and live a life they want and deserve. 

In this digital world we live in today, we created this planner to bring people back to their roots, and do it old-school, which is to use pen and paper to organize thoughts and ideas. Good old journaling, still to this day, has never ceased to be effective. And we believe people should do it more. 

We are extremely grateful that we are on this journey to personal growth and development. Working on ourselves is a life-long journey, but it's so worth it. There's nothing more fulfilling than knowing that WE HAVE WHAT IT TAKES to change our lives for the better. We realized that we can do SO MUCH MORE than what we think we're capable of and we can be so much more than what society and other people expect us to be. We just need to BELIEVE it and ACT ON IT.

We hope we are able to provide value to your life with our planner. 

The planner has helped us immensely in our own lives that we want to share it with as many people as possible in the hopes that it can change other lives too.

We are using crowdfunding as a platform not only to get this planner out to everyone but also to give back in our own little way. We chose abandoned teenage youths as our beneficiary because it is a cause that is near and dear to our hearts, and we believe that if we can help shape the minds of our future generations, the world will be better off.

This productivity planner is just the first of many that we plan to create. We are also planning to create other editions, such as Travel Edition, Mommy Edition, Fitness Edition, and so much more. We also want to create other products, in addition to the planner, to help inspire and encourage people to become accurate thinkers and live their best life!

Please SHARE this campaign to your friends in social media and to those who you know could benefit from this product. Thank you so much for your support.
