story:
Who We Are And What We're Doing

We are trying to raise $2,000 to make our website mobile-friendly by adding responsive design elements to our existing site.  ($1,800 for the coding, $200 est. support costs.)

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to strap into the cockpit of a Lockheed-Martin F-22 Raptor and take to the skies in the world’s preeminent fighter jet?  Did you know the average air-to-air dogfight lasts no more than about 2 minutes?  Those few minutes spent battling to the death are some of the most mentally and physically challenging moments to be experienced by humans.  Wouldn’t you like to know what goes on during those moments of intense combat without having to endure the crushing g forces, physical strain, and mental exertion experienced by the pilots?  The aim of Tally One is to tell the fighter pilot’s story to the rest of the world.  Through our blog at www.TallyOne.com we share stories, photos, and videos straight from the cockpits of today’s hi-tech fighters.

But we want to do more than just share stories.  We want to help you live like a fighter pilot.  It’s no secret that one must be at the top of their game to be one of the chosen few allowed to take command of our highest-tech aircraft.  While we have put in the work and have been blessed with the physical and mental capacity to take on such a difficult job, we believe there are many out there who are fighter pilots in spirit.  These are the people who pour their whole being into their jobs and do whatever it takes to succeed.  We want to help you bring out your inner fighter pilot.

We launched the blog in January 2013.  Our website currently receives 2,000 unique visitors each month and is continuing to grow.  In addition to sharing the fighter pilot experience, we offer a line of aviation-themed clothing designed to truly help you live like a fighter pilot.  Our vision is to make Tally One represent aviation in the same way Nautica represents sailing; by giving it a place in everyday life.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to better reach our audience, we need to make some changes to our website that will allow improved user access and interaction.  Our site is currently not mobile friendly.  If you’ve tried to visit us on your iPhone or Android device, you know what I mean.  We need to add responsive coding that will determine the best way to display our site on any device.  This coding will cost us  $1,800 to have implemented, and an estimated $200 in support hours for follow-up tech support.  

With sales from our website still at a slow trickle, we need to raise funds to help us reach the critical cross-section of visitors using mobile devices to view our site.  So here I am, appealing to you to help our fledgling business connect with more readers and more customers. 

We’re launching this Indiegogo campaign to seek your financial support of our cause.  In order to show our appreciation for your involvement, we offer various levels of thanks corresponding to your level of contribution.

A $1 contribution will receive our sincerest gratitude and a public acknowledgement of your individual support with a link to your web page/Facebook page on TallyOne.com. (Enthusiast Level Supporter)

A $10 contribution will receive a Tally One die-cut vinyl sticker in addition to the Enthusiast Level benefits. (Student Pilot Level Supporter)

A $25 contribution will receive our Tally One Challenge Coin in addition to the Student Pilot Level benefits. (Wingman Level Supporter)


A $50 contribution will receive a Tally One performance ball cap in addition to the Wingman Level benefits.  (Flight Lead Level Supporter)


A $75 contribution will receive your choice of Tally One custom T-Shirt in addition to the Flight Lead Level benefits (Package Commander Level Supporter)

A $100 contribution will receive an 18” x 24” Tally One poster in addition to the Package Commander Level benefits (Mission Commander Level Supporter)


A $500 contribution will receive a custom framed, limited-edition print of Sunset Over White Sands in addition to Mission Commander Level benefits. (Instructor Pilot Level Supporter)


A $1,000 contribution will reserve the leaderboard ad spot* (or any ad spot of your choice) for a full year on TallyOne.com and get you a shout-out in our upcoming eBook "The Fighter Pilot Tradition"  in addition to Instructor Pilot Level benefits (Command Pilot Level Supporter)

*All advertisements on TallyOne.com must comply with Tally One's advertising policy found at: http://tallyone.com/advertise-with-us/

Please note the die-cut stickers are in design and will be ready for viewing soon. We will post the products for viewing when they are finished.

THANK YOU!!!

By helping us improve our users' experience, you will potentially be helping us increase our sales and advertising revenues.  More importantly you will be helping us share our love of aviation by getting others to "live like a fighter pilot".

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute money to our project, you can certainly help in a number of other ways:

  • Tell your friends and family members about www.TallyOne.com
  • Read our stories and share them with your friends via numerous social media options
  • Visit the Tally One store and buy our stuff!

Any contribution, money or otherwise, is greatly appreciated.
story_txt:
Who We Are And What We're Doing

We are trying to raise $2,000 to make our website mobile-friendly by adding responsive design elements to our existing site.  ($1,800 for the coding, $200 est. support costs.)Have you ever wondered what it would be like to strap into
the cockpit of a Lockheed-Martin F-22 Raptor and take to the skies in the
world’s preeminent fighter jet?  Did you
know the average air-to-air dogfight lasts no more than about 2 minutes?  Those few minutes spent battling to the death
are some of the most mentally and physically challenging moments to be
experienced by humans.  Wouldn’t you like
to know what goes on during those moments of intense combat without having to
endure the crushing g forces, physical strain, and mental exertion experienced
by the pilots?  The aim of Tally One is
to tell the fighter pilot’s story to the rest of the world.  Through our blog at www.TallyOne.com we share stories, photos,
and videos straight from the cockpits of today’s hi-tech fighters.
But we want to do more than just share stories.  We want to help you live like a fighter
pilot.  It’s no secret that one must be
at the top of their game to be one of the chosen few allowed to take command of
our highest-tech aircraft.  While we have
put in the work and have been blessed with the physical and mental capacity to
take on such a difficult job, we believe there are many out there who are
fighter pilots in spirit.  These are the
people who pour their whole being into their jobs and do whatever it takes to
succeed.  We want to help you
bring out your inner fighter pilot.
We launched the blog in January 2013.  Our website currently receives 2,000 unique
visitors each month and is continuing to grow. 
In addition to sharing the fighter pilot experience, we offer a line of
aviation-themed clothing designed to truly help you live like a fighter
pilot.  Our vision is to make Tally One
represent aviation in the same way Nautica represents sailing; by giving it a
place in everyday life.
What We Need & What You GetIn order to better reach our audience, we need to make some
changes to our website that will allow improved user access and
interaction.  Our site is currently not
mobile friendly.  If you’ve tried to
visit us on your iPhone or Android device, you know what I mean.  We need to add responsive coding that will
determine the best way to display our site on any device.  This coding will cost us  $1,800
to have implemented, and an estimated $200 in support hours for follow-up tech support.  With sales from our
website still at a slow trickle, we need to raise funds to help us reach the
critical cross-section of visitors using mobile devices to view our site.  So here I am, appealing to you to help our
fledgling business connect with more readers and more customers.  
We’re launching this Indiegogo campaign to seek
your financial support of our cause.  In
order to show our appreciation for your involvement, we offer various levels of
thanks corresponding to your level of contribution.A $1 contribution will receive our sincerest gratitude and a
public acknowledgement of your individual support with a link to your web
page/Facebook page on TallyOne.com. (Enthusiast Level Supporter)
A $10 contribution will receive a Tally One die-cut vinyl
sticker in addition to the Enthusiast Level benefits. (Student Pilot Level
Supporter)
A $25 contribution will receive our Tally One Challenge Coin
in addition to the Student Pilot Level benefits. (Wingman Level Supporter)



A $50 contribution will receive a Tally One performance ball
cap in addition to the Wingman Level benefits. 
(Flight Lead Level Supporter)




A $75 contribution will receive your choice of Tally One custom T-Shirt in addition to the Flight Lead Level benefits (Package Commander
Level Supporter)
A $100 contribution will receive an 18” x 24” Tally One
poster in addition to the Package Commander Level
benefits (Mission Commander Level Supporter)


A $500 contribution will receive a custom framed,
limited-edition print of Sunset Over White Sands in addition to Mission
Commander Level benefits. (Instructor Pilot Level Supporter)



A $1,000 contribution will reserve the leaderboard ad spot*
(or any ad spot of your choice) for a full year on TallyOne.com and get you a shout-out in our upcoming eBook "The Fighter Pilot Tradition"  in addition to
Instructor Pilot Level benefits (Command Pilot Level Supporter)
*All advertisements on TallyOne.com must comply with Tally One's advertising policy found at: http://tallyone.com/advertise-with-us/
Please note the die-cut stickers are in design and will be ready for viewing soon. We will post the products for viewing when they are finished.THANK YOU!!!By helping us improve our users' experience, you will potentially be helping us increase our sales and advertising revenues.  More importantly you will be helping us share our love of aviation by getting others to "live like a fighter pilot".
Other Ways You Can HelpEven if you can't contribute money to our project, you can certainly help in a number of other ways:
Tell your friends and family members about www.TallyOne.com

Read our stories and share them with your friends via numerous social media options

Visit the Tally One store and buy our stuff!

Any contribution, money or otherwise, is greatly appreciated.

story:
It all started when Covid sent us to all online classes in March, in our small college town in Maryville, MO every small business had closed down and the ones that didn't were barely offering anything, plus the store hours seemed to always be changing. What really irritated Val and I was that every restaurant or local mom/pop shop we went to that said they were open on Google or Facebook....... wasn't actually open. And after the 5th time of driving to El Maguey to go get tacos and brews... PRAYING that they were open... we decided to create a platform to mitigate this problem and help small businesses communicate with their customers and locale with ease.

   We know that Covid has hurt a lot of small businesses, especially the minority owned businesses and our mission is to help them. We are raising this kick-starter to further the progress of empowering these small businesses, and re-uniting the communities in which we all live in. So far we have raised 20k from friends and family, but that has only gotten us a beta-version (will be complete in August) and keeping us afloat with all of our monthly expenses. We also have started to build relationships with businesses in Kansas City, and reaching out to more of the minority owned mom/pop shops, restaurants, and hair salons/barbershops.  With the funds from Kickstarter we will be able to bring in more help to increase our marketing efforts (part-time staff, PR, brand awareness, partnerships), pay for our full product release (App with better interface and more features for businesses), compliance and legal, as well as paying for the free LIMITED EDITION T-shirts we are supplying to our first 50 backers. We have seen multiple family members of ours struggle to market their business during COVID among the others who we have spoken with. We want to see a change, and the change is building our communities. COMMUNITY BUILDING IS THE KEY!! Back our venture to see a change in your community and fuel the power of the people!

story:
I have been working on this project for around 9 years now.

I have been tweaking and improving the business plan and now feel that it is ready to put into production.

I have searched wide and far to see if anyone anywhere has this project in operation, and fortunately for us, nobody does.

I know this is a broad statement, and all new businesses think their business is the 'next big thing'. By contributing to this project, you could potentially create a whole new 'virtual' market for buyers and sellers alike to interact. 

I am seeking an investment of £150,000, roughly $250,000 USD.

This funding will be used for the following purposes:

Design of the platform and 'marketplace' - £40,000 this will cover the complete design of the website, marketplaces, mini websites, virtual stores for people purchasing these, and also the social media aspect of the website where customers can interact with friends, play games etc.

Design of the 'virtual world' or a map service - £20,000 This will be similar to Google Maps, but will be our own map service designed solely for us.

Marketing and Advertising expenditure - £60,000 - this will be spent on numerous online advertising campaigns including Pay Per Click, Search Engine Optimisation etc.

Ongoing expenses until profitability - £15,000 - This will cover the cost of any bills including phone, internet, rent (if required), any initial wages for staff including designers we hire in house.

A buffer for unexpected costs - £15,000 because you always need a 10% buffer when starting a business as you never know when it will be needed.

What you will get in return for any contributions is simple, you will get a plot of your choice anywhere on the 'Virtual Map', again same as the globe. So you could purchase your house, you could purchase the Eiffel Tower, or maybe even the Statue of Liberty. Bearing in mind that our system is set up in such a way that your investment in one of these 'virtual properties' will only ever increase.

Here's how it works, you buy a piece of land or landmark for lets say £5.

Let's say 100 people visit this 'landmark' that you own, ie, visit the page you own, your page is now worth £6. 1 Pence increase for each visit. The more popular your page, the higher it's value.

Now let's say you have an advertising campaign on your page and are receiving £0.10 per person clicking your advert. If 100 people click this advert, you've just made £10. It really is as simple as that.

You can then sell this on in a marketplace, continue using it and receive advertising revenue, or even open a online store on this to sell items to the public.

Here's the best part, I am a specialist in Google PPC and have a solid team of SEO consultants working with me. Only thing is, this project will take 9 months to complete, and hence the financing part. We will use our experience and knowledge which we have gained over the last number of years to promote this project to it's full potential.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask.

story:
Our goal is to develop a piece of high quality open-source software that adds OpenPGP message support to Zimbra.

This crowd funder is the first in a series to achieve a full implementation of OpenPGP in Zimbra. 

If the goal is reached we will develop a plugin (Zimlet) for Zimbra Collaboration Suite 8 that that detects GPG/PGP signed email messages and displays a green information bar to notify the end user a signature was verified successful or displays a warning screen when a signed message was not verified successful. Public key server look-ups will be supported.

Part One Signature verification

  • 600 euros to set up a development environment and create the Zimlet.
  • The zimlet will be released as open source and free software.
  • The source code will be published to Github.
  • Expected PRODUCTION release date: July 2014
  • Fixed Funding, you will be refunded if the goal is not reached, and the plugin won't be developed

What is next

  • After successful completion we will continue development towards signing messages, encrypting and encrypting, this will be in a new crowd funder. 


What is Zimbra

Zimbra is one of few full featured Email Collaboration Suites that is Open Source. It can be compared to Google Mail, Calendar but hosted at your company or in a private cloud.

  • Developers have experience with maintaining Zimbra 6-8 Network Edition and Open Source edition.
  • Experienced software developers.

What is PGP

Pretty Good Privacy (PGP) is a data encryption and decryption computer program that provides cryptographic privacy and authentication for data communication. PGP is often used for signing, encrypting, and decrypting e-mails (source wikipedia).

story:
ARMPAL is a cross-age 3D wooden assembly tabletop game suitable for entertainment between 1-4 people, which could be perfect for either party games or family entertainment.

 

 

 

We designed quick-removable and replaceable head kits to expand the playability of Armpal.

Based on the same set of control system and robot arm, we have designed three sets of components: manipulator caliper, excavator bucket, and magnetic crane.

 

ARMPAL can be used for multiple entertainment modes such as single-player entertainment, two-player battles, and multiplayer cooperation.

We recommend the following 8 ways of playing according to the different requirements for operational proficiency, the actual duration of the game (short time≤3 min, long time＞3 min), and the number of participants in the game.

The players can use the mechanical robot arm-calipers kit to stack up the wooden cube blocks in turn in the central areas on Armpal exclusive table mat.

If one side fails to stack or the wooden block tower falls down, the other side wins the game.

⏳The time limit of this mode is 3 minutes.

The players can use the excavator bucket kit to move the goods in your stacking area to the balance scale. When time is up, the very side with heavier goods to the balance scale (the side of the balance is lower) wins.

⚖️The players can use the magnetic crane kit to scramble for the goods in the central area and move them to your own stacking area.

The game is over when all the goods are moved out. The very side who moves heavier goods wins.

 

 

Build a 3×4 wooden block wall in the Obstacle Area. Players will take turns to throw wooden cubes using Armpal robot arm and try to destroy the wooden block wall.

A total of 3-N rounds are performed according to the number of players (the wooden block wall should be restored after each throw).

1 point for each block shot, the player with the highest score wins!

 

Build a 3×4 wooden block wall in the Obstacle Area. Players will take turns to throw wooden cubes and try to put them into the Armpal Scale Box controlling the robot arm, 5 throws for each player.

3 points for Box 1, 10 points for Box 2, and -5 points for accidentally knocking down obstacle blocks.

The player with the highest score wins when all the throws are done!

 

 

9 Blocks in the Kick Off Area for each player to carry the wooden blocks to the Scoring Areas within the 3-min game. Successful transportation to the right areas gain points, and the player with the highest score wins when time’s up!

Each successful placement of a wooden block in the Central Area will get 1 point. The 3-Points Area and 5-Points Area are the Scramble Areas, and the very side with the block at the top of the pile in these areas when time’up will get the corresponding scores.

When players accidentally knock down the wood cubes which are already in the Scramble Areas, corresponding points should be taken from their final scores.

 

 
 
 

Two people operate a device (each person with one of the 2 handles) simultaneously , each group of players transports wooden blocks from the Stacking Area to the Central Area within the 3-min game, and the group with more wooden blocks wins when time’s up.

 

 

Players will pass the wooden blocks in a circle controlling their Armpals.

Watch out! Don’t drop it!

The 2 players who dropped the wooden block while passing it will fail the game and the other 2 players win!

 

 The new Cannon Kit emphasizes the sense of simulation like the existing kit, so it will have a firing principle that is completely different from other firearm model toys —— this might probably the closest one to real ammunition in the current market!

 

 

For the new cannon kit, we designed ammunition containing bullet, case, primer, and even powder (replaced by spring energy storage). At the same time, we designed the components for delivery and return. And also, a series of institutions of shelling (throwing shells).

 

 

In addition to controlling the aiming of the robotic arm during operation, you will also use the two triggers on the handle of the control unit, one of which is used to fire and the other is used to deliver the bomb. 5 Rounds of ammunition can be loaded at once. *The Cannon Kit is currently undergoing verification and finishing work, will be available for purchase at special price for ALL BACKERS ON KICKSTARTER on pledge manager when the campaign ends.

 

 

 

Armpal is a set of wooden assembled, non plug-in tabletop game.

Reducing the difficulty of the assembly process to the lowest level, the most complicated tool you’ll use is only a screwdriver, which make ArmPal well-adapted to a very wide age range.

 

 

 

We have designed a multi-axis operating system for Armpal that is beyond imagination. 

If you want to experience the joy of manipulating machinery without leaving home, this set of tabletop game must be a very good choice.

 

 

As a set of mechanical-themed tabletop game, you can find armpal ingeniously integrates gear transmission, hydraulic transmission, pulleys, magnets, and multiple mechanisms. 

The visualized design enable us to enjoy the whole working process of movements with all the beautiful mechanical structures.  

The optimization of the production process is also an important part of the design work.

The laser cutting of the main wood knot structure can ensure smooth edges, and makes it easy to be taken apart without tools.

In just a few steps, the entire hydraulic system can be rejuvenated to counteract possible liquid evaporation.

 

 

 

 Our designers try to assign hand-made models to the attributes of the game. Such products can bring people back to the real world from mobile phones and the Internet, increasing face-to-face communication between people.

The time spent playing with family or friends is full of happiness. And what is even more amazing is that this game is made by yourselves!

You can easily use your hands to cooperate with the manipulation machinery to complete complex operations.

story:
A not so long time ago in a city not so far far away...

The idea for SavySwap (spelled with one V on purpose) started  7 months ago by two ambitious lads Chris Coleman & Cal Knight.  Both were living in Philadelphia at the time but complete strangers to one another. Chris was a college student who had attended the University of Colorado and later moved back to the East Coast to Washington DC to finish his education. With a background in journalism and a love for technology, Chris found himself writing and creating his own material for his techblog and eventually helping to found Strategic Media, a mobile strategies company. He knew he was destined to make a bigger impact in the world.  

Cal, who had been a part of a promising startup in 2010 which he sold to his partner was now working towards a new venture in the eCommerce space. He was determined to follow in the footsteps of the serial entrepreneur, Richard Branson, Calvin would not give up on this dream!

 

So what happened next?  

Cal had started a  group in Philadelphia that Chris had joined. At the time, Chris had a really great idea for a campus-share company that would help college students buy and trade items with each other within their own campus. He was looking for a co-founder who could help execute this plan. While discussing the idea, what was supposed to be a 30 minute call turned into hours of brainstorming which turned into something much bigger than sharing items on a college campus.  

The Problem and The Savy Solution!

Cal & Chris discussed how irritating it was to sell or list specialty items on sites like Ebay, Craigslist, and Amazon. After doing detailed research, they found that over 50% of the items on Ebay never receive a bid or a view, Amazon caters towards businesses selling its products to users and relatively ignores customer to customer selling and local businesses. And Craigslist...well we all know how difficult it can be to buy or sell things from trustworthy users. 

There had to be a better way; a way to get connected with people with similar interests that you could get to know and trust in an exciting manner while leveraging your existing social network! What if there were profiles like Airbnb and a means of communicating instantly where you could work deals with other buyers and sellers? 

Changing The Way We Buy, Sell, and Trade Online

The current eCommerce space is limited in the ways to get what you want. Currently users have the option to outright buy an item, or place a bid on them and that's it!  Well, what if you were looking for a new camera, but didn't necessarily have the money to get the one you wanted? What if someone had that exact camera you were eyeing, and was looking for an item that you already owned and didn't mind getting rid of...enter Swapping! You may then ask, what if the items didn't equal each other in value....enter Bartering!  For the unfamiliar...

Barter is a system of exchange by which goods or services are directly exchanged for other goods or services without using a medium of exchange, such as money.

We were inspired by Kyle MacDonald, who in 2006 started with a paperclip and bartered his way into getting a house!!!! 

Bartering has been a part of our lives since the day we could communicate. You may remember going to school at a very young age with an apple for lunch and wanting that double chocolate fudge pudding Jennifer had. What did you do, did you stick with your apple in misery or did you try to work a deal with Jennifer to get what you wanted? The same concept can be applied to getting what we want from each other online!  

  

Why this Campaign?

In the very quick amount of time we've developed SavySwap we have received numerous amounts of positive feedback from advisors, investors, and successful startup entrepreneurs about the potential of the idea. We've put in hours upon days upon weeks of hard work to make strategic connections with people who are passionate about this idea like us and share the vision of how it can make a difference in the lives of people around the world.

The only thing holding us back from delivering a great product is money. We've already poured our own funds into getting mockups and the development of a prototype and wireframes; but, in order to deliver a finished, more polished product that people will love and can use to its fullest extent, we will need your help.

 
 
 
 
 

About The Developers 

The contributions that we receive through this funding campaign will allow us to work with a great and well renowned mobile development company, Sourcebits!  They have developed apps for companies such as Twitpic, Velib, Coca-Cola, General Electric, IBM, and Intel!

After our initial consulting session with the technical team at Sourcebits, they were excited to work on a cutting edge app with our team and bring our idea of social bartering to life! However, you pay for what you get, and working with a professional team such as this is not cheap. The cost of the project will be $50,000. Not only will your contributions allow us to work with this A+ team to develop the app, but also ensure the best user experience for you!

 

 

What We're Asking for and What You Get in Return...

Sourcebits roots are in working with larger corporations but they are looking to explore more freedom to pursue startup projects similar to ours. They created a great promo program for startups where they will take 50% upfront of the capital needed for an app to be designed and developed. We are asking for $35,000 to reach our goal of developing the fully functional SavySwap app. 

As we mentioned, the cost for the project we are creating is $50,000. We will use $25,000 of the funds to put towards the app being developed and delivered to you, the people! We will then use the remaining money toward additional marketing to ensure we gain enough initial users to really enhance the SavySwap experience and validate the success of the application! 

In return we have many unique and awesome personalized perks to thank you greatly for your contributions!!!!!! We wanted to really have our donors feel a sense of pride, passion, and excitement about SavySwap, so we are offering everlasting thank you's!

Perks

Rewards range from an elegant handwritten and embossed thank you card to a sleek decal from Stickermule with the SavySwap logo! The larger your donation the more SavySwap swag you'll get.  Check out all the sweet perks you can claim on the right side bar of this campaign!  Remember even donating $1 is a big help and we thank you eternally!

 

 

 

The Impact

SavySwap will be extremely valuable to anyone who has ever wanted to find a better way to sell, buy, and trade items and services and refused to settle for the status quo. If you've ever felt like you couldn't make money from something you had because you would never find someone else who wanted it, or wanted to buy something you really loved but felt you couldn't get it because you couldn't find it or didn't have the money to afford it, SavySwap will save the day!  

Your contributions will help us revolutionize the way people connect with each other to get items they want. No longer will they have to settle for buying for that new SLR camera lens or Les Paul Guitar for stock value! You can work with other users to strike a deal and barter for what you think is fair! 

SavySwap also couldn't come at a more important time! With a down economy and currency losing value we need to look to each other to build up ourselves and communities to be stronger than ever before!  History shows that when capital is weak, trading and bartering thrive!  We can use those skills we learned as children to bring excitement, fun, and communication into ecommerce!  SavySwap will be the place users can build their own personalized communities and get connected with others who have similar interests or hobbies!  Together we can enhance our experiences by taking action and leading the way in revolutionizing how ecommerce is engaged!  

Other Ways You Can Help: iPhone 5 Giveaway

We do realize that not everyone can donate, or maybe you just don't want to and we understand! You can still help us achieve our goal and make this dream a reality by getting the word out and sharing this campaign with your friends, your network, or even complete strangers! You can also be rewarded in other ways. By signing up on our website and referring the most people, you will win a brand new iPhone 5. So what are you waiting for!?!?

Thank you so much for your time, sharing, and donations we just cannot thank you enough!!!!

and as always....

"Stay Savy My Friends!"
story_txt:
A not so long time ago in a city not so far far away...
The idea for SavySwap (spelled with one V on purpose) started  7 months ago by two ambitious lads Chris Coleman & Cal Knight.  Both were living in Philadelphia at the time but complete strangers to one another. Chris was a college student who had attended the University of Colorado and later moved back to the East Coast to Washington DC to finish his education. With a background in journalism and a love for technology, Chris found himself writing and creating his own material for his techblog and eventually helping to found Strategic Media, a mobile strategies company. He knew he was destined to make a bigger impact in the world.  
Cal, who had been a part of a promising startup in 2010 which he sold to his partner was now working towards a new venture in the eCommerce space. He was determined to follow in the footsteps of the serial entrepreneur, Richard Branson, Calvin would not give up on this dream!
 
So what happened next?  
Cal had started a  group in Philadelphia that Chris had joined. At the time, Chris had a really great idea for a campus-share company that would help college students buy and trade items with each other within their own campus. He was looking for a co-founder who could help execute this plan. While discussing the idea, what was supposed to be a 30 minute call turned into hours of brainstorming which turned into something much bigger than sharing items on a college campus.  
The Problem and The Savy Solution!
Cal & Chris discussed how irritating it was to sell or list specialty items on sites like Ebay, Craigslist, and Amazon. After doing detailed research, they found that over 50% of the items on Ebay never receive a bid or a view, Amazon caters towards businesses selling its products to users and relatively ignores customer to customer selling and local businesses. And Craigslist...well we all know how difficult it can be to buy or sell things from trustworthy users. 
There had to be a better way; a way to get connected with people with similar interests that you could get to know and trust in an exciting manner while leveraging your existing social network! What if there were profiles like Airbnb and a means of communicating instantly where you could work deals with other buyers and sellers? 
Changing The Way We Buy, Sell, and Trade Online
The current eCommerce space is limited in the ways to get what you want. Bartering has been a part of our lives since the day we could communicate. You may remember going to school at a very young age with an apple for lunch and wanting that double chocolate fudge pudding Jennifer had. What did you do, did you stick with your apple in misery or did you try to work a deal with Jennifer to get what you wanted? The same concept can be applied to getting what we want from each other online!  
  
Why this Campaign?
In the very quick amount of time we've developed SavySwap we have received numerous amounts of positive feedback from advisors, investors, and successful startup entrepreneurs about the potential of the idea. We've put in hours upon days upon weeks of hard work to make strategic connections with people who are passionate about this idea like us and share the vision of how it can make a difference in the lives of people around the world.
The only thing holding us back from delivering a great product is money. We've already poured our own funds into getting mockups and the development of a prototype and wireframes; but, in order to deliver a finished, more polished product that people will love and can use to its fullest extent, we will need your help.

 


 


 
 
 
About The Developers 
The contributions that we receive through this funding campaign will allow us to work with a great and well renowned mobile development company, Sourcebits!  They have developed apps for companies such as Twitpic, Velib, Coca-Cola, General Electric, IBM, and Intel!
After our initial consulting session with the technical team at Sourcebits, they were excited to work on a cutting edge app with our team and bring our idea of social bartering to life! However, you pay for what you get, and working with a professional team such as this is not cheap. The cost of the project will be $50,000. Not only will your contributions allow us to work with this A+ team to develop the app, but also ensure the best user experience for you!

 
 

What We're Asking for and What You Get in Return...
Sourcebits roots are in working with larger corporations but they are looking to explore more freedom to pursue startup projects similar to ours. They created a great promo program for startups where they will take 50% upfront of the capital needed for an app to be designed and developed. We are asking for $35,000 to reach our goal of developing the fully functional SavySwap app. 
As we mentioned, the cost for the project we are creating is $50,000. We will use $25,000 of the funds to put towards the app being developed and delivered to you, the people! We will then use the remaining money toward additional marketing to ensure we gain enough initial users to really enhance the SavySwap experience and validate the success of the application! 
In return we have many unique and awesome personalized perks to thank you greatly for your contributions!!!!!! We wanted to really have our donors feel a sense of pride, passion, and excitement about SavySwap, so we are offering everlasting thank you's!

story:
All your data anytime, anywhere, across all your devices. 

Bytedrive has a single goal, which is to provide fast,simple and secure cloud backup services through browser, desktop and mobile applications for all your backup needs.

Bytedrive features

Automatic unlimited backups.

Military based encryption (military grade AES-256 encryption).

Sharing of large files across multiple platforms with a single click.

File Versioning, for example if you have multiple stored copies of files, this will allow for the monitoring and tracked changes of that file.

Seamless syncing across multiple devices browsers and computers, with the option to view a entire backed up system and/or sync files and documents from any device anywhere at anytime.

Automatic restore of accidential lost or deleted files.

Create automated scheduling for user needs. 

Most importantly 'NO MORE MANUAL BACKUPS!'.

Package Offers:

                                    

                               

Bytedrive offers four packages consisting of a Backup solution with limited capacity, Backup Pro with unlimited capacity a Sync solution and finally a Ultimate solution combining both Backup Pro and Sync. These packages automatically encrypt and store your files safely and securely online, with the availability to access these files from anywhere at anytime.

Bytedrive Backup/Pro

Instantly Backup all your precious files including, photos,music and documents, works seamlessly with both MAC and PC. The Bytedrive Desktop applications run incognito without taking up any CPU usage whilst automatically backing up your data. 

All your Backup Needs

Bytedrive Backup will protect all your valuable data safely and securely online, within the cloud. Bytedrive Backup provides a fully efficient, easy to use and install, complete secure solution to backing up your important files with no limit on capacity.

Your Files Anytime

Once your data is backed up you can view your files anytime. This can be from any web browser, or from your mobile devices. Files including documents and photos can be viewed and downloaded to your device. You are also able to listen to your music and watch your favourite movies on the go.

Works Incognito 

Bytedrive Backup functions quietly in the background of your machine automatically backing up your system without any disruptions. No prior technical knowledge is required, the automation of backup means that all your files are backed up instantly and securely. Files can also be restored simply at any time with a single click.


Complete Piece of Mind Solution 

Bytedrive Backup provides a complete safe and secure environment for your files. We use military grade encryption; so all your files stay safe and completely private. We keep multiple copies of your files, so you can revert and access your data at anytime, we will also provide a dedicated and unrivalled support team, included absolutely free.


             Bytedrive Sync                              

Bytedrive Sync is your own unique personal storage space for your data; Sync will come fully complete with upto 2TB of cloud storage. This syncs between all your Macs and PCs, and is also accessible from anywhere online or on you’re mobile devices.

Sync files between all computers 

Bytedrive Sync appears as a new drive on your Mac or PC.  Bytedrive Sync works as any other drive, with the ability to drag and drop files, this is then synced and shared between all your computers and mobile devices , so your files go with you wherever you are.

Unleash your Files 

With Bytedrive apps you can access all your files from anywhere at anytime. You can stream your music and movies or view your documents and photos on the go. We currently have apps developed for the iPad, iPhone, and soon to be released for Android, and Windows 8. Our mobile site will also allow you to access your private storage from any web-enabled device.

File Sharing already integrated 

                                     

With sending large files, Bytedrive enables sharing files with a single click. These files can then be shared publicly or globally or shared privately and securely with selected people. 

Bytedrive Ultimate 

                                                      

Automatically backup all your computers and Sync all your data between your MAC & PC'S, as well as access all your files from any device, with one complete package and additional features only available with Bytedrive Ultimate.

Unlock the Ultimate Power of Bytedrive 

                                                   

Bytedrive Ultimate incorporates Bytedrive Pro Backup for both MAC & PC. Bytedrive Sync also integrates with up-to 2TB of cloud storage space. This Allows you to protect all your data, Sync between all your computers and share files with the ability to access them from anywhere anytime. 

Ultimate User Privileges 

Bytedrive Ultimate gives exclusive privileges unavailable with other packages. Ultimate users can FTP or SFTP to access cloud storage, with the access of your files from an FTP client including automation of uploads and downloads. WebDAV access is also combined to access your files, with the ability to view and edit from from within other applications including Pages, Numbers and Keynote.

Ultimate Performance 

Bytedrive software is designed to be superfast and super efficient. Bytedrive doesn't limit your upload or download speed, and is fully optimised to work incognito.

Current Status 

ByteDrive has been in development since March 2014. Beta versions of the MAC, iOS have been developed and will continue to be developed to full production quality. Windows applications and android are at present under development,  ByteDrive and all its applications are set to be fully operational and rolled out towards the end of this year with the ability to expand to final release sooner from your generous assistance. Although Bytedrive was only formed in 2014 we are looking forward to you joining the community this year to make Bytedrive a future success.

Where you money goes:

Your generous support will pay for the continual development of Bytedrive applications from beta to full release. Hire of secondary developer to get Bytedrive out to you faster and hopefully a support technician, depending on how much raised, all your generous contributions will assist with the continual growth of Bytedrive.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to support us with your hard earned cash, please tell your friends! Share this campaign and talk about it. Follow us on Twitter @bytedrive and give Bytedrive a try once released. You are also welcome to contact us directly regarding the campaign at indiegogo@bytedrive.co 

Technology Team 

Sam Anthony Hunt, Founder of Bytedrive, lead Designer & Programmer

M.S.C Software Engineering Graduate, 2014, Aberystwyth, Wales

Sam has been an avid software developer and passionate freelance mobile developer for the past 5 years. knowledge of current issues in the field of Software Engineering, including enterprise design patterns, platform interoperability and the development of distributed applications. Skills were also developed within forensic and ethical hacking with understanding core vulnerabilities in a multitude of system architectures.

Previous experiences have been working with open source frameworks to developing iOS game applications both augmented reality and 2D related projects.

Frequently Asked Questions, 

Answered

Q.  How secure is my data and where is it held? 

A.Your Bytedrive account is held on multiple storage servers within the UK ensuring your data is fully protected. Bytedrive currently employs servers all based within the UK with military grade AES-128 encryption used during the transfer of files between your computer and the server ensuring your files are safe and secured within these data centres. Technicians are available onsite and servers are monitored 24hours a day. 

Q.  Can we add more computers and pay for additional storage? 

A. No problem, additional storage will be available for both Sync and backup, you are also able to increase the number of computers you want to backup.  

Q.  Do we pay for the applications? 

A. Never! The applications will be made available completely free, Once subscribed and a fellow Bytedriveian (Bytedrive Follower) you will automatically have free access to download both desktop and mobile applications.

story:
All portable electronic locks are running on compact with limited battery power, battery drained preventing any access is still common problem.

 

Nowadays, your smartphone is your key until it is out of battery, stolen or left in the office.  

 

How you feel to carry so many heavy, rusty metal key all day long and take minutes to find the right key among them.

 

Our solution is ready for you to solve your most hassle issue on electronic lock. Introducing Smart Key and locking system by Brilliant Guard. Our patent-pending security access algorithm, lightweight, rechargeable, and smartphone manageable smart key can empower you to have one physical key to access and manage up to 100 locks (BG branded only locks).

Proudly to introduce Brilliant Guard smart padlock with weight over 480g built with zinc alloy material, comfortably passed ASTM grade 4 level, and strong design look. It supports dual authentication when it comes to Brilliant Guard Smart key, standard encryption, and secured wireless communication that you can count on. Companion mobile App (supported Android and iOS) tightly connects with our secure server to monitor any anonymous activities. 

 

Our single App can enable easy access management, secure data protection, and authentication management by network security server.  NO more rekeying hassle, refreshing new digital key at your fingertips to save time and money. Sharing and tracking the locks with our smart key can get easier and faster. 

 

 

Our smart key is so lightweight that you can place it in your pants or purse without notice. Elegant design with smart chip inside, it empowers everything you need to access your lock with strong security protection. Companion strong and smart padlock can give you peace of mind while you are away from your properties. Our patent-pending dual authentication algorithm can fully protect authorization data residing in the key and sensitive data while communicating with locking system.  

 

 

 

The smart key can be easily activated by scanning our unique code on your smartphone with our companion app (supported Android and iOS).  You can selectively add, change, or remove any keys, anytime and anywhere as many as you need that distributing to a group of personnel who want to access your building or front-gate remotely. 

 

People always think about a lock is just a lock which is to protect and secures your assets. However, we build our lock more than you can imagine. Coupling with smart key, your friends, families, coworkers, and even UPS deliver can benefit our innovation by sharing smart key or with mobile App. Granting one time access or terminating it when necessary, it can be done just few clicks on your mobile App. 

 

 

We also provide a scalable solution in simplifying the access control and real-time status update across for your personal or business purpose. 

Especially in Chicago, you can easily observe four different weather in a day in February, rain in the morning then rain turns to light snow right after lunch, windy but sunny before sunset.  Our heavy-duty smart padlock has passed IP65 protection testing.

 

When the temperature drops down to sub-zero temperature, a battery exposes in this weather might be hard working. With our smart key unique power-boosting feature, it can power the lock in cold weather condition simply plugin and go. 

 

Our technical team has devoted a tremendous amount of time to build the world's smartest padlock and power key at the same time, high tech might be boring inside since it operates the way how we design and program, however, picking your own colorful padlock can be personal and meaningful. Our marketing team believes lock can be smart but also should provide a variety of colors to speak for itself independently. We can proudly say even heavy-duty padlock can be shiny with eye-catching color. 


The smart idea always needs experienced and subject matter expertise to build it, when it comes to lock manufacturing, our team has over 20 years of building commercial lock experience with our own factory. 

 

 Combining with our technology development team to start from design, development, testing, manufacturing to packing is in one great team. Experience counted, however, intellectual proprietary is extremely important to us because integrity and trust is our core value. 

 

Transforming new way to manage access control but retaining with over 20 years manufacturing experience and skill. We design, develop, and build our products with most reliable and high quality.

 

Even single piece of nut and bolt matter on building a high-quality product which can be durable.   

 

Our rigorous testing team never compromises your asset security and protection by relaxing our quality assurance standard. 


Smart locking system with on-demand smart key by Brilliant Guard, our lightweight, rechargeable, and smartphone manageable smart key can provide power charging, access key, and event retriever on all our BG locking devices like a portable padlock. With our patented algorithm, dual hardware and software authentication will be deployed throughout the locking system to validate legitimate users. Our vertical development spanning from firmware, mechanical hardware, software, and manufacturing are all in-house by our experienced and industrial recognized leaders. 

 

 

Join us to be part of our journey to create an eco-friendly environment by reducing metal key usage, mitigating carbon emission by sharing more, and enabling internet-connected things with our innovation.

 

Creating a better, faster, more secure way to share and protect your important and valuable asset both mechanical and digitally.

 

Our mission is to design and manufacture easy-to-use and internet connected electronic locking products that anyone can use to have a better way to manage, share, operate and reduce the cost of living.  Our team is comprised of innovative technology expert that has proven successful record, over 30 years manufacturing veteran that belief in transforming from mechanical to electronic smart and connected is the future.

story:
What is SQLServerBooster?

A few years ago I needed to backup the MS SQL Server databases on my server, compress them and automatically send to the cloud. I created a custom solution. This solution eventually became SQLServerBooster.

In 2011 I released the first public version. Since then I have been working on it in my spare time. Currently it provides several features such as:

  • Creating MS SQL Server database backups (all editions and since  2000 version),
  • Supports relational and Analysis Services databases.
  • Uploading the backups to cloud services including Amazon S3, Amazon Glacier, Dropbox, Windows Azure and FTP/FTPS servers.
  • Backup encryption and compression
  • Scheduling
  • Email notifications
  • And much more...

Best of all, SQLServerBooster is FREE for anyone to use and does NOT have any limitations (i.e - number of installations, server instances, amount of backups, etc.) like other solutions available. 

This video show how to download and interact with the tool. The basic instructions to configure a simple or multi-database backup task. *This video has no audio.



What will be new in SQLServerBooster 2.0?

Now I want to add support to the following cloud services:

  • Google Drive
  • Microsoft OneDrive
  • Box
  • Rackspace 

I also want to support more databases such as:

  • MySQL
  • MariaDB
  • Oracle
  • PostgreSQL
  • MongoDB
To implement these cloud services and databases I need to upgrade my dev tools and buy more software licenses.

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge is the time necessary to accomplish all the features that I want to implement.  They will require time to be developed and tested, and to make sure that everything works well and with exceptional quality.

Throughout these years since I released SQLServerBooster I gathered the knowledge to develop the interface/connectors with the cloud services. Because of my background I also have the skills to work with the DBMS (Database Management Systems) that I want to support, and I also have experience utilizing these databases.


Perks

I chose these perks because they represent my home country Guatemala in Central America. The perks depict a variety of our traditions and landscapes.  They are handmade by local artisans so you will be indirectly supporting the local economy.

story:
What is Leative (Lee-8-tiv)?

Leative is an exclusive community of software company CEOs.

Leative coordinates monthly small group meetings of 6 to 8 CEOs who engage in rich dialogue about ideas, insights, and information. If you want to be part of a group of peers who are committed to trust, collaboration, and growth, Leative is that group.

These meetings provide you the opportunity to connect with other software CEOs to:
  - Collaborate on solutions to business challenges.
  - Discuss CEO-level issues others would not understand (it can be lonely at the top).
  - Benefit from a culture of accountability.
  - Exchange ideas, insights, and information.
  - Be inspired by others with vision.

You will be connected with peers who have no vested or conflicted interest in your business, so you get an honest opinion and feedback from peers who aren't afraid to ask you the tough questions.

The meetings take place in virtual rooms utilizing video conferencing. You can attend the meetings from the comfort of your home, the office, or while traveling. No more frustrating traffic jams or the other hassles of local meetups.

In these meetings, participants share the challenges they are facing in their business and collaborate on solutions and resources to grow their companies.

Leative also provides you with accountability. Accountability to move your company forward each month, and an expectation that you will take action to solve the problem you are facing.

This provides motivation to eliminate challenges from your business instead of letting them stick around inhibiting your company’s growth.

Monthly infusions of expertise

In addition, Leative members will have the opportunity to participate in live webinars each month, complete with question and answer session. The webinar will consist of an interview with or presentation from an expert in the field. Topics will be chosen based on feedback from the community.

Collaboration accelerates growth

Collaboration is an accelerator for growth... growth of yourself, growth of your business, and growth of our economies.

The most efficient form of collaboration is still verbal communication.

In today's world of fast moving innovation, you need as many brilliant minds in your corner as possible. You need thinkers to help you come up with great ideas and solve challenges.

We need to be connected with others to share these ideas and challenges to create great solutions.

This is what Leative is all about. It gives you a way to connect with like minded peers to collaborate on solutions for the challenges in your company.

More resource to generate results

Imagine having the resources of 6 to 8 other CEOs behind you. I'm sure you have experienced the following situation. You need a contractor for a short term project such as translating your software to another language.

You go to Elance or oDesk and spend hours trying to hire a good translator. You finally select a contractor, but whether they will perform well is unknown. If they don't, it's back to square one.

Now imagine being able to ask for a recommendation from your peers for a great translator. You get a trusted recommendation and your project is completed in record time. No hassle, just results.

Now apply that same situation to customer analytics software, accounting software, customer support software, etc. You hear about the real experiences of others and reduce your time to find resources for your company.

Of course, you could send a message to your network on Twitter, Facebook, or LinkedIn, but who has time to ask all the questions through messaging. It would take several back and forth conversations to gain understanding about the other person's real experience with a contractor or a software tool?

There is just no substitute for verbal collaboration.

Worried you will sell yourself to your competitors? Not a chance!

When groups are formed, care is taken not to place CEOs from competing companies in the same group. Everyone in the group has one thing in mind, and that is helping others solve their challenges and having their own challenges solved.

You will experience trust and accountability as each member strives for collaboration and growth.

Accelerate your growth

Think of Leative as the accelerator for you and your business. Sure, you could make business happen without Leative, but you would be moving at a much slower pace while the competition leaps ahead.

What will it cost?

In talking with many software CEOs, we have discovered some are paying in excess of $400/month for a similar service. Some are paying as much as $1000/month.

If you are a software CEO, you can guarantee you get the absolute best price by contributing to this campaign and joining us today.

If you contribute $77 to this campaign, your first month is free.

If you contribute $231 to this campaign, your first three months are free and you lock in your membership cost at $77 per month for the life of your membership.

If you contribute $1,164, your membership to Leative is free for life.

Hurry and grab these perks today. There are a limited number of them to be had. After this campaign is over, the monthly cost of Leative will go up.

If you are not completely satisfied with your membership in the first 90 days, you will receive a 100% refund.

How is Leative different from the other services?

Leative is focused exclusively on software companies. Being a part of Leative means you are guaranteed to be partnered with other CEOs that understand the unique challenges of software companies.

Why are we passionate about Leative?

We have always been passionate about growth and technology. In combining these passions, we will help software companies and those that lead them grow to their fullest potential.

Software companies provide a variety of jobs for the economy. We believe this helps raise the quality of life for everyone.

We need your help

The money raised from this campaign will be used to build the Leative website and purchase necessary software subscription services needed to support Leative. It will also be used to hire the necessary support staff.

Help us by sharing this campaign

One of the important ways you can help us is by sharing this campaign. If you are signed in to Indiegogo, the link located above by the "Share The Campaign" text is unique to you.

For every software company CEO that contributes to this campaign through your link, we will give you two months of membership for free. That is assuming you are the CEO of a software company yourself.

What do you get?

There are a variety of contribution options to the right and various perks that come with each of those contribution options.

If you are a software CEO, we have options that allow you to save significant money if you sign up with us today by contributing to this campaign.

We believe in providing value for everyone who contributes. That is why we are also providing a perk for those who are not software company CEOs. We want to give you a behind the scenes look at how this idea was built and launched so you can do the same.


P.S. We believe collaboration is an accelerator for growth for both your company and yourself. As the individuals and businesses grow in a society, so will its economy. So jump on board and support us in this campaign.

P.P.S. You can help us tremendously by sharing this campaign. Under the video above, you will find some options for sharing the campaign. If you login to Indiegogo, the sharing link is unique to you.

If you are a software CEO, you will receive 1 month membership free for every software CEO that you refer if they contribute to this campaign.
