story:
KnifeEdge® Bits remove most any stripped Phillips screw in a single step often leaving the screw reusable if needed. No more drilling and flipping removal tools that leave the screws unusable.

The KnifeEdge® Bit has enjoyed tremendous support in the past including by ThisOldHouse. 

These bits are made and ready to go. Supporting us will get your KnifeEdge® Bits sent out as soon as payment clears to us from Indiegogo

 

Here are a couple of testimonials from supporters. Plus close-up pics of our KnifEdge®bits.

Paul R says,

"I just wanted to tell you how wonderful these bits are to work with. I've used them to remove about 50 snap screws on a wooden boat restoration. They outperform any other bit I have used. GREAT JOB!"

From another supporter,

"My husband failed to tell me our knife edge bit arrived...but I found him posting this on Facebook today "We had some screws poking through the seat base on 2 of our chairs. Both chairs had a screw that they had destroyed when they put the seats on. I thought I would try the knife edge bit and once it got a good grab of the screw it came right out. Wow!"

 

Review from Dr. Ryan K, "Just got my knife edge bit and it's awesome."

 I've been having fun walking around my house tightening things.

I can't believe the BITE this thing has. I can't wait to find a stubborn screw only my KnifeEdge can remove. All those crappy stripped screws had better watch out....there's a new sheriff in town and his name is KnifeEdge!

And this one,

Review from Thomas S, "I am honestly impressed with these Knife Edge bits!"

I backed a lot of projects, at last count I have had about 65 that have been successfully funded, and almost 100 that have not been. The knife edge bits that you have created, are the first rewards I have ever received from a Kickstarter project, where I have genuinely felt like they will improve my quality of life. They work amazingly well, and I was finally able to unscrew a door hinge, where someone previously had almost destroyed the head of the screws. It was one of those little irritations that I kept meaning to fix, but none of my bits had enough “bite”. When I got my new Knife Edge bits through the post, it was the first problem I tackled with them.

About Our Story

Hello, First let us state that we have spent most of our lives working with tools. It is important to us that you understand that we do know what we are talking about. We had to experience the problems before we could seek the remedy. We are not wasting your valuable time. We would not do that. 

If you want a short third-party version of our bit, here is a nice write-up on http://www.coolthings.com/knife-edge-pjillips-screwdriver-bit/ 

Something we would like to emphasize is that if you use our Knife Edge® bit to begin with, you are very unlikely to ever see another stripped screw head from your work. It does make a nice removal tool but that is not it's primary function. VERY IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ. This is a professional grade hardened steel tool. It is very likely that the screws you are working with are much softer so it is important that you start out slowly with the KnifeEdge® Bit and give your screw a chance to turn. This will give you the best chance of success.

Thank you for reading on.

What if we told you that we have the one tool that you have always wanted? The one you thought you could never have because it didn't exist, before now? The instant you try it, you will want it, and once you have it, you will protect it, because losing it would make you far less effective like you were before this. If you are like most of us, this is a tool that you think you already own several of, but you hate to use. This tool is (reluctantly) used at least as often as any other but often with problems and words you would not want your mother to hear that come directly from its use. This tool was NOT designed to be used as it is today, but no one has ever explained to you why, until now. We looked around and tried everything we could find. What we found was that even though everyone we have ever talked to hates the way this tool works, No one had ever bothered to make the needed design improvements, so we did! Aside from the most basic shape that had to be maintained in order to still fit Phillips screws we made several major changes in almost every aspect of its design so that it was satisfactorily updated to be efficient, effective and finally, gratifying to use. Odd's are you have old ones with you whether you are at home, work or driving. We are talking about Phillips screwdrivers. Specifically Phillips bits, the part that actually touches the screw to make it turn. Our advanced new "KnifeEdge®" Bit for Phillips screws works with new screws or damaged old screws. Oily, rusty or dirty screws. Screws that before now had to be painstakingly removed and thrown away. Again, It works with most damaged, greasy, oily or wet screws the same way it does when you are in a clean, dry shop with new screws. It requires less effort than ever before and it works the same reliable way whether you use it for putting a project together or taking it apart. Sounds great, doesn't it?

What you are about to discover can be life-changing. (Your tool use may vary.) 

 

 

Damaged Screws Easily Turned By KnifeEdge® Bit

Before we begin we would like to share with you the attributes we required of ourselves for our tool to be worthy of your support. 

1. You should instantly notice the superiority when you first use it without any doubt. 

2. It should save you time and/or money. Both would be best.

3. It should save you energy and help protect you from injury. 

4. You should want to think of it as your, ”only bit” after one use. You realize its value and will not let the "KnifeEdge®" Bit out of your sight once you have it. Old out of date bits will be retired. You'll have to experience it to fully understand.

As you will see we are proud to say that we have successfully accomplished all 4. 

Most of us learned at an early age the basics of tools, which hammers worked with nails, which saws cut wood or metal and certain screwdrivers worked with certain screws, right? Experience teaches us that if you apply your hammer properly you will drive a nail straight into your work every time as desired. Conversely, anyone who has ever tried to drive a Phillips screw knows the frustrating disappointment of using your best efforts trying to complete the simple task of turning a screw, only to watch that screw often become unusable as the bit pushes itself out and destructs the screw head right before your eyes. This out of date tool should be called the "Screw Destroyer", not screwdriver because it often destroys more than it drives. So now you’re stuck and it isn’t your fault! Here's proof.

 

 

Henry Phillips Patent For Driver To "Cam out" Or Push Out When "It" Thinks It's Finished, Not You. It Served A Purpose Then. Now It's The Cause Of Your Problems.

Does this sound familiar? Do you have that little job on your list that you promised to take care of before you head out, only to be stopped in your tracks by a stripped screw head because the bit came out and destroyed it before you were finished? You are left with a screw that is not out and it’s not in. It’s just…there! You bite your tongue to not get in trouble but we all know the feeling, right? Now you either have to leave it for later or your plans have to change.

These bits will change that.

 

 

Made For Todays Phillips Screws. It's Like Nothing Else You've Seen!

The "KnifeEdge®" Bit Will Be Your Only Bit of Choice. 

We have perfected the design of the "KnifeEdge®" Bit. The Trade Mark has been issued. The Utility Patents have been filed with the U.S. Patent Office. This is a serious professional grade tool. As such we will only make professional quality bits using the best materials and machining techniques available. This is important to understand because due to their very complex patent pending design these KnifeEdge® Bits are much more expensive to make than the old style Phillips bits of the past. Those bits are generally made by stamping them out in mass quantities at speeds too fast to see. Our bit is much more multifaceted, machined and the attention to detail is much higher with closer tolerances so those methods simply would not work for us. An example might be if you think about a table leg, one that is basically straight from end to end costs much less to make than one with lots of details that takes more time, labor and expertise so while our cost is more, they are worth every penny simply because they are so much easier to use, should last a lot longer and offer a much better result. In short, ours actually work!

The difference in cost is a small price to pay when compared to how much better the “KnifeEdge®” Bit performs. Think of all the frustration you’ll no longer experience using this bit and they are less expensive than the rescue bits mentioned above. Also, Henry's old bits do not last as long as preliminary tests have shown ours do because "KnifeEdge®" Bits do not bounce in and out of the screw heads beating themselves to death like before while they destroy your screws which is what greatly accelerates the wear and tear to Henry's old bits. 

We are offering the most common sizes, a No.1, a No.2 in either a 1.35-inch length that fits a standard magnetic bit holder or as a 2-inch power bit that fits most power-driven drills and chucks as well as others. FYI Most screws take a No.2 bit. If they are smaller screws they will require a No.1 bit. Using the correct size, as with most things, is critically important.  If you are not sure we suggest you buy both and use the one that fits. This way your job will be easy to complete.

Please Follow Us On Facebook. Go here and share with everyone. It will only take a minute and it makes a big difference!

 

A Final But Important Thought:

During the last four years, we have worked with many people who without their skillful help we would have never made it this far. We appreciate them all tremendously and are forever thankful. We often heard from those who have worked with us in developing the "KnifeEdge®" Bit that once you know about it, once you've tried it, every time you need to turn a Phillips screw, you will be glad you have one. Those that had our prototypes similarly said they were very relieved to have the right tool for the job. We have now heard similar statements from many of the happy people who supported our Kickstarter campaign.

The instant you try it, you will see why this could easily become the industry standard. Get yours now and please share us with your friends so we can offer these to everyone as soon as possible! Thank you for your time and support! We seriously appreciate you! 

Please contact us at info@knifeedgebit.com with any questions.
story_txt:
KnifeEdge® Bits remove most any stripped Phillips screw in a single step often leaving the screw reusable if needed. No more drilling and flipping removal tools that leave the screws unusable.The KnifeEdge® Bit has enjoyed tremendous support in the past including by ThisOldHouse. These bits are made and ready to go. Supporting us will get your KnifeEdge® Bits sent out as soon as payment clears to us from Indiegogo Here are a couple of testimonials from supporters. Plus close-up pics of our KnifEdge®bits.Paul R says,"I just wanted to tell you how wonderful these bits are to work with. I've used them to remove about 50 snap screws on a wooden boat restoration. They outperform any other bit I have used. GREAT JOB!"From another supporter,"My husband failed to tell me our knife edge bit arrived...but I found him posting this on Facebook today "We had some screws poking through the seat base on 2 of our chairs. Both chairs had a screw that they had destroyed when they put the seats on. I thought I would try the knife edge bit and once it got a good grab of the screw it came right out. Wow!"
 
Review from Dr. Ryan K, "Just got my knife edge bit and it's awesome."
 I've been having fun walking around my house tightening things.
I can't believe the BITE this thing has. I can't wait to find a stubborn screw only my KnifeEdge can remove. All those crappy stripped screws had better watch out....there's a new sheriff in town and his name is KnifeEdge!
And this one,
Review from Thomas S, "I am honestly impressed with these Knife Edge bits!"
I backed a lot of projects, at last count I have had about 65 that have been successfully funded, and almost 100 that have not been. The knife edge bits that you have created, are the first rewards I have ever received from a Kickstarter project, where I have genuinely felt like they will improve my quality of life. They work amazingly well, and I was finally able to unscrew a door hinge, where someone previously had almost destroyed the head of the screws. It was one of those little irritations that I kept meaning to fix, but none of my bits had enough “bite”. When I got my new Knife Edge bits through the post, it was the first problem I tackled with them.
About Our Story
Hello, First let us state that we have spent most of our lives working with tools. It is important to us that you understand that we do know what we are talking about. We had to experience the problems before we could seek the remedy. We are not wasting your valuable time. We would not do that. 
If you want a short third-party version of our bit, here is a nice write-up on http://www.coolthings.com/knife-edge-pjillips-screwdriver-bit/ 
Something we would like to emphasize is that if you use our Knife Edge® bit to begin with, you are very unlikely to ever see another stripped screw head from your work. It does make a nice removal tool but that is not it's primary function. VERY IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ. This is a professional grade hardened steel tool. It is very likely that the screws you are working with are much softer so it is important that you start out slowly with the KnifeEdge® Bit and give your screw a chance to turn. This will give you the best chance of success.
Thank you for reading on.
What if we told you that we have the one tool that you have always wanted? The one you thought you could never have because it didn't exist, before now? The instant you try it, you will want it, and once you have it, you will protect it, because losing it would make you far less effective like you were before this. If you are like most of us, this is a tool that you think you already own several of, but you hate to use. This tool is (reluctantly) used at least as often as any other but often with problems and words you would not want your mother to hear that come directly from its use. This tool was NOT designed to be used as it is today, but no one has ever explained to you why, until now. We looked around and tried everything we could find. What we found was that even though everyone we have ever talked to hates the way this tool works, No one had ever bothered to make the needed design improvements, so we did! Aside from the most basic shape that had to be maintained in order to still fit Phillips screws we made several major changes in almost every aspect of its design so that it was satisfactorily updated to be efficient, effective and finally, gratifying to use. Odd's are you have old ones with you whether you are at home, work or driving. We are talking about Phillips screwdrivers. Specifically Phillips bits, the part that actually touches the screw to make it turn. Our advanced new "KnifeEdge®" Bit for Phillips screws works with new screws or damaged old screws. Oily, rusty or dirty screws. Screws that before now had to be painstakingly removed and thrown away. Again, It works with most damaged, greasy, oily or wet screws the same way it does when you are in a clean, dry shop with new screws. It requires less effort than ever before and it works the same reliable way whether you use it for putting a project together or taking it apart. Sounds great, doesn't it?
What you are about to discover can be life-changing. (Your tool use may vary.) 
 


 
Damaged Screws Easily Turned By KnifeEdge® Bit
Before we begin we would like to share with you the attributes we required of ourselves for our tool to be worthy of your support. 
1. You should instantly notice the superiority when you first use it without any doubt. 
2. It should save you time and/or money. Both would be best.
3. It should save you energy and help protect you from injury. 
4. You should want to think of it as your, ”only bit” after one use. You realize its value and will not let the "KnifeEdge®" Bit out of your sight once you have it. Old out of date bits will be retired. You'll have to experience it to fully understand.
As you will see we are proud to say that we have successfully accomplished all 4. 
Most of us learned at an early age the basics of tools, which hammers worked with nails, which saws cut wood or metal and certain screwdrivers worked with certain screws, right? Experience teaches us that if you apply your hammer properly you will drive a nail straight into your work every time as desired. Conversely, anyone who has ever tried to drive a Phillips screw knows the frustrating disappointment of using your best efforts trying to complete the simple task of turning a screw, only to watch that screw often become unusable as the bit pushes itself out and destructs the screw head right before your eyes. This out of date tool should be called the "Screw Destroyer", not screwdriver because it often destroys more than it drives. So now you’re stuck and it isn’t your fault! Here's proof.
 

 
Henry Phillips Patent For Driver To "Cam out" Or Push Out When "It" Thinks It's Finished, Not You. It Served A Purpose Then. Now It's The Cause Of Your Problems.
Does this sound familiar? Do you have that little job on your list that you promised to take care of before you head out, only to be stopped in your tracks by a stripped screw head because the bit came out and destroyed it before you were finished? You are left with a screw that is not out and it’s not in. It’s just…there! You bite your tongue to not get in trouble but we all know the feeling, right? Now you either have to leave it for later or your plans have to change.
These bits will change that.

 

 
Made For Todays Phillips Screws. It's Like Nothing Else You've Seen!
The "KnifeEdge®" Bit Will Be Your Only Bit of Choice. 
We have perfected the design of the "KnifeEdge®" Bit. The Trade Mark has been issued. The Utility Patents have been filed with the U.S. Patent Office. This is a serious professional grade tool. As such we will only make professional quality bits using the best materials and machining techniques available. This is important to understand because due to their very complex patent pending design these KnifeEdge® Bits are much more expensive to make than the old style Phillips bits of the past. Those bits are generally made by stamping them out in mass quantities at speeds too fast to see. Our bit is much more multifaceted, machined and the attention to detail is much higher with closer tolerances so those methods simply would not work for us. An example might be if you think about a table leg, one that is basically straight from end to end costs much less to make than one with lots of details that takes more time, labor and expertise so while our cost is more, they are worth every penny simply because they are so much easier to use, should last a lot longer and offer a much better result. In short, ours actually work!
The difference in cost is a small price to pay when compared to how much better the “KnifeEdge®” Bit performs. Think of all the frustration you’ll no longer experience using this bit and they are less expensive than the rescue bits mentioned above. Also, Henry's old bits do not last as long as preliminary tests have shown ours do because "KnifeEdge®" Bits do not bounce in and out of the screw heads beating themselves to death like before while they destroy your screws which is what greatly accelerates the wear and tear to Henry's old bits. 
We are offering the most common sizes, a No.1, a No.2 in either a 1.35-inch length that fits a standard magnetic bit holder or as a 2-inch power bit that fits most power-driven drills and chucks as well as others. FYI Most screws take a No.2 bit. If they are smaller screws they will require a No.1 bit. Using the correct size, as with most things, is critically important.  If you are not sure we suggest you buy both and use the one that fits. This way your job will be easy to complete.

A Final But Important Thought:
During the last four years, we have worked with many people who without their skillful help we would have never made it this far. We appreciate them all tremendously and are forever thankful. We often heard from those who have worked with us in developing the "KnifeEdge®" Bit that once you know about it, once you've tried it, every time you need to turn a Phillips screw, you will be glad you have one. Those that had our prototypes similarly said they were very relieved to have the right tool for the job. We have now heard similar statements from many of the happy people who supported our Kickstarter campaign.
The instant you try it, you will see why this could easily become the industry standard. Get yours now and please share us with your friends so we can offer these to everyone as soon as possible! Thank you for your time and support! We seriously appreciate you! 
Please contact us at info@knifeedgebit.com with any questions.

story:
Check out the video

The Revolutionary new tool for landscaping maintenance.

The Original Weedsharks are a universal fit multi-purpose replacment trimmer head designed to meet the demand needs of today’s homeowners and landscape maintenance professionals.

Weedsharks are a 4 in 1 heavy duty adapter head with (2) two different sets of  replaceable cutting teeth and (4) four sizes of trimmer line, so you will be able to find the right BITE!    

Weedsharks increases user efficiency with ease of use and our patented pending "Tail Whip" Dual Cutting Action!

Great For Wet Grass Cutting, Brush Clearing, Light Tilling, and Cultivation.

                                             

WeedSharks Product Line:

The WeedSharks will come in two models:

The WeedShark Mighty Max: Comes with Poly replaceable blades.

Non-Sparking, Use for light grass cutting, power raking, no ground contact.

WeedShark PRO: Comes with Steel replaceable blade. Used for medium to heavy grass and brush, medium ground contact.

 

 

SharkLine:

Made of high quality copolymers and Made in the USA. This line has Superior wear and provides maximum line use. We will stock (3) sizes

Chomper:

.

SharkTeeth:

Poly:  Non-Sparking Copolymer replacement blades(4). Can be used on both models

Stainless Steel: 1-piece replacement blade. Can also be used on both models

                                     

SharkOil:

BioSharkOil: Biodegradable 2 Cycle Engine Oil, that meets or exceeds TC-W3 and JASO FB. Made in the U.S.A.

SharkOil: Full Synthetic 2 cycle oil to get the most out of your machine.

Made in the U.S.A.

                                                                        

Press Coverage:

 

Outdoor Power Equipment

Landscape Irrigation

Green Media Online

Green Industry Pros

 

Pre order your Original WeedShark PRO now, and we’ll include SharkLine…our precut replacement string along with Early Bird pricing!  Shipping will be just in time for Spring!

Requirements:

The Weedsharks requires use with a straight shaft weed trimmer with at least 25cc engine.

WeedSharks will fit on 95% of the required trimmer manufactured.  A customer may call our 800 number and we will ship them the required hardware to fit their specific machine at no charge.

 

                            

Project Timeline

 

We have fully working pre-production units.

We have identified all components to be used in mass production for the Weedsharks, replacement blades, and replacement string. We have built the latest samples using those components.  We are currently in negotiations with a vendor for the 2-cycle oil.

December:

Tooling (Injection Molding tool) has started back in November. Our Mechanical Engineer will be flying to China by the last week on November in order to inspect  off-tooled samples.

Pre-production run of 20 samples will be completed by mid December.

Product testing: We will start in middle of December an extensive 30 day product testing using beta testers. Product will be tested in USA (California, Illinois, and Washington).

Packaging: Retail Packaging artwork will be finalized.

January:

  • Early January Product will be submitted for ANSI certifications. This can take about 4 weeks for completion.
  • Website design will be finalized.
  • Packaging: Clamshells and blister pack packaging will be complete
  • Setup QC and assembly line in China.

February-March:

  • Start Mass production
  • Lauch Website 

April:

Distribution - Backers get their Original Weedshark PRO models and replacement line.

About us

Ambush Heads, LLC, is an enthusiastic start‐up company based out of California. We develop products to be manufactured, distributed, and directly sold as lawn and garden products in retail outlets worldwide. Our owners and consultants consists of product enthusiasts, mechanical engineers, manufacturing experts, industry experts, and businessmen ready to give you new, effective and useful Lawn and Garden Products.

                                               

Use of Funds

We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to get Weedsharks into production, we will accept as many Early Bird orders as we get. This will help us reach our minimum unit order from the manufacturer.

We know what we’re doing; We've led the development and manufacturing, so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.

We’re asking you to help us make the WeedSharks a reality.

Use of Funds
We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to get Weedsharks into production, we will accept as many Early Bird orders as we get. This will help us reach our minimum unit order from the manufacturer.
We know what we’re doing; We've led the development and manufacturing, so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.We’re asking you to help us make the WeedSharks a reality.

story:
Our Mission...

BlueJean Time is trying to change the world for the better by targeting how people work.  We believe by adding to work flexibility and efficiency we can enable any of a number of  improvements to our planet.

Relaxed people with more time on their hands...

Reduced business costs which reflect in greater profits...

Less communication mistakes...

More communicated ideas and involved people...

and decreased toll on the environment and public infrastructure.

We believe in a fully democratic environment in which all users can benefit financially from the work we do.

BlueJean Time Share is the first vehicle we will create by which anyone can participate in the BlueJean Time revenue stream.  All that is required is BlueJean Time membership and a willingness to electronically share applications they like with anyone they wish to.

We are looking to fund our development costs and marketing efforts.  

At BlueJean Time we are enabling workers to work green, stress free, cost effectively, and most importantly - where they want to.  It is a lofty goal.  Much of the world seems convinced that to be productive one must commute to a location daily, and with all the personal and financial costs that entails.  Our parent company, Blue Collar Objects, is operating proof that this just is not the case.

You can additionally further our cause by joining BlueJean Time and learning for yourself the potential power a free work network can grant for work, family, clubs, and personal creativity.

Thank-You so much for thinking of us.

story:
It's Not Just An App...It's A Movement!

Won't you join us in our quest to:

  • Help the good people of the world find the food they really want and not get a geography lesson or a bunch of outdated listings when they search.
  • Give restaurant owners (especially the mom and pops) a powerful, new way to promote their best dishes and thus grow their businesses and their contribution to the economy.
  • Assist travelers and people new to an area in cutting through the confusion and finding the truly good places to eat.
  • Give people who like to post what they're eating online a solid community and culture that transcends any single social network.
  • Stop indecision among all the groups of friends, co-workers, and business associates who spend too much of their lunch breaks figuring out where to eat.
  • Create an app and online database that makes it fast, easy, and outright tantalizing to look for food.

 

The Ultimate Food App Story

We developed the concept of the “Ultimate Food App Project” while traveling with our families and for work. We found it difficult to discover great food because the web is designed towards locating restaurants, not awesome dishes.

It’s difficult to find exactly what to eat without having to sift through a large mindless list of different restaurants online. Wouldn’t it make more sense to find and see the actual dishes that you want? Wouldn't it be great if the food selections nearby simply appeared on your smartphone, with little or no searching at all. 

The Ultimate Food App focuses on the actual food, which makes finding your next great meal easy.

 

We aim to create the largest and most useful, socially driven menu in the world, served through your smartphone. A large “potluck” where Users and Restaurants can contribute dish postings to a menu of great food that’s nearby. The Ultimate Food App will forever change the way you find the best food around.

We believe that EVERYONE should have the ability to find whatever food they want, wherever they are. We also want to connect restaurants and food vendors with you, by providing a platform to showcase their best dishes. The Ultimate Food App is designed to do all of these things and more.

We have worked hard on developing the concept, and built a working prototype. WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT for the next critical step in the creation of this amazing app.

It's more than an app. It's Revolutionary! It's a Movement. It's a Food Culture!

PLEASE JOIN US AND HELP FUND OUR VISION!

As seen on:

 

How Does It Work?

When you open our app, the first thing you see is the food near you sorted by relevance…not just the number of “likes” but also ranked by review.

If you’re looking for something in particular, we offer various ways to search. 

Just like with food, users can also add and review restaurants if the restaurant isn’t already listed.  Every restaurant in the world gets a simple, free listing.

But, if they really want to create a noticable presence, the restaurants can upgrade. 

We’ve come to realize that the social element is what’s missing from the other food apps.  The app lets you add photos that you can post along with the food on whatever social networks you use.  All of them with one tap!  You can even email them to people who are not on your networks.

 

The Social Menu - What Really Makes the App Ultimate

We call it the Social Menu.

How do we make sure that there are enough dishes and restaurants?

It’s easy as 1-2-3.

1.      We start with the most comprehensive listing of restaurants online.

2.      People like you submit dishes and restaurants.

3.      Restaurants submit their best dishes

All three work together through our app.

It goes beyond the app.  It’s a MOVEMENT and a CULTURE!

And EVERYONE can use it to make the biggest and best Social Menu in the world!

Isn’t that REVOLUTIONARY?

 

 

What We Need to Make This App a Reality

As of this moment, the most powerful means for anyone to help make this app a reality for all of us, is to support and contribute to this ambitious project on Indiegogo.

Our project requires $30K USD. All the funds will be used to build the core functionality of the Ultimate Food App. This requires design creation, technical development, coding, alpha build, beta testing, and the actual launch itself. All funds in excess of our funding requirments will be used to add additional features to enhance your experience and expand the reach of the app. 

 

 

The Stretch Goals

Our primary funding goal is for the core functionality of the app.  Pretty much what you see in the videos above.  But like many campaigns, we've added some "stretch goals" for additional capabilities that we can add, should you, the good people of the indiegogo community see fit to provide us the funds.

Stretch Goal #1:  Android Version

It is our strategy to increase the likelihood of successful funding of this project by setting an initial goal to develop only for the iOS platform.  It was a decision based upon the popularity of the iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. 

However, we realize that a lot of you use Android devices (as do many of us).  Plus Banshee Cloud believes that everyone should have a choice as to which devices they want to use and not be forced into any system by software developers.

So while this is technically a stretch goal, we truly believe that The Ultimate Food App will not be complete until it is available in an Android version.  And as Android users, we are genuinely upset when the Android version of an app doesn't work as well as the iOS version.  So we want to assure you that when we develop ANYTHING cross platform, it will look and work and be just as fun to use as any other version.

If our funding reaches the $50,000 level, we will immediately begin development of an Android version of The Ultimate Food App.

Stretch Goal #2: Web Interface

If we genuinely want to make our app available to everyone worldwide, we have to acknowledge that not everyone has nor even wants a smartphone.  But many people do search for restaurants on their computers.  Plus there are several other mobile operating systems which have web-browsing capability. 

To make the app accessible to anyone with internet access, we will build a web interface with the full capabilities of the app if our funding reaches the $65,000 level. 

Stretch Goal #3: Windows Phone

We cannot overemphasize how strongly we feel about giving people the right to choose their mobile computing platform.  With the upcoming release of Windows Phone 8, we want to make the Ultimate Food App available to anyone using Microsoft's new mobile operating system.  To this end, we plan to develop for Windows Phone with $85,000 in backing.

Stretch Goal #4: Food Bank Connect

While the United States is the wealthiest country on earth, it is deplorable to see that USDA statistics show a 14.6% increase in “food insecurity” nationwide from 2008-2010.  The increase is nearly 20% in some Southern states.  (USDA. Coleman-Jensen, A., Nord, M., Andrews, M., & Carlson, S. Household Food Security in the United States in 2010) 

In our community and throughout much of the nation, food bank officials will tell you that they are seeing more middle class families turning to charitable outlets to find basic sustenance.

We believe that not only is it our civic duty to address this issue, but also that we could not in good conscience call it The Ultimate Food App if we could not find a way to use this technology to help you feed the hungry in your community.  We propose to create a capability within The Ultimate Food App that allows users and restaurant owners alike connect to food banks nearby.  Whether you run a licensed commercial kitchen or have extra groceries at home, you will be able to inform one or more food banks that you have surplus food and make arrangements to get the food to where it’s needed most.

We will not charge any user, restaurant, or food bank to use this system.

At a funding level of $105,000, we plan to develop this vital service.

Stretch Goal #5:  Dietary Edition

Just like the app itself, the inspiration for this capability came from personal experience.  At lunchtime one day, Rene and his companions tried to use an app to find food, only to realize that everyone in the car had dietary considerations.  And none of their mobile apps could search or filter upon factors such as no red meat, low carbs, lactose free, etc.

Since the preliminary design for The Ultimate Food App had already started, it occurred to us that it would be a great idea to come up with an app that could take dietary data and locate dishes that meet the user's requirements. 

Restaurants, regardless of their subscription status with us can submit the dietary profiles for no charge.

We plan development of this capability at $135,000.

 

 

What's in a Name?

With apologies to Mr. Shakespeare and Ms. Juliet, while our app is a great concept to us, naming it is a different story altogether.  Rene thinks it should be called Meal-O-Cator and Rodney thinks it's FoodLync.  Rather than letting them bicker over this, we've decided to leave it up to our backers.  So if you pledge $10 or more to our project, you get to vote on its name.  You'll see them asking anyone they see about this, but the contributors are the ones in the dimly lit room who really call the shots.  And yes, that means you can also vote to keep calling it The Ultimate Food App.  It certainly would save us having to do a lot of new artwork.

 

 

WE LOVE PERKS!

In gratitude for your contirbution, we are offering some very cool perks.

But first a few things to point out...

We are not giving away iPhones. The iPhones in the images below represent the app. Nor are we giving away the plate, silverware, and napkin.  They are just illustrations.  Foodie Swag logo imprints are simulated.  While we will do all we can to portray these items accurately, the actual appearance of items may vary.  Actual appearance of Rene and Rodney certainly will vary.

 

About the Foodie Swag

Yes, we are giving out some really cool Foodie Swag to our contributors.  But we want to emphasize that it's more than branded merchandise.  Anything with the app logo on it is specifically designed to  be useful to Foodies and anyone else who goes out to eat. But more importantly, the Foodie Swag is meant to serve as campaign material for the Movement.  We've given some serious thought to what we're giving out. 

For instance, look at the Ultimate Food App Sticky Notes.  Everyone jots down notes and leaves them stuck in a prominent spot.  It helps them remember important stuff.  But at the same time, you can also give the people that wander into your cubicle a hint about how they can join our Movement and add the food they love for everyone to find.

And the hand sanitizer.  If you go out to eat, there's no need to leave your hard won seat to practice good personal hygiene.  That girl dining alone at the table next to yours will see your bottle and ask about the app.  She'll probably even ask to borrow your phone so she can post her Panini Special on Facebook.  The app truly does bring people together!

  • Vote on the name of the app!
  • Participation in the beta test of the app!
  • Be in the first group to get the app (iPhone not included)!
  • A Personal Thank You from Rene and Rodney!
  • Your Picture on the Foodie Wall (our online tribute to you) at the Salsa & Chips Level!

  • Your Picture on the Foodie Wall (our online tribute to you) at the Buffalo Wings Level!

Together we can change the way we all find the best food around!

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Get Involved

 

Although the BEST way to help is to fund this campaign, we understand that some people just can’t contribute. But, that doesn’t mean you can't still get involved with this awesome movement and food culture.

These are some alternative ways that you can help bring the Ultimate Food App to the world:

  • Tell your friends and family about the Ultimate Food App
  • Tell others to help fund the project
  • Blog about us
  • "Like" our Facebook page
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Share us on all your social networks.
  • Link to us on your website
  • Send us your favorite dishes on our blog UltimateFoodApp.com
  • Tell a celebrity or someone with lots of followers to Tweet about us.

 

 

 

Statement of Transparency 

(Let's get serious for a moment...)

There has been a lot of press lately on how tech companies, including some of the most successfully funded projects in crowdfunding history, have either run out of money or are announcing serious delays in the delivery of their product.  We are uncomfortable with this trend, as we see crowdfunding and Indiegogo in particular as an important and necessary alternative means of financing tech projects.  To this end, we are undertaking the development of the Ultimate Food App with the understanding that our success or failure will reflect upon the viability of all other technology and software development projects that are on Indiegogo, whether at this time or in the future.

To substantially increase the probability of success, we plan to apply key principles of project management that our team has utilized in past capacities for software and web development in several industries, in sectors ranging from manufacturing to government, and applications ranging from inventory management to social networking.  Key milestones have been established and controls will be utilized to assure conformity to standards of scheduling and the quality of deliverables.

In addition to strict management of deadlines and development standards, we are addressing the issue of financial sustainability through the application for planning methodologies for close monitoring of budget variances and cash flow projections.  Of course, none of this would be of use if not for our foundation of a comprehensive budget for the project. 

Even outside of Indiegogo, many software developers primarily focus on the design and coding of the product to the neglect of the marketing of what they produce.  Our approach stems from the realization that without a defined market and promotional activity to connect to that market, any for profit venture will inevitably be received with a lukewarm response at best.  Before even the founding of our company, the members of our management team have always taken the approach of identifying a need in a market and creating a product around that need.  And of course, with the primary markets segments for our product identified, our promotional activities can not only be planned but also properly accounted for in our budgeting process.

While these macro-level financial plans are simply overall good business practice, we also have to be cognizant of some key considerations when operating under the specific constraints of an environment such as Indiegogo.  Specifically, with necessity to hit one’s set funding goal, the primary issue encountered is the establishment of a realistic and sound target.  Our project budget has been created for the development of the minimum functionality required to create a product with the right features to address the market needs at hand.  And so our goal becomes that much more attainable. 

But we also understand that to settle for minimum functionality is to compromise the need to strive for excellence.  And so we have defined a series of additional features and capabilities that we feel are logical steps in the continued advancement of our product.  Fortunately, Indiegogo and the world of crowdfunding have given rise to the concept of the stretch goals.  We have seen numerous projects successfully implement the idea of setting a series of progressive goals, to be implemented as additional funds are pledged by their funders. 

Our goals reflect this approach.  The initial funding target is specifically for the development of an app for Apple’s pervasive iOS platform.  The scope of the project reflects the minimal, yet very useful features of the iOS application.  And the scope has been locked in order to develop the product within the funding goal. 

Past the initial goal, stretch goals have been established, most notably the first such goal involving development of an Android version of the app.  It has always been our intention to include users of devices in this fast growing market.  Which incidentally, includes many of our team members.

So in summary, while our Indiegogo project will last just over a month in duration, it is the culmination of a planning process which has taken the better part of a year.  The project itself is only part of a larger entity that includes our marketing plan and ongoing development well beyond the stretch goals of the project.  While predicting the future in detail is in the realm of science fiction, we feel that we have developed plans and controls that will allow us to execute the development and marketing of what we see as an incredibly viable product. 

But what reaches far beyond our business and the app itself is the fact that the true key to success is not our software, but how its use can affect the lives of people throughout the world.  The interaction between the users and the restaurants and food vendors is what drives this.  We sincerely believe that what we are helping to create is a movement and a culture of sharing and helping and improving how people dine out worldwide.  This truly is what makes our app unique and different from all the other apps currently on the market.

And so the success of our app and the database of food is in the end dependent upon how well our funders, and subsequently our users understand its potential and use it.  Fortunately, this is an area that is completely under the control of the community of funders on Indiegogo.

Thanks

The Ultimate Food App Team

www.UltimateFoodApp.com
story_txt:
It's Not Just An App...It's A Movement!
Won't you join us in our quest to:

Help the good people of the world find the food they really want and not get a geography lesson or a bunch of outdated listings when they search.
Give restaurant owners (especially the mom and pops) a powerful, new way to promote their best dishes and thus grow their businesses and their contribution to the economy.
Assist travelers and people new to an area in cutting through the confusion and finding the truly good places to eat.
Give people who like to post what they're eating online a solid community and culture that transcends any single social network.
Stop indecision among all the groups of friends, co-workers, and business associates who spend too much of their lunch breaks figuring out where to eat.
Create an app and online database that makes it fast, easy, and outright tantalizing to look for food.

 
The Ultimate Food App Story
We developed the concept of the “Ultimate Food App Project” while traveling with our families and for work. We found it difficult to discover great food because the web is designed towards locating restaurants, not awesome dishes.
It’s difficult to find exactly what to eat without having to sift through a large mindless list of different restaurants online. Wouldn’t it make more sense to find and see the actual dishes that you want? Wouldn't it be great if the food selections nearby simply appeared on your smartphone, with little or no searching at all. 
The Ultimate Food App focuses on the actual food, which makes finding your next great meal easy.
 
We aim to create the largest and most useful, socially driven menu in the world, served through your smartphone. A large “potluck” where Users and Restaurants can contribute dish postings to a menu of great food that’s nearby. The Ultimate Food App will forever change the way you find the best food around.
We believe that EVERYONE should have the ability to find whatever food they want, wherever they are. We also want to connect restaurants and food vendors with you, by providing a platform to showcase their best dishes. The Ultimate Food App is designed to do all of these things and more.
We have worked hard on developing the concept, and built a working prototype. WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT for the next critical step in the creation of this amazing app.
It's more than an app. It's Revolutionary! It's a Movement. It's a Food Culture!
PLEASE JOIN US AND HELP FUND OUR VISION!
As seen on:

 
How Does It Work?

When you open our app, the first thing you see is the food near you sorted by relevance…not just the number of “likes” but also ranked by review.
If you’re looking for something in particular, we offer various ways to search. 
Just like with food, users can also add and review restaurants if the restaurant isn’t already listed.  Every restaurant in the world gets a simple, free listing.
But, if they really want to create a noticable presence, the restaurants can upgrade. 
We’ve come to realize that the social element is what’s missing from the other food apps.  The app lets you add photos that you can post along with the food on whatever social networks you use.  All of them with one tap!  You can even email them to people who are not on your networks.
 
The Social Menu - What Really Makes the App Ultimate

We call it the Social Menu.
How do we make sure that there are enough dishes and restaurants?
It’s easy as 1-2-3.
1.      We start with the most comprehensive listing of restaurants online.
2.      People like you submit dishes and restaurants.
3.      Restaurants submit their best dishes
All three work together through our app.
It goes beyond the app.  It’s a MOVEMENT and a CULTURE!
And EVERYONE can use it to make the biggest and best Social Menu in the world!
Isn’t that REVOLUTIONARY?
 
 


What We Need to Make This App a Reality

As of this moment, the most powerful means for anyone to help make this app a reality for all of us, is to support and contribute to this ambitious project on Indiegogo.
Our project requires $30K USD. All the funds will be used to build the core functionality of the Ultimate Food App. This requires design creation, technical development, coding, alpha build, beta testing, and the actual launch itself. All funds in excess of our funding requirments will be used to add additional features to enhance your experience and expand the reach of the app. 
 
 
The Stretch Goals
Our primary funding goal is for the core functionality of the app.  Pretty much what you see in the videos above.  But like many campaigns, we've added some "stretch goals" for additional capabilities that we can add, should you, the good people of the indiegogo community see fit to provide us the funds.
Stretch Goal #1:  Android Version
It is our strategy to increase the likelihood of successful funding of this project by setting an initial goal to develop only for the iOS platform.  It was a decision based upon the popularity of the iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. 
However, we realize that a lot of you use Android devices (as do many of us).  Plus Banshee Cloud believes that everyone should have a choice as to which devices they want to use and not be forced into any system by software developers.
So while this is technically a stretch goal, we truly believe that The Ultimate Food App will not be complete until it is available in an Android version.  And as Android users, we are genuinely upset when the Android version of an app doesn't work as well as the iOS version.  So we want to assure you that when we develop ANYTHING cross platform, it will look and work and be just as fun to use as any other version.
If our funding reaches the $50,000 level, we will immediately begin development of an Android version of The Ultimate Food App.
Stretch Goal #2: Web Interface
If we genuinely want to make our app available to everyone worldwide, we have to acknowledge that not everyone has nor even wants a smartphone.  But many people do search for restaurants on their computers.  Plus there are several other mobile operating systems which have web-browsing capability. 
To make the app accessible to anyone with internet access, we will build a web interface with the full capabilities of the app if our funding reaches the $65,000 level. 
Stretch Goal #3: Windows Phone
We cannot overemphasize how strongly we feel about giving people the right to choose their mobile computing platform.  With the upcoming release of Windows Phone 8, we want to make the Ultimate Food App available to anyone using Microsoft's new mobile operating system.  To this end, we plan to develop for Windows Phone with $85,000 in backing.
Stretch Goal #4: Food Bank Connect
While the United States is the wealthiest country on earth, it is deplorable to see that USDA statistics show a 14.6% increase in “food insecurity” nationwide from 2008-2010.  The increase is nearly 20% in some Southern states.  (USDA. Coleman-Jensen, A., Nord, M., Andrews, M., & Carlson, S. Household Food Security in the United States in 2010)  
In our community and throughout much of the nation, food bank officials will tell you that they are seeing more middle class families turning to charitable outlets to find basic sustenance.
We believe that not only is it our civic duty to address this issue, but also that we could not in good conscience call it The Ultimate Food App if we could not find a way to use this technology to help you feed the hungry in your community.  We propose to create a capability within The Ultimate Food App that allows users and restaurant owners alike connect to food banks nearby.  Whether you run a licensed commercial kitchen or have extra groceries at home, you will be able to inform one or more food banks that you have surplus food and make arrangements to get the food to where it’s needed most.
We will not charge any user, restaurant, or food bank to use this system.
At a funding level of $105,000, we plan to develop this vital service.
Stretch Goal #5:  Dietary Edition
Just like the app itself, the inspiration for this capability came from personal experience.  At lunchtime one day, Rene and his companions tried to use an app to find food, only to realize that everyone in the car had dietary considerations.  And none of their mobile apps could search or filter upon factors such as no red meat, low carbs, lactose free, etc.
Since the preliminary design for The Ultimate Food App had already started, it occurred to us that it would be a great idea to come up with an app that could take dietary data and locate dishes that meet the user's requirements. 
Restaurants, regardless of their subscription status with us can submit the dietary profiles for no charge.
We plan development of this capability at $135,000.
 
 
What's in a Name?
With apologies to Mr. Shakespeare and Ms. Juliet, while our app is a great concept to us, naming it is a different story altogether.  Rene thinks it should be called Meal-O-Cator and Rodney thinks it's FoodLync.  Rather than letting them bicker over this, we've decided to leave it up to our backers.  So if you pledge $10 or more to our project, you get to vote on its name.  You'll see them asking anyone they see about this, but the contributors are the ones in the dimly lit room who really call the shots.  And yes, that means you can also vote to keep calling it The Ultimate Food App.  It certainly would save us having to do a lot of new artwork.
 
 
WE LOVE PERKS!
In gratitude for your contirbution, we are offering some very cool perks.
But first a few things to point out...
We are not giving away iPhones. The iPhones in the images below represent the app. Nor are we giving away the plate, silverware, and napkin.  They are just illustrations.  Foodie Swag logo imprints are simulated.  While we will do all we can to portray these items accurately, the actual appearance of items may vary.  Actual appearance of Rene and Rodney certainly will vary.
 
About the Foodie Swag
Yes, we are giving out some really cool Foodie Swag to our contributors.  But we want to emphasize that it's more than branded merchandise.  Anything with the app logo on it is specifically designed to  be useful to Foodies and anyone else who goes out to eat. But more importantly, the Foodie Swag is meant to serve as campaign material for the Movement.  We've given some serious thought to what we're giving out. 
For instance, look at the Ultimate Food App Sticky Notes.  Everyone jots down notes and leaves them stuck in a prominent spot.  It helps them remember important stuff.  But at the same time, you can also give the people that wander into your cubicle a hint about how they can join our Movement and add the food they love for everyone to find.
And the hand sanitizer.  If you go out to eat, there's no need to leave your hard won seat to practice good personal hygiene.  That girl dining alone at the table next to yours will see your bottle and ask about the app.  She'll probably even ask to borrow your phone so she can post her Panini Special on Facebook.  The app truly does bring people together!

So in summary, while our Indiegogo project will last just over a month in duration, it is the culmination of a planning process which has taken the better part of a year.  The project itself is only part of a larger entity that includes our marketing plan and ongoing development well beyond the stretch goals of the project.  While predicting the future in detail is in the realm of science fiction, we feel that we have developed plans and controls that will allow us to execute the development and marketing of what we see as an incredibly viable product. 
But what reaches far beyond our business and the app itself is the fact that the true key to success is not our software, but how its use can affect the lives of people throughout the world.  The interaction between the users and the restaurants and food vendors is what drives this.  We sincerely believe that what we are helping to create is a movement and a culture of sharing and helping and improving how people dine out worldwide.  This truly is what makes our app unique and different from all the other apps currently on the market.
And so the success of our app and the database of food is in the end dependent upon how well our funders, and subsequently our users understand its potential and use it.  Fortunately, this is an area that is completely under the control of the community of funders on Indiegogo.
Thanks
The Ultimate Food App Team

www.UltimateFoodApp.com

story:
Following Margo MacDonald’s death on 4 April 2014, friends and colleagues have worked to make sure that her voice and her ideals, which inspired so many will continue to be heard in the referendum campaign.

Jim Sillars will this weekend (Sunday 13 July 2014) launch a public web based appeal to fund the “Margo Mobile”. A mobile campaign vehicle which will tour housing estates and working communities across Scotland, as a testimony to Margo’s political legacy, allowing campaigners to make the case for independence, in a way Margo would have relished.

The “Margo Mobile” will travel across the country from the beginning of August until polling day.
In addition, the campaign vehicle will tour with a mini bus which will transport a team of activists who will work in co-operation with Local Yes campaign groups. Leaflets and accompanying campaign material setting out the case for independence, will feature insights and comments from Margo.

Margo’s husband Jim Sillars said;

 “Some of Margo’s admirers have already contributed to the project, but I urge all those who supported Margo, were inspired by her and wish to secure her legacy by ensuring a Yes vote, to make a financial contribution to the Margo Mobile”

Jim Sillars added;

“The recent Electoral Commission release on referendum finance, makes stark reading, “Better Together” has received over £2.4m compared with under £1.2m for Yes Scotland. This project will allow ordinary voters to redress the balance, by contributing whatever they can manage.”

A mobile campaign vehicle which will tour housing estates and working communities across Scotland, as a testimony to Margo’s political legacy, allowing campaigners to make the case for independence, in a way Margo would have relished.The “Margo Mobile” will travel across the country from the beginning of August until polling day.In addition, the campaign vehicle will tour with a mini bus which will transport a team of activists who will work in co-operation with Local Yes campaign groups. story:
The IZO Collection is a vibrant collection of computer accessories aimed to boost your mood through color. By blending fashion-forward hues with ergonomic round forms, we created refined accessories that draw envious eyes and jealous fingers.  By combining unique aesthetics and innovative technology, the IZO keyboard set will not only improve your productivity but also make a style statement for your workspace.

 

 

Tired of dull-colored keyboards? 

By blending an alluring metallic and matte paint, we created three fresh perspectives on pearlescent body finishes. 

 

 

 

For ultimate visuals, we displayed different colors from the body down to inside the keycaps. Each metallic-matte body is complemented with contrasting lighter shades in the outer keycaps. Inside each keycap, the double-shot PBT displays a darker-colored font with the backlight off. With the backlight on, a lighter-toned color shines through - giving you a total of 4 different color visuals all in one keyboard. 

 

 

 

95% of keyboards are designed with rigid and sharp edges. The IZO design approach defies those expectations. 

Every corner, line, and edge follows a unified curved form, and numerous design elements were fused for ergonomic comfort and refined beauty. Our unique edge-less design is built to be visually soothing and soft to the touch. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The intuitive gold control knob is both gorgeous and functional - helping you efficiently access important media & backlight functions with ease. 

By simply turning the knob, you can increase or decrease volume and push down for mute. When holding 'FN' while turning the knob, you can increase or decrease the backlight brightness, and push down to cycle between 21 backlight modes.

 

 

 

With 21 backlight modes to choose from, you can pick from a variety of different light settings for the perfect visual experience. 

 

 

 

Our custom PBT double-shot keycaps create a light and dark color contrast between the keycap and font - displaying two-color effects with the backlight on and off. By adding laser-etched font, the keys will never fade away with time and usage. 

 

 

 

Popular for typing and programming, Gateron Blue mechanical switches are clicky with responsive haptic feedback. With an average of 50 Million actuations, expect a long lifespan with these reliable mechanical switches. 

 

 

 

A switch on the back of the keyboard allows you to easily choose between USB or Bluetooth connectivity.  

 

 

In USB mode, simply connect the included Type-C cable for a wired connection. In Bluetooth mode,  easily pair the device with your computer with a strong Bluetooth 5.0 connection and switch between up to 3 Bluetooth devices.

 

 

 

For ultimate versatility, the IZO keyboard is fully compatible with Mac and PC operating systems. IZO keyboards come with hybrid Operating System keycaps which display both OS icons. This allows users to use either PC or Mac without swapping out keycaps.

 

 

 

The large 5,000 mAh Lithium-ion rechargeable battery can be used for up to several months on a single charge with the backlight off (depending on usage). 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The IZO number pad functions as a standalone calculator when not used as a number pad, giving you two-in-one. 

Calculator function keys were built specifically for all calculator necessities. By toggling the switch on the top, users can connect to any device in Bluetooth or USB Mode to use as a number pad. 

 

 

 

 

Inspired by the luxurious feel and look of cosmetic bottles, the IZO mouse combines metallic matte, elegant gold, and milky frost to create a glamorous juxtaposition of colors.

 

 

 

The alluring gold scroll wheel and ring highlight the soft touch of the translucent frost body, showcasing multiple textures within the design. Through extensive testing and redesigns, we crafted a curved and round form that perfectly fits in your palms.

 

 

 

With two wireless options, the IZO Mouse can connect wirelessly with the backward compatible Bluetooth 5.0 or with the included RF USB Dongle for devices without Bluetooth capabilities.

 

 

 

The highly accurate PixArt PAW 3212 optical sensor comes with adjustable DPI settings at 1000, 1600, or 2400 dpi for reliable tracking.

 

 

 

 

Retaining the same design principles of the IZO keyboard, the IZO palm rest incorporates a parallel round pattern, while the colorful print on its microfiber surface perfectly matches the hue of your keyboard. Made with memory foam, the IZO Palm Rest's ergonomic design provides good elasticity and soft comfort for long-term use.

 

 

 

 

Similar to the IZO Palm Rest, the IZO Desk Pad incorporates the same pattern and microfiber surface that perfectly matches your keyboard and mouse. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Founded in Los Angeles in 2005, AZIO was created as the answer to stagnant aesthetics of workspace accessories. Our designs do not confine to trends – we aspire to provide the highest quality, uniquely-designed essentials to help users work smarter with style.

By circumventing traditional materials, forms, and functions, we break through conventional designs to create your dream workspace.

story:
Since Studioso was founded in March of 2017, we have focused on creating a product that centers on improving lives of music students and teachers. Our primary objective is to optimize music education through improving efficiency. The app is focused around making sure all aspects of music education are productive, efficient, and organized. As we revolutionize music education to be more effective and enjoyable, our mission has grown to transcend the mere improvement of music education. Studioso is a leader in expanding the accessibility of quality music education. We have pledged to donate part of our profits to provide scholarships for underprivileged music students. Every student deserves access to music education, and we are determined to be the leader in corporate support for the arts. This charitable giving is setting a positive example for other corporations.

 

We are in need of funding to finish the development of Studioso on all web, iOS, and Android platforms and to accelerate our growth through marketing investment. Specifically, the team will contract additional app and web developers to complete Studioso’s full launch by 2018. In marketing, we will attend music education conferences to directly introduce our product to music educators.

If we do not meet our goal, the funds will be used mainly for marketing purposes and we will maintain our in-house app development with a slower pace and longer time before our release date.

At Studioso, our mission is to improve the lives of music students and teachers. We believe the best way to do this is through technology. That is why Studioso LLC was founded in March of 2017. With a growing team of 7 musicians, marketers, and app developers, Studioso is creating an app to connect music students to their teachers in a way that enhances the learning experience and facilitates the lives of teachers. Through enabling clear communication, efficient practice, and progress visualization, Studioso is eliminating student frustration, encouraging motivation, and fostering students’ love of music. However, Studioso is more than just an app. We are a company with a higher purpose of expanding the accessibility of music education.

 

You can also help by following us on social media @appstudioso.

 

Tweet about our campaign and show your support!

story:
Goals

The goal of this campaign is to fund creation of a new Static Code Analyzer for JavaScript, which will be available as PhpStorm, WebStorm and Idea Ultimate plugin. Project code name is "JS Inspections (EA Extended)" and we are targeting this level of community satisfaction.

 

Comparing to already existing alternatives (eslint, tslint), the analyzer will be capable of:

  • analyzing both JavaScript and TypeScript
  • giving instant feedback while you are writing code (without any external tools)
  • assisting in learning new language features and following best practices
  • deeply analyzing control flow and data types
  • providing tooling for efficiently working with legacy code (fully customizable rules and more)
  • bringing security, performance, control flow and probable bugs rules

 

When it comes to JetBrains IDEs, the plugin will push the Static Code Analysis quality bar further in direction of finding security, performance issues, potential bugs and much more.

Benefits (+ click on a perk to see rewards)

The main benefit is having state of art and simple to use code analyzer for JavaScript, running real-time in your JetBrains IDE and helping you to avoid bugs and to automate code fixes. Only backers will get exclusive access to the plugin, before anyone else does. Of course with higher pledge, more perks are available (incl. custom rules creation).

Team background

Since 2014 we created similar analyzers for PHP (Php Inspections (EA Extended), Php Inspections (EA Ultimate) and Yii2 Inspections) providing real-time code analysis and making life of ~30 000 engineers easier every day.

The analyzers are covering wide scope of possible defects: from code style to security issues. Many of existing rules can be applied to other programming languages as JavaScript, so we have already great basis for delivering first version fast.

Roadmap

For roadmap and priorities planning we'll dedicate Q1 2020 with collaborative planning approach.

In practical field, this means voting among backers and choosing which inspections groups to start with (the inspection groups will be the same as in Php Inspections (EA Extended)), choosing releases frequency and more. Then we'll start working on implementation with regular releases, delivering value ASAP and collecting feedback from backers.

OSS availability

This will be decided at planning phase by backers. But in any case we'll likely use GitHub and its ticket system for all collaboration, documentation and feedback topics.

What can I do?

Best is to make your contribution to funding and share with colleagues/community you are in touch with (sometimes reviews link can help to engage people). The rest is in community hands and I'll be sharing progress at my twitter account (@kalessil).
