story:
Breakthrough technology

XeroPass is the first secure identity authentication solution of its kind that allows you to approve computer access to all your online accounts from your smartphone, and eliminates the need to create, remember, enter or update user names and passwords. XeroPass gives you real-time control over all your accounts. 

 

This is just the beginning... 

XeroPass is not a simple password manager or storage device that can be lost or hacked, but a triplex next-generation cyber-security solution that gives you total control over all your online accounts and related purchases and expenses.  More importantly, XeroPass on Indiegogo is your first step into next-generation cyber-security that will ultimately eliminate the need to use passwords and logins altogether.  In the future, you’ll simply click on the XeroPass icon on participating websites and be logged into your accounts while retaining complete control over your personal information and purchases using those accounts.

As leading cyber-security experts, we recognize that user names and passwords simply don’t provide true-security and that all of us are being forced to spend more and more time dealing with this problem.  We also know that discrete devices and password mangers are easily compromised by today’s industrial hackers.

 

The future of XeroPass includes you!

XeroPass is an extensible solution to the problem of secure authentication that has plagued some of the top online companies with greater frequency.  The password files of these companies are under constant attack, requiring more complex and difficult to remember passwords.  The days of using passwords as a method of securing your personal accounts and information are numbered. 

As a XeroPass contributor you will help decide what features will be added to XeroPass first. We're already planning to put real-time financial transaction approval in the palm of your hand.  The potential applications for XeroPass are unlimited, and we want your invaluable, creative ideas.

    

Why did we create XeroPass?

We’re a purpose driven company of people, committed to changing the status-quo for the better, so we can all live happier and more productive lives.  We were already engaged in successfully solving complex cyber-security challenges for business and government. We are inventing next-generation cyber-security technology to make computers immune to cyber-borne threats.

At certain levels of participation you’ll have the opportunity to view video interviews where top experts in cyber security talk about our technology and how it is changing the game in the quest for true-security in cyber space.

 

About XeroPass

With XeroPass, every time you navigate to a website on your computer, your smartphone pops-up a message that asks if you want to approve a login for that website.  Select YES and you are automatically logged into the account for that website.  No more creating, remembering, resetting, entering or re-entering login information.

XeroPass also allows you to automatically and easily generate unique logins and passwords that meet the high security standards being required more frequently by banks and e-commerce websites.

If your smartphone is lost or stolen, it can’t be accessed by others and it’s fast and easy to deactivate that smartphone and activate a new one.

Unparalleled protection and ease of use – When you navigate to a website you are automatically logged in.  When you set up a new account you can use XeroPass to generate your login information.

XeroPass employs a triplex cyber-security schema based on patented technologies that government security and academic experts have dubbed “game changing”. The data required for accessing any specific account is never stored on your computer or in the same place, at the same time or in any form that can be viewed by others.

 

In appreciation for your good support, let us publicly announce our thanks!

All XeroPass campaign supporters will get their names listed (optional, of course) on our website.

We need your support. Please purchase our limited edition XeroPass-Indiegogo t-shirts - every bit of support helps! As we hit various campaign milestones our pledges will also receive additional special offers.

 Limited Edition "Mission Control Launch Team T-Shirt" - See it in our media gallery section

 

About Vir2us

Vir2us, (pronounced Virtuous) began as a Silicon Valley research and development firm in 2001 creating next-generation cyber security technology that solved complex computer problems for some of the most tech-savvy firms in the San Francisco Bay area. Since that time, Vir2us and its technology solutions have been recognized by some of the highest level agencies and security professionals of the U.S. Government and other governments worldwide.

 

About our Team –

The Vir2us team includes Silicon Valley veterans who helped launch the computer industry and the digital age. They were first in digital networks, Internet e-commerce, and next generation cyber-security.

 

FAQs 

When can I get XeroPass?

Supporters at the $100 level will have the option to get the beta-release in June. Others will get the final first release in August.

I am a Canadian backer will I be charged international shipping for my T-Shirt?

No

Will you ship the Launch Team T-Shirt overseas?

Yes, for an additional shipping charge of $20.

Will Xeropass work anywhere in the world where smartphones can be used?

Yes

Can I import credentials from other password managers into XeroPass?

Yes

Is it possible to retrieve passwords manually on the go and not use auto-login?

Yes- you can enable this option at sign up.  You can change it at any time.

Will XeroPass have a random secure password generator feature?

Yes

How do you protect my data on my smartphone?

The data required for secure authentication and login is not stored on your smartphone or in any usable format.

If I lose my smartphone can it be remotely erased?

This is not necessary since the information required to login is not available from the smartphone. Also, the service can be disabled from the web and when your phone number is moved to a new phone it is easily reactivated. 

What additional software is required to use XeroPass for my business?

None- Additional future feature modules, such as approval of financial transactions, will require an enterprise module that will be available separately on the xeropass website.

How do you collect delivery information or t-shirt sizes?

You’ll receive an email to confirm shipping and sizing information.

What if I don’t want to be listed on the site as a sponsor?

We won’t list your name until you respond to our email asking how you would like you’re name to appear.

What desktop computer platforms does XeroPass support?

Windows OS using Windows Explorer and Firefox, Chrome (Mac by October 2013)

What mobile devices are supported?

XeroPass works with iPhone, Android and Windows-based smartphones (more to come).

What will be the retail price for XeroPass?

XeroPass will be sold for $9.99 per user subscription exclusive of enterprise feature modules from the smartphone app stores.

What if I don’t have phone service or I am using a public terminal?

You can simply retrieve your login information from your smartphone with a PIN if you elect to have this option on your account.

Will there be any monthly or yearly fees to use XeroPass?

XeroPass has an annual subscription fee and will be upgraded regularly at no-charge to Indiegogo supporters.  This does not include enterprise add on features that will require a separate module for your business or organization.

Is the information stored in the cloud encrypted?

Yes - In addition, the account information stored in the cloud is not in a form that is usable.

 

How we manage the challange

Because the prototype for XeroPass is already completed, the primary challange in a project involving proprietary technology and several third-party delivery components (app stores and smartphones) is the risk of an extended schedule.

Fortunately, the main technology components of Xeropass are designed by Vir2us and are well understood by our engineers and product marketing professionals, and the third-party app store submission criteria and implementation schedules are well defined.

Because Xeropass is a compilation of Vir2us designed technologies that the company has worked with in its other next-generation secure computing solutions, we do not anticipate any technical challenges.

Vir2us' technology and product design professionals are highly skilled at designing, prototyping and delivering innovative hardware and software solutions on time and within budget. However, should there be a change in schedule our Indiegogo partners will be notified immediately.

If your smartphone is lost or stolen, it can’t be accessed by others and it’s fast and easy to deactivate that smartphone and activate a new one.
Unparalleled protection and ease of use – When you navigate to a website you are automatically logged in.  When you set up a new account you can use XeroPass to generate your login information.
XeroPass employs a triplex cyber-security schema based on patented technologies that government security and academic experts have dubbed “game changing”. The data required for accessing any specific account is never stored on your computer or in the same place, at the same time or in any form that can be viewed by others.
 
In appreciation for your good support, let us publicly announce our thanks! 
All XeroPass campaign supporters will get their names listed (optional, of course) on our website.
We need your support. Please purchase our limited edition XeroPass-Indiegogo t-shirts - every bit of support helps! As we hit various campaign milestones our pledges will also receive additional special offers.
 Limited Edition "Mission Control Launch Team T-Shirt" - See it in our media gallery section
 
About Vir2us
Vir2us, (pronounced Virtuous) began as a Silicon Valley research and development firm in 2001 creating next-generation cyber security technology that solved complex computer problems for some of the most tech-savvy firms in the San Francisco Bay area. Since that time, Vir2us and its technology solutions have been recognized by some of the highest level agencies and security professionals of the U.S. Government and other governments worldwide.
 
About our Team –
The Vir2us team includes Silicon Valley veterans who helped launch the computer industry and the digital age. They were first in digital networks, Internet e-commerce, and next generation cyber-security.
 
FAQs  
When can I get XeroPass?
Supporters at the $100 level will have the option to get the beta-release in June. Others will get the final first release in August.
I am a Canadian backer will I be charged international shipping for my T-Shirt?
No
Will you ship the Launch Team T-Shirt overseas?
Yes, for an additional shipping charge of $20.
Will Xeropass work anywhere in the world where smartphones can be used?
Yes
Can I import credentials from other password managers into XeroPass?
Yes
Is it possible to retrieve passwords manually on the go and not use auto-login?
Yes- you can enable this option at sign up.  You can change it at any time.
Will XeroPass have a random secure password generator feature?
Yes
How do you protect my data on my smartphone?
The data required for secure authentication and login is not stored on your smartphone or in any usable format.
If I lose my smartphone can it be remotely erased?
This is not necessary since the information required to login is not available from the smartphone. Also, the service can be disabled from the web and when your phone number is moved to a new phone it is easily reactivated. 
What additional software is required to use XeroPass for my business?
None- Additional future feature modules, such as approval of financial transactions, will require an enterprise module that will be available separately on the xeropass website.
How do you collect delivery information or t-shirt sizes?
You’ll receive an email to confirm shipping and sizing information.
What if I don’t want to be listed on the site as a sponsor?
We won’t list your name until you respond to our email asking how you would like you’re name to appear.
What desktop computer platforms does XeroPass support?
Windows OS using Windows Explorer and Firefox, Chrome (Mac by October 2013)
What mobile devices are supported?
XeroPass works with iPhone, Android and Windows-based smartphones (more to come).
What will be the retail price for XeroPass?
XeroPass will be sold for $9.99 per user subscription exclusive of enterprise feature modules from the smartphone app stores.
What if I don’t have phone service or I am using a public terminal?
You can simply retrieve your login information from your smartphone with a PIN if you elect to have this option on your account.
Will there be any monthly or yearly fees to use XeroPass? 
XeroPass has an annual subscription fee and will be upgraded regularly at no-charge to Indiegogo supporters.  This does not include enterprise add on features that will require a separate module for your business or organization.
Is the information stored in the cloud encrypted?
Yes - In addition, the account information stored in the cloud is not in a form that is usable.
 
How we manage the challange
Because the prototype for XeroPass is already completed, the primary challange in a project involving proprietary technology and several third-party delivery components (app stores and smartphones) is the risk of an extended schedule.
Fortunately, the main technology components of Xeropass are designed by Vir2us and are well understood by our engineers and product marketing professionals, and the third-party app store submission criteria and implementation schedules are well defined.
Because Xeropass is a compilation of Vir2us designed technologies that the company has worked with in its other next-generation secure computing solutions, we do not anticipate any technical challenges.
Vir2us' technology and product design professionals are highly skilled at designing, prototyping and delivering innovative hardware and software solutions on time and within budget. However, should there be a change in schedule our Indiegogo partners will be notified immediately.

story:
We are creating "The Greatest Mobile App Festival on The Planet!”. There are so many thousands of useful apps.  Finding the ones that were designed for you can be a challenge!  The Mobile App Expo helps people find awesome and empoweirng apps in a fun and interactive way.  

Our festival is a traveling expo much like a Pet Expo or Comic Con, but instead of learning about pets or super heroes, patrons learn about awesome apps and the latest smart phone innovations!  We want people who tour our festivals to walk away with a pocket of useful and fun apps that align with their hobbies, passions and professions.

Booths at our festival are made up of live demo exhibits and poster and video display exhibits that play an app's explainer video.  As festivalgoers tour the expo, they are able to download apps to their smart phones via QR codes at the exhibits.

The Mobile App Expo is designed to be a fun learning experience!  We will have a booth that you can literally launch angry birds from a catapult and a booth to throw ninja stars at fruit. We will have a band made of iPhones and an iPhone karaoke station.  There will be iPads to test drive apps and live demos of smart phone accessories.   Imagine taking an art exhibit and combining it with the social fun of a Warrior Dash!  By the time someone leaves our festival they have a great facebook picture as well as a pocket of new apps they just discovered!

The fact that app developers do not need to be physically present to showcase their apps, makes our festival easy to transport.  Thus, our festival will be a national tour.  We are arranging venues for 2013 and we have Dallas, Los Angeles and San Francisco on our list. 

~ What We Need ~

We need awesome apps to build the festival into an explosive cornucopia of apps!  We want over 300 awesome apps to be exhibited on the tour.  This is a lot of work. The hardest part is letting app developers know about our exhibit and physically getting their exhibits built.  We need help finding awesome apps.  Our festival will showcase a wide, eclectic collection of useful and fun apps. Suggest an awesome app and help fund it!

~ What You Get ~

Fund $5 and you get a ticket to any Mobile App Expo. This ticket does not expire, so when we come to your city, just show up, hand over the ticket and get ready to fill your phone with apps you didn't even know existed!


Fund $30 and you receive a ticket, plus we will add your suggested app to our festival!  We will custom create an exhibit consisting of a poster with your app's features that will include a QR code so our festivalgoers will be able to download your suggested app on the spot.  Your exhibit will travel with our festival to three cities.  (This is deal for an app developer to get their app noticed, or to help promote your favorite app!).

 

Fund 79$ and you receive all of the above plus we will create an exhibit with a video display that showcases your app's explainer video.  Your exhibit will travel to four cities.

 

Fund $250 and you receive all of the above plus a one time complimentary 8' x 8' booth space at any of our festivals that allows you to interact in person with thousands of festivalgoers and the media journalists and app reviewers we invite from each city.


The apps presented in our festival will receive national publicity. Apart from being presented in front of thousands of festivalgoers with the ability to be downloaded on the spot, we invite media journalists and app reviewers to find awesome apps with personal VIP entrances that grant them free passes and other perks.  Apps also have the chance to win the "Best Of" in each city that our patrons vote on. At each city we visit, we are anticipating an attendance of two thousand app aficionados. We plan on holding three festivals in 2013. Our festival is one of the most cost effected ways to get an app noticed.

 

~ What Can You Do? ~

We need to let app developers know about how we can help their app get noticed. 

PLEASE HELP US GET THE WORD OUT!

You can use the Indiegogo Share Tools to do this.

Please send a link of this page to all your app developer friends and let them know how we are building an interactive festival of apps that can get their apps into the hands of app aficionados across the country.

If you have a favorite app, fund it, then send us an email and we will contact the app developer to request permission to create an exhibit for it and add it to our tour. We have already gotten permission from a number of awesome apps to create an exhibit for them.

 

If you are an app developer who wants their app to be a part of our tour, fund the app and then send us an email with your graphics and/or video and we will begin constructing your exhibit and add it to our festival.

 

Email:  support@mobileappexpochallenge.com

 

Please visit our website at:  www.mobileappexpochallenge.com

 

~ Our Company ~

Our company, Life Learning Devices, LLC., is a motivational products and production company established in 2007.  We put on events that inspire people to live fulfilled and passionate lives. 

We invented a button much like the Staples Easy Button that provides daily motivational quotes.  Our product line includes a number of useful topics that make for, "The World's Greatest Gift!". Please visit our site at: www.lifelearningdevices.com.

We recently produced an extremely successful outdoor adventure challenge that provided family fun and entertainment for over 4,000 people: The Mud Ninja Extreme Challenge.  Mud Ninja 2013 is already in the works and we will be delivering a day of insane muddy fun once again!  Please visit our site: www.mudninja.com.

story:
BLUEVER Hello X2 is an easy-to-mount and simple-to-use peripheral that is used on any standard desktop monitor or laptop to instantly transform it into an interactive touchscreen with extra functionality. 

With the help of its built-in camera and infrared light bulbs, BLUEVER Hello X2 detects your moving finger towards the monitor and translates it into touch and drag mouse actions with high accuracy and no latency. It makes your work and fun more efficient and engaging.

 

 

 

BLUEVER Hello X2 works with any average laptop or desktop with Mac or Windows OS and a monitor screen size starts from 10” up to 27”, and converts them into fancy touchscreens.

It makes the interaction with your computer more intuitive and instinctive, therefore your life and work more efficient and easier.

 

 

 

 

Hello X2 magically sprinkles touchscreen features to your monitor which detect and actuate various finger gestures, including click(short press), double-click, right-click(long press), swipe, touch and hold, touch and drag, draw\sketch\write with finger.

 

 

BLUEVER Hello X2 is easy to mount on monitors of all sizes from 10” to 27”. It clips onto the upper right corner of the monitor and you should be able to find a firm fit by turning the screw by hand to adjust.

In case you switch to a new computer or monitor of different size or thickness, you can still use your BLUEVER Hello X2 with it. It won’t occupy any extra space on your table, and is so small and lightweight that won’t add a bulk of burden to your monitor.

 

 *The clip can be adjusted between 1 to 28mm. It also comes with a removable soft grip which allows for a secure and scratchless attachment to your monitor.

 

 

BLUEVER Hello X2 is configured with a camera and infrared light emitter. Any disturbances towards the invisible laser web caused by the movement of your finger in front of the computer screen will be detected by the camera and translated into accurate and immediate mouse actions.

BLUEVER Hello X2 has a feature called accidental touch protection that prevents sleeve touch or swipe, so no actions of your clothes will be inadvertently made.

 

 

 

The BLUEVER Hello X2 doesn’t require a bare finger to detect touch. Gloves, paintbrushes and stylus will all work.

 

 

 

If you’re anyone who desperately misses a touchscreen on your MacBook Pro 2020 such as a photographer, a graphic designer, a presenter, a gamer, an editor or an artist, you will find Hello X2 extremely practical and useful.

 

 

Once attached, turn on your computer and plug BLUEVER Hello X2’s USB connector into it to power up. The first time you use BLUEVER Hello X2 with your computer, it is important to calibrate it correctly. The process can be easily done by following the instructions given by the application installed on your computer. It takes just a few steps of about 1 minute and you only have to do it once. Power on/off, sleep/wake or upgrade systems on your computer won’t affect the performance of BLUEVER Hello X2.

The LED on BLUEVER Hello X2 clearly indicates its working status for your convenience:

  • Green - normal operation; 
  • Red - to be calibrated/driver to be installed or run; 
  • Yellow - sleep.

*Any change in the physical position or location of BLUEVER Hello X2 on your monitor or uninstall its software application requires a re-calibration.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

BLUEVER was established in 2019 and is a team dedicated to design lifestyle tech products that help people to transform into a smarter life. BLUEVER is known for designing and innovating smart devices and lifestyle products. Our objective is to inspire people to improve their personal life and work efficiency.

Why SmartNewspapers

At Audiovisual News, Inc. we know that your time is valuable and so is being in the know. Consequently, we plan to create a new kind of newspaper by transforming traditional newspapers into SmartNewspapers that will give you more time to enjoy your newspapers and will make it very easy to always be in the know from sources you trust.

SmartNewspapers are personalized, audiovisual extensions of major newspapers like: The New York Times, The Washington Post, USA Today and your favorite local newspapers. They read like print newspapers, on almost any Internet device with a major Internet browser, and can be heard like an audiobook, using content from voiceover artists instead of synthesized computer voices.

Even if you don’t currently read newspapers and get your news from the Internet, SmartNewspapers might change your mind because SmartNewspapers will make it even easier and faster for you to get your news from the Internet. For example, instead of going to the Internet to get your news, the news will come directly to you, on devices you probably already own, like your smartphone. This means that you can get personalized news updates as they happen, anywhere and anytime and from sources that you trust! In addition, you can now enjoy your SmartNewspaper while driving in your car, exercising or doing something else.

Imagine listening to your personalized SmartNewspaper in the car, pausing, and then continue reading in silence on the train. With SmartNewspapers, you will have the best of all worlds.

 

Our Product in under 30 seconds

One of the most compelling aspects of SmartNewspapers is how easy they are to use. For example:

 

Want to read your favorite newspaper on the go?

 

Select it from your list of SmartNewspaper subscriptions.

 

Next select the first article you want to read.

 

Yes, that is the one!

 

Find where you want to start.

 

Select the paragraph, and…

 

The SmartNewspaper will start reading the article to you…

 

And automatically advance after that…

 

So that you can do other things at the same time. It’s just that easy!

 

Anyone can be a Philanthropist

During our Indiegogo campaign, Audiovisual News Angel, Inc. is offering you discounts that are over 86% off our daily subscription rate. And, if you want to see what it feels like to be a philanthropist, for not a whole lot of money, we have matching gift subscriptions at four of our pledge levels ($100, $250, $500 and $1,000).

It is our hope that you will use this Philanthropist discount to give gift subscriptions to people at either an educational institution, medical facility or some other nonprofit organization.

While a lot of philanthropists get their names on buildings as a constant reminder of their good deeds, you can get your name, or company name displayed, every day, on the front of every gift subscription that you purchase. For example, “Compliments of” and your name, or company name, will be displayed on the front page of your gift subscriptions has a daily reminder of your good deeds. Of course, you also have the option of leaving the space blank and being anonymous. It’s up to you!

 

Where Are We Now

We have started building a working prototype, but we still need money and resources to finish the job.

 

What We Need From You

Three things:

  1. Money. So that we can finish the SmartNewspaper prototype.
  2. Subscribers. The more subscribers we get the better. You can even give gift subscriptions to friends, family or whoever you want!
  3. Your input. We want your input on deciding which newspaper we should partner with first.

 

Should it be USA Today?

 

Or, the New York Times?

 

Or some other newspaper, such as your own hometown newspaper?

 

 

Your Rewards

Here are some of the rewards that you can expect to get for helping us:

  1. A daily, monthly or year subscription to the first SmartNewspaper that we publish.
  2. A lifetime Angel icon displayed on the front page of all your SmartNewspapers that identifies you as a VIP, who helped us get started.
  3. Votes toward helping us determine which newspaper will be the first SmartNewspaper ever published.

 

Here is an overview of our Indiegogo rewards:

 

Thank you for helping us. And remember, every little bit helps!

story:
Background

I have spent the past year developing an interactive website that deals with buying and/or selling video tutorials. The prototype is up and running! Through my journey in web designing and starting a business, I have found that tutorials have truly aided in my success.

Free video sharing websites offer some good tutorials, but are hard to find or don't even offer them at all. If you are like me, you have sifted through hundreds of poor tutorials to find what you are looking for.

There is not much incentive for users to create quality video tutorials since there is little money to be made through advertising. ARGH! Advertising is another really annoying obstacle of free video tutorials. No ADS!!!

Watch Quick Video Explanation

Paid Tutorials

That is where I thought paid tutorials would be much better. There are websites that provide paid tutorials, but are limited on the categories that are taught. This occurs because they directly hire the teachers to create tutorials.

Teachinsight is driven by users that submit their tutorials to the community. Anyone can become a teacher. All that is needed is a well-constructed comprehensive tutorial. After submission, the tutorial is reviewed by our team. If the tutorial does not meet our standards an email will be sent to the teacher providing reasons for rejection.

To become a teacher you must pass a basic quiz to confirm you fully understand our process.  Pricing will be kept low ($1-$5) to promote high quantities to be purchased and to compete with free tutorial websites. You can download the tutorial or watch it through our website purchased section. Imagine an incredible Photoshop tutorial that gets purchased by three or four thousand "students".

Learning Online

There is a high volume of video tutorials being viewed online today. The power of the internet has changed the way we learn. Video tutorials are a popular way to learn nowadays. I saw a Youtube tutorial on Illustrator that was viewed over 6 million times. Teachers like this have been bookmarked by me and will be needed to gain traffic. Initially, Teachinsight will require tutorials to stimulate growth.

Website Features

  • Purchase or Sell
  • Rate Purchased
  • Preview Video For Tutorial
  • Comment System
  • Q & A
  • iPad iPhone Compatible
  • Tagging
  • Deposit/Withdrawal System
  • PayPal, Money Bookers, and Alert Pay
  • Earnings/Statement Reporting
  • Library Bookmarking
  • Purchased will be hosted by us to view as well be downloadable
  • Additional files (ex.psd,html,jpg) can be added to be downloaded
  • Follow other members
  • Message other members
  • Referral (Affiliate) Program

Clean And Modern Design

Nothing is worse then a website that has a ton of functionality, but no style. We understand that a great design along with an easy-to-use interface is essential to making this website successful. We have connections with incredible web and graphic designers. A clean design will not be overlooked. 

 
With A Little Help From Our Friends

We plan to have updates placed on Indiegogo throughout the project. If we get funded (fingers crossed) the updates will move to our facebook page. With your help we can pay for the following:

  • Dedicated Server (needed for mass traffic)
  • Additional development (web, database, graphic)
  • Tutorial Review Team (1 or 2 in beginning)
  • Legal Protection (copyright, privacy policy)
  • Marketing (SEO,SEM)

Thank you so much for taking the time to learn about this project and I hope you find it worth funding!

Initially, Teachinsight will require tutorials to stimulate growth.
Website Features

Purchase or Sell
Rate Purchased
Preview Video For Tutorial
Comment System
Q & A
iPad iPhone Compatible
Tagging
Deposit/Withdrawal System
PayPal, Money Bookers, and Alert Pay
Earnings/Statement Reporting
Library Bookmarking
Purchased will be hosted by us to view as well be downloadable
Additional files (ex.psd,html,jpg) can be added to be downloaded
Follow other members
Message other members
Referral (Affiliate) Program


Clean And Modern Design
Nothing is worse then a website that has a ton of functionality, but no style. We understand that a great design along with an easy-to-use interface is essential to making this website successful. We have connections with incredible web and graphic designers. A clean design will not be overlooked. 


 
With A Little Help From Our Friends
We plan to have updates placed on Indiegogo throughout the project. If we get funded (fingers crossed) the updates will move to our facebook page. With your help we can pay for the following:

Dedicated Server (needed for mass traffic)
Additional development (web, database, graphic)
Tutorial Review Team (1 or 2 in beginning)
Legal Protection (copyright, privacy policy)
Marketing (SEO,SEM)

Thank you so much for taking the time to learn about this project and I hope you find it worth funding!

story:
cob·ble  verb  /ˈkäbəl/

:roughly assemble or put together something from available parts or elements.

The Little Monster

The Cobblebot Little Monster was designed to provide an affordable desktop 3D printer capable of high speeds, high resolution, and a very, very low cost of ownership.  The printer was dubbed “Little Monster” by the Cobblebot team due to its incredibly simplistic design and frighteningly awesome performance. It’s an extremely easy to assemble 3D printer. A X6" x Y6" x Z6" build area is provided standard, which is expandable up to X10" x Y10" x Z10". This campaign is being launched consecutively with an identical Kickstarter Campaign.


Start Your Journey Into 3D Printing

Whether you are looking to put your creativity to work and bring your ideas to life or to start a business, Cobblebot Little Monster can help you get there. Our high quality and low cost ($199) 3D printer makes Cobblebot Little Monster a unequaled consumer 3D printer that can be used for business or personal use. 

You dream it, let Cobblebot make it!

Material & Filament

The Cobblebot Little Monster is primarily designed to print in PLA and ABS plastic.  For those interested in printing in other materials, the hotend may be upgraded to allow printing in other materials, such as: Nylon, Polycarbonate, Flexible Filament, LayWood, PVA, HDPE. 

Assembly And Calibration

Cobblebot Little Monster can be assembled in 1 hour and calibrated in minutes.  The Little Monster is an extremely simplistic design with few parts which makes assembly a breeze.  You can follow our detailed written instructions (with pictures) or follow along with our video build guide.


The Final Push

Cobblebot Little Monster is already a completely functional consumer 3D printer.  But we will be working to improve / perfect its custom parts until the end of the Kickstarter campaign. Additionally, we will be working to pretty it up a bit. 

All plastic parts will be injection molded for smooth and solid parts for everyone. Metal parts will be avaliable as an upgrade option.

What The Future Holds

Cobblebot Inc. is a rapidly expanding business that expects to launch half a dozen new machines in 2015, including a CNC Mill, Engraving Machine, Laser Cutter, and 3D Scanner.  We also plan to launch a line of filament for use with 3D printers.  The current level of success of Cobblebot Inc. means our supporters can look forward to continued support of all of the products we design and manufacture. 


Technical Specifications

  • Physical Dimensions: 12" x 12" x 12" (304mm x 304mm x 304mm)

  • Build/Print Dimensions: Default: 6" x 6" x 6" (152mm x 152mm x 152mm);  Upgradeable to a max of 10"x10"x10" (254mm x 254mm x 254mm) in 1" increments.

  • Layer Height: 100-300 micron

  • Print Speed: 30 - 60mm/sec (Can be faster with hot end upgrade)

  • Weight: roughly 10 lb (7.7 kg).

  • Compatibility: Windows, Mac, or Linux.

  • Connections: USB & SD Card.

  • Materials supported: ABS, PLA (No Upgrades); + Nylon, Polycarbonate, Flexible Filament, LayWood, PVA, HDPE (Upgraded)

  • Hotend: Currently Planned Default: J Head (PEEK + PTFE liner), .35mm Nozzle. Upgraded: All Metal Hexagon Hotend, .4mm Nozzle; 

  • Filament Size: 1.75mm

  • Power Supply: 12V 30A Recommended (Approximately $24 on Amazon) - Not included with kit due to the excessively high rate of damage during shipping encountered in our previous Kickstarter campaign (Our cost per unit is expected to be higher after warranty claims than our backers could purchase the power supply for independently - so we've determined we would take a loss by offering power supplies - one of the many things we've learned from our previous Kickstarter campaign).  We will recommend the appropriate power supply for purchase to our supporters and provide instructions on how to set it up.

  • Stepper Motors (x4):  Nema 17 Stepper Motors

  • Electronics:  Ramps 1.4 & Arduino MEGA 2560 (Most supported and widely used 3D printer boards)

  • LCD: Model 2004 LCD Included; Upgrade: Model 12864 LCD.

  • SD Card Slot: Included

  • Stepper Drivers: A4988 (Default - Allows 1/16 stepping)

  • Heated Bed: PCB Heatbed is an Optional Upgrade.


Risks and challenges

The hard development work is already done and the team is 100% invested in its completion over the next few months.

So what risks and challenges are there?

We would say that the primary risks/challenges are encountering manufacturing delays, delays with logistics, and customs delays. This is something that we  encountered with our first Kickstarter / Indiegogo Campaign. So what we have done with THIS campaign is we have calculated the delays we previously encountered with our manufacturers and with customs into the estimated delivery dates for this project.

Obviously this means if we don't encounter the same delays we encountered in our first campaign, everyone could receive their rewards months sooner than projected (as early as late April). But we prefer to deliver sooner and have everyone thrilled about getting their Cobblebot Little Monster ahead of time than to have to explain why our manufactures didn't complete production or ship on time.

The design, manufacturing and importation of products for small businesses can be complex. Most of the Cobblebot Team has experience working with large corporations and many of our Team has had experience working with some of the very manufacturing companies that we use to manufacture Cobblebot parts. What we have learned the hard way is that there is a big difference in the importance that China manufactures place on a company that is ordering tens of millions of dollars worth of products vs. tens of thousands of dollars worth of products, despite any previous relationship with the manufacturer. As a small business we won't be the priority for our manufactures and this can cause delays - we believe this is actually the reason for some of our delays in our previous Kickstarter / Indiegogo campaign (another delay was that we had quality control issues with a manufacturer and they had to reproduce the product) - but the end result is the same: We use reputable manufactures who will ultimately deliver the goods we ordered and they will be of high quality. And we will turn around and get those parts to you, our wonderful supporters.

With a company like Cobblebot Inc. there is no real risk of not receiving your product, only a risk of delayed shipment.

story:
HoneyComb is a set of creative training modular blocks, designed for children of ages 3 and up. Basic Kit & Queen Kit are 2 of Honeycomb series. With hundreds of different blocks and combinations, you can quickly design, program, and prototype your own ideas. 

No electronic experience, no coding, and no screens required. Even free from the coding learning process, our smart blocks still give your children a tangible experience of snap and connect the blocks into DIY robots with thousands of function combinations. Each standard module is installed with 3 neighboring magnetic connectors, and all modules are made of 100% safe tested materials.

Over the last 2 years, our team is dedicated to bringing this brand new evolutionary modular blocks to the market. After our Music kit won the RedDot Communication & Design Award in 2017, we are now launching our two new kits:

  • Honeycomb Basic kit

  • Honeycomb Queen kit

​

 

The Basic kit is a groundbreaking language that you can definitely learn faster and better.It uses photo acoustic electronics to guide children's hands-on skills and to develop programming logic in their operations. It's very easy to use for 6-9 years old children, stitching way is also rich and colorful.

The Queen kit is programming language that you can touch easily,no screen,no soldering.no electronics knowledge needed. With HexaBlock series, all of your devices are connective in the future.

 

Merry Christmas Show

Kids first basic physical logical kit.

Basic Kits is a set of multivariate magnetic blocks with six-side structure, which designed by RedDot Award HoneyComb Team.  Conveying the basic ideology of HoneyComb Kits, studying the basic physical programming logic, sorting out  relationship of input, output, intermediate.

​

 

 

 

Lego pieces of all varieties constitute a universal system and work with Basic Kit.

We have a LEGO conversion card that can be combined with Lego Bricks.The magnet on the back of each module can be attached to the card.

Happy moment when children play with Basic&Queen Kit.

 

Programming is boring? Queen Kit ignites children's passion for learning. Simple blockly programming, a variety of cool play, release endless creativity.

Honey Blockly

For advanced players, we provide with programming platform based on Windows/iOS, through which we can complete the functions that direct connecting could not complete. And you can also design your own dot matrix game such as Angry Birds, Aircraft War and etc. 

Blockly Programming

Coding = Better Writing 

See your child's writing improve!

  • HoneyComb blockly platform to install quick and easy
  • Queen Kit: you only need to pull the magnet through the completion of the link, suitable for children operation
  • Drag and drop inside the HoneyComb graphics, write your first game

Incredible kit for blockly programming

 

 
 

Let us see what others say about HoneyComb E-Block Kits.

 

 

Through 12 months of researching and development, HoneyComb™ completed more than 40 basic building blocks in 2016 ; designed and made new technology package including Gesture Control, Voice Control, Panoramic Camera and other characteristic functional blocks. As the new generation of electronic blocks, HoneyComb™ packages guide user from easy to difficult level, step by step. No programming knowledge is needed, hence all of users will enjoy the fun of creating something by themselves.

Our design concept comes from hexagonal structure of honeycomb, achieving unlimited expansion in the plane. As for connection interface, use a unique one – input and three -output design, to ensure the uniqueness and  transmission of signal . (Note: some functional modules are designed for "one- in- one -out" or "three- in- three- out ". Please refer to the actual module)

Hexagon design / Unlimited extension

Each HoneyComb module is manufactured to an exacting degree of precision. When two modules are connected they will fit in steadily, yet will be easily disassembled. The machines that manufacture Basic & Queen bricks have tolerances as small as 10 micrometres.

We’re always happy to explore tools, toys, kits, books, and materials that help educators and parents from around the world to deliver quality STEAM/STEM education. As such, we love working with individuals, businesses, and organizations that enable us to achieve this mission.

 

Our products have been certified for children's safety, and there is no need to worry about safety in use.​ ​Honeycomb mass product is completed by Foxconn.

 

What is it?                     

 The New generation of fun tools for STEM Learning

Why should we use it? 

It can teach children logical thinking,creative expression...

Where can we buy it?   

Only on Indiegogo.

What features are available?

DIY your own instrument; blockly programming; gives all children the opportunity to take their first steps into the world of coding.

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.

(School & Steam Studio etc.)

For more than 10 units, new policy for you. 
Please contact us.  Email: nic@honeycombkits.com

SPECS

What is the uniqueness of the technology? 

Built for kids to use and play, no technology background required.

Ways of power supply? 

HexaBlocks Kits could be plugged into a wall outlet to be used,and use with Powerbank or DC Battery(9V).

Will there be updates to it in the future?  

Yes

SHIPPING

When does shipping begin?

Shipping will begin in Mid-March 2018.

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.

Please contact us. Email：sissi@honeycombkits.com

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?

Yes

  

Why not share good things with your friends? If you share our Indiegogo campaign on your Facebook, Twitter or Instagram, and it brings one of your friends contribute to our campaign, we will send you a FREE VR glasses!

You can share as many times as you want.

Need help? We're here for you: 

Want to know more information? Please click:

Official Website: www.honeycombkits.com

If you have any questions about business issues, during or after the campaign, you can always reach us at: sissi@honeycombkits.com

 

Risks and challenges

One part of HoneyComb Robot Blocks is highly complex: the chip. It is built in with thinnest size with highest capacity of speed arranged signal transduction. We have a close dialog with our manufacturing partner--Foxconn, who have a lot of experience with such complicated structures, and we implemented their feedback into our development process.

Despite that, we kept the internal parts simple. This allows us to develop quickly, and to choose between various different suppliers.

Our team has a very strong background in management, product design and mechanical engineering. We have already defined our manufacturing flow and our sourcing of the various different parts. Not only this, we are also in talks with several manufacturers for every part of HexaBlocks Kits. This allows us to scale production and logistics accordingly, even if we encounter high demand or supply shortage.

With hardware, there are always risks for production delays. The good news is that we have done all the footwork to get HexaBlocks Kits ready for mass production.

 We plan to start shipping HexaBlocks Kits to our Indiegogo supporters in Mid-March 2018.

story:
The Problem: 

Have you ever gone to the doctor and pharmacy and have someone ask you later, “What did they say?” and you honestly don’t know? Or you are taking more than one medication and can't remember when to take it and in what dosage?  Don't worry, you're not alone.  Many people have the same problem. As a result, they take their medications incorrectly, which potentially can have some severe side effects. 

This is especially true for people with chronic conditions, such as diabetes; they may take 3 to 5 medications at different times during the day, with various dosages, some before or after meals or before bedtime. It can be confusing to keep everything straight.

The Solution: 

Our Mobile App for Diabetes, iRetainRx, will simplify the unwieldy task of medication management into a fun and easy interactive mobile experience in the daily lives of those diagnosed with diabetes.  Our advanced and innovative project launch combines high technology with the best of medical science to help people manage their medications.

If you haven't already, watch the video above to see how easy it is for consumers diagnosed with Diabetes to take their medication and record their blood glucose level via their cell phone. It will have an interactive component: users will receive "points" as positive incentives for taking their blood glucose sugar levels and taking their medication regularly.  They will alert them about medication incompatibility and give reminders for medication refills.  It will help monitor and enable patients, caregivers, and pharmacists to collaborate and successfully implement treatment action plans.

Our Goal:  $30,000:

For our first software product offering, the Mobile App for Diabetes, iRetainRx, we are raising $30,000 to allow us to deploy and launch our mobile app on Android devices to support people with Diabetes. This money will pay for 1000 hours worth of design, development, testing and deployment.

We already have the back end built, but we need help funding with the front end. We are using the NFC (Near Field Communication) technology smart stickers; you might have heard of them used for Google Wallet or other payment transactions. We are going to use this NFC technology to remind, track, motivate and reward people for their actions necessary for treating diabetes. Currently, there is no mobile health application with NFC smart stickers used in this way.  The end result of this phase will be a standalone mobile software product with NFC interactivity. 

Our Team and Mission: 

Dr. David Parpart, D.C.and CEO of Socially Relevant, started and ran four clinics in Silicon Valley, diagnosing and treating patients with chronic conditions.  He also experienced chronic conditions and knows firsthand how challenging it can be to lead a normal life. “Managing a chronic condition is like having a full time job. Just imagine what it’s like to be working full time and managing a full time chronic illness. It often debilitates patients and causes them to limit their daily activities.  However, if they can control their chronic condition successfully, they can lead fuller lives.” David feels that with his clinical medical background and his entrepreneurial business experience, he can help others manage their condition with this mobile healthcare medication application for diabetes.

Others on the team are in the healthcare field, educating newly diagnosed diabetes patients on how to monitor their glucose levels and the importance of taking their medications regularly and empowering others.  We also have medical scientists, behavioral and social network experts, HIPAA compliant experts, high tech product management and engineering architects working in the background. UX designers, writers, educators, and marketing types round out the group. 

Our team, Socially Relevant (iRetainRx), is committed to save 500K lives in the next decade by helping people take their medications correctly and preventing hospital re-admissions.  By using mobile devices, we want to motivate people to change their behavior toward healthier outcomes.  Using four basic principles of Simplify, Inform, Motivate and Reward, we believe our solution of iRetainRx will help people with chronic conditions like diabetes succeed in gaining control over their lives.

Industry Support and Awards:

Partners include the American Pharmacists Association, California Pharmacists Association, Dallas Nephrology Associates, Surescripts, Healthwise, Medtask, and the Palo Alto Medical Foundation.

iRetainRx was a Semi-Finalist prize winner in the Sanofi US Innovation Challenge.  In March 2012, we were selected as one of the 5 semifinalists and were awarded $20K.  In May 2012, we presented our iRetainRx solution at Sanofi’s Design Innovative Diabetes Challenge Demo Day in NYC.  We were recognized having an innovative, interactive mobile health application for effective treatment plan adherence and optimal patient outcomes. 

Timeframe: 

We aim to launch this project within 90 days after we secure funding.  We have some developers and designers working behind the scenes. In addition, we have an excellent advisory board consisting of experts in medicine and technology whom we have been collaborating with to build partnerships and future interests.

NOTE: We've given ourselves less than 90 days to fund this project, but if we get enough supporters early on to reach our goal of $30,000, we can proceed with building the front end sooner rather than later.  

Rewards:

 By choosing one of the levels of support, you can receive the following:

  • Reward Level #1 at $10 - Thank you email and message from CEO with our heartfelt thanks!

 

  • Reward Level #2 at $25 - Thank you email and Sticker "Saving 500 Lives". See picture #2 and #3 in gallery. 
  • Reward Level #3 at $50 - Thank you email. Sticker "Saving 500 Lives" and 4 NFC (Near Field Communication) stickers. See picture #2 and #3 in gallery.
  • Reward Level #4 (US) at $100 - Thank you email, "I am Socially Relevant" Company T-shirt in S, M, L and XL with red or blue color logos with a black background. Shipping and handling is included for US orders. See T-shirt pictures #4 - #7 in gallery.
  • Reward Level #5 (International) at $110 -Thank you email, "I am Socially Relevant" Company T-shirt in S, M, L and XL with red or blue color logos with a black background. This includes $10 for shipping and handling for international orders. See T-shirt pictures #4 - #7 in gallery.
  • Reward Level #6 at $500 - Thank you email, and invite to a special tester event in a dining environment. 100 very special guests will beta test the project release. Lunch will be held at a premiere restaurant, Parcel 104, in Santa Clara, CA with CEO and the design team. 
  •  Note: You do not have be a geek to enjoy this event, just someone who loves to support new projects and enjoys eating a delicious meal!

 

Please Help:

Our goal is to eventually give this mobile app, iRetainRx, away to consumers for free so they can easily manage their Diabetes. 

Won't you help us in reaching our goal of $30,000 and helping us make a difference in the world for people's health and well-being?  Thanks so much!

 

The Socially Relevant Team
Saving 500K lives
story_txt:
The Problem: 
Have you ever gone to the doctor and pharmacy and have someone ask you later, “What did they say?” and you honestly don’t know? Or you are taking more than one medication and can't remember when to take it and in what dosage?  Don't worry, you're not alone.  Many people have the same problem. As a result, they take their medications incorrectly, which potentially can have some severe side effects. 
This is especially true for people with chronic conditions, such as diabetes; they may take 3 to 5 medications at different times during the day, with various dosages, some before or after meals or before bedtime. It can be confusing to keep everything straight.
The Solution: 
Our Mobile App for Diabetes, iRetainRx, will simplify the unwieldy task of medication management into a fun and easy interactive mobile experience in the daily lives of those diagnosed with diabetes.  Our advanced and innovative project launch combines high technology with the best of medical science to help people manage their medications.
If you haven't already, watch the video above to see how easy it is for consumers diagnosed with Diabetes to take their medication and record their blood glucose level via their cell phone. It will have an interactive component: users will receive "points" as positive incentives for taking their blood glucose sugar levels and taking their medication regularly.  They will alert them about medication incompatibility and give reminders for medication refills.  It will help monitor and enable patients, caregivers, and pharmacists to collaborate and successfully implement treatment action plans.
Our Goal:  $30,000: 
For our first software product offering, the Mobile App for Diabetes, iRetainRx, we are raising $30,000 to allow us to deploy and launch our mobile app on Android devices to support people with Diabetes. This money will pay for 1000 hours worth of design, development, testing and deployment.
We already have the back end built, but we need help funding with the front end. We are using the NFC (Near Field Communication) technology smart stickers; you might have heard of them used for Google Wallet or other payment transactions. We are going to use this NFC technology to remind, track, motivate and reward people for their actions necessary for treating diabetes. Currently, there is no mobile health application with NFC smart stickers used in this way.  The end result of this phase will be a standalone mobile software product with NFC interactivity. 
Our Team and Mission: 
Dr. David Parpart, D.C.and CEO of Socially Relevant, started and ran four clinics in Silicon Valley, diagnosing and treating patients with chronic conditions.  He also experienced chronic conditions and knows firsthand how challenging it can be to lead a normal life. “Managing a chronic condition is like having a full time job. Just imagine what it’s like to be working full time and managing a full time chronic illness. It often debilitates patients and causes them to limit their daily activities.  However, if they can control their chronic condition successfully, they can lead fuller lives.” David feels that with his clinical medical background and his entrepreneurial business experience, he can help others manage their condition with this mobile healthcare medication application for diabetes.
Others on the team are in the healthcare field, educating newly diagnosed diabetes patients on how to monitor their glucose levels and the importance of taking their medications regularly and empowering others.  We also have medical scientists, behavioral and social network experts, HIPAA compliant experts, high tech product management and engineering architects working in the background. UX designers, writers, educators, and marketing types round out the group. 
Our team, Socially Relevant (iRetainRx), is committed to save 500K lives in the next decade by helping people take their medications correctly and preventing hospital re-admissions.  By using mobile devices, we want to motivate people to change their behavior toward healthier outcomes.  Using four basic principles of Simplify, Inform, Motivate and Reward, we believe our solution of iRetainRx will help people with chronic conditions like diabetes succeed in gaining control over their lives.
Industry Support and Awards:
Partners include the American Pharmacists Association, California Pharmacists Association, Dallas Nephrology Associates, Surescripts, Healthwise, Medtask, and the Palo Alto Medical Foundation.
iRetainRx was a Semi-Finalist prize winner in the Sanofi US Innovation Challenge.  In March 2012, we were selected as one of the 5 semifinalists and were awarded $20K.  In May 2012, we presented our iRetainRx solution at Sanofi’s Design Innovative Diabetes Challenge Demo Day in NYC.  We were recognized having an innovative, interactive mobile health application for effective treatment plan adherence and optimal patient outcomes. 
Timeframe: 
We aim to launch this project within 90 days after we secure funding.  We have some developers and designers working behind the scenes. In addition, we have an excellent advisory board consisting of experts in medicine and technology whom we have been collaborating with to build partnerships and future interests.
NOTE: We've given ourselves less than 90 days to fund this project, but if we get enough supporters early on to reach our goal of $30,000, we can proceed with building the front end sooner rather than later.

 By choosing one of the levels of support, you can receive the following:


Reward Level #1 at $10 - Thank you email and message from CEO with our heartfelt thanks!
 


Reward Level #2 at $25 - Thank you email and Sticker "Saving 500 Lives". See picture #2 and #3 in gallery. 



Reward Level #3 at $50 - Thank you email. Sticker "Saving 500 Lives" and 4 NFC (Near Field Communication) stickers. See picture #2 and #3 in gallery.



Reward Level #4 (US) at $100 - Thank you email, "I am Socially Relevant" Company T-shirt in S, M, L and XL with red or blue color logos with a black background. Shipping and handling is included for US orders. See T-shirt pictures #4 - #7 in gallery.



Reward Level #5 (International) at $110 -Thank you email, "I am Socially Relevant" Company T-shirt in S, M, L and XL with red or blue color logos with a black background. This includes $10 for shipping and handling for international orders. See T-shirt pictures #4 - #7 in gallery.



Reward Level #6 at $500 - Thank you email, and invite to a special tester event in a dining environment. 100 very special guests will beta test the project release. Lunch will be held at a premiere restaurant, Parcel 104, in Santa Clara, CA with CEO and the design team. 


 Note: You do not have be a geek to enjoy this event, just someone who loves to support new projects and enjoys eating a delicious meal!

story:
All around the world, amazing things are being discovered. From the privacy of their garages and workshops, gadget men and women are researching better ways to solve our energy needs. Their goals are the same: to find, and deliver new technology to brother and sister citizens of an abused planet.

Some succeed.

Have you ever heard about someone who came up with something amazing? Something that would make the world better for everyone? Where did it go?

What if you were the discoverer?

I mean, what if, working from the comfort of your garage or workshop, you found something that would eliminate pollution from cars, for example. Not only virtually eliminate pollution, but give you better mileage, and made your car run better than it ever has?

Wouldn't you think the World would beat a path to your door to get hold of your discovery if they only knew about it?

What if they didn't?

What would you do?

I bet you would do pretty much the same as I with my discovery. You would take it to the people, no matter what it took.

Suzanne Anderson and The Gadgetman Groove

IN SHORT

My name is Ron Hatton, and I am a garage-level tinkerer. Just a tinkerer like many others, but one who has actually made a discovery that could literally change the planet.

I've dedicated the last 30 or so years of my life to finding something to release the all the power in a gasoline engine. I've seen some pretty cool things happen on my workbench, just like many thousands of people around the world. The difference with me is I actually found something. Something that is truly difficult to believe.

In March of 2009, while working in my garage in Gilbert, Arizona, I was given an insight, an inspiration if you will, of an adjustment that could be made to an engine that would cause something good to happen. And happen it did.

When I applied this adjustment, it took mere seconds to know something amazing was happening to this engine. It was running cooler and quieter and the emissions of the vehicle almost disappeared. When we took it out for a road trip, this Land Rover went from around 200 miles a tank to more than 600, and was more powerful than it had ever been in its life.

This was able to happen because The Gadgetman Groove gives the fuel that is normally wasted in the exhaust what it needs to burn inside the engine.

Since that first application, I have applied this technology to more than 1500 engines with very consistent results. EVERY engine that receives this modification runs better. So, many people have come to me to share this knowledge so they may apply it in their neighborhoods. About 200 people in North America alone are using this technology to make their planet a cleaner place, while benefiting in saving fuel.

I have also been approached by many groups intent on buying out my patent. None wanted to see it delivered, and that was a keystone to my dream of more than 25 years. My goal is to see it made available in a way that makes sense to everyone who wants to learn it, and give them the opportunity to help us change the planet.

You see, as I actually perfected the “The Gadgetman Groove” in my driveway, I bet I can teach you how to do it in yours.

For that, I need your help.

To be able to teach more people, I need better training materials. Materials that are expensive to produce. Instructional videos need to be made that describe, in detail, how to make the most from its application, for it changes many things about the way an engine burns fuel.


Photo Courtesy of www.EPA.gov



According to the EPA, at least 60% of every dollar's worth of energy burns in the exhaust. The Gadgetman Groove can change all that, demonstrated in the fact that about 40% of the vehicles I modify experience doubling of their mileage.

I told you it was going to be difficult to believe. But it is, nonetheless, true. If you want to see for yourself, just go to YouTube.com and search for “Gadgetman Groove”. There, you will find more than 300 video reports on its effects, but not from my perspective. From the mouths of The People who have experienced it.

Your contributions will allow more people to apply this simple adjustment to every gasoline engine on the planet. From chain saws and weed-eaters (2-cycle engines) to the largest V-10 Tritons, they are all designed to consume fuel and The Gadgetman Groove reverses some of that waste.

If we only save 20% of what we spend on gasoline (about $24 million an hour) we would have an extra $100 Million flowing through our economy. And THAT is something we ALL need. Not only that, but our engines would no longer be polluting our air with nearly as much garbage due to inefficient engine design.

What We Need

Ron and Debbie Talk about The Campaign

To get this technology into the hands of more people, we are going to need some supplies. We need better training materials and more of the special cutting tools to create the shape that allows this all to happen. Then, we need more people to know about The Groove.

To spread it around the world in an accurate manner, we will also see to it being translated into Spanish, French, Russian and German to begin with.

To accomplish this, we are going to need about $50,000. We will use it to

  • Hire someone to design our training program- $3K-$5K

  • Hire professional videographers to record 8 to 10 hours of training and produce a set of Multi-Media DVD's- $5,000

  • Hire Graphic designers to produce a training manual- $5,000

  • Manufacture 100 sets of bits- $12,000

  • Produce 100 Training Manuals- $4,000

  • Produce 100 DVD sets-$1,000

  • Translation Services-$0.12 - $0.16 per word - $2000 minimum per language (graphics extra)

As you can see, the hard costs alone will amount to about $40,000 for English training alone. To translate into additional languages and produce 100 each will cost approximately $6000 per.

Adding in additional unknown costs it could easily amount to more than $50,000 just to get the English version. Whatever additional funds are received will be used to make even MORE kits, to supply even MORE Gadgetmen the world over, enabling us, The People, to change the world.

One engine and one person at a time.

The Impact

Since I began modifying engines with The Gadgetman Groove, more than 3,000 engines around the world have been enhanced with the technology. More than 300 people have learned the technique, and we are proud to say we have been able to reduce emissions every single time.

There is no single adjustment that can give what The Gadgetman Groove gives. No part, no alteration, no habit that can reduce pollution as it does so casually. Nothing on the market that increases power the way it does. And nothing, NOTHING that can give people double their mileage, which happens in about 40% of the engines I have modified.

Air is the most vital element in our world. Pollution from vehicles is directly responsible for the elevation of Asthma rates increasing by as much as 200% in our major cities. Mexico alone has 54 cities where the air is considered unfit to breathe, and The Gadgetman Groove can change all that, and more.

Not only will our team be able to make their vehicles better, but if they like what they find, we will help them turn The Gadgetman Groove into a part-time income while benefiting their customers and their community.

As their business grows, we will use the funds from the sale of these licenses to make even more kits, and to even design new engine control systems to make The Groove even more effective, and to help other garage-level tinkerers bring their discoveries to market.

This is my way of sharing my discovery with The People and The Planet.

What you get for giving

Here's what we have in mind for gifts for your contribution:

  1. Any Contribution: PDF of Two simple things you can do to increase engine efficiency.
    2) $25-Autographed Gadgetman Groove hat
    3) $50-Hat and Tee shirt combo
    4) $100-$100 coupon off modification
    5) $500-Free Mod Certificate (S&H extra)
    6) $1000-New Personal License to Designee
    7) $5000-Full Licensed Training with Gadgetman in Hamilton MT.
    8) $10,000-A Weekend with Gadgetman in your town, tools in hand.

You say that even a dollar is out of your reach? You can STILL help us change the planet. If my story has inspired you, then share it with your friends and family. If there's a gadget man in their midst, and they are working to make this planet a better place for us all to live, then I want to speak to them!

To see more than 200 Video Reports, visit our YouTube Channel.

Simply use the “Sharing” tools below and let the world know we're here to help!
