story:
About

In a world where remote work is increasingly prevalent, maintaining productivity on-the-go can be a challenge. Xebec was created to fix that. Bring the convenience of external monitors from the office with you on the road, on a plane, or in a coffee shop in a compact, portable, and lightweight all-in-one package.  

 

 

 

Equipped with two ultra-thin, lightweight slidable screens, Xebec is there when you need it and hidden when you don't. Using power directly from your laptop, Xebec frees you from relying on outlets. The proprietary removable universal mount frees you from taking up valuable desk space. Setup and teardown takes just seconds, allowing you to move from space to space with ease. Xebec is the ultimate tri-screen laptop accessory.

 




 

 




1. Attach

 

2. Slide

 

3. Connect

 

Enjoy

 


 

 

 

 

Xebec on a 2016 13" MacBook Pro​

Xebec on a massive 20" Alienware PC

Xebec at night on a 2019 13" MacBook Pro

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping will be collected after the campaign ends and before we ship the product in order to ensure that we can provide the lowest and most accurate price possible. Estimated shipping costs are - $10/Xebec within the US, $15/Xebec for Canada and Mexico, and $40/Xebec for the rest of the world.

 

 

 

 


 

After graduating from The University of Texas I began my in digital technology consulting. As a consultant, I was required to travel to client sites across the country on a weekly basis. As anyone who regularly travels for work knows, getting work done at the client site can be very difficult. Between the constant barrage of questions and endless meetings, I spent more time going from conference room to conference room setting up and tearing down my workstations, than getting productive work done. The reason behind the struggle was that I lacked the screen real estate I'd come to rely on in my home office and needed monitors for my laptop.

We tried standalone monitors, but they took too much time to setup and lacked the portability to go from room to room. We tried USB monitors, but they required additional desk space that we didn't have. I felt there must be a better solution. So, in 2017, I went to work designing and building a prototype that would:

  • Allow me to have access to my monitors when and where I needed them
  • Include a removable mount that I could affix to my work laptop seamlessly - without causing any damage
  • Be compact and easy to travel with
  • Require zero additional work space, given the often crammed, shared desks at the client site

This is the origin of Xebec

Given our shared entrepreneurial spirit and experience working on the go, I knew this was something my co-founder would also be excited about. After revealing the prototype to him, we determined that we were both compelled to solve this shared problem, and we decided to pursue it further. This initiated 18 months of market research, vendor outreach, engineering, design, and countless prototypes. By the end, we had upgraded 3D printers twice and upgraded our 3D modeling software three times. Finally, in 2019, we arrived at the Xebec that exists today.

Over the past six months, we have tirelessly prepared for our first production run and we could not be more excited. In September of this year, I made the big leap: I left my job as a Product Manager to dedicate myself to Xebec full-time. Our tag line and motto at Xebec is "Free Yourself." Free Yourself from the confines of a single, small screen. Free Yourself from power outlets and bulky equipment. Free Yourself from the traditional "office" and work where you want.


In this digital age, we are fortunate to have access to knowledge and information from virtually anywhere. Xebec was created to extend that freedom to your remote workstation. We are proud to introduce you to Xebec: your laptop's new favorite companion. 


 

 

 

 

 

"Will my laptop work with Xebec?"

Xebec works with almost ALL laptops. It requires both a power and a video feed to operate each screen. Your laptop's USB port will be used to power the Xebec with the supplied Micro-USB cable. Laptop video ports come in many different formats: HDMI, Displayport, Mini-Displayport, USB-C, VGA, Thunderbolt 3, and USB 3.0 (with HDMI adapter) are a few examples of video output port types. Although Xebec's native video input is HDMI, it is perfectly compatible with all of the above video formats when used with a simple HDMI adapter. Click this link to learn more about compatibility.

 

"I don't know what USB 3.0 or USB-C or any of this means"

Don't worry! All of this terminology can seem daunting at first but it's rather straight forward after breaking it down. Click this link (same as above) to learn about the differences between these ports.

 

"Where can I get an HDMI adapter if I need one?"

We will be offering high quality HMDI adapters as low cost add-ons when we gather your shipping info after the campaign. Through our 2 years of research and development we have worked with dozens of adapters and have a few recommendations.

 

"Will Xebec work with my Microsoft Surface?"

Yes! With the use of a simple external power bank Xebec can be used with the Microsoft Surface. The Mini Displayport will drive video to one screen and the USB 3.0 port will drive video to the other screen (using a simple USB to HDMI adapter).

 

"Is Xebec compatible with Chromebook?"

As long as your laptop has a USB output and a video output, it is compatible with Xebec! 

 

"When will I get my Xebec?"

All Xebec's are scheduled to ship by March.

 

"What is the shipping cost?"

Please see the "Shipping" section above for details

 

Risks and challenges

Although there are a number of risks associated with launching any new product, we are confident that we have carefully mitigated each risk. We have prior experience bringing products to market on Kickstarter and the strong manufacturing relationships that come along with that. Between this experience and a strong complementary team of engineers and business strategists we are confident that we will deliver what we promised. Of course, if anything does happen along the way we will notify you immediately.
story_txt:
AboutIn a world where remote work is increasingly prevalent, maintaining productivity on-the-go can be a challenge. Xebec was created to fix that. Bring the convenience of external monitors from the office with you on the road, on a plane, or in a coffee shop in a compact, portable, and lightweight all-in-one package.     Equipped with two ultra-thin, lightweight slidable screens, Xebec is there when you need it and hidden when you don't. Using power directly from your laptop, Xebec frees you from relying on outlets. The proprietary removable universal mount frees you from taking up valuable desk space. Setup and teardown takes just seconds, allowing you to move from space to space with ease. Xebec is the ultimate tri-screen laptop accessory.   1. Attach 2. Slide 3. Connect Enjoy   

 
 Xebec on a 2016 13" MacBook Pro​Xebec on a massive 20" Alienware PCXebec at night on a 2019 13" MacBook Pro       Shipping will be collected after the campaign ends and before we ship the product in order to ensure that we can provide the lowest and most accurate price possible. Estimated shipping costs are - $10/Xebec within the US, $15/Xebec for Canada and Mexico, and $40/Xebec for the rest of the world.     After graduating from The University of Texas I began my in digital technology consulting. As a consultant, I was required to travel to client sites across the country on a weekly basis. As anyone who regularly travels for work knows, getting work done at the client site can be very difficult. Between the constant barrage of questions and endless meetings, I spent more time going from conference room to conference room setting up and tearing down my workstations, than getting productive work done. The reason behind the struggle was that I lacked the screen real estate I'd come to rely on in my home office and needed monitors for my laptop.We tried standalone monitors, but they took too much time to setup and lacked the portability to go from room to room. We tried USB monitors, but they required additional desk space that we didn't have. I felt there must be a better solution. So, in 2017, I went to work designing and building a prototype that would:
Allow me to have access to my monitors when and where I needed them
Include a removable mount that I could affix to my work laptop seamlessly - without causing any damage
Be compact and easy to travel with

Require zero additional work space, given the often crammed, shared desks at the client site
This is the origin of XebecGiven our shared entrepreneurial spirit and experience working on the go, I knew this was something my co-founder would also be excited about. After revealing the prototype to him, we determined that we were both compelled to solve this shared problem, and we decided to pursue it further. This initiated 18 months of market research, vendor outreach, engineering, design, and countless prototypes. By the end, we had upgraded 3D printers twice and upgraded our 3D modeling software three times. Finally, in 2019, we arrived at the Xebec that exists today.Over the past six months, we have tirelessly prepared for our first production run and we could not be more excited. In September of this year, I made the big leap: I left my job as a Product Manager to dedicate myself to Xebec full-time. Our tag line and motto at Xebec is "Free Yourself." Free Yourself from the confines of a single, small screen. Free Yourself from power outlets and bulky equipment. Free Yourself from the traditional "office" and work where you want.In this digital age, we are fortunate to have access to knowledge and information from virtually anywhere. Xebec was created to extend that freedom to your remote workstation. We are proud to introduce you to Xebec: your laptop's new favorite companion.      "Will my laptop work with Xebec?"Xebec works with almost ALL laptops. It requires both a power and a video feed to operate each screen. Your laptop's USB port will be used to power the Xebec with the supplied Micro-USB cable. Laptop video ports come in many different formats: HDMI, Displayport, Mini-Displayport, USB-C, VGA, Thunderbolt 3, and USB 3.0 (with HDMI adapter) are a few examples of video output port types. Although Xebec's native video input is HDMI, it is perfectly compatible with all of the above video formats when used with a simple HDMI adapter. Click this link to learn more about compatibility. "I don't know what USB 3.0 or USB-C or any of this means"Don't worry! All of this terminology can seem daunting at first but it's rather straight forward after breaking it down. Click this link (same as above) to learn about the differences between these ports. "Where can I get an HDMI adapter if I need one?"We will be offering high quality HMDI adapters as low cost add-ons when we gather your shipping info after the campaign. Through our 2 years of research and development we have worked with dozens of adapters and have a few recommendations. "Will Xebec work with my Microsoft Surface?"Yes! With the use of a simple external power bank Xebec can be used with the Microsoft Surface. The Mini Displayport will drive video to one screen and the USB 3.0 port will drive video to the other screen (using a simple USB to HDMI adapter). "Is Xebec compatible with Chromebook?"As long as your laptop has a USB output and a video output, it is compatible with Xebec!  "When will I get my Xebec?"All Xebec's are scheduled to ship by March. "What is the shipping cost?"Please see the "Shipping" section above for details Risks and challengesAlthough there are a number of risks associated with launching any new product, we are confident that we have carefully mitigated each risk. We have prior experience bringing products to market on Kickstarter and the strong manufacturing relationships that come along with that. Between this experience and a strong complementary team of engineers and business strategists we are confident that we will deliver what we promised. Of course, if anything does happen along the way we will notify you immediately.

story:
It's my pleasure to meet you! 

My name is Maria Angelica Martinez. Everyone calls me Angel. I was born and raised in the Philippines. At the age of 15, I left the Philippines to pursue International Baccalaureate at the United World College (UWC) of Costa Rica with the help of UWC scholarship.  

KINDNESS created opportunities for me start a new life abroad and meet people who I hold very dear in my heart everyday.

Studying along with 120 scholars from 90 different countries has humbled me and taught me the value of life, friendship, self worth, and hardwork. UWC inspires me everyday to achieve healing, meet people who empower me to survive each challenge, and serve those I can reach out to. I OWE my success to YOUR kindness and to everyone's kindness. 

The UWC and the Davis Foundation paved the opportunities for me to obtain a fully funded scholarship at Colorado College (CC) to pursue Economics. During my junior year, they funded my studies at the London School of Economics for a year. More specifically, through UWC, CC, and the Davis Foundation I met people from all walks of life who taught me the rewards of kindness: it saves and changes lives like mine by being surrounded by those who sincerely believe that you are a BEAUTIFUL person.

While studying at Colorado College, I worked for 6 jobs to pay for other school and (mainly) medical expenses. After my junior year in college, I was diagnosed with Fibromyalgia (along with depression), Sciatica, and Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS). Also, the orthopedic surgeon told me my bones are degenerating so fast my X-rays show I have a 50-year old body. After the rheumatologist diagnosed me with fibromyalgia, he has tried put me on different treatments. Unfortunately, none has been working so far. I have tried all the possible types of medications and I still experience varying degrees of flare ups everyday. Physical therapy greatly helped me walk again and generate a little more energy. Eventually, I had to stop because the expenses and costs were piling up.

The things I used to do everyday became unbearable in my junior year until today. To describe some my flare ups, here are some descriptions: 

  • Eating gives me very painful stomach and back cramps so there are consecutive days when I couldn't eat or when I hardly drink water.
  • Laughing, crying, and simply socializing (talking to people) lead to painful flare ups that kept me at bed for days. I usually have these episodes of tremors (shaking) and restlessness (even while talking) that lead to extremely painful flare ups and missing a day or two of work/school.
  • Showering feels like my skin is burning and being punched for every drop of water that touched my skin. 
  • Wearing clothes is very painful and unbearable.
  • Sleeping/standing up/sitting down are all very painful so resting or sleeping is often impossible.
  • Doing well in school and at work is a struggle because of very frequent fibro fogs and flare ups.
  • Driving has become very dangerous because my eyesight becomes extremely blurred/disappears at random times and fibro fog makes me disoriented while driving . Fibromyalgia has caused my blurred and double visions, extreme light sensitivity, shift of focus problems, eye pain when I move my eyes, dizziness, and flashing lights. 
  • Most often, after waking up I instantly feel extremely painful chest pains that make it excruciatingly painful to breathe, move, swallow, cough, sneeze, or simply to talk to ask for help.

Even though it has been extremely difficult to get through these challenges, the support I have been receiving has strengthened me to carry on.

IMPORTANCE OF MY CAMPAIGN

My big ideas are to improve my health conditions so I can continue working effectively, maintaining my working visa status in the US, and settling down to start a new life. Eventually, when I am more financially stable, I can start helping other people on a larger scale. 

I will need to raise US$ 3,000. This will help my campaign to: 

  • Raise funds for my medical expenses (specifically for my fibromyalgia treatments)  such as for my: current medical bills, physical therapies, pain management, and check-ups. Your help and support will further improve my conditions and strengthen my physical, psychological, and emotional health. As a result, I could continue working to the best of my abilities, capacity, and aptitude.

THANK YOU FOR HELPING ME BE A STEP CLOSER TO MY GOALS!

I believe that kindness is a choice we make everyday: it can be simply a smile or a gesture that acknowledges the other person's existence, the time you give to listen to other people, or your sincerity towards other people. Kindness is BEAUTIFUL. While I sincerely do everything I can to help other people feel appreciated everyday, I still want to help others on a larger scale someday--like what has been done to help me get to where I am. 

Your help is already making my dream a REALITY: giving back and making a difference to the lives of people through KINDNESS. After settling down and saving up, I want to continue devoting my life to help other people in need through giving them opportunities to study and achieve life goals.

THANK YOU VERY MUCH. YOUR FUNDING IS IN FOR A LIFETIME!

This fundraising project is very important for me because it already empowers me to carry on with my dreams in spite of the challenges I have been facing. Also, this project strengthens my hopes to achieve my highest potentials because it will help me become more physically, mentally, and emotionally prepared for everyday life (especially work). Eventually, I will be more able to help other people in need. :)

Thank you very much for taking time to read this. Your time is already an invaluable form of support. Please feel free to contact me for any clarifications and for any way that would help this project be a success. 

PERKS! SINCERELY JUST FOR YOU!

  • For any amount or form of support, you will receive a PERSONALIZED THANK YOU card full of gratitude and love
  • For any amount or form of support, I will update you occasionally on my whereabouts and my progress towards achieving my goals through personalized video messages, letters, or a blog

For any form of help or support, your kindness will be very much appreciated and will be more than helpful to get me through my current journey. 

THANK YOU VERY MUCH AGAIN FOR YOUR HELP!

Thank you for spreading the word. Any form of help is highly and sincerely appreciated. The time you spent to read my story already made a great difference. Your kindness is already in for a lifetime. Thank you.

story:
The Screw Holder is a transparent rubber sleeve that slides onto screwdrivers to hold a variety of screw sizes to the end of a screwdriver. You will never drop a screw again!

Photos of Production Pieces

The ribbed head interior keeps screws straight while the interior taper adjusts for a wide variety of screw head sizes.

The ribbed shaft interior was designed to have constant contact with the drivers shank, the 4 points of contact allow for a wider range of shank diameters. It also reduces friction while sliding the Holder up or down the shank.

The solution to always having your Screw Holder handy is to easily store one on every screwdriver in your set and simply slide it into position when you need to use it.

How it works

Usage is simple. Take your screwdriver and slide the sleeve onto the end of the shank. The interior is tapered, so simply adjust the depth to fit the screw head size. Next, insert the screw head into the Holder.

Due to the interior taper, it is an easy adjustment for larger screws too.  Slide the sleeve back on the shank of the screwdriver and insert the larger screw.  Slide the Holder about three-fourths of the way onto the shank.  The slits in the Holder accommodate a wide variety of screw head sizes. You will note that there are ridges in the material of the Holder to keep the screws from shaking out.

We have produced the Screw Holders in two sizes. We have measured every screwdriver that we could find and we found that with these two sizes of Screw Holders we are able to fit the widest range of common screwdrivers and screws.

The above diagram details out which shank diameters will work with which size Screw Holder. The four internal linear ribs were designed to make contact with different shank shapes so it easily works with hex and slot drivers.

These are the sizes and shapes that we can confidently say work the best when we tested the Screw Holder. This range covers nearly all standard size screws found in the household or construction site.

Testing our Screw Holder on a Class 10 off-road buggy with our custom made dashboard hula girl. 


Versatility

With the Screw Holder the versatility is a great feature whether you are working with stainless steel screws on your boat, assembling inexpensive furniture with non-magnetic screws, or working on your computer.  The Screw Holder is your partner to make these processes run as smoothly as possible.

We are very proud to be producing the Screw Holder in the USA using recycled materials. The manufacturer we are working with did a great job on our first production run of Screw Holders. 

For our domestic buyers shipping is included.  For international we are only able to offer shipping for our $22 & $40 reward tiers. Thank you for your understanding and we appreciate your interest in our project.


Why Raise More funds?

We are currently producing the Screw Holders and are attempting to expand our mold and production capabilities in order to keep up with demand, as well as create more brand awareness. Our product works awesomely! We just need more people to know about it.

Screw Holder by Tri Comma is on

Facebook - YouTube

About Me 

Hi, I'm Phillip Kauffman, a Southern California based designer and innovator. I grew up working with my dad in his custom cabinet shop where I developed my love for working with my hands. Then, during college, I started my own business airbrushing custom cars, motorcycles, and sailboats. I did that for six years while finishing my degree. I worked designing movie posters and television campaigns for five years and now I oversee the creative team for Makita Power Tools as well as working on Screw Holder.

I designed the Screw Holder to eliminate my frustration with screws falling off the end of my screwdriver when I'm assembling something new or fixing something that has broken. My ultimate goal is to always streamline my process. With the Screw Holder I have made my life easier and now it can help you too.

About the Team

Brett Kauffman - Brett is working on finishing his Mechanical Engineering degree at Cal Poly Pomona while working at Cal Tech building machines for them. He has refined my design and developed all 7 of our prototypes with his expert lathe work. Could not have gotten this far without him!

Dan Ucko - Dan is a social media guru, his in-depth knowledge of all things trending will help lead our campaign's Twitter and Facebook pages.

Daniela Kauffman - My wonderful wife, Daniela, is extremely detail oriented and will be running our accounting and fielding customer service inquiries when we reach that point.

Eddie Chai - Eddie is an extremely talented videographer and designer working with him on our video was an absolute pleasure.  I would highly recommend him! His website is Saltytiers.com

Jason Gearlds - My lawyer extraordinaire. Jason is a huge part of my team advising me on all things legal pertaining to business and trademarks. Wouldn't have been able to do it without him.

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone!

My name is Gabriel Nwokedi. I am a junior at Strake Jesuit College Prep. Business has always been a passion of mine and just recently I chose to act on it. I released an online marketing application for students called BTSU (short for Buy, Trade, Sell University). Here, users can buy, trade, sell, and bid on items/jobs safely and anonymously. Why did I create this? I created BTSU to leave a positive mark on my community. I want to show them that anyone can make it if they truly believe they can. Simply put: I want to inspire them. You could play a huge role by contributing to my project. The donations received will go towards fixing the app (bugs and errors) and making BTSU more appealing. This will increase its popularity, and help me get my message out.

What We Need & What You Get

Currently, I am hoping to raise $1000 for BTSU. The majority of this will go towards my developer. He will fix the bugs, look, and errors on BTSU. The rest will be split 50/50 on design and advertisements. To help fix the look and feel of BTSU, I will need to add custom artwork and layout. The money for advertising will go towards a charity event I plan to host at my school. I plan to use this percentage for arm bands and shirts. If I have excess money I will donate the rest to Turning Point Center. This is a nonprofit organization that helps people in need turn their life around for the better.

By donating, you can help many more than myself. You would be helping myself, my community, and nonprofit organizations. Whether it is $1 or $100, you will be helping many people.

The Impact

BTSU is very valuable to me and, with your help, can be very valuable to the world. With a kind donation, you could help kickstart the sole proprietorship that gives back to the community. You could be the one that helps not only me, but many others achieve their goals.

Other Ways You Can Help

Donations aren't the only way to help us. A great way to help would be to pass the idea of BTSU along to a friend! Indiegogo makes this easier with their share tools!

Whether you donated or not, I would like to thank you for your time. My goal was to get BTSU known. You reading this did just that.

Best regards,

Gabriel Nwokedi

story:
Hi everyone - thanks for stopping by.

Let me tell you about a project I am very passionate about.

My name is David Webster, and I've spent around 25 years developing interactive training software, interactive encylopedias, writing books, starting my own company, and creating the KnowledgePresenter and KP Learner Manager software products.

Over the last two years, I've been working hard on a product called AppCobra. This software is designed to allow anyone to create mobile and HTML5 apps, without programming.

You may have seen some other 'app creation' tools. But you have probably not seen AppCobra. This is a completely different beast.

AppCobra is not a stopgap tool. It is not a tool for creating 'soft-of' apps. It allows you to create apps that take advantage of all HTML5 and mobile features. It allows you to create apps that previously could only be done with specific platform software developer kits, and a lot of programming.

And you can create apps for any HTML or mobile platform.

If you want to see some examples, have a look at these demos. Or, have a look at this document.

You will be amazed at what can be achieved. There is no room to detail all the features here - but stop by http://www.appcobra.com for more detail.

The Next Step

We want to expand AppCobra in two major areas.

First, we want to create a social media based online app site – which we are currently called The AppCobra Cloud. This will provide a forum where any AppCobra developer can post their apps - share their apps - distribute their apps, and sell their apps. A place where people can show off their skills. Where students, developers and corporations can reach out to and show the world what they've done, and what they have available.

A place where you can share your app with friends. Or share with the world. Students can show off to their class, and teachers can comment on student apps.

Because AppCobra creates apps for all platforms (iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, etc.), and can essentially create device independent apps, this site will not be tied to any particular platform, but optimized for all. A single app can be made available on multiple platforms.

This is a place where users can search for apps via keywords, categories, companies, platform, users, or any one of a range of other criteria.

These users may run, purchase and/or download apps, leave comments, ratings, scores, and more.

Developers will be able to upload apps to their AppCobra Cloud account in one step, directly from AppCobra. And their app can be deployed, or updated, instantly. No waiting for someone to review it. Or reject it.

And we want to make this even better by creating a system whereby people can make money from their apps.

In the education arena, this will particularly useful - teachers can check user homework - in the form of apps - make comments, add and edit scores, and make suggestions.

Like most social media platforms, this platform will include the ability to have friends, associates, classmates, followers, and more.

Developers can use the AppCobra Cloud to share or sell code or projects, ask questions, get and give advice, and generally communicate with each other about their apps.

We also recognise that people may want native apps in the various App stores - so, secondly, we would also like to make this a one click process – and a fee would apply for this process.

Currently, within AppCobra, we already have the ability to be able to upload, in a single operation, your app to our server, and invite someone to view it, or download it to your device. It acts as a kind of proof of concept that is already working, and can be tested with a trial download of AppCobra.

Additionally, our experience with KP Learner Manager Enterprise, our Learning Management System, has given us the expertise to allow us to be able to track all online usage and permissions for apps.

AppCobra Online

At the moment, there are a number of tools that allows simple Apps to be created using online tools. These may be simple to use, but essentially create little more than phone or tablet sized websites, with few if any taking true advantage of devices and HTML5. This is due in part to the limitations of online tools – development is slower, and many features found in desktop tools can simply not be used, plus what I perceive as a rush to get to market.

We can and will make a version of AppCobra online. I have experience in developing the technology (of course, AppCobra itself), and have created several online tools before (KP Learner Manager Enterprise, and KnowledgePresenter Q, our online quiz/survey/poll creator software – as seen at quizzes.knowledgepresenter.com).

Files will be able to be transferred to and from the online, and local versions of AppCobra. No other tools to our knowledge will have such a feature. The online tool will, at least initially, serve the simple side of the market – very template driven, not a lot of customization features, as most of the other tools are like – but of course the ability to take to content offline and really create immersive web apps.

This will also increase our market penetration into tablets themselves, rather than just developing on desktops. So a client can actually create apps on their iPad, or Windows Tablet, or other mobile device.

On past experience, and with the technology we have already created, we expect that this tool can be achieved within six months.

What we Need

Our funding goal is $50,000. This will allow us to hire the staff and dedicate the time to make this ground breaking project a reality. Ideally, of course, the more we raise, the quicker and more thoroughly we can turn this project around.

Why Help Us?

We think it is important to democratize the App industry. It is dominated by a few large players - and currently, for many people, especially in education, is just too difficult to bother creating their apps. We want to change this.

It is a glib statement - this could change the world. But I believe this could have a major impact. And with your help, we can do this.

We most certainly have the potential to allow students everywhere to participate in app building and distribution.

I, and Kookaburra Studios, have been around for 13 years now. We have a successful track record in creating the best products in their area.

We are a very small company, but we've already proved that we can create products that are better than those produced by anyone, anywhere.

We'd really appreciate your help.

Please stop by http://www.knowledgepresenter.com, or http://www.appcobra.com to see a little more about us and our products.

Hi everyone - thanks for stopping by.
Let me tell you about a project I am very passionate about.
My name is David Webster, and I've spent around 25 years developing interactive training software, interactive encylopedias, writing books, starting my own company, and creating the KnowledgePresenter and KP Learner Manager software products.
Over the last two years, I've been working hard on a product called AppCobra. This software is designed to allow anyone to create mobile and HTML5 apps, without programming.
You may have seen some other 'app creation' tools. But you have probably not seen AppCobra. This is a completely different beast.
AppCobra is not a stopgap tool. It is not a tool for creating 'soft-of' apps. It allows you to create apps that take advantage of all HTML5 and mobile features. It allows you to create apps that previously could only be done with specific platform software developer kits, and a lot of programming.
And you can create apps for any HTML or mobile platform.
If you want to see some examples, have a look at these demos. Or, have a look at this document.
You will be amazed at what can be achieved. There is no room to detail all the features here - but stop by http://www.appcobra.com for more detail.

story:
Before we get into the nuts and bolts of it all, here’s the eagle-eye view of our campaign:

1. The product we’ve created is the Hip Money app. 
2. The sole purpose of our app is to help you save smarter and pay off loans faster, without having to change your spending habits or your bank accounts. We estimate our average user will see $132 in interest savings per year.
3. The bigger goal is to enable everyone to be smarter with their finances and force the banks to care more about people than profit, and prove that there’s a better way to do things than just accept the status quo. We also call this the Fingers Up Movement. 

And we believe all of this is possible – with a single app and, of course, a whole lot of people. 

Keep reading for the juicy details. 

The Hip Money team is building an app that we believe will become the go-to financial app for pretty much everyone who uses money. This app will help you pay back loans faster, reach your savings goals more wisely and efficiently, and ultimately save you thousands of dollars. Best part is, the Hip Money app watches your spending habits and creates realistic daily savings suggestions that are appropriate for you. So even if you think you don’t have the funds to save, you do.

Here's a little glimpse into the app and what it can do: 



But exactly how does the Hip Money app work? Easy. Just do this:

Get Hip. 
Install Hip Money directly to your iOS or android phone, then securely link it  to your checking, savings, banking, credit and/or loan accounts so Hip Money can understand your spending habits.

Set some goals, playa. 
Establish why you’re saving and/or what you’re paying off – maybe you want to pay back a student loan quicker, or save for a down payment on a house, or go on a trip to Cabo or Provo, Utah. Doesn’t matter. All goals are good goals. 

Show yourself the money. 
Ping! Hip Money pings you once a day (or less if you like) to provide you a personalized daily savings recommendation. Based on your money coming in and going out, Hip Money will tell you what you could/should save that day. All you have to do is determine if that amount is low, high or just right. Then choose where you want to put your daily savings to work. (Notice how you can also see the added savings calculation or potential interest savings projection for each goal?) 

Swipe it like it’s hot. 
Now comes our favorite part. And this is very important. This is where you hold all the power. When you’re ready to make that move to save for your future, all you have to do is raise your finger with pride, touch it to the screen, and simply swipe to the right to save.  

It's that easy. With a single finger, you can save yourself thousands of dollars over time. ... Did you just get chills? Cause we just got chills.

Feel like the balla you are. 
In less than two minutes a day, with a simple swipe to the right, you have just changed your financial future for the better, forever. Which means you get to feel good about yourself every day. And who doesn’t like that?

If you're still not sure how Hip Money works, or if you just really hate reading copy, here's a demo of the app. Narrated by Hip Money's very own Mark Zmarzly. 


Here's the best way we can put this: 

We created the Hip Money app because we were inspired to help people save and pay back loans smarter. We created the Fingers Up Movement because the problem is bigger than you think. 

Banks have a system in place that has worked for them for centuries. It makes them lots of money, but it’s at the expense of the customer. 

For years, we watched friends and family members waste money on interest when we knew they could pay off loans faster and more efficiently. And that was frustrating. So we came up with the Hip Money app. (You may have heard of it.)

To say the least, we were pretty excited about the idea of helping people, so we reached out to banks and lenders to help us take this app directly to their customers. ... Long story short: they weren't interested. To paraphrase: "helping people be smarter about saving or prepaying loans would impact our bottom line." 

Whelp, that fueled our fire. We knew then and there that things needed to change. The financial system's mindset needed to shift from short-term profit to long-term customer benefits. And fast. 

So, that led us to the Fingers Up Movement. 

Our goal now was to create a movement of people that forces our country’s banks and financial systems to rethink the way they do business - a movement that would force change with a single app and a million FU fingers.

What we’re asking of you is to not only help us get the Hip Money app out into the world, but also share this bigger message. Get others to join the movement. Change the system. Take back control. The more people, the better. 

It’s powerful to think that, with a simple swipe of a finger, you can make a huge impact on your immediate and long-term future. But think about this: what would happen if everyone starting swiping to the right? When a million people do something, there’s no way it can go unnoticed. A gust of wind can create a ripple, but a windstorm can create some serious waves. And we want to create some serious waves.

Well, first and foremost, using the Hip Money app could help you save thousands of dollars. (Did we mention that? Pretty sure we mentioned that.) But more immediately, your contributions can earn you some pretty cool stuff, including helping us in the beta testing, getting access to the app before anyone else, and becoming the proud new owner of a shirt some people are calling the new Pablo Picasso:

More of a drinker instead of a shirt wearer? Then we got you covered, too, with 16oz Glass T-Rex Cans or Hip Mugs:

Plus, you’ll be part of the Fingers Up Movement, which will (hopefully) continue to grow. And that means you can say you were instrumental in making a difference regarding this very important, and often overlooked problem in our society.

We’re kind of at a unique point in the fundraising process, as we’ve already begun building the app and have demoed it across the country, funding it all ourselves. 

In fact, we’ve even won some awards:

  • Runner Up - Chase Bank Sponsored FinCon Startup Challenge 
  • Top 3 Most Promising Startups - Startup Voodoo 
  • Winner - Pipeline Pitch of the Year 2016 
  • Prototype Grant Award - Department of Economic Development 
  • Top 6 Global Finalist - Sony FinTech Innovation Challenge 

So we know that people want the app; they see what it can really do. And that’s awesome for us. But we have more to do, and we need your help.

We said early on that one of our campaign goals is to work directly with you – our earliest users – to build a kickass app that will help get you where you want to go financially, as well as make you happy. 

By reaching out to the crowdfunding community, we hope to find a core group of our ideal users who have a collaborative spirit and who will give us direct feedback to improve the app as it grows. 

On top of that ... 

Raising our $15,000 goal will help us offset some of the initial integration and ongoing costs to move money from your checking account to your savings or loan. 

Yeah, that costs money. Go figure. Now, we could just launch the app and pass the transfer costs on to the user, but that’s not really our style. So we’d rather get a core group of users to join the campaign, so we can work toward integrating with the payments partner that makes the most sense and has the lowest long-term costs for our users.

Last, but most certainly not least: why the hell are we doing all of this? 

It’s pretty plain and simple. We want to help people.

Before there was Hip Money, there were dozens and dozens of interviews with people ages 22-36 about how they currently use money. They shared with us pitfalls in today’s current banking system, gaps in existing technology, good and bad stories about money, and on and on. It was basically 60% customer problem discovery and 40% therapy session (as people don’t often get the chance to talk about what scares them about money, or what they want to see happen with their financial futures). From there, we looked for common themes and one truism rang out: 

"How can I get a better financial future without a lot of time, information, or having to sacrifice the things I like to do like go out with my friends?"

So that was where the core goal of Hip Money was born. From there, the Hip Money team really got the ball rolling. We set out to create an app that we believe will help make people’s futures better, without disrupting their present-day routines.

A lot of people make up our team, but here's the core group.

This is Mark. He has worked in banking for more than 10 years now. He's pretty much a financial wizard.

This is Ed. He’s got more than 20 years of technology experience under his belt. And he likes headphones. Obviously.

This is Jude. He's Mark’s oldest son. Dressed up as Mark. He’s currently an online-video sensation.

There you have it. Our app, our movement, our motivation and our goals. And now we need your finger to make it all happen. (Yes, we know how that sounds.) 

So please support our campaign and please share it with your friends, family, neighbors, acquaintances, enemies, doctors, mailman (or woman), whoever. The more people who join, the more everyone benefits.

story:
Now INSTANT has to be MOBILE. Family is always important. Technology has brought family and friends together over the years. Millions transfer money back home to support their families. Some transfers take days while others require a bank account for the recipient. 56%  (2.5 billion out of 4.7 billion) of the world adult population DO NOT have bank accounts whereas more than 90% own and use a mobile phone.  Then, we thought it was time to deliver money across continents just as SMS is delivered. Swift and instant.

Now, INSTANT has to be INDEPENDENT also. Even when people receive money, they have to visit the bank or a financial service agent in order to get cash, having to DEPEND on banks/agents operating hours and terms. Thus, our technology is being built to eliminate this, bringing about INDEPENDENCE.

WE PRESENT THE FIRST TECHNOLOGY THAT ELIMINATES A MIDDLE-MAN BETWEEN THE SENDERS AND THEIR RECIPIENTS FOR INTERNATIONAL TRANSFERS!

We are passionate about this mobile-based technology, hence we began development of our platform using personal funds. We, like our friends and millions of others who support families abroad cannot wait to financially include families and friends who do not wish to engage in the rigors of banking and its paperwork. 

We need your help via contributions to fully develop this technology and make it available to users around the world. With your help, families and friends can save transfer costs, have access to savings over exchange rates, avoid the bureaucratic process of banks, instantly cater to emergencies and be financially included.


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We need a total  of $292,000 to fully complete our platform, pay legal and professional fees, pay for State licenses and Federal registrations, lease office, hire staff and pay for advertisement and marketing in order to kick off the initial phase of operations. We also made provision for the maximum Indiegogo 9% fee.

The initial phase of operations includes providing services from three USA States to one 'pilot' country in Asia and another in Africa.


What You Get!

We are very glad that you have taken your time to consider contributing to our campaign.

Our new idea has given us the opportunity to meet with various people from different cultures and they are very excited to share things they value with us and with YOU!

We have a lot of beautiful cultural fashion and home accessories you would love. Thus, you can also contribute to us by picking any of your desired perks when you click the "CONTRIBUTE NOW" button.


WHAT IF OUR ENTIRE GOAL IS NOT REACHED?
We certainly look forward to reaching our campaign goal but if we do not, we would have been empowered to cater to some parts of the project right away. We have placed priority on our platform development which we already started financing with our personal funds.
Not meeting our set goal amount will not stop the project from progressing, but it will surely delay the time we would be able to roll out the services. With time, we will still be able to make the technology and its services available to all who need it.
To our contributors, we will remain grateful and keep you informed of our progress while also delivering every perk picked.


PROJECT TIMELINE


The Impact of our Technology

Majority of the time, people transfer money to families and friends because there is an immediate need to cater to domestic bills and survival. Hence, the sender who is also making sacrifices to release a part of what he/she earns would be greatly encouraged with lower transfer fees and exchange rates while receiving money instantly for their urgent needs is most favorable to the recipients. Both parties would be very happy to maximize the amount transferred rather than lose it to institutions.

One of the most important parts of our technology is the 'Time To Deliver'. A recipient can receive money when banks have closed and be able to make use of it for their needs which may be very critical. IT'S LIKE HANDING CASH OVER TO SOME ONE NEXT TO YOU!


Risks & Challenges

Certainly, every innovation faces some level of risk. Some of the high-level risks we face are financial fraud activities, money laundering and stiff competition from existing money transfer giants. In mitigating against financial fraud, our platform will not be accepting credit cards, thus customers will only either purchase our branded 'one-time loadable' cards using any value of their choice (not a predefined prepaid value) or load their account using a debit card to ensure that transaction is performed by the owner, in addition to phone and address verification. Our technology is focused on maximizing the amount received by the recipient, eliminating banking rigors and ensuring they have access to the funds at anytime of the day/night, hence we have transfer limits per transaction, per day, per month and per year and we do not allow huge fund transfers.  After all, family support is not meant to involve huge transfers.
Existing competitors will try to stop us from taking their market share, but because our technology requires less manpower for transfer processes, we will always have less overhead, thus keeping transfer costs lower than market rate for users. For them, they have to consider the manpower involved in the chain hence having to keep the rates high enough to pay up.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you may be willing to support us but probably unable to do so financially. We appreciate you. You can also contribute to our course by clicking on Our Facebook page, like us and share our page with your friends.
story_txt:
Now INSTANT has to be MOBILE. Family is always important. Technology has brought
family and friends together over the years. Millions transfer money back home to
support their families. Some transfers take days while others require a bank
account for the recipient. 56%  (2.5 billion out of 4.7 billion) of the world adult population DO NOT have bank accounts whereas more than 90% own and use a mobile
phone.  Then, we thought it was time to deliver money across continents
just as SMS is delivered. Swift and instant.Now,
INSTANT has to be INDEPENDENT also. Even when people receive money, they have to
visit the bank or a financial service agent in order to get cash, having to DEPEND on
banks/agents operating hours and terms. Thus, our technology is being built to eliminate this,
bringing about INDEPENDENCE. 
WE
PRESENT THE FIRST TECHNOLOGY THAT ELIMINATES A MIDDLE-MAN BETWEEN THE SENDERS
AND THEIR RECIPIENTS FOR INTERNATIONAL TRANSFERS!

story:
Would you like to help Peterborough and Fenland go Green this year?

The Green Party has launched a fundraiser for £5,000 to go towards the cost of an election campaign in Peterborough and Fenland next year in 2015.

There’s everything to play for with both the Local and General elections. Using the high profile MP Candidates as a springboard the Green Party has an opportunity to elect its first Green Councillors.

The Green Party has been a powerful voice in the Peterborough and Fenland and we need to continue our work across environmental & social policies.

This is your chance to help us reach Hundreds of Thousands of people across Peterborough and Fenland  in one go so please go Green today and give Peterborough and Fenland the chance of a better future.

contact peterboroughgreenparty@gmail.com for more information

YOU CAN ALSO PAY BY CHEQUE WHICH WILL BE ADDED TO THE TOTAL

Payable to 'PETERBOROUGH AND FENLAND GREEN PARTY 

Address: Video Appeal, Treasurer, Peterborough and Fenland Green Party, 15, Kings Gardens, Peterborough, Cambridgeshire, PE1 4EN.

story:
How will these cards help You?

Are you...

...a product creator?

  • Quickly generate a wide range of creative solutions for any difficult problem, creating a large pool of innovative ideas
  • Naturally attract more profit by predicting new solutions to problems customers don’t yet know they have

...an entrepreneur?

  • Identify the answer to the age old question, “Which idea should I invest my time in?” (so you know which will bring you what you want, the fastest)

...a team manager, facilitator or a coach?

  • Facilitate team discussion, using the Innovation Deck to trigger new ideas and help your team to find new solutions

...an engineer?

  • Solve tough technical problems that seemed impossible to work out before
  • Pick the most optimal solution quickly and easily, saving time and effort of going through unnecessary design loops

...an inventor?

  • Use it as a check-list for your new ideas
  • Think up new inventions or even the Next Big Thing, before others get there

...a creative soul?

  • Turbo-boost your creativity and rapidly improve your Problem Solving, creative and critical thinking skills


What is the Innovation Deck?

Innovation Deck is a new deck of brainstorming cards for product creators and entrepreneurs. It provides an effective “brain hack” that helps rapidly re-focus on the customer, identify product improvement opportunities and generate ideas.

The Innovation Deck is strategically designed to improve your critical and creative thinking and help you focus on the most crucial product features. As a result, you will be creating better products in shorter time.You’ll get: 

  • 4 Instructional Cards
  • 23 «EXAMINE» cards
  • 23 «EXPLORE» cards
  • 4 «EVALUATE» cards

Each proven technique and question is uniquely formulated to trigger a wealth of responses from your subconscious mind, allowing you to shed light on hidden areas for product improvement (a.k.a. problems).


New innovations begin with the CARDS…

Whenever you are looking to create new invention, developing new solution, or just planning to improve the existing product:

Use the Innovation Deck to create a breakthrough in just 3 simple steps.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 1. Take out twenty-three “EXAMINE” cards to examine the problem.

When you are looking for better solutions, you probably ask questions like…

“How to invent something that market will appreciate? What new product ideas would the customer like? What features should I add to my product? What features should I remove?”

“EXAMINE” cards are strategically designed  to Deep Dive into the problem and laser-in on the most beneficial answers to these vital questions.

Example: 5 random cards (you are getting 23 "EXAMINE" cards in the deck).


What you will be able to do:

  • Quickly and efficiently laser-in on the most profitable, helpful, and desirable features you should include in your product 

  • Identify crucial improvement opportunities for your new product

  • Run small but effective “mini design reviews”, making sure that your product development project stays on track at all times

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 2. Now use twenty-three “EXPLORE” cards to explore the wide range of options.

As the greats have all said, “Want a better answer? Ask a better question…”

“EXPLORE” cards give you the best and latest brainstorming techniques that have been proven to work in the most challenging industries, combined with the always reliable tools from the Theory of Inventive Problem-Solving (TRIZ).

Example: 5 random cards (you are getting 23 "EXPLORE" cards in the deck).


What you will be able to do:

  • Quickly generate a wide range of creative solutions for any difficult technical problem, creating a large pool of innovative ideas

  • Get unstuck FAST by transforming your “mental state” so it elegantly solves the most challenging technical problems with ease

  • Allow yourself to take a deep breath and relax, because you’ll realize that you already possess the most innovative solution — you just need the right questions to allow those solutions to surface

  • Transform dull, painful meetings from “ZZZzzzzzzz” to FUN!* Use this deck as a game: spread the cards on the table, face down. Turn over one random card, discuss it with the team and see how novel ideas come to mind

*Most studies on gamification found a positive effect from the use of game thinking and game mechanics to engage users in solving problems.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 3. Apply four “EVALUATE” cards to evaluate the ideas and pick the most promising one.

You’ve EXAMINED and ferreted out all the potential problems.

You’ve EXPLORED and delivered the widest array of saleable solutions.

Now it’s time to EVALUATE.

So now it's time to answer the crucial question:

“Which idea should I invest my time, money and team resources in?”

“EVALUATE” cards help you to see a bigger picture. The chosen techniques also help your subconscious mind naturally review your wide array of solutions, and choose the optimal one.

Example: 2 random cards (you are getting 4 "EVALUATE" cards in the deck).


What you will be able to do:

  • Laser-in to quickly and easily identify the most optimal, profitable solution, so you save money, energy and resources — by minimizing unnecessary design loops and saving TIME

  • Stop in-fighting and power games that result in poor solution choice — because the rules of the game is clear, and the most innovative and winning idea naturally arises!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why should You invest in my idea?

It is frighteningly challenging to create new inventions and products.

Less than 1% of awarded patents actually find their way to realization in the form of new products. And that’s not all: according to the U.S. Department of Commerce, for those products that get through the hurdles of development and manufacturing, and are launched to the market, over 90 percent will fail in the first four years.

At the same time, there are several products on Kickstarter and IndieGoGo that managed to raise over $1’000’000 in just a couple of months.

Why is it so difficult to create commercially viable products? And why some products succeed while others fail? I believe our brains are to blame.

Our brains are built up in such a way that we delete most of the information that comes our way. We’re deletion machines. For example, if right now you are focused on reading this page, you are likely to delete most of the information around you. You might not notice how warm your feet may feel, or the noise of the computer fan, until I mention it.

Similar thing happens when we develop products: once we get a product idea that we believe in, we focus on it. And as we put our idea into the spotlight, we tend to delete everything else.

We are so laser-focused on developing our solution, we ignore the inputs from the market, large part of the alternative solutions, and whether there is a better way to add value to the customer.

Those who are able to control their focus, create products that sell.

Unfortunately, controlling our focus is not always easy.

We've all been guilty of jumping right into solution design, rather than seeing whole picture and considering the variety of options.

I grew a bit frustrated seeing us innovators buried in details at the very beginning of the concept stage, where “big picture” thinking and open-mindedness matters more. People going in circles, coming up with very similar solutions and not seeing the way out. Companies that spend months and years (and millions of dollars) developing a new product nobody wants.

So I sought out a solution — brainstorming cards that help you to re-focus on the customer, quickly identify improvement opportunities and generate a wide variety of solutions when it matters most. Solution that is fast to use and brings instant results.

And the Innovation Desk was born.


Who am I?

My name is Andrey Schukin. Like you, I am passionate about product innovation and creative problem-solving, which drive me to consistently keep my eyes open for new, more efficient ways to create better products.

I am an author of several patents and have been invited as a guest speaker for courses in Problem Solving and Innovation Management at the leading universities in Switzerland and Hong Kong.

Before I created the Innovation Deck, I was a multi-stage product development manager for 12 years. I’ve personally plunged off the cliff into the muddied waters of market research, idea selection and proof, IP protection, engineering, manufacturing implementation, and product commercialisation—all while working with large international corporations as well as small start-ups in Sweden, UK and Switzerland, in a wide range of different industries: from power generation and offshore engineering to consumer electronics, telecom and medical devices.

I’ve obtained my MSc in Mechanical Engineering, then few years later another degree in Innovation, Creativity and Entrepreneurship, and spent a couple of years learning various languages (the next one going to be Chinese).  Early on I also became interested in psychology and mystery of the human language processing, spending years to pick out the best techniques that I applied in this product.

If you are interested to know more about me, please visit my blog at www.InnovationFast.com


Praise for the Innovation Deck

Want to know what some of the smartest minds, fast-paced innovators, and uncanny solution finders think about the Innovation Deck—after spending just a few minutes with it?

"I love this product and ready to buy it. Very correct step - to have something literally at hand!" -Nikolay Bogatyrev, inventor and expert in Biomimetics, www.biotriz.com

"The Innovation Deck is a good way to spark and organize discussion during project development." - Mark Melnykowisz, Artist - Scientist, Wearable Computing

"Interesting way to approach the project and forces people to stop for a minute and re-evaluate." - Carolyn Keane, Founder at Inventing Daily LLC, www.inventingdaily.com

"I think the idea is great... Young engineers will find it most useful" - Robert Ferreiro, Technical Guy at Ferreiro Consulting

"I like the set up. I have always enjoyed the idea of taking bit size chunks out of every problem while keeping an overall perspective on the end goals. I think this deck does a good job of that." -Claire Phillippi, Design Engineer, Best Metal Products

  "This is a great product that allows the team to stimulate ideas for product development easily. A very innovative way! Step by step guide makes it very user friendly." - Connie Lau, Project Manager, Nuclear Division, CCI AG, www.linkedin.com/in/connielau

  "Due to schedule constraints, we've all been guilty of jumping right into solution design, without considering all the options. A checklist (these cards) could definitely help" -  Aidan Foley, Senior Project Engineer, Aerospace/Defense

 "I thought it was a great idea and well put together and was thought-provoking during problem solving sessions." - Mauro Tomasi, Mechanical Designer. Sole Proprietor. 


Make the Innovation Deck YOURS with Branded Cards

Outshine your competition with the ultimate gift for your potential customers.

Get 30 branded decks, with your company’s logo and details, to position you at the top of your customers’ minds whenever they’re stumped.

As an added bonus, you will be able to place 50 words of text (or an image) on the back of the first card.


“How will I put the Innovation Deck to work for me?”

I keep mine on my desk, to provide a quick check-list that guarantees I understand the problem, can generate the widest array of saleable solutions, and easily identify the most profitable new product idea.

How you can foresee yourself using it, is up to you…

Whether you’re developing a product alone, stuck in a no-solution meeting, or working with a team of bull-headed competitors, here’s why you should always keep The Innovation Deck close at hand.

Here are just a few ways our colleagues benefited from using The Innovation Deck:

•  As a Dual-Brained Checklist: Go through the deck methodically, picking one card after another and spending a minute or two thinking about each question, allowing you to easily engage both your conscious and subconscious mind to solve your most challenging problems.

•  As a Split-Second Inspiration Generator: Pick a random card out of the deck. What does it say? Is it relevant to your product? Why? What could you do to improve things further? What else?

•  As a Zap to the Team Brain: Get together with your team. Spread the cards on the table, face down. Turn over one random card. Discuss how it is relevant to your product or problem? Why can you use this now? What’s the best way to apply the questions? See how many ideas you can trigger from a single card and you’ll instantly begin to see its value. Once the discussion is finished, the next team member turns over another random card.


What the Innovation Deck is NOT…

It’s Not Magical (although it might feel that way when you're generating new ideas on demand). It’s NOT a Golden Pill.

If you’re an entrepreneur, engineer, or innovator, you probably already know that to absorb the full benefits from the Innovation Deck you’ll absolutely need two things:

A)  Attention and a few minutes of your time to consider the questions on the cards, and

B)  A genuine wish to make your product better.

And if you let it just sit on your table, not much will happen.

Like everything worth doing, creating spell-binding products requires effort — the Innovation Deck simply eases your most common challenges, eliminates the mental blocks, and incites answers from your brain.


Quality

As a colleague, I know how much you value the quality of the products you create. That’s why I have searched long and hard to identify the best suppliers on planet Earth.

I have every assurance that no corners will be cut, ever, in the making of any card in your Innovation Deck, including printing it on the finest multi-layered card stock, with a resistant structured surface—so it retains its shape and durability through years of use. The cards will be delivered to your door in a handy transparent plastic box — to ensure that extra added measure of protection, and guarantee they will catch your eye, so you remember to take them out and generate that Next Big Idea, in seconds.


Schedule

The printing time is expected to take about two weeks and delivery to your door will take another two weeks. 

 If you order a PDF, we will aim to send it to you within one day.


You’re a Thinker. So you obviously have more questions…

Here are your answers.


This page is too long... Can you explain in three sentences how to invent something new?

Sure.

1. Ask questions from "Examine" cards to understand your customer, point out critical issues, and limit the area where you are going to search for solutions.

2. Apply techniques from "Explore" cards to generate a variety of different ideas that solve issues and customer pain that you discovered in Step 1.

3. Finally, use "Evaluate" cards to evaluate all the options you now have, and choose the most optimal solution.

Congratulations, your new product idea is created!

Why is the Innovation Deck a better alternative than “brainstorming” cards?

It is NOT your usual manual with a list of random brainstorming questions. It focuses specifically on product invention process, giving you the best and latest techniques that have been proven to create new inventions in the most challenging industries.

It also takes into account the way we humans process language and triggers your unconscious mind to generate solutions for you.

I’m an Entrepreneur. How can I use the Innovation Deck for non-physical products (software, services, etc.)?

As a forward thinking individual you will find many ways to use the majority of the cards right away, and the remaining cards as your project develops.  While the Innovation Deck originally had a physical product focus, many who deal in the abstract have touted its unbeatable benefits as well.

Why buy several decks?

Beyond the fact that you should take advantage of our offer to brand these, and anchor your business as “The Innovator” in the subconscious minds of your clients, you should buy several decks for your friends, your office, your teammates…

I believe, as a product creator, that every product creator should have one. Plus card decks are like toothbrushes – everybody will want to use his/her own.

How do I track the amount of referrals I made?

Remember, you’ll get your choice of $30 from your order OR one FREE Innovation Deck for every two of your referrals who support us (we’ll e-mail you to ask your choice after the campaign is finished). Here is how you track the number of your referrals:

1. Sign onto IndieGoGo.
2. Click on your user name beside the Search Box at the top right of the page.
3. Select “My Profile” option

4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of Referrals and Pledges that resulted from your sharing.

How can I boost my amount of referrals?

A few easy ideas that just require few seconds to do:

1. Post your personal link (log in and click the “Link” button below the video) to your personal LinkedIn, Facebook or any other social media.
2. Post or message to any relevant Forums, LinkedIn Groups or Twitter accounts, asking them to Share or Retweet.
3. If you or a friend runs a blog or writes, ask them to do a story and provide your personal URL.

4. Post to Reddit, BuzzFeed, StumbleUpon or similar sites with your link.



Thanks for looking! Interested? Choose your perk and order.
