the most optimal, profitable solution, so you save money, energy and
resources — by minimizing unnecessary design
loops and saving TIME 


Stop in-fighting and power games that result in poor solution choice — because the rules of the game is
clear, and the most innovative and winning idea naturally arises!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Why should You invest in my idea?It is frighteningly challenging to create new inventions and products.Less than 1% of awarded patents actually find their way to realization in the form of new products. And that’s not all: according to the U.S. Department of Commerce, for those products that get through the hurdles of development and manufacturing, and are launched to the market, over 90 percent will fail in the first four years.At the same time, there are several products on Kickstarter and IndieGoGo that managed to raise over $1’000’000 in just a couple of months.Why is it so difficult to create commercially viable products? And why some products succeed while others fail? I believe our brains are to blame.Our brains are built up in such a way that we delete most of the information that comes our way. We’re deletion machines. For example, if right now you are focused on reading this page, you are likely to delete most of the information around you. You might not notice how warm your feet may feel, or the noise of the computer fan, until I mention it.Similar thing happens when we develop products: once we get a product idea that we believe in, we focus on it. And as we put our idea into the spotlight, we tend to delete everything else.We are so laser-focused on developing our solution, we ignore the inputs from the market, large part of the alternative solutions, and whether there is a better way to add value to the customer.Those who are able to control their focus, create products that sell.Unfortunately, controlling our focus is not always easy.We've all been guilty of jumping right into solution design, rather than seeing whole picture and considering the variety of options.I grew a bit frustrated seeing us innovators buried in details at the very beginning of the concept stage, where “big picture” thinking and open-mindedness matters more. People going in circles, coming up with very similar solutions and not seeing the way out. Companies that spend months and years (and millions of dollars) developing a new product nobody wants.So I sought out a solution — brainstorming cards that help you to re-focus on the customer, quickly identify improvement opportunities and generate a wide variety of solutions when it matters most. Solution that is fast to use and brings instant results.And the Innovation Desk was born.
Who am I?My name is Andrey Schukin. Like you, I am passionate about product innovation and creative problem-solving, which drive me to consistently keep my eyes open for new, more efficient ways to create better products.I am an author of several patents and have been invited as a guest speaker for courses in Problem Solving and Innovation Management at the leading universities in Switzerland and Hong Kong.Before I created the Innovation Deck, I was a multi-stage product development manager for 12 years. I’ve personally plunged off the cliff into the muddied waters of market research, idea selection and proof, IP protection, engineering, manufacturing implementation, and product commercialisation—all while working with large international corporations as well as small start-ups in Sweden, UK and Switzerland, in a wide range of different industries: from power generation and offshore engineering to consumer electronics, telecom and medical devices.I’ve obtained my MSc in Mechanical Engineering, then few years later another degree in Innovation, Creativity and Entrepreneurship, and spent a couple of years learning various languages (the next one going to be Chinese).  Early on I also became interested in psychology and mystery of the human language processing, spending years to pick out the best techniques that I applied in this product.If you are interested to know more about me, please visit my blog at www.InnovationFast.com
Praise for the Innovation DeckWant to know what some of the smartest minds, fast-paced innovators, and uncanny solution finders think about the Innovation Deck—after spending just a few minutes with it?"I love this product and ready to buy it. Very correct step - to have something literally at hand!" -Nikolay Bogatyrev, inventor and expert in Biomimetics, www.biotriz.com"The Innovation Deck is a good way to spark and organize discussion during project development." - Mark Melnykowisz, Artist - Scientist, Wearable Computing"Interesting way to approach the project and forces people to stop for a minute and re-evaluate." - Carolyn Keane, Founder at Inventing Daily LLC, www.inventingdaily.com"I think the idea is great... Young engineers will find it most useful" - Robert Ferreiro, Technical Guy at Ferreiro Consulting"I like the set up. I have always enjoyed the idea of taking bit size chunks out of every problem while keeping an overall perspective on the end goals. I think this deck does a good job of that." -Claire Phillippi, Design Engineer, Best Metal Products  "This is a great product that allows the team to stimulate ideas for product development easily. A very innovative way! Step by step guide makes it very user friendly." - Connie Lau, Project Manager, Nuclear Division, CCI AG, www.linkedin.com/in/connielau  "Due to schedule constraints, we've all been guilty of jumping right into solution design, without considering all the options. A checklist (these cards) could definitely help" -  Aidan Foley, Senior Project Engineer, Aerospace/Defense "I thought it was a great idea and well put together and was thought-provoking during problem solving sessions." - Mauro Tomasi, Mechanical Designer. Sole Proprietor. 
Make the Innovation Deck YOURS with Branded CardsOutshine your competition with the ultimate gift for your potential customers.Get 30 branded decks, with your company’s logo and details, to position you at the top of your customers’ minds whenever they’re stumped.As an added bonus, you will be able to place 50 words of text (or an image) on the back of the first card.“How will
I put the Innovation Deck to work for me?”
I keep mine on my desk, to provide a quick check-list that guarantees I
understand the problem, can generate the widest array of saleable solutions,
and easily identify the most profitable new product idea.
How you can foresee yourself using it, is up to you…
Whether you’re developing a product alone, stuck in a no-solution
meeting, or working with a team of bull-headed competitors, here’s why you
should always keep The Innovation Deck close at hand.
Here are just a few ways our colleagues benefited from using The
Innovation Deck:
• 
As a Dual-Brained Checklist: Go through the deck methodically, picking
one card after another and spending a minute or two thinking about each
question, allowing you to easily engage both your conscious and subconscious mind to solve your most
challenging problems.
• 
As a Split-Second Inspiration Generator: Pick a random card out of the deck. What
does it say? Is it relevant to your product? Why? What could you do to improve
things further? What else?
• 
As a Zap to the Team Brain: Get together with your team. Spread the
cards on the table, face down. Turn over one random card. Discuss how it is
relevant to your product or problem? Why can you use this now? What’s the best
way to apply the questions? See how many ideas you can trigger from a single
card and you’ll instantly begin to see its value. Once the discussion is
finished, the next team member turns over another random card.


What the Innovation Deck is NOT…
It’s Not Magical (although it might feel that way when you're generating new ideas on demand).
It’s NOT a Golden Pill. 
If you’re an
entrepreneur, engineer, or innovator, you probably already know that to absorb
the full benefits from the Innovation Deck you’ll absolutely need two things:
A)  Attention and a few
minutes of your time to consider the questions on the cards, andB)  A genuine wish to
make your product better. 

And if you let it
just sit on your table, not much will happen. 
Like everything worth
doing, creating spell-binding products requires effort — the Innovation Deck
simply eases your most common challenges, eliminates the mental blocks, and
incites answers from your brain.
QualityAs a colleague, I know how much you value the quality of the products you create. That’s why I have searched long and hard to identify the best suppliers on planet Earth.
I have every assurance that no corners will be cut, ever, in the making of any card in your Innovation Deck, including printing it on the finest multi-layered card stock, with a resistant structured surface—so it retains its shape and durability through years of use. The cards will be delivered to your door in a
handy transparent plastic box — to ensure that extra added measure of protection,
and guarantee they will catch your eye, so you remember to take them out and
generate that Next Big Idea, in seconds.


Schedule

The printing time is expected to take about two weeks and delivery to your door will take another two weeks.  If you order a PDF, we will aim to send it to you within one day.

You’re a Thinker. So you obviously have more questions…
Here are your answers.This page is too long... Can you explain in three sentences how to invent something new?Sure.1. Ask questions from "Examine" cards to understand your customer, point out critical issues, and limit the area where you are going to search for solutions. 2. Apply techniques from "Explore" cards to generate a variety of different ideas that solve issues and customer pain that you discovered in Step 1.3. Finally, use "Evaluate" cards to evaluate all the options you now have, and choose the most optimal solution.Congratulations, your new product idea is created!
Why is the Innovation Deck a better alternative than “brainstorming” cards?
It is NOT your usual manual with a list of random brainstorming questions. It focuses specifically on product invention process, giving you the
best and latest techniques that have been proven to create new inventions in the most challenging industries. 
It also takes into account the way we humans process language and triggers
your unconscious mind to generate solutions for you.
I’m an Entrepreneur. How can I use the Innovation Deck for non-physical products
(software, services, etc.)?
As a forward thinking individual you will find many ways to use the
majority of the cards right away, and the remaining cards as your project
develops.  While the Innovation Deck
originally had a physical product focus, many who deal in the abstract have
touted its unbeatable benefits as well.Why buy several decks? 
Beyond the fact that you should take advantage of our offer to brand
these, and anchor your business as “The Innovator” in the subconscious minds of
your clients, you should buy several decks for your friends, your office, your
teammates…
I believe, as a product creator, that every product creator should have one. Plus card
decks are like toothbrushes – everybody will want to use his/her own.
How do I
track the amount of referrals I made?
Remember, you’ll get your choice of $30 from your order OR one FREE
Innovation Deck for every two of your referrals who support us (we’ll
e-mail you to ask your choice after the campaign is finished). Here is how you
track the number of your referrals: 1. Sign onto IndieGoGo.2. Click on your user name beside the Search Box at the top right of the
page.3. Select “My Profile” option

4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of
Referrals and Pledges that resulted from your sharing.

How can I
boost my amount of referrals?
A few easy ideas that just require few seconds to do:1. Post your personal link (log in and click the “Link” button below the
video) to your personal LinkedIn, Facebook or any other social media.2. Post or message to any relevant Forums, LinkedIn Groups or Twitter accounts,
asking them to Share or Retweet.3. If you or a friend runs a blog or writes, ask them to do a story and
provide your personal URL.

4. Post to Reddit, BuzzFeed, StumbleUpon or similar sites with your
link.
Thanks for looking! Interested? Choose your perk and order.

story:
Hacks 4 Humanity -- Building Mobile Apps For The Social Good!

We live in a world driven by technology. Everywhere you look, people are on their cell phones, laptops and gaming devices immersed in the virtual world of innovation. It is estimated that by 2017, 4.4 billion people will be using mobile apps*. As the world becomes more engaged in social media, games, and other distractions, it's easy to become detached and disconnected from the rest of the world. So you have to wonder:

Are we losing our humanity?

Technology has the power to impact generations and create our future. What if we created mobile apps that contributed to the Social Good and allowed us to actually connect with our humanity and change the world?

What if we built apps that benefited nonprofit organizations, or contributed to environmental causes, or helped us feed the homeless, or helped bring fresh clean water to impoverished communities? 

What if we engaged students and professors from Arizona State University and other colleges, as well as members of local communities skilled in design, technology, civic planning, programming, etc. to collaborate and build these kinds of mobile apps?

At the Hacks 4 Humanity hackathon event happening September 20th-21st, 2014, we will do exactly that!



Plan of Action:

Arizona State University Project Humanities and EqualityTV have partnered to create a hackathon event that will contribute to the Social Good!

We have invited ASU students and professors, as well as technology professionals, visionaries, civic planners, and other community organizations and members to take part in the first-ever hackathon at Arizona State University that will focus on building mobile apps and technology solutions that will benefit nonprofit organizations and other causes. The hackathon event will be held at the Sun Devil Fitness Complex at ASU, which was generously contributed by the Sun Devils.

We will engage the 7 Principles of the "Humanity 101" curriculum created by ASU Project Humanities. These 7 principles have been identified as virtues that help us reconnect with our humanity and influence generations. 

Together, the 7 Principles of the “Humanity 101” curriculum creates an opportunity to be reconnected with our humanity, using compelling values and technology as a foundation. Hackers will develop cutting-edge technology solutions that will solve complex challenges and allow them to engage and innovate in the following seven areas:



FORGIVENESS: What can be created that will allow us to practice and demonstrate forgiveness culturally and personally?

RESPECT: How can we learn to work with and/or engage and help others?

KINDNESS: What can we build to promote and encourage random or intentional acts of kindness?

INTEGRITY: How can we build a platform, community or initiative that maintains integrity? Data privacy?

EMPATHY: How can we reconnect with humanity and empathize with the challenges facing others?

SELF REFLECTION: Can we explore technology that allows us to dig deeper into ourselves and therefore create personal change?

COMPASSION: Can we see the world and others differently? What can we build to address the issues affecting humanity?

We will organize into groups of 1 - 5 people, and using our sponsored library of API's, open source data, and other contributed resources, we will spend the entire weekend of Sept 20th and 21st building mobile apps. On Sunday, the apps will be presented to a panel of judges who will then choose the top 3-5 projects which will receive sponsored prizes!

The funding we raise will contribute to the immense expenses that need to be covered to run this massive event. We expect between 300-500 participants at Hacks 4 Humanity. Each participant will need meals, beverages and snacks the entire time they are hacking for humanity.

We have presented an attainable goal of $5000 to ensure this campaign is a success, but our budget is extensive and the food costs alone are around $19,000, so every contribution helps us keep the participants fueled so they can focus their creative energy on building technology solutions that will change the world.


    How Does Hacks 4 Humanity Change The World?

    Building mobile apps that will solve the challenges facing humanity will allow us to tap in deeper to help one another on the planet. 

    Mobile apps will be taken a step beyond providing distractions and mindless entertainment. We will be able to help homeless people find soup kitchens or shelter, or be able to track the amount of radiation in our city, or help nonprofits manage their day-to-day operations.

    The possibilities are endless!

    When you have a room full of hundreds of people gathered together with the common goal of impacting the world with technology, you're certain to cause a ripple effect and change the entire planet!

    www.hacks4humanity.com




      What is Possible?

      The success of this hackathon relies on the people who 'SHOW UP' and participate in our initiative. This means we need actual participants to sign up and be part of the hackathon. We need sponsors to contribute funding, prizes, open source API's and in-kind contribuitions. We need enough food to feed our participants. We need community members and organizations to get on board and participate and/or support.

      If we don't have all of these in place--the event will not be a success! So every little bit helps us achieve greatness. 

      Sign up for the hackathon FREE here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/hack-4-humanity-w-arizona-state-university-project-humanities-hackathon-tickets-11991146843?aff=eorg

      We still need sponsors to contribute to our hackathon event. Find out how you can get involved here: http://www.scribd.com/doc/236170379/Hacks-4-Humanity-Sponsorship-Kit


        Be A Hacks 4 Humanity Evangelist:

        Spread the word! Whether on Social Media, email blasts, over the telephone, or in person, we need YOU to get the word out about what we are doing! 

        TWITTER:

        @Hacks4humanity1 

        @equalitytv 

        @asu_humanities

        FACEBOOK: 

        www.facebook.com/hacks4humanity

        www.facebook.com/projecthumanities

        www.facebook.com/equalitytv

        www.facebook.com/wonderwomenhacks


        Who is ASU Project Humanities?

        VISION:

        ASU Project Humanities strives to be the leader in local, national, international conversations about  the breadth, depth, and value of humanities study and understanding across disciplines. Project Humanities seeks to connect all four ASU campuses and local communities in talking, listening, and connecting. We further seek to establish and lead multidisciplinary research opportunities and to engage local, national, and international communities in humanities discussions.


        MISSION:

        ASU Project Humanities brings together individuals and communities within and around ASU to talk, listen, and connect. Project Humanities works to broaden audience perspectives and to instill passion for and understanding of humanities study, research, and humanist thought. We also strive to show the interconnectedness of humanities within and across disciplines and in our daily lives, and to create positive change in people and communities across political, socioeconomic, geographic, and cultural boundaries.


        You can learn more about ASU Project Humanities here:
        http://humanities.asu.edu/


        Who is EqualityTV?

        We are a collective of visionaries and social innovators who produce events, programming, and humanitarian campaigns that highlight and celebrate marginalized communities, promote equality for all, and that change the world. 
        From hackathons, to global photo campaigns, to marriage equality PSA's, nonprofit organizations, hugging campaigns, workshops and film festivals, we are committed to changing the world. We are also aggregating, curating and producing original content which will be hosted on our exclusive multimedia platform. We're dedicated to making an impact and 'celebrating humanity!'
        Enjoy an inside look at our worldwide "I Am Equality Campaign!"




        *Portio Research Study (March 2013)

story:
Easier than saying “ABRACADABRA!” or waving around a magic wand, the MagicBox will give you the look and feel you want from your creations. It polishes ABS and PLA prints to a glassy smooth finish in almost no time at all! 

The magician’s greatest secret. 

Do you want beautiful, finished prints that wow your audience, but don’t want to spend so much time, effort, and money to get them? Then you need an elegant solution that polishes your creations effortlessly. You need the MagicBox!

The magicbox in all its glory!

The MagicBox uses an acetone vapor bath to smooth the lines normally present on FDM prints. It’s simple, easy-to-use settings give you control over the look and feel of your creations. Polish out rough edges or preserve detail, it’s up to you.

On the right is a duck before being polished. On the left is a duck after being polished by the MagicBox. This is ABS duck.

ABS material made by MagicBox

This is ABS secret-head who's file we download from internet.

Magicbox for PLA prints result.

This is our filament that we use on our MagicBox experiment.
story_txt:
Polish your 3D prints… Magically! Easier than saying “ABRACADABRA!” or waving around a magic wand, the MagicBox will give you the look and feel you want from your creations. It polishes ABS and PLA prints to a glassy smooth finish in almost no time at all! The magician’s greatest secret. Do you want beautiful, finished prints that wow your audience, but don’t want to spend so much time, effort, and money to get them? Then you need an elegant solution that polishes your creations effortlessly. You need the MagicBox!The magicbox in all its glory!The MagicBox uses an acetone vapor bath to smooth the lines normally present on FDM prints. It’s simple, easy-to-use settings give you control over the look and feel of your creations. Polish out rough edges or preserve detail, it’s up to you.On the right is a duck before being polished. On the left is a duck after being polished by the MagicBox. This is ABS duck.ABS material made by MagicBoxThis is ABS secret-head who's file we download from internet.Magicbox for PLA prints result.This is our filament that we use on our MagicBox experiment. Our filament picture.


Ready to witness the magic on your desktop?
We’ve designed and built a few functional prototypes of the MagicBox, and we are almost ready to start manufacturing. We need your help to make it happen. By backing our project, you could be first in line to get a MagicBox, and be one step closer to simplifying your workflow, or making your hobby even more enjoyable.  So pick a reward, any reward, and help us make your life much easier, and a whole lot more magical!
We need a volunteer from the audience
To begin using the MagicBox just follow these simple directions:

Fill the reservoir with acetone.
Place a clean print into the chamber.
Adjust the settings and press start.
Automation Control: For the sake of the safety, we control between inside and outside pressure, we need to keep the pressure  balance,because this is why  vapor always inside and smell nothing.
The clean fan will run after the magical process done.

TA-DA!
Stage magic, meet street magic.
At Sky-Tech we believe that everything about 3D printing should be fun and inspiring. When we were looking for a solution to polish our own creations, we found that everything else on the market was too big, too expensive, and too difficult to use. So we decided to create our own solution; something that would be small enough to fit on our desks, something that doesn’t require us to pawn our hats and rabbits or buy expensive chemical refills, and something that would be easy for anyone to use. So we designed and built the MagicBox.
The secrets revealed.
The MagicBox uses a patent pending process to quickly evaporate acetone. The vapor fills the chamber and begins to smooth out the surface lines from of your FDM prints. After you’re finished, the exhaust fan and filter will capture the excess vapor to ensure that the air in your room stays clean and fresh.
Super secret: We have made ​​a compact design to our customers, please note that we design a  vapor switch on control pannel, with the steam setting time, you can control the acetone vapor make different fineness, for example, we can make the surface is very slippery, but the details would lose more, you can make the surface smooth surface only a little, but the details can be preserved.This is called Magicbox customize function.
The MagicBox will be manufactured using the highest-quality components available. Here are some general specifications:

Total Size: 30cm x 30cm x 29cm
Chamber Size: 25cm x 25cm x 20cm
Weight: 5kg
Power: 100-240V A/C, 50/60HZ
Works with ABS, PLA

Project background
1.	After using a beaker filled with acetone over an induction cooker to finish our 3D prints, we began brainstorming a better way and came up with the concept of the MagicBox. We wanted to make the whole process simpler.
2.	Then we began to design a basic controller and chipset to test with.  



3.	We wanted the MagicBox to be used right next to your 3D printer, so we designed it to be small; about the size of a 17 inch monitor. Our first concept drawings. Our first design draft. 3D CAD models of the functional prototype. 

Our design draw.

MagicBox Control Pannel

Magicbox Specification

           3D  CAD models of the functional prototype.

4.	We were all excited about the prototype when it was finally ready to test, and after we tested it with a few prints we realized we had made something truly magical. And that is how the MagicBox was born! 
Production and fulfillment plan 
During the campaign, we’ll finalize the design of the MagicBox and prepare for manufacturing with the same manufacturer that produces our high performance 3D printers. Once the campaign is successful, we’ll start mass production for the backers and form a marketing strategy for global sales. At Sky-Tech we have lots of experience manufacturing 3D printers and our customers include product design companies, architecture design companies, colleges, educational institutions, etc. The engineering magic inside the MagicBox is considerably simpler than the mechanisms and electronics in our 3D printers, so you can rest assured that we have the skills and capacity to promptly fulfill our rewards. If you’d like more information on our company please visit our website.
Major production stages:
1. MagicBox concept development. ~ 2014/1/15 
2. Prototype development. ~ 2014/2/20 
3. Prototype testing and improving, manufacturing preparations. ~ 2014/07
4. Indiegogo funds start. ~ 2014/07
5. MagicBox manufacturing. ~ 2014/10
6. Distribute rewards and begin sales. ~ 2015/02
The 3D Printer we use on this Experiment: 
All of the prints we use two machines to print it, and we offer the best price for our bakers.

SKY-MAKER X-series for PLA prints

SKY-MAKER X-series specification

We use SKY-MAKER 800 to make ABS prints.
This is the SKY-MAKER 800 specification.


Our sofware interfaceSome of the 3d prints that our 3d printer printed.

Printed by SKY-MAKER X-Series


Printed by SKY-MAKER 800

The NEW Printer that we are going to announce this year called SKY-MINI: 




SKY-MAKER MINI for PLA prints
SKY-MAKER MINI specification
Printed by SKY-MAKER MINI

The reason for SKY-TECH launching a second
campaign.


A couple of months ago, we had an idea to crowdfund
a product called Magic Box in another network platform. We are appreciated that
there are still so many people want to support our project. Even the campaign
expired, we received the mails and requires everyday, say that they want to
support our project. Therefore, we decided to have the same campaign in
Indiegogo.
It helps our new backers to buy the product from
the public platform not email. 
Select a pledge

You'll receive a "Thank You!" card by mail and a mention of your generosity on our website on every magical pledge!



NEW Perks!













SKY-MAKER EVO-series for ABS/PLA prints

SKY-MAKER EVO 1 & 2 specification
Core team members: 




Eric Huang – The founder of Sky Tech Co., Ltd, and also the main creator of MagicBox. With Eric’s background in mechanical engineering, he started the 3D printer business in 2012, and as business grew, he started thinking about developing tools that work in conjunction with 3D printers. In 2013 the idea for the MagicBox became his latest obsession. 

JoLin/Sky-Tech
Jo Lin – The marketing manager of the team. She’s mainly responsible for the American and European markets. When the MagicBox project began, Jo recommended to introduce it first to the American market according to her marketing experience. She believes that Kickstarter is the best platform to make the MagicBox a reality. 


Gary Wu/Sky-Tech
Gary Wu – Gary is the senior engineer. He put in a lot of effort in the design of the MagicBox, and contributes ideas to not only the hardware, but also to the user experience. 

Jerry Wu/Sky-Tech
Jerry Wu – One of the engineers in Sky Tech. Jerry mainly takes care of testing the MagicBox and all of Sky Tech's other products. 

James Wu/Sky-Tech

James Wu – The general manager of the team. Keeping the project on time and on budget is James’s main job.
We are getting ready for the big reveal.
We’ve come a long way since our first designs and prototypes for a polishing and finishing station. Now we are finally ready to begin full production, but only with your support. Here is what we’ve done so far:

Formed a dedicated team within Sky-Tech
Designed and built a few housing prototypes
Designed and tested different chip sets and firmware
Experimented, again and again, with different sizes and varieties of prints
Consulted with manufacturers to estimate costs of production

Risks and challenges
Every Indiegogo project comes with unique risks and challenges. Here are some that we might face when producing the Magic Box:
DESIGN & ENGINEERING The Magic Box is designed to be useful, simple, and safe. We’ve spent countless hours experimenting with the variables to make sure that the user experience is totally magical. However, we might find that after many tests the Magic Box does not hold up to this standard. This will force us to re-engineer certain components which may delay delivery.
PRODUCTION & DELIVERY We will produce the Magic Box with the best manufacturer we can find for the cost and quality. If for any reason we encounter unforeseen challenges before or during production, we will communicate them to all of our backers and adjust our targets accordingly. That being said, we don’t foresee any challenges so great that they would prevent us from delivering the Magic Box altogether.

FAQ1. Can Magic Box work with PLA prints?

Yes, it can work. Everyone said acetone was only for ABS, but we don't want to use methanol and lye on PLA material because it's too dangerous for our customer. So we found a way out to adjust the temperature and vapor volume to improve this. I need to say, the ABS prints is better than PLA prints,but anyway we will try to find the best parameter for this machine for PLA prints use.
You can download the Acetone solvent MSDS from our website. http://www.sky-tech.com.tw/sky-tech/doc/magicbox/acetone.msds.pdf2. Can Magic Box work with ABS prints?
Absolutely,it's can work on ABS prints. You can download the Acetone solvent MSDS from our website. http://www.sky-tech.com.tw/sky-tech/doc/magicbox/acetone.msds.pdf3. How big size prints that magic box can handle? Magicbox's chamber size is 25cm x 25cm x 20cm. As long as your prints smaller than this size, then you can smooth it.4. How to buy the acetone?Don't worry, it's very easy to get it, you will found it from hardware store.

story:
THE BEER BUDDY

 

 

  follow us on facebook - thank you

 

BEER BUDDY HISTORY

A Bottoms Up Beer dispensing system for 5 liter party kegs (169 fl oz Partykeg) - That’s awesome! The Bottoms Up dispensing system is probably the fastest and most spectacular way to get beer into a glass. This idea comes from America and has caused a worldwide buzz.

The perfect beer enjoyment in seconds is made possible by the gentle rise in the glass. This way only a small amount of carbonic acid is lost and your beer tastes particularly fresh. As an official sales partner, we have successfully distributed the system to commercial customers (B2B), such as Restaurants, stadiums and arenas.

But people kept on asking me again and again. “Do you have a Bottoms Up device for domestic use?”

Now at last we can say: "Yes, we do - It is called BEER BUDDY!"

Please visit our website for more details and all our products www.bottomsupbier.de

Bottoms Up Beer

Draft Beer - Warp Speed!

 

THE TEAM

Jörg Blin had an idea for the buddy. Jörg is CEO of Bottoms Up Beer Germany and is therefore the official retailer for the unique Bottoms Up beer dispensing system. To implement this product, he has teamed up with Felix Rennies. Felix is an engineer, a product designer and knows how to put crazy thing to live.

If you like this product and you support our campaign, we would be very pleased.

Thank you for your great support.

Beer Buddy Team

 

Bottoms Up Beer known on press and TV:

Bottoms Up Beer is already well-known (Thanks to press articles and TV worldwide).

 

Many more videos are also available on our YouTube channel

 

 

 

Why did we develop Beer Buddy?

Due to a number of inquires, we have decided to develop a dispensing system, working according to the Bottoms Up principle for the domestic use (B2C).

We were thrilled by the idea of enjoying beer quickly while watching football with friends, having BBQ in the garden or at the festival. What’s more, retailers are super excited about this product to.

You, the backers of this campaign, have the following advantages through Indiegogo:

  1. You are a part of the history of Beer Buddy and have made it possible Of course, you will get a special discount
  2. You get special bonuses
  3. You are the first one to hold Beer Buddy in your hands and experience the wonder of rising beer.
  4. You have a choice between different starter kits.
 

What is Beer Buddy capable of?

 

The Beer Buddy is able to tap beer from the well-known and available 5-liter party keg - according to the patented Bottoms Up principle - through the bottom of the glass "from the bottom up"

BeerBuddy is to accompany you everywhere, whether at the barbecue evening in your garden, at the beach, at the festival campsite, or simply with friends – he is simply your buddy.

For this reason, we have designed Beer Buddy not to require any electricity!

Just put a well-chilled party keg in the isolated Buddy. A barrel remains cold for several hours depending on temperature outside.

You can get party kegs at any well-stocked beverage store all over Europe, the USA or Asia - almost worldwide.

More than 1000 regional, national or also international beer brands are available.

 

THE BEER BUDDY – technical drawing and final Design

You can see what the Buddy is going to look like as below. Top priorities are functionality and scalability in manufacturing.

The seven following images represent a technical drawing, they don’t show a complete finished product yet.

But if everything goes according to plan, you will be able to hold BEER BUDDY in your hands as shown.

 

 

Beer Buddy - final design

 

The glass & the cup

THE GLASS - MADE BY RASTAL

The Bottoms Up Beer Glass and the reusable plastic cup, are developed and made in Germany by one of the most renowned glass manufacturer in the world.

This is the way how the Beer Buddy glasses are made.

 

 

Dimensions

Beer Buddy is handy, has a cool design and can be used everywhere!

 

Risks & advantages

 

The technical principal works very well. Now we need to change a view parts to produce them in injection molds.

Pressure regulator and tubing are used in various taping devices and are therefore available by default.

 

If you like this product and you support our Beer Buddy campaign, we would be very pleased.

Thank you for your great support.

Beer Buddy Team

story:
The QHP Experience:

We are Lisa and Andi of Quiet Home Paints.  As mother and daughter, we share more than just a business, but also a passion for color, design and sustainability.  Lisa, a designer with 20+ years of experience, created each color based on her knowledge of what works.  The paint is truly non-toxic, odorless and safe - on top of which the quality and beauty exceeds expectations.  We take the guess work out of picking paint by offering truly beautiful colors in ready-made palettes that are safe for you and your family. 

We aim to change the way you buy paint from purchasing a product to purchasing an experience, but we need your help! Our goal moving forward is provide our customers with not only the best paint available, but all of our knowledge and expertise to ensure you are able to create your perfect space.

With every paint purchase, customers will gain access to an online resource of endless knowledge.  Webinars, tutorials and design tips will be at your finger tips.  This doesn't just mean paint, although we will share knowledge on every aspect of that.  There will also be information on color theory, floor planning, accessorizing, and more.

As a contributor, you are vital to our success in educating the public on the importance of using a non-toxic paint like ours and changing the paint industry.  With your help we will give customers access to our own expert designer, Lisa Teague, as well as other top designers, bloggers, and stylists around the country. 

As a small, local company we need you to help get the word out there and create a truly unique paint experience. 


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $50,000.  This money will be used to:

  • Reach a broader audience and educate on the importance of using Quiet Home Paints (did you know that even paints labelled as no VOC can still contain up to 5 g/l of VOCs? Scary, right?)
  • Develop a Customer Access Portal to house video tutorials from great designers around the country and bring design expertise to your door. 
  • Continually develop new palettes to stay current with new design trends. 
Your donation will earn you not only our ever lasting love, but the knowledge that you are contributing to a better indoor air quality around the country.  Oh and you get great gifts for your donation like samples of our awesome paint, virtual design consultations with Lisa, your name as one of our colors, etc.
If our fundraising goal isn't reached, the funds we do raise will be used to educate a larger audience on the importance of using Quiet Home Paints.  We will not give up on our goal of providing every family in the US a healthy, beautiful paint. 

The Impact

The EPA declared Indoor Air Quality the number one health issue in the US last year.  Poor Indoor Air Quality can lead to numerous health problems ranging from asthma and other respiratory issues to cancer.  VOCs (volatile organic compounds) are major contributor to poor indoor air quality.  And paint is a big culprit when it comes to VOCs.  You may think that as soon as the paint dries, the VOCs are gone, but this simply isn't true.  VOCs can be emitted into the air for days after the paint dries.  And what is worse, even the paint on the market labelled as LOW or NO VOC can STILL CONTAIN VOCs (not to mention other harmful toxins).  The regulation allows for a paint to claim No VOC status as long as there are less than 5 grams per liter and this is before you add pigments.  Pigments are where a lot of the VOCs live, so the paint you think is healthy really might not be.  

With Quiet Home Paints, there are truly no VOCs.  Not in the base or in the pigments so every color we offer is as safe as the next.   Your contribution will help educate the country on this important issue.  AND it will enable us to bring to you the very best product with the very best knowledge behind it. 

Other Ways You Can Help

While all donations are extremely appreciated, we realize not everyone is able to contribute in a financial way.  By simply sharing our campaign with you friends or even just talking to people about Quiet Home Paints you would be helping us in a big way.

story:
Our story ..

Its all started when we met myself and my partner discussing how can we make something benefit consumers and users around the world. After many researches and reviews, we came up with izone. The Bandwidth Optimization and Data Savings solution came to exist after many years of development. That was 10 years ago. Our company is driven by our passion and dedication to our customers and partners. We love what we do. Now its just about time to move to the next level. Our new project is called iZone Cloud... its the core of izone technology but with much advanced technology enabling people around the world to SAVE money, SECURE their Internet and get FASTER Internet.

This campaign is very important milestone in our history. Its the PRODUCT for today's problems of cost of internet connections, mobility devices, speed and security issues.

iZone Cloud is the answer for these concerns. with izone we believe customers will never pay more for data usage. Thats our promise. We plan to empower millions of people around the world with iZone Cloud, be part of this dream. 

How much do we need?

We’re looking for at least $125,000 (USD) which will be used to develop new levels of izone cloud, developing new markets and getting it out asap to markets. More funds may be required to expand the R&D even further to develop new compression technology. If we don't reach our target, we are still committed to the business and getting izone to the market by Sep 2014. What we are excited about is the passion we have as a team to make things working and delivering our promises. Committment is what made iZone Cloud today. Part of the funds will go to build a new Data Center in Australia to serve ANZ and APAC markets. 


    The iZone Impact

    Your contribution will make our go-to-market faster and will help us to deliver the new iZone Cloud to consumers worldwide. with iZone Cloud, subscribers get to spend less money on data usage on machines, mobile, tablets and other devices. We love to save money to our customers which they can spend it somewhere else!.  

    With our past 10 years to communications and development, our previous version iZone Telecom, the product been used by over 28,000 customers worldwide for the past 10 years. Its just about time to go to next level. the iZone Cloud. Its faster, more secure, and more compression to save date consumption.


    Risks & Challenges

    People during all times they come up with new products and technologies, some we use and some we don't due the nature of the product(s). We believe not everything we invent/develop may be used by others as the cause/needs may not be there. But all people need to be CONNECTED to the Internet, all people need to COMMUNICATE and SHARE moments ,and all people need SPEED and SECURE data transmission.  iZone Cloud is all about these trends and values. Our challenges are clear for us and we do take them into considerations such as availability of bandwidth in certain countries, cost of smart devices/phones, data plan cost in various countries. Thats why we are doing our best to make iZone Cloud cost goes down as much as we can. In fact we are planning to make it as low as $2 per month for mobile devices.


    The setup behind iZone Cloud Technology

    Thanks to our data centers in Frankfurt, Germany where we can serve clients in Europe and North America extrmely very fast. 



    How iZone Cloud looks like? sneak preview
    (more images under gallaery tab)



    Whats Next for iZone Cloud?

    Helping Educational 

    Mobile data is expensive in the emerging markets and specially in Africa. Our app will help the educational sector to use more data out of their mobile data plan. In addition our app will help users to secure internet connection while connected to unsecured wireless networks.

    The Potential

    We strongly believe that every mobile user is a potential user to our service. everyone would love to save money when possible. Our app will help mobile user to get more data out of his data plan, especially while using roaming.

    App pricing

    For  1.99$ per month; an affordable price in all regions and especially in Africa where mobile users pay around 30$ per month to get 1Gb of mobile data. by using our app they can at least double this data size for less than 2 dollars a month.


    How to reach and follow us

    Rabie Fares, Co-Founder and CEO at rabie.fares@izonetelecom.com 

    Mo Dajani, C0-Founder, President ant CTO at msdajani@izonetelecom.com

story:
SFANS adapter is the world's first truly portable dock for the Nintendo Switch. SFANS connects to your Nintendo Switch's USB Type-C port and essentially gives you all of the functionality of a docked system. This pocket-sized device is the ultimate option for Switch owners who value mobility over all else.

There's an HDMI port for audiovisual output and a USB Type-C power connection to supply the juice. Two additional USB Type-C and two USB 3.0 allow you to transmit data or charge other devices, like Pro Controllers and Joy-Cons in the premium Joy-Con Grip.

Review from My Mate VINCE, YouTube

Review from Marc The Geek, YouTube

Review from metagamers, YouTube

SFANS has the same function as the official Nintendo Switch dock. When connected to your Switch, it will display your games in 1080P on you TV/Monitor.

 

Using the SFANS adapter is easy. Simply connect your Nintendo Switch, HDMI cable and power source and play on your TV.

 

The compact design of SFANS allows you to put it in your pockets and all travel bags.

Play games on a big screen when going to your friends’ house and traveling. With SFANS adapter, your Nintendo Switch is accessible at anytime and anywhere.

 

          

With the SFANS adapter, you can play games likeThe Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild at your Switch in TV mode anywhere. SFANS makes easy to play in TV mode anywhere & anytime.

         

Are you concerned about scratching your Nintendo Switch Screen when docking and undocking? With SFANS, you can totally tear off any screen protectors. No more worries about scratching screens.

The dock released by Nintendo Switch will block the air vent at the bottom, which may lead to warping and overheating. SFANS adapter connects the Nintendo Switch via external wiring, without blocking the air vent, eliminating any possibility of warping and improving airflow when used with a stand.

         

Get a useful accessory pack special for backers who just purchase the Switch. Accessories as stickers, cases, screen protectors and AC adapter will be included.

  • Founder-- Allen Hayes
  • Electronic Engineer -- Randy Beacham
  • Industrial Designer -- Winston Jacobs
  • Marketing -- Tom Vadnais

We are super fans of the Nintendo Switch. We purchased a set of Nintendo Switch at launch, only to find the included dock is clunky, ugly and not easy to travel with.

We are also Engineers, so realizing this problem we put our thinking caps on and come up with a solution.

It took us one month to design the SFANS adapter and we truly believe it to be a good solution to many of the issues and inconvenience introduced by the original Nintendo  Switch Dock.

We are very proud to share with you what we have achieved. Thank you for checking out our campaign and we hope to get your support!

For any press inquiries please reach out to info@sfans.store

 

 

What AC adapter do you send?

If you buy the $79 perk, we will send you the corresponding AC adapter. If you are the user of the European standard, we will send the corresponding European power adapter. If you are the UK standard users, we will send the UK power adapter. If you are a user of the American Standard, we will send the American power adapter. You can choose the AC adapter in the survey after the campaign.

Why are you crowdfunding?

We love crowdfunding! For us, it's a perfect solution to ensure we meet minimum order quantities for the first production batch - our tooling is done and we're ready to scale up our manufacturing.

Have you got licensing for the SFANS from Nintendo?

We are looking to get Official Licensing for the SFANS adapter, once we receive full backing we can progress these talks further. Our aim is to receive full licensing before delivery! 

Where does it ship?

We're proud to ship our adapters worldwide. 

How much is shipping?

Please see reward details for all other locations. Local taxes not included.

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.

Please contact info@sfans.store and include in your email the region(s) you distribute to.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

info@sfans.store

Thank you for supporting SFANS- The first portable adapter for Nintendo Switch

Risks & Challenges

We love the Nintendo Switch. It is our passion about the Switch that inspires us to develop this SFANS adapter. We have many years of experience in electronic product development. Currently, the product has completed the small-scale trial production, and we will be conducting mass production testing during the campaign. We plan to start shipment in August. Just like any other project, SFANS will face some challenges in the whole process. Therefore, in order to solve these issues, we have taken some measures.

  1. We have purchased chips from suppliers to ensure the manufacturing can go smoothly, free from the delay caused by various parts. 
  2. We have contacted several manufacturers and signed contracts to ensure the timely shipment. We take the possible issues into our consideration.

We will try our best to solve any problems that occur in the process of manufacturing and shipment in order to avoid delays in delivery. We will post updates about the process of SFANS every week, sharing the latest news with you guys. It is your support that will make SFANS happen.

story:
My Story

Hello, my name is Andrew Martis and I have been accepted into project M. I am a young creative seeking to accomplish great things and give back to the community. I want to put my skills and knowledge to use to help you and help those around you. "Project M is a program for creative people who are already inspired to contribute to the greater good, and are looking for a platform to collaborate and generate ideas and projects bigger then themselves." I have been known as a trusted friend, someone more than willing to go the extra mile to help others before myself and I look forward to doing this on a larger scale! 


The Impact

Project M is all about collaboration and bringing together like minded individuals for the greater good and making things happen with the resources, ideas, and people who are already around. Their goal is to get people to think wrong, break out of every box you've learned to pull ideas from and free yourself from normal thinking processes. Project M will be the jumping point to get me out of a slump I've been in for a very long time. I am one who is scared of taking chances and shies away from doing things that aren't always a sure thing. I'd love to be a part of M and see just how far I can really push myself and free my mind and talents from fear.


What I Need & What You Get

The goal is $1000, this will be geared directly to cover travel expenses to and from Belfast, Maine, housing, meals, project expenses, as well as other incidental costs that I may encounter during these two weeks. I want to always give back as much as I can. For those who donate I've got a few nifty perks that will be coming your way and you can check those out on the side of this page to learn how your contributions will help and what you will receive for your incredible contribution. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word to family, friends, neighbors, random people at coffee shops, everyone! Let them know what I am trying to accomplish and let them know they are contributing to something much larger than either of us could imagine. Be sure to visit my personal design website or follow me on twitter to keep up with me and follow my progress! Be sure to check out the Project M website as well to see all the great things other sessions have already accomplished.

story:
A new logo and modern design language for the site would accomplish several things:

  • Keep Mirage feeling fresh and current, which demonstrates core contributors' dedication to the project
  • Get new developers excited about the project and wanting to learn more
  • Play our part in showing the Ember community's commitment to taking every aspect of software development seriously, including details like site design and demos

The funds will go to Lindsey Wilson, the designer behind the Ember.js Tomster mascot. By getting Lindsey to do the design work, we're signaling our belief in conventions and shared solutions. Mirage should feel even more at home within the Ember community.

I'm also planning on updating the site soon to an Ember app with live code demos. A strong brand, interactive examples and eventually a homepage video is something I've wanted for a long time.

If you or your company has benefited from using Mirage, this is a great way to give back!

story:
We have started shipping the Sculptor starting on April 2nd, with worldwide free shipping, so you got nothing to worry about!

Almost everyone who works in an office prefer to have a second monitor at work, as it boosts productivity so much. However, what if we are not tied down to a set desk, what if we work on the go? Well, we have the solution, an ultra-thin, highly portable monitor, the Sculptor!

Coming in at 15.6" with razor sharp 4K resolution, we are confident the Sculptor is the best portable monitor you can find anywhere. It's smart too: it auto-rotates to switch between landscape and portrait mode; and it is ultra slim, so it is super easy to take with you anywhere. It also works with smartphones, transforming your iPhone or Android into a mobile work station. The Sculptor's wide range of compatibility allows you to connect it to your laptops, smartphones, consoles, cameras and so on! 

You can use Sculptor with any device you can think of! Connect it to your laptop or desktop computer to use it as an extra screen to boost your productivity. Or connect it to your PS4, XBOX One or Nintendo Switch to enjoy a more immersive gaming experience anywhere you go! Connect it to your smartphone to turn it into a workstation and nail that last-minute assignment with ease. Connect it to your camera and start livestreaming! And its 4K resolution gives absolutely crystal clear display!

What sets Sculptor apart is that this amazing monitor detects your hand movement and auto-rotates accordingly, so you can switch from landscape to portrait orientation without breaking a sweat. Unlike other monitors on the market, you don’t need to rotate your device for the monitor to rotate, which makes it super convenient.

No more hassles when you are trying to live stream, simply connect Sculpter to your camera and voila! Live streaming using your camera has never been easier!

Beside the 0 latency touch response, the built-in touch menu of Scuptor also makes this device super easy to use. Now productivity just got taken to a whole new level!

It is not just working with the Sculptor, use it with your gaming system as well. Connect it to your PS4, Xbox or Nintendo Switch or any other consoles to enjoy a better gaming experience.

Kickstand comes in handy when you are using the Sculptor, this is truly the most convenient portable monitor you can have!

When iPhone is connected, Sculptor can work as a mirrored screen.

In some cases, when connected with iPad Pro, Sculptor can work as an extension screen.

Macbook supported.

Production started already, we are ready to ship!

We are a Chinese manufacturer located in Shenzhen, China. Our factory covers an area of 20,000 square meters and has more than 80 staff.

Why Indiegogo

We sold more than 120,000 monitors worldwide last year, mostly ODM for a few big-name brands. We decided to sell directly to customers and provide our customers the high-quality monitors with a reasonable price without the middlemen increasing the rate. We see Indiegogo as the first step to the international market.

 

Manufacturing

Everything up to this point has already been prepared and we are ready for mass production. We will start to deliver the monitor once we get more than 100 orders. It typically takes one to two weeks to arrive at your doorstep.  Since we ourselves are the supplier, we are confident in quality control and will make our best to ensure there is no delay in manufacturing. We will be 100% honest with you and keep you updated with everything.
