story:
The short version

The last version of RAWGraphs is already 2 years old. 

During these years we have collected a lot of feedback and suggestions from many users and we think it’s time to move forward and start working on a new and improved version with more features. To do so, we need your support. But don’t worry: RAWGraphs will always be open and free for everyone.  

What is RAWGraphs?

It's a free and open source software to easily visualize your spreadsheets.

The idea behind RAWGraphs is to provide a tool that allows people without coding skills to produce visualizations on their own. Originally conceived for graphic designers to complete a series of tasks that were unavailable in other tools, it evolved into a platform that provides simple ways to map data dimensions onto visual variables. Basically RAWGraphs allows users to easily and quickly create data visualizations that can be exported and edited in a vector graphics software (such as Adobe Illustrator and Sketch).

Users aren’t asked to register or pay any type of fee to use it and anyone can access and modify the code as well. 

Try the current version here!

The story of RAWGraphs

RAWGraphs was born as a side project initiated at DensityDesign Research Lab at Politecnico di Milano in 2013 and was initially led by Giorgio Caviglia. 

The tool has been successfully adopted by many users around the world (about 4,000 unique visitors every week) and won the award for “Most Beautiful” project and “Gold medal” for tools at the Kantar information is beautiful awards 2014. 

Since 2017 the project has been maintained by DensityDesign Research Lab and Calibro, a design studio founded by two former members of the research lab. Since we are now entering a new phase for RAWGraphs, we thought we would enlarge our team and involve a more experienced partner in the development of robust and open-source software: Inmagik, a studio based in Bergamo (Italy), focused on the development of web applications, mobile apps, data management systems and interactive user experiences.

If you want to know more about the project or you want to try it, please visit rawgraphs.io

Why a crowdfunding?

At this point, you are probably asking yourself: “Why are you asking for help if the software is already online?”

The answer is quite simple. We want to update the technological stack of the software that is now outdated and add a bunch of new features.

This is why we decided it was time to find a sustainable way to maintain the project. The goal is to fairly compensate the people that work on the project, enlarge the team and dedicate the right amount of time and resources on it. Since we want to keep the software open and free for everyone, we need your support to give RAWGraphs new life. RAWGraphs is also widely used in education and research by a lot of students and researchers in their data-driven projects. 

Instead of selling licenses or premium versions we’d rather keep the tool open and free for everyone. 

Your contribution can make that happen. By contributing, you are not only supporting the RAWGraphs team but you are also helping thousands of other people like students and young professionals to benefit from a 100% free and open software.

What happens if we reach our goal?

In the last years, we collected a lot of feedback and suggestions from our users and thanks to your contribution this is what we are planning to do if we reach. 

1 - More charts

    We want to add more charts to our tool. We are planning to add some basic charts (such as stacked bar charts, line charts and matrix) and integrate some new and unconventional ones. 

2 - Save your projects and templates

    Everytime you create a chart with RAWGraphs you always have to start from scratch... and sometimes it can be frustrating. With RAWGRaphs 2.0 we would like to add the possibility to save customized templates (colors, sizes, etc) so that you can reuse them for multiple visualizations without having to input the options again. Projects can also be saved (your data and your configuration) in a standalone file so that you can start where you left off without losing any of your progress. 

3 - More control and more options

    The visualizations created with RAWGraphs often need a lot of refinement with other graphic design softwares. With RAWGRaphs 2.0 we would like to make your life easier. These are some of the improvements we have in mind:

  • Better management of labels
  • Possibility to export legends
  • Aesthetically improved charts
  • Possibility to add annotations
  • An SVG structure easier to manage and polish in vector editing softwares

4 - Increased performance

    Redefining and re-engineering our technical stack will allow us to develop a version of RAWGraphs that will allow to upload more data and experience less bugs.

5 - Better integration with SPARQL query

We already did some experiments querying Wikidata and it’s super cool. We would like to make this process easier and more accessible to everyone. 

6 - Make it easier to create and add new charts

More documentations and ready to use templates based on a completely refactored JavaScript library. 

7 - More educational material to teach and learn RAWGraphs

    Since RAWGraphs is widely used in many educational programs we want to improve our learning section with more tutorials and more samples. We will also create more material and guides for developers to learn how to add custom charts and participate in the development of the tool.

What happens if we exceed our goal?

We have a lot of things in mind to improve RAWGraphs. If your contributions exceed our goal (33,000 €) we will have more time to spend on the design and development of RAWGraphs 2.0.

Here is our dream to-do list: 

  • More charts, more charts, more charts!
  • Add the possibility to make simple data transformations (filter, geocoding, etc)
  • RAWGraphs App: the offline and stand-alone version of the application that you can install on your computer
  • Export to GIST

 

And last but not least...Interactive charts! Yes, we would love to add the possibility to create interactive charts and have an easy way to embed them in web pages and interactive projects.

Risks and challenges

RAWGraphs is a pretty simple software. Adding more functionalities will make the software more complex (to design and develop) and we need time to do so. The risk is that the schedule we have in mind could become tight and the new version will require more time than expected. But don’t worry, the latest stable version of RAWGraphs will be always available online and, if you support us with 50€ you will have early access to the beta version.

What if we don’t succeed? The campaign will be anyway flexible, meaning that even if we won't reach that goal, we will work according to the founding we manage to collect.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some might not have the means to contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share our campaign online using the share tools in this page
  • Spread the word about our project
  • Tell us what you would like to see in the new version of RAWGraphs through social media
  • If you are a teacher, share the campaign with your students and your colleagues

If you want to support RAWGraphs in a different way, or you have any question about the campaign, drop us a message at hello@rawgraphs.io.

story:
Read our press...

We love design. We love art. We love tattoos. But we haven't been ready to take the permanent plunge.

We wanted temporary tattoos that we could proudly wear in public - tattoos that wouldn’t look fake and silly. 

And that’s why we created this little thing here.

The inkbox is a fruit-based tattoo that lasts two weeks, and only takes 10 minutes to apply.  It looks and feels just like a real tattoo, without the commitment.


How it works

Application in 5 easy steps:

1. Peel the back off of the inkbox. 

2. Place it on the skin where you want your tattoo to appear. 

3. Run the provided towelette under water for 3 seconds.

4. Put on the provided black tattoo glove and hold the towelette over the black square in the middle for 10 minutes, with firm pressure. 

5. Remove the stencil and wait.

The tattoo magically appears over the next 12-24 hours. We like to put them on before bed and then wake-up with a tattoo!

Over 300 designs from which to choose

When you pre-order we'll send you a survey to choose your design from getinkbox.com (We've been selling our previous type of tattoo here).

See the rewards section for ordering a custom design.

The inkbox comes in 7 different sizes to fit designs anywhere from 0.5 inches to 5 inches. 


Composition 

The inkbox consists of 4 layers:

1. The first layer is an adhesive stencil.

2. The second layer is a non-woven that contains our organic inkbox formula. 

3. The third layer protects your hands from getting stained. 

4. The fourth layer holds it all together, like a hug.  

When wet, the active inkbox formula is absorbed into your skin in the shape of the stencil.

The patent-pending inkbox formula is 100% organic and made from a fruit. It’s safe for your skin and safe for all ages. It works by reacting with organic compounds in your skin, effectively turning the structural proteins in the top layer of your skin black.

Unlike temporary tattoos that sit on top of your skin, ours sit in your skin, like a real tattoo. Tattoos stain the Dermis (the second layer of skin) and our formula stains the Epidermis (the first layer of skin). The reason tattoos stay forever is because the Dermis doesn’t exfoliate like the Epidermis.


We could have made our formula synthetic. But we took the hard road. We’re committed to building you a natural product that’s safe for your skin.


 

Create Your Own Tattoos

The inkbox tattoo studio will allow you to easily create any tattoo you desire. You can upload your own designs or create one from scratch by tracing images, text, and shapes. You can then order it as a custom inkbox that we ship to you. Design to door! …to skin.

We're aiming to release this in the Spring of 2016. 


Our vision

We want to give you a completely new way to express yourself. We’re committed to bringing you hundreds of new designs every month and a tool that allows you to easily create and wear your own tattoos.

It’s All About Self Expression

We can do some cool things with our inkbox tattoos, but we can’t replicate the full gamut of tattoo art. From shading to pointillism, there are certain things our tattoos cannot currently replicate (but we’re working on it!). Tattooing is an art form and we don’t wish to disrupt that, but rather, we wish to co-exist alongside it as a form of self-expression. 

Giving Back

We donate a percentage of every sale to the Darien Initiative, which for 30 years, has provided community and agricultural support to the Embera-Wounaan and Kuna tribes of the Darien Gap, Panama

These tribes have been dying their skin with the pulp of the Genipa Americana fruit for thousands of years. It’s where we got the idea for inkbox and it’s where the ingredients for our formula come from.

We also pay our wonderfully talented artists fair commission on each sale of their designs. 


Rewards

Every inkbox comes in a kit with a black tattoo glove and a towelette. For example, if you back reward 3 you will receive 3 full kits, packaged separately. 

This is a product we both wanted in our lives. We're making inkbox as awesome as possible because we're our own biggest customers. We’ve been selling a previous type of fruit-based tattoo for 7 months now and we personally talk to many of our customers, listening closely to what they want to see. Their feedback, combined with our own desire for semi-permanent tattoos, is the reason we created the new inkbox tattoo.

Our story

As brothers we've always worked on things together.  As children we would ride our bikes around our hometown and purchase second-hand sporting equipment that we would then sell back to our local used sporting goods store for a profit. We're pretty sure we kept that place afloat for a few years as 10 and 13-year-olds.

When Tyler moved away for 4 years we lost contact.  2 years ago Tyler came back. When we came up with the concept for inkbox we decided to rekindle our brotherhood and work on something together again. Some say don't mix family and business, but for us it has always been closely intertwined. To us, business is about sharing the same values with each other and our customers.  inkbox is a family affair through and through. 



Shout-out

To all of the wonderful people who have helped us over the past 5 months.


Nigel, Chloe, Marianne, Kristine, Cynthia, Ashton, Sam, Mike, David, Matt, Felipe, Brodie, Ves, Shawn, Rob, the DMZ staff, and our parents.


Photo Credits:

Diagrams illustrated by by Kristine Vodon http://vodondesign.com/

"Mujeres de la etnia Emberá" by Ayaita - Own work. Licensed under CC BY 3.0 via Wikimedia Commons - https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Mujeres_de_la_etnia_Ember%C3%A1.jpg#/media/File:Mujeres_de_la_etnia_Ember%C3%A1.jpg

"Panama Embera 0619" by Yves Picq http://veton.picq.fr - Own work. Licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 via Wikimedia Commons - https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Panama_Embera_0619.jpg#/media/File:Panama_Embera_0619.jpg

"Panama Embera0605" by Yves Picq http://veton.picq.fr - Own work. Licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 via Wikimedia Commons -https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Panama_Embera0605.jpg#/media/File:Panama_Embera0605.jpg ᐧ


Risks and challenges

We're currently testing different adhesive materials and non-woven fabrics for optimum application. We have application time down to 10 minutes, but aim to get it lower than that. We're sourcing our materials from the world's most innovative medical materials producer.

Shipping of Indiegogo perks is estimated to start in early January 2016.

Because we're still testing, shipping dates are not 100% accurate. We've estimated these dates with our best judgement, based on previous testing, knowledge of the new materials, and the shipping dates for our machinery. The formula itself is ready-to-go!

When we came up with the concept for inkbox we decided to rekindle our brotherhood and work on something together again. Some say don't mix family and business, but for us it has always been closely intertwined. To us, business is about sharing the same values with each other and our customers.  inkbox is a family affair through and through. 








Shout-out
To all of the wonderful people who have helped us over the past 5 months.
Nigel, Chloe, Marianne, Kristine, Cynthia, Ashton, Sam, Mike, David, Matt, Felipe, Brodie, Ves, Shawn, Rob, the DMZ staff, and our parents.
Photo Credits:
Diagrams illustrated by by Kristine Vodon http://vodondesign.com/
"Mujeres de la etnia Emberá" by Ayaita - Own work. Licensed under CC BY 3.0 via Wikimedia Commons - https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Mujeres_de_la_etnia_Ember%C3%A1.jpg#/media/File:Mujeres_de_la_etnia_Ember%C3%A1.jpg
"Panama Embera 0619" by Yves Picq http://veton.picq.fr - Own work. Licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 via Wikimedia Commons - https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Panama_Embera_0619.jpg#/media/File:Panama_Embera_0619.jpg
"Panama Embera0605" by Yves Picq http://veton.picq.fr - Own work. Licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 via Wikimedia Commons -https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Panama_Embera0605.jpg#/media/File:Panama_Embera0605.jpg ᐧ

Find more designs at www.getinkbox.com



Risks and challenges
We're currently testing different adhesive materials and non-woven fabrics for optimum application. We have application time down to 10 minutes, but aim to get it lower than that. We're sourcing our materials from the world's most innovative medical materials producer.
Shipping of Indiegogo perks is estimated to start in early January 2016.
Because we're still testing, shipping dates are not 100% accurate. We've estimated these dates with our best judgement, based on previous testing, knowledge of the new materials, and the shipping dates for our machinery. The formula itself is ready-to-go!

story:
What is Focus 5?

Focus 5 is a Web Application with iOS and Android Apps that allow you to:

  • Plan out your priority actions for the week in minutes

  • Keep your boss or accountability partner informed on what you are working on

  • Receive helpful reminders for unfinished tasks

  • Receive feedback metrics on your personal productivity

  • Track and report your accomplishments

Whether you are accountable to one person or to a team, Focus 5 can help you stay connected and focused on the RIGHT things. 

Why Focus 5 Works

78% of companies have good strategies and plans, but only 4% focus and execute.  The other 74% are distracted and unfocused.  We have thousands of distractions during our day.  With email, text messages, social media and other communications demanding our attention, we end up wasting precious time on things that add little or no value to our life.  Focus 5 will help you plan for what is important, be accountable to someone for these tasks and keep track of the progress you are making.  With Focus 5 you are 30 times more likely to achieve your goals.  That’s right…..30 times, because you are investing your time instead of just spending it.

See for Yourself

Pilot User Feedback

“Staying focused on my goals has always been a challenge for me. Focus 5 provides me a simple and easy to use software that allows me to focus on my priorities and keep them right at my finger-tips.  I plan out my priorities on Monday morning and then start and end every day utilizing Focus 5 to help me avoid distractions.  Focus 5 helps me INVEST my time rather than just SPEND my time.” 

Kevin Kelling

Mortgage Loan Originator

“I get more done with Focus 5 than I do without.  As a pilot user I was asked to stop using Focus 5 for 2 weeks.  I felt so unproductive for those two weeks, I couldn’t wait to start using it again.  With it, I get more of the right things done.”

Tom Minor

Business Owner

"With Focus 5 I keep my priority work front of mind each day.  It's simple to use and doesn't overcomplicate my workflow.  I remove the noise of my day and spend more time developing my team and connecting with my customers.  I cannot wait to share Focus 5 with my team!"

A.J. Frint

Business Development Manager


Why are we seeking Investors?

We are looking for 500 to 1,000 initial investors to join the Focus 5 community.  Investors are about building a feedback community to help us improve usability and provide input on future priorities and future releases.  Investors will be the first to have access to the full release. Funding from investors will help us bring these future releases to our user community sooner.  Even if we do not achieve our initial monetary goals from this campaign, we are committed to delivering Focus 5 to our Investors before the end of this year.

Where we are now and what is our expected future timing?

We currently have an iOS beta version that we have been testing with approximately 50 users for the last 6 months.  We have received great feedback on the App and plan to broaden the use of the application by delivering a full Web Application, iOS and Android Mobile versions to users around December 1st or sooner. 

Ultimately I would like to see Focus 5 be an ongoing source for tools and resources to help you achieve your goals and dreams.

Smart Investment

Your initial investment will insure that you never have to pay additional fees for access again and allow you to be the first to have access to the newly upgraded version of Focus 5.  It will also give you the opportunity to provide feedback on our design and help prioritize future functionality.  But let’s not forget the real benefit, YOU will be among the first to accomplish more with Focus 5.  With Focus 5 you are 30 times more likely to achieve your goals than without it.  It will help you start investing  your time right away.  Your investment in Focus 5 is an investment in your future success.

Hi, I’m Tim Scholten.  I am President of Visible Progress Visible Progress.  I consult with Financial Institutions and am also an Executive Coach.  I spent over 30 years in leadership positions in the banking industry.  In 2002 I managed a group of people that were responsible for Internet Banking for a Top 50 US bank.  We were a small team, but we set a goal of becoming the #1 Consumer Rated Online Bank in the US.  We had a good strategy, but a small team and an even smaller budget.  We knew that we needed to execute better than all our peers.  That is where the methods built into Focus 5, the product I am introducing today, were developed.  Using the Focus 5 method, we not only accomplished our goal of becoming the #1 Consumer Rated Online Bank within a year and a half, but were able to remain in the top 5 over the next 5 years.  Here is a link to my bio.  About Tim Scholten

Help Me Expand the Reach of Focus 5

Now I am on a mission to share these concepts with others using Focus 5.  I believe that Focus 5 can transform the lives of hundreds of thousands of people rather than just the few clients I coach each year.  Here is where I need your help.  I am looking for individuals and teams that are willing to make a monetary investment to be among the first to have access to Focus 5, commit to using it, and providing feedback.  In just 10 minutes per week using Focus 5, you can achieve more by working smarter, not harder.

If you would like to start investing your time instead of just spending your time, if you are ready take your life, your career, or your relationships to the next level, I invite you to become an early subscriber and help me help others do the same!

story:
This is my second attempt to raise my goal with Indiegogo. In my first attempt that ended November 4, 2014. It inspire 1,600 referal that turn in to $481.00 from 11 contributions. The campaign page also had 2,900 visits! How amazing that was to reach that many people. Please take a few moment to read my small business cause and I hope you get inspire today to become a contributor towards my passion, thank you! 

Hi my name is David Ovando, I grew up in the county in Virginia. Living in the country there was a lot to be done outside. Yard work started to grow on me a bit but never thought of it as a job. Going to school I was just learning what my goals and passions where in life. After graduating high school I had many job while going to college and every job I took didn't really make me happy or gave me the passion to go. I worked in construction doing framing, worked at the post office, sold new and used cars at a dealer, sold hats for lids, work now part-time at Lowes Home Improvement. All those job were not landscaping or lawn-care! 

           In June of 2008 I got married to the love of my life and received the news that I was going to be a dad. After the birth of my son I started a mowing business to make $600 for rent in May 2009. The passion and drive to learn more about growing my small mowing business then turn to a lawn and landscaping maintenance small business. I started the business in Bentonville, AR where it became an established small business. The name I choose was Mower Man Lawn Service. My business grew to over 100 mowing job per month with 20-30 landscaping maintenance per month over the years and I got the experience and knowledge by reading books and watching online videos. I came out in a local news paper in Bella vista, Arkansas doing leaf removal, have also been featured with Independent we stand (which is sponsored my Stihl and Chrysler) see it here: http://www.independentwestand.org/indie-thought... , and was nominated to be small business of the year out of 250 business nation wide with independent we stand in 2013 and again in 2014 out of 306 business that were nominated (didn't win, but it was an honor). Here is the link to the nomination for 2014 : (http://www.independentwestand.org/indies/profil... ). Green industry pro, which is a landscaping magazine and blog; they did an article on my business how you use social media to grow your business ( Read it here: http://www.greenindustrypros.com/article/11077281/social-media-marketing-profits). So as you can see my passion and drive to succeed has been noticed by a wide range of people.

        Fast-forward to today, my mother-in-law has dementia so she needs constants care so I moved my family and small business to San Diego, CA in June of 2013. She is also a 5-time cancer survivor so she means a lot to me, too.  I gave up my small business so my wife could take care of her mom. In the process I gave up my dream job and picked up a part-time job at Lowes Home Improvement while I could reestablish my small business. After being here for 2 years, I have had trouble putting funds together to afford to market my small business to my new customers. Things are very different here: There is a lot of competition, we are in a drought still since I moved to San Diego, and it's a city not a country setting like where I began my small business.

       If I made my goal I would be able to get some door hangers, pay for gas to distribute them, help get a website going, start advertising through social media, Get some equipment and repair equipment that I currently have, and create art work of my work that I want to see if I could start a new trend. I call it landscaping art. This art/ photography could be sold on eBay or etsy haven't decided yet.

       When I moved here I had some money saved aside but that was used up with living expenses and food. You may ask: Why don't you work to save up the money yourself if you're so passionate about this business? Because I would be so grateful if you could understand that making a small business is hard work. It takes a lot of dedication and passion. This all started with an idea that grew into something enjoyable to do everyday. A couple months back I was asked what make me different from any other lawn-care company? Several things make it different: my business was started from hard work and was not an inheritance, I do quality work without taking any short cut that others may do, I run and operate several social media accounts for the business by myself (my passion can be seen through each social media account page), my dream is not to be come rich from this line of work; it is to provide the best work that customers want or need due to not being able to do it them selves because of work or physical abilities. I want to thank everyone that takes the time to read my story. Other ways you can help is by becoming a fan of my landscaping business page on Facebook 

(Click Here: https://www.facebook.com/MowerManLS )

 and sharing this with your friends! Let's make it happen with your support, today!

make it different: my business was started from hard work and was not an
inheritance, I do quality work without taking any short cut that others may do,
I run and operate several social media accounts for the business by myself (my
passion can be seen through each social media account page), my dream is not to
be come rich from this line of work; it is to provide the best work that
customers want or need due to not being able to do it them selves because of
work or physical abilities. I want to thank everyone that takes the time to
read my story. Other ways you can help is by becoming a fan of my landscaping
business page on Facebook (Click Here: https://www.facebook.com/MowerManLS ) and sharing this with your friends! Let's make it happen with your support,
today!

story:
These days, creative work doesn’t stop when the office closes. Great ideas and inspiration can happen anytime. Having an external display is the perfect way to get more done efficiently but it’s difficult to fully develop an idea on a small screen. Until now, most portable monitors were only 13” or 15.6” and lacked essentials such as touchscreen control. 

So we created Ananta, the world’s first touchscreen 17.3-inch monitor, a stunning high definition screen that expands your view to unleash your creativity and maximize your productivity anywhere and anytime.

 

This full-featured portable touchscreen monitor is ultra-responsive and intuitively controlled via multiple touch gestures or simply with a pressure-sensitive stylus pen.

 

Upgrade your laptop with touchscreen convenience. You can expand your laptop with touchscreen functionality and turn it into a powerful drawing tool.

 

For artwork and design, Ananta comes with a tilt and pressure-sensitive capacitive stylus pen. You can easily vary line weight, create subtle shading, and produce a wide range of artistic effects just like with a conventional pencil.

 

  •  A Larger Touchscreen for Creative Ideas
     

A larger monitor helps you grow your ideas with a more expansive view. Ananta gives you pixel-perfect precision and smooth handwriting, note-taking, and sketching experience. Perfect for artists, designers, or photographers to create, sketch, or edit.

 

  •  Productivity-boosting Tool for Work
     

Master multitasking with dual monitors at the same time, perfect for office work, stock monitoring or programming in the portrait mode. With Ananta, you simply get more done.

 

  •  On-the-go Monitor for Entertainment
     

Enjoy a better gaming experience with a big screen! Supporting connection with Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, PC, and mobile games, Ananta always gives you a broad visual horizon and stereo sound effects.

 

Instantly turn your phone into a mobile movie theater to immerse yourself in a true cinematic experience with stereo sound effects and high-resolution display quality.

 

  •  Transform Your Smartphone into a 17.3” Laptop
     

With Ananta, you can simply turn your smartphone into a 17.3” laptop. Create a portable, efficient work station anywhere.

 

  •  Instant Plug and Play
     

You can connect your laptop to the monitor with a single USB Type-C to USB Type-C cable. It’s not necessary to bring tons of adapters and cables when you’re on the go. The monitor can be powered by your devices and it is highly energy-efficient, eliminating the need for bulky battery packs. 

Don't worry if your device's ports are not enough. The laptop or smartphone can also be charged directly via the monitor. No need to bring the extra power adapter while you're on the go. 

 

  •  Magnetic Stand and Protector
     

The monitor comes with a magnetic screen protector that also acts as a viewing stand. Super easily set up in different angles to fit your need best.

  •  All The Ports You Need
     

The monitor comes with 2 USB Type-C, 1 USB-A, 1 HDMI ports and 1 3.5mm audio jack to cover your daily needs.

 

 
  •  Ultra-narrow Bezel
     

Push your viewing experience to the limit with a narrow-bezel 17.3” screen. Whether you’re playing games or watching movies, you will always enjoy the full picture.

 

With Ananta, you can build up a 17.3" laptop easily without a 17.3" high-end laptop cost. It is more lightweight, portable and powerful than ever!

 

We are a team of engineers who passionated about developing the production boosting tool to help people work more efficiently. A secondary monitor to expand your view is not a new thing today. Most of the portable monitor we found in the current market is either 13" or 15.6". A 17.3” monitor can rarely be found in the current market. After research, we found that most of 17.3" monitors are too thick, bulky. And none of them are designed with the pressure-sensitive function and aren't compatible with the active stylus pen. We thought that could be a perfect feature on a 17.3" large portable monitor and can fill the blank in the current portable monitor market.

 

At the early stage of Ananta, it was thick with only one port for the power supply and data transformation. For the second prototype of Ananta, we increase the number of ports for convenience. After many tests we did, we are able to compact Ananta to a thinner and lighter monitor.

 

Please check the video below and you will see how Ananta structured and compact into such thinness.

After many tests of research, design and development we have successfully conquered the thin and portable 17.3" monitor without built-in battery.

 

Let's take a look at our workshop and the production line. We're confident to ship the product in our promised timeline. Please don't worry.

 

 

Here is a demo unedited video about the surprising pressure-sensitive functions. Check how the pressure-sensitive stylus pen works on Ananta monitor. You can easily control the thickness of the lines, create subtle shading, and produce a wide range of artistic effects.

 

We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll keep you up to date with Kickstarter updates and message. And please feel free to reach out to us!

With Ananta, you can build up a 17.3" laptop easily without a 17.3" high-end laptop cost. It is more lightweight, portable and powerful than ever!
 

 
 
 

 

 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 


 


 
 

 
We are a team of engineers who passionated about developing the production boosting tool to help people work more efficiently. A secondary monitor to expand your view is not a new thing today. Most of the portable monitor we found in the current market is either 13" or 15.6". A 17.3” monitor can rarely be found in the current market. After research, we found that most of 17.3" monitors are too thick, bulky. And none of them are designed with the pressure-sensitive function and aren't compatible with the active stylus pen. We thought that could be a perfect feature on a 17.3" large portable monitor and can fill the blank in the current portable monitor market.
 
At the early stage of Ananta, it was thick with only one port for the power supply and data transformation. For the second prototype of Ananta, we increase the number of ports for convenience. After many tests we did, we are able to compact Ananta to a thinner and lighter monitor.
 

 
 
Please check the video below and you will see how Ananta structured and compact into such thinness.




 

 
 

 

After many tests of research, design and development we have successfully conquered the thin and portable 17.3" monitor without built-in battery.
 

 
Let's take a look at our workshop and the production line. We're confident to ship the product in our promised timeline. Please don't worry.
 

 
Here is a demo unedited video about the surprising pressure-sensitive functions. Check how the pressure-sensitive stylus pen works on Ananta monitor. You can easily control the thickness of the lines, create subtle shading, and produce a wide range of artistic effects.
 


 



 


 

 

 

We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll keep you up to date with Kickstarter updates and message. And please feel free to reach out to us!

story:
We know that security can be an arduous task. We don’t want to create drudgery for you, so we designed 1-CLOAK to work the way you work. By making 1-CLOAK operate with the simple drag and drop functionality, nothing could be easier.

We’ve also used ground breaking 1-million-bit encryption technology, which is not only 7000 times more secure than standard encryption software, but it performs at speeds that allow live video audio or video transmissions to be encrypted and decrypted in real-time. So, next time there’s a security breach you can relax with 1-CLOAK as the information on your computer, in the cloud, on your USB and external drives is safe.

You also don’t need to worry about ransomware targeting your information because with 1-CLOAK the ransomware won’t be able find the files they are trying to target.

1-CLOAK works on both Mac & Windows computers (mobile is coming!) and it is so easy to use with an interface that looks like Finder or Windows-E. The 1-CLOAK workflow uses a drag and drop system that anyone can use.

 

 

The modern computing environment has changed significantly over the last few years and protecting data is increasingly important. We believe data protection should be easy to use and affordable so everyone can protect their data from hackers! Normal defence measures like antivirus software is no longer enough. These work as a perimeter protection but we all need to protect the core of our computers where we can protect the actual data itself. The best way to do this is with 1-CLOAK.

Our 1-CLOAK consumer product gives you 1 year of protection for $12 USD and works on a license subscription per person not per device. It is available for Mac & Windows (mobile is coming!). 1-CLOAK is also compatible with most cloud storage providers which means when they get infiltrated your data is of no value to the hackers as they can’t find what they want, keeping you safe.

 

“Dropbox hackers stole 68 million passwords – check if you are affected and how to protect yourself”- The Telegraph, 31st August 2016

“The world’s most valuable resource is no longer oil, but data”- the Economist, 6th May 2017

“Personal data vulnerable to cyber-attack” –  UK Office of the Information Commissioner, 14th March 2017

 

 

 

 

 

 

Building a more secure digital world is better for everyone. While we would love a digital world that was respectful, honest and trustworthy, the reality is not everyone has the same values as us. However, we recognise the difference we can make is helping individuals, like you, protect their privacy.

It just starts with the power of 1. Be a part of our movement to build a more secure digital world. Be a member of a community that truly understands and respects user rights and kick back at those who don’t have honest intentions.

If enough people join 1-CLOAK then together we will build a more secure digital world.

Crowdfunding allows us to present the 1-CLOAK opportunity to a community that has similar values. Community members who want to make a difference but also savvy individuals who want to protect themselves, their data and their family’s privacy.

 

I am sure you can see why 1-CLOAK is needed. We are reaching out through this crowdfunding platform for your support so that we can bring on all of the other products we have in the pipeline faster – Business, Enterprise, GDPR Compliance product just to name a few. With this funding the project will get to market in August 2017. If everything goes well then later this year we will also be looking at adding handheld functionality so your mobile devices will be protected as well.

1-CLOAK is brought to you by ONE Cube, a NZ start-up company focused on security in the global market. We believe protecting data should be easy, fast and affordable so everyone can protect their data from being compromised. We take a different view to security companies. Our view is – if you can’t stop someone from accessing your system, make the data (and thereby it’s inherent value), worthless to them. Our first product off the blocks is 1-CLOAK consumer and it ticks all our boxes.

We really appreciate your time and your support and look forward to you joining our community to make the digital village a more protected space.

 

email us on info@1cube.net

story:
About

MoverPad can be snapped aside computer monitor once MagDisc installed.

The virtual reality can sometimes be very chaotic and distracting. Bunch of mover can serve as steady visualization of tasks and ideas on workdesk, keeping you on track.

Play with your ideas! Meet Mover.

Brainstorm ideas brick by brick and easy colliding. 4 sizes of Movers can be used for different purposes, ranging from your sudden small idea to your big list of goals.

 

It pops off!

With a press on the edge of the left, Mover will stand in a tilting position, releasing space for it to be taken away easily.

Special Angle Design

Movable Thinking and Organizing

Things at a glance

Snap the whole thing at eye-sight.

*At the end of the campaign, we will send each backer a survey collecting your choice of variations regarding the reward you pledged.

“What if I want a MoverPad and two packs of MoverCombo?”

“What if I want an extra MoverBook on top of my MoverCombo?”

“What if I want Refill?”

No worries, this is taken care of by the Add-on (Please be aware of the Extra Shipping Cost)

(Select your base reward first and adjust the pledge amount)

 

Shipping Cost needs to be added to reflect weight change.

Instruction to include another rewards in pledge

For bulk purchase, please email business@bravestorming.com

We hope to bring more action to people.

We believe by holding something genuine and real helps people focus more. When you can hold something real in hand, you have a sense of control.

Experience the new pleasure of killing task!

Ready to make your own work life style?

Movers can seamlessly suit your need with customizable templates on both MoverPad and MoverBook.

We welcome your creation to our newly found template community. Snap your template and hashtag #movertemplate and we may make them downloadable on our website.

The two page philosophy

Mover is about denoising and focus. We believe only the important ones are worth your attention. So we have the two-page philosophy, only sheltering stuff and ideas in immediate time span. They all stay on top with a single flip.

“Aren’t you tired of flipping pages all the time?”

“What mover organizers do you have exactly?”

 

Basically, movers can snap on any strong metal surface (whatever magnet can stick on). For better organizing and elegant usage, we also designed specialized organizer for movers.

Meet the MagDisc!

Tired of picking up memo and a messy workspace?

You can also snap hand written notes with Mover on a MagDisc.

Meet the MoverPad!

Store a bunch of action steps or notes in brick form for carrying and snapping.

About the snapping part….. MoverPad is embedded with strong magnets to be snapped aside a computer screen for easy visualization after MagDisc installation.

No worries, it can also stand vertically and horizontally.

Slide in your own template guiding your day to day action or thinking.

Snap to your eyesight for movable thinking!

Meet the MoverBook!

Larger area to store a bunch of action steps or notes in brick form.

Snap to the Fridge!

 
 

Consistent improvement of the outlook.

The Movers' magnet strength test

The Bauhaus style and the Simplicious style. Yet, you can always create your own style.

We originally used paper, but something about the hand feeling is lacking. That is why we keep changing and the tool evolves to a brick form.

Look how awful the original design is. The press-and-standup design has been tested over and over again to ensure the smooth experience.

We even thought of using a whole metal container as the base of Mover. But it failed.

We have tested different plastics for the strength and flexibility. Salute to those who broke and failed :)

We have finalized our design and are ready to manufacture.

During the prototyping period, we have built a strong connection with our suppliers and excluded the bad ones.

We have done a lot of testing on prototype and tooling process to ensure the manufacturing and production process will be feasible and smooth.

For Indiegogo InDemand, since we have succeeded funding on Kickstarter, we will ship out any order on a monthly basis. 

 

(photo from Digital Creator, Victor Cheng)

(photo from Digital Creator, Victor Cheng)

Like many metropolitan cities, we are in need of some space, especially in Hong Kong. This topic has brought us together and we thought to ourselves, "Even though we do not have much physical space, we at least can create our own area for thinking,

We have been using this tool to brainstorm and make this Kickstarter campaign happen.

If you know someone in mind whom you think the Movers will bring value to their life, we would love you to share this campaign with them. Thank you!

For Press inquiries about Bravestorming.com, please email press@bravestorming.com. Or download our media kit including photos, GIFs, videos and more high quality materials.

 

 

Last but not least, thank you Quinten Bavelaar from Mfly Music for granting us to use his amazing sound clip for our video. Do check out his work!

 

Risks and challenges

We have accumulated a lot of knowledge and experience to develop Mover. Our team has put in a great deal of effort into this project and we are confident that with a successful backing, we will be able to successfully complete our campaign.

We know how important communication is and we pledge to be open and transparent with you to the best of our abilities. If we are met with unexpected circumstances, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.

It is important to note that we ship the products to a wide-range of certain countries and there may be some delays due to taxes, tariffs and other import regulation in each country.

Mover is a consumable product and we will try our best to keep the quality at its best.
Although it is a rare scenario, if the products fall off too many times, there is a potential for the magnets to drop out from the movers. There will not be refund nor return process. Users are advised to find ways to restore the product.

Warning: Please read the product instruction at bravestorming.com to make sure setting up the product in a proper way.
